  57:    37:     $parentDir = "$projectPath\agents\$($subAgent.Parent)\sous_agents"
  58:    38:     $agentDir = "$parentDir\$($subAgent.Name)"
  59:    39:
  60:    40:     # Cr√©er le dossier du sous-agent
  61:    41:     New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $agentDir -Force | Out-Null
  62:    42:
  63:    43:     # Cr√©er les fichiers de base
  64:    44:     $files = @("config.yaml", "agent.py", "tools.py", "__init__.py")
  65:    45:     foreach ($file in $files) {
  66:    46:         $filePath = "$agentDir\$file"
  67:    47:         if (-not (Test-Path $filePath)) {
  68:    48:             New-Item -ItemType File -Path $filePath -Force | Out-Null
  69:    49:         }
  70:    50:     }
  71:    51:
  72:    52:     Write-Host "   ‚úÖ $($subAgent.Parent)/$($subAgent.Name) ($($subAgent.Type))" -ForegroundColor Green
  73:    53: }

  75:    55: # 2. Cr√©er les fichiers __init__.py pour l'import
  76:    56: Write-Host "`n2. CONFIGURATION DES IMPORTS..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  77:    57:

  79:    59:     $initFile = "$projectPath\agents\$parent\sous_agents\__init__.py"
  80:    60:
  81:    61:     $imports = @'
  82:    62: # Import des sous-agents
  83:    63: try:
  84:    64:     from .cloud_architect import CloudArchitectSubAgent
  85:    65:     from .blockchain_architect import BlockchainArchitectSubAgent
  86:    66:     from .microservices_architect import MicroservicesArchitectSubAgent
  87:    67: except ImportError as e:
  88:    68:     print(f"Erreur d'import des sous-agents: {e}")
  89:    69:
  90:    70: __all__ = [
  91:    71:     "CloudArchitectSubAgent",
  92:    72:     "BlockchainArchitectSubAgent",
  93:    73:     "MicroservicesArchitectSubAgent"
  94:    74: ]
  95:    75: '@
  96:    76:
  97:    77:     # Adapter les imports selon le parent
  98:    78:     if ($parent -eq "coder") {
  99:    79:         $imports = $imports.Replace("cloud_architect", "backend_coder")
 100:    80:         $imports = $imports.Replace("blockchain_architect", "frontend_coder")
 101:    81:         $imports = $imports.Replace("microservices_architect", "devops_coder")
 102:    82:         $imports = $imports.Replace("CloudArchitectSubAgent", "BackendCoderSubAgent")
 103:    83:         $imports = $imports.Replace("BlockchainArchitectSubAgent", "FrontendCoderSubAgent")
 104:    84:         $imports = $imports.Replace("MicroservicesArchitectSubAgent", "DevOpsCoderSubAgent")
 105:    85:     }
 106:    86:
 107:    87:     $imports | Out-File -FilePath $initFile -Force -Encoding UTF8
 108:    88:     Write-Host "   ‚úÖ $parent/__init__.py cr√©√©" -ForegroundColor Green
 109:    89: }
 110:    90:
 111:    91: # 3. Mettre √† jour l'agent parent pour g√©rer les sous-agents
 112:    92: Write-Host "`n3. MISE A JOUR DES AGENTS PARENTS..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
 113:    93:
 114:    94: foreach ($parent in @("architect", "coder", "smart_contract", "frontend_web3", "tester")) {
 115:    95:     $parentAgentFile = "$projectPath\agents\$parent\agent.py"
 116:    96:
 117:    97:     if (Test-Path $parentAgentFile) {
 118:    98:         $parentCode = Get-Content $parentAgentFile -Raw
 119:    99:
 120:   100:         # Ajouter la gestion des sous-agents
 121:   101:         $subAgentManagement = @'
 122:   102:
 123:   103:     # Gestion des sous-agents
 124:   104:     def __init__(self, config_path: str):
 125:   105:         super().__init__(config_path)
 126:   106:         self.sub_agents = {}
 127:   107:         self._initialize_sub_agents()
 128:   108:
 129:   109:     def _initialize_sub_agents(self):
 130:   110:         """Initialise les sous-agents sp√©cialis√©s"""
 131:   111:         try:
 132:   112:             from .sous_agents import *
 133:   113:
 134:   114:             # Cr√©ation dynamique des sous-agents bas√©e sur la configuration
 135:   115:             sub_agent_configs = self.config.get("sub_agents", {})
 136:   116:
 137:   117:             for agent_name, agent_config in sub_agent_configs.items():
 138:   118:                 agent_class_name = f"{agent_name.capitalize().replace('_', '')}SubAgent"
 139:   119:                 agent_class = globals().get(agent_class_name)
 140:   120:
 141:   121:                 if agent_class:
 142:   122:                     sub_agent = agent_class(agent_config.get("config_path", ""))
 143:   123:                     self.sub_agents[agent_name] = sub_agent
 144:   124:                     self.logger.info(f"Sous-agent {agent_name} initialis√©")
 145:   125:                 else:
 146:   126:                     self.logger.warning(f"Classe non trouv√©e pour le sous-agent {agent_name}")
 147:   127:
 148:   128:         except ImportError as e:
 149:   129:             self.logger.error(f"Erreur lors de l'import des sous-agents: {e}")
 150:   130:
 151:   131:     async def delegate_to_sub_agent(self, task_type: str, task_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 152:   132:         """D√©l√®gue une t√¢che √† un sous-agent appropri√©"""
 153:   133:         # Logique de routage vers le bon sous-agent
 154:   134:         sub_agent_mapping = self.config.get("sub_agent_mapping", {})
 155:   135:
 156:   136:         for pattern, agent_name in sub_agent_mapping.items():
 157:   137:             if task_type.startswith(pattern):
 158:   138:                 if agent_name in self.sub_agents:
 159:   139:                     self.logger.info(f"D√©l√©gation de la t√¢che {task_type} au sous-agent {agent_name}")
 160:   140:                     return await self.sub_agents[agent_name].execute(task_data, {})
 161:   141:
 162:   142:         # Fallback: utiliser l'agent principal
 163:   143:         self.logger.info(f"Aucun sous-agent trouv√© pour {task_type}, utilisation de l'agent principal")
 164:   144:         return await self.execute(task_data, {})
 165:   145:
 166:   146:     async def get_sub_agents_status(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 167:   147:         """Retourne le statut de tous les sous-agents"""
 168:   148:         status = {}
 169:   149:
 170:   150:         for agent_name, agent_instance in self.sub_agents.items():
 171:   151:             try:
 172:   152:                 health = await agent_instance.health_check()
 173:   153:                 status[agent_name] = {
 174:   154:                     "status": health.get("status", "unknown"),
 175:   155:                     "agent_info": agent_instance.get_agent_info()
 176:   156:                 }
 177:   157:             except Exception as e:
 178:   158:                 status[agent_name] = {
 179:   159:                     "status": "error",
 180:   160:                     "error": str(e)
 181:   161:                 }
 182:   162:
 183:   163:         return {
 184:   164:             "total_sub_agents": len(self.sub_agents),
 185:   165:             "sub_agents": status
 186:   166:         }
 187:   167: '@
 188:   168:
 189:   169:         # Ins√©rer apr√®s la classe BaseAgent
 190:   170:         if ($parentCode -match "class.*Agent\(BaseAgent\):") {
 191:   171:             $modifiedCode = $parentCode -replace "(class.*Agent\(BaseAgent\):[\s\S]*?)(def __init__)", "`$1$subAgentManagement`n`n    `$2"
 192:   172:             $modifiedCode | Out-File -FilePath $parentAgentFile -Force -Encoding UTF8
 193:   173:             Write-Host "   ‚úÖ $parent/agent.py mis √† jour avec la gestion des sous-agents" -ForegroundColor Green
 194:   174:         }
 195:   175:     }
 196:   176: }

 222:   202:     specialization: "Architecture Microservices"
 223:   203:
 224:   204: # Mapping des t√¢ches vers les sous-agents
 225:   205: sub_agent_mapping:
 226:   206:   "cloud_": "cloud_architect"
 227:   207:   "aws_": "cloud_architect"
 228:   208:   "azure_": "cloud_architect"
 229:   209:   "gcp_": "cloud_architect"
 230:   210:   "blockchain_": "blockchain_architect"
 231:   211:   "web3_": "blockchain_architect"

 233:   213:   "microservices_": "microservices_architect"
 234:   214:   "service_": "microservices_architect"
 235:   215:   "api_": "microservices_architect"
 236:   216: '@
 237:   217:
 238:   218:         # Adapter pour chaque parent
 239:   219:         if ($parent -eq "coder") {
 240:   220:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("cloud_architect", "backend_coder")
 241:   221:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("blockchain_architect", "frontend_coder")
 242:   222:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("microservices_architect", "devops_coder")
 243:   223:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("Architecture Cloud", "Backend Development")

 246:   226:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("cloud_", "backend_")
 247:   227:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("aws_", "api_")
 248:   228:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("azure_", "database_")
 249:   229:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("gcp_", "infrastructure_")
 250:   230:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("blockchain_", "frontend_")
 251:   231:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("web3_", "ui_")
 252:   232:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("smart_contract_", "component_")
 253:   233:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("microservices_", "devops_")
 254:   234:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("service_", "pipeline_")
 255:   235:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("api_", "deployment_")
 256:   236:         }
 257:   237:
 258:   238:         # Ajouter √† la fin du fichier
 259:   239:         $newContent = $configContent.Trim() + "`n`n" + $subAgentSection

 261:   241:

 263:   243:     }

 268:   248:
 269:   249: $testIntegrationScript = @'

 279:   259: async def test_subagents():
 280:   260:     """Teste l'int√©gration des sous-agents"""
 281:   261:     print("üß™ TEST D'INTEGRATION DES SOUS-AGENTS")

 284:   264:     # Test avec l'agent architecte
 285:   265:     try:
 286:   266:         from architect.agent import ArchitectAgent
 287:   267:
 288:   268:         # Cr√©er l'agent
 289:   269:         architect = ArchitectAgent("agents/architect/config.yaml")

 292:   272:         print(f"‚úÖ Agent architecte initialis√©")
 293:   273:         print(f"üìä Sous-agents charg√©s: {len(architect.sub_agents)}")
 294:   274:
 295:   275:         # Tester chaque sous-agent
 296:   276:         for agent_name, agent_instance in architect.sub_agents.items():
 297:   277:             try:
 298:   278:                 info = agent_instance.get_agent_info()
 299:   279:                 print(f"  ‚Ä¢ {agent_name}: {info.get('specialization', 'N/A')}")
 300:   280:             except Exception as e:
 301:   281:                 print(f"  ‚Ä¢ {agent_name}: ‚ùå Erreur - {e}")
 302:   282:
 303:   283:         # Tester la d√©l√©gation
 304:   284:         test_task = {
 305:   285:             "type": "cloud_design",
 306:   286:             "requirements": {
 307:   287:                 "name": "Test Cloud Architecture",
 308:   288:                 "budget_constrained": True,
 309:   289:                 "needs_global_presence": False
 310:   290:             }
 311:   291:         }
 312:   292:
 313:   293:         result = await architect.delegate_to_sub_agent("cloud_design", test_task)
 314:   294:         print(f"üìã R√©sultat de d√©l√©gation: {result.get('status', 'N/A')}")
 315:   295:
 316:   296:     except Exception as e:
 317:   297:         print(f"‚ùå Erreur lors du test: {e}")
 318:   298:         import traceback
 319:   299:         traceback.print_exc()

 321:   301:     print("="*60)
 322:   302:     print("‚úÖ TEST D'INTEGRATION TERMINE")
 323:   303:
 324:   304: if __name__ == "__main__":
 325:   305:     asyncio.run(test_subagents())
 326:   306: '@
 327:   307:
 328:   308: $testIntegrationScript | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\test_subagents_integration.py" -Force -Encoding UTF8
 329:   309:
 330:   310: try {

 338:   318: # 6. G√©n√©rer le rapport final
 339:   319: Write-Host "`n6. GENERATION DU RAPPORT FINAL..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
 340:   320:
 341:   321: $subAgentsReport = @{
 342:   322:     deployment_date = Get-Date -Format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
 343:   323:     total_sub_agents = $subAgents.Count
 344:   324:     sub_agents_by_parent = @{}
 345:   325:     structure = @{}
 346:   326: }
 347:   327:
 348:   328: foreach ($parent in @("architect", "coder", "smart_contract", "frontend_web3", "tester")) {
 349:   329:     $parentSubAgents = $subAgents | Where-Object { $_.Parent -eq $parent }
 350:   330:     $subAgentsReport.sub_agents_by_parent[$parent] = @{
 351:   331:         count = $parentSubAgents.Count
 352:   332:         agents = $parentSubAgents.Name
 353:   333:         types = $parentSubAgents.Type
 354:   334:     }
 355:   335:
 356:   336:     # Compter les fichiers cr√©√©s
 357:   337:     $parentDir = "$projectPath\agents\$parent\sous_agents"
 358:   338:     if (Test-Path $parentDir) {
 359:   339:         $fileCount = (Get-ChildItem -Path $parentDir -File -Recurse).Count
 360:   340:         $dirCount = (Get-ChildItem -Path $parentDir -Directory).Count
 361:   341:         $subAgentsReport.structure[$parent] = @{
 362:   342:             directories = $dirCount
 363:   343:             files = $fileCount
 364:   344:         }
 365:   345:     }
 366:   346: }
 367:   347:
 368:   348: $subAgentsReport | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10 | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\reports\subagents_deployment_report.json" -Force
 369:   349:
 370:   350: Write-Host "`n" + "="*60 -ForegroundColor Cyan
 371:   351: Write-Host "üéâ DEPLOIEMENT DES SOUS-AGENTS TERMINE !" -ForegroundColor Green
 372:   352: Write-Host "="*60 -ForegroundColor Cyan
 373:   353: Write-Host ""
 374:   354: Write-Host "üìä RESUME:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
 375:   355: Write-Host "  ‚Ä¢ Sous-agents d√©ploy√©s: $($subAgentsReport.total_sub_agents)" -ForegroundColor White
 376:   356: Write-Host ""
 377:   357: Write-Host "üîß PAR AGENT PRINCIPAL:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
 378:   358: foreach ($parent in $subAgentsReport.sub_agents_by_parent.Keys) {
 379:   359:     $parentData = $subAgentsReport.sub_agents_by_parent[$parent]
 380:   360:     Write-Host "  ‚Ä¢ $parent : $($parentData.count) sous-agents" -ForegroundColor White
 381:   361:     foreach ($agent in $parentData.agents) {
 382:   362:         Write-Host "    ‚ó¶ $agent" -ForegroundColor Gray
 383:   363:     }
 384:   364: }
 385:   365: Write-Host ""
 386:   366: Write-Host "üìÅ FICHIERS CREES:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
 387:   367: foreach ($parent in $subAgentsReport.structure.Keys) {
 388:   368:     $structure = $subAgentsReport.structure[$parent]
 389:   369:     Write-Host "  ‚Ä¢ $parent : $($structure.files) fichiers dans $($structure.directories) dossiers" -ForegroundColor White
 390:   370: }
 391:   371: Write-Host ""
 392:   372: Write-Host "‚ö° COMMANDES DE TEST:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
 393:   373: Write-Host "  Tester l'int√©gration: python test_subagents_integration.py" -ForegroundColor White

 400: SCRIPT 2 | install-blockchain.ps1
 401: Size: 13020 bytes | Type: .ps1 | Modified: 2026-01-26 20:59:00.750096
 402: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 403:     1: # install-blockchain.ps1 - Script d'installation des outils blockchain
 404:     2: # Version corrig√©e pour d√©tecter Foundry sur D: - 2026-01-27
 405:     3:
 406:     4: # ========== FONCTIONS ==========
 407:     5: function Test-CommandExists {
 408:     6:     param([string]$CommandName)
 409:     7:     try {
 410:     8:         # Essayer d'abord la m√©thode standard
 411:     9:         $cmd = Get-Command $CommandName -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
 412:    10:         if ($null -ne $cmd) {
 413:    11:             return $true
 414:    12:         }
 415:    13:
 416:    14:         # V√©rifier sur le disque D: sp√©cifiquement
 417:    15:         if ($CommandName -eq "forge") {
 418:    16:             $forgePaths = @(
 419:    17:                 "D:\Foundry\forge.exe",
 420:    18:                 "D:\foundry\forge.exe",
 421:    19:                 "$env:ProgramFiles\Foundry\bin\forge.exe",
 422:    20:                 "$env:USERPROFILE\.foundry\bin\forge.exe"
 423:    21:             )
 424:    22:
 425:    23:             foreach ($path in $forgePaths) {
 426:    24:                 if (Test-Path $path) {
 427:    25:                     # Ajouter au PATH de la session si trouv√©
 428:    26:                     $binDir = Split-Path $path -Parent
 429:    27:                     if ($env:Path -notlike "*$binDir*") {
 430:    28:                         $env:Path += ";$binDir"
 431:    29:                     }
 432:    30:                     return $true
 433:    31:                 }
 434:    32:             }
 435:    33:         }
 436:    34:
 437:    35:         return $false
 438:    36:     } catch {
 439:    37:         return $false
 440:    38:     }
 441:    39: }
 442:    40:
 443:    41: function Write-InstallLog {
 444:    42:     param([string]$Message, [string]$Type = "INFO")
 445:    43:     $timestamp = Get-Date -Format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
 446:    44:     $color = "White"
 447:    45:     if ($Type -eq "SUCCESS") { $color = "Green" }
 448:    46:     elseif ($Type -eq "ERROR") { $color = "Red" }
 449:    47:     elseif ($Type -eq "WARNING") { $color = "Yellow" }
 450:    48:     Write-Host "[$timestamp] $Type : $Message" -ForegroundColor $color
 451:    49: }
 452:    50:
 453:    51: function Invoke-Silent {
 454:    52:     param([string]$Command)
 455:    53:     try {
 456:    54:         Invoke-Expression $Command 2>$null 1>$null
 457:    55:         return $true
 458:    56:     } catch {
 459:    57:         return $false
 460:    58:     }
 461:    59: }
 462:    60:
 463:    61: # ========== INSTALLATION DES OUTILS ==========
 464:    62: Write-Host "`n=== INSTALLATION DES OUTILS BLOCKCHAIN ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 465:    63: $installDate = Get-Date -Format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
 466:    64: Write-Host "Date: $installDate`n"
 467:    65:
 468:    66: # 1. V√âRIFICATION FOUNDRY (VERSION CORRIG√âE POUR D:)
 469:    67: Write-Host "1. V√âRIFICATION FOUNDRY..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
 470:    68:
 471:    69: # V√©rifier sp√©cifiquement sur D:
 472:    70: $foundryFound = $false
 473:    71: $foundryPath = $null
 474:    72:
 475:    73: $possiblePaths = @(
 476:    74:     "D:\Foundry\forge.exe",
 477:    75:     "D:\foundry\forge.exe",  # Votre installation
 478:    76:     "D:\Foundry\bin\forge.exe",
 479:    77:     "D:\foundry\bin\forge.exe",
 480:    78:     "$env:ProgramFiles\Foundry\bin\forge.exe",
 481:    79:     "$env:USERPROFILE\.foundry\bin\forge.exe"
 482:    80: )
 483:    81:
 484:    82: foreach ($path in $possiblePaths) {
 485:    83:     if (Test-Path $path) {
 486:    84:         $foundryFound = $true
 487:    85:         $foundryPath = $path
 488:    86:         $binDir = Split-Path $path -Parent
 489:    87:
 490:    88:         # Ajouter au PATH de la session si n√©cessaire
 491:    89:         if ($env:Path -notlike "*$binDir*") {
 492:    90:             $env:Path += ";$binDir"
 493:    91:             Write-InstallLog "Ajout√© au PATH de la session: $binDir" -Type "INFO"
 494:    92:         }
 495:    93:         break
 496:    94:     }
 497:    95: }
 498:    96:
 499:    97: if ($foundryFound) {
 500:    98:     Write-InstallLog "Foundry trouv√© √†: $foundryPath" -Type "SUCCESS"
 501:    99:
 502:   100:     # Tenter de v√©rifier la version
 503:   101:     try {
 504:   102:         $forgeVersion = forge --version 2>&1 | Select-Object -First 1
 505:   103:         if ($forgeVersion -match "forge") {
 506:   104:             Write-InstallLog "Version: $forgeVersion" -Type "INFO"
 507:   105:         } else {
 508:   106:             # Essayer en appelant directement
 509:   107:             $directPath = $foundryPath
 510:   108:             & $directPath --version 2>&1 | ForEach-Object {
 511:   109:                 if ($_ -match "forge") {
 512:   110:                     Write-InstallLog "Version: $_" -Type "INFO"
 513:   111:                 }
 514:   112:             }
 515:   113:         }
 516:   114:     } catch {
 517:   115:         Write-InstallLog "Impossible de v√©rifier la version de Foundry" -Type "WARNING"
 518:   116:     }
 519:   117: } else {
 520:   118:     Write-InstallLog "Foundry non d√©tect√©" -Type "WARNING"
 521:   119:     Write-Host "`nFoundry semble √™tre install√© sur D:\foundry\" -ForegroundColor Yellow
 522:   120:     Write-Host "Mais n'est pas dans le PATH de cette session." -ForegroundColor White
 523:   121:     Write-Host "`nPour corriger:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
 524:   122:     Write-Host "1. Ajoutez D:\foundry\ au PATH syst√®me:" -ForegroundColor White
 525:   123:     Write-Host "   [Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable('Path', `$env:Path + ';D:\foundry', 'Machine')" -ForegroundColor Gray
 526:   124:     Write-Host "2. Red√©marrez PowerShell" -ForegroundColor White
 527:   125:     Write-Host "3. Testez: forge --version" -ForegroundColor White
 528:   126:     Write-Host "`nOU ex√©cutez cette commande maintenant:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
 529:   127:     Write-Host "   `$env:Path += ';D:\foundry'" -ForegroundColor Gray
 530:   128: }
 531:   129:
 532:   130: # 2. INSTALLATION HARDHAT
 533:   131: Write-Host "`n2. INSTALLATION HARDHAT..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
 534:   132:
 535:   133: if (Test-CommandExists "npm") {
 536:   134:     # V√©rifier si Hardhat est d√©j√† disponible
 537:   135:     $hardhatCheck = $false
 538:   136:     try {
 539:   137:         $output = npx hardhat --version 2>$null
 540:   138:         if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
 541:   139:             $hardhatCheck = $true
 542:   140:         }
 543:   141:     } catch {
 544:   142:         $hardhatCheck = $false
 545:   143:     }
 546:   144:
 547:   145:     if (-not $hardhatCheck) {
 548:   146:         Write-InstallLog "Installation Hardhat..." -Type "INFO"
 549:   147:         try {
 550:   148:             npm install -g hardhat 2>$null
 551:   149:             Write-InstallLog "Hardhat install√©" -Type "SUCCESS"
 552:   150:         } catch {
 553:   151:             Write-InstallLog "Erreur installation Hardhat" -Type "ERROR"
 554:   152:         }
 555:   153:     } else {
 556:   154:         Write-InstallLog "Hardhat d√©j√† disponible" -Type "INFO"
 557:   155:     }
 558:   156: } else {
 559:   157:     Write-InstallLog "npm non disponible" -Type "WARNING"
 560:   158: }
 561:   159:
 562:   160: # 3. INSTALLATION OUTILS SECURITE
 563:   161: Write-Host "`n3. INSTALLATION OUTILS SECURITE..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
 564:   162:
 565:   163: # V√©rifier Python/pip
 566:   164: $pipExists = Test-CommandExists "pip"
 567:   165:
 568:   166: $securityTools = @(
 569:   167:     @{Name="Solhint"; Command="solhint"; Type="npm"; Install="npm install -g solhint"}
 570:   168: )
 571:   169:
 572:   170: # Ajouter outils pip seulement si pip existe
 573:   171: if ($pipExists) {
 574:   172:     Write-InstallLog "pip d√©tect√©, ajout des outils Python..." -Type "INFO"
 575:   173:     $securityTools += @{Name="Slither"; Command="slither"; Type="pip"; Install="pip install slither-analyzer --user"}
 576:   174:     $securityTools += @{Name="Mythril"; Command="myth"; Type="pip"; Install="pip install mythril --user"}
 577:   175: } else {
 578:   176:     Write-InstallLog "pip non d√©tect√©, outils Python ignor√©s" -Type "INFO"
 579:   177: }
 580:   178:
 581:   179: foreach ($tool in $securityTools) {
 582:   180:     # V√©rifier si d√©j√† install√©
 583:   181:     if (Test-CommandExists $tool.Command) {
 584:   182:         Write-InstallLog "$($tool.Name) d√©j√† install√©" -Type "INFO"
 585:   183:         continue
 586:   184:     }
 587:   185:
 588:   186:     Write-InstallLog "Installation $($tool.Name)..." -Type "INFO"
 589:   187:
 590:   188:     if ($tool.Type -eq "npm") {
 591:   189:         try {
 592:   190:             Invoke-Silent "npm install -g solhint"
 593:   191:             Write-InstallLog "$($tool.Name) install√©" -Type "SUCCESS"
 594:   192:         } catch {
 595:   193:             Write-InstallLog "Erreur installation $($tool.Name)" -Type "ERROR"
 596:   194:         }
 597:   195:     } elseif ($tool.Type -eq "pip") {
 598:   196:         try {
 599:   197:             Invoke-Silent $tool.Install
 600:   198:             Write-InstallLog "$($tool.Name) install√©" -Type "SUCCESS"
 601:   199:         } catch {
 602:   200:             Write-InstallLog "Erreur installation $($tool.Name)" -Type "ERROR"
 603:   201:         }
 604:   202:     }
 605:   203: }
 606:   204:
 607:   205: # 4. INSTALLATION OUTILS FRONTEND
 608:   206: Write-Host "`n4. INSTALLATION OUTILS FRONTEND..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
 609:   207:

 611:   209:     @{Name="TypeScript"; Command="tsc"; Install="npm install -g typescript"},
 612:   210:     @{Name="Yarn"; Command="yarn"; Install="npm install -g yarn"}
 613:   211: )
 614:   212:

 616:   214:     if (Test-CommandExists $tool.Command) {
 617:   215:         Write-InstallLog "$($tool.Name) d√©j√† install√©" -Type "INFO"
 618:   216:     } else {

 625:   223:         }

 648:   246: Write-InstallLog "Installation Viem (local)..." -Type "INFO"

 654:   252:     }

 661:   259: }

 665:   263:
 666:   264: $rpcConfig = @{
 667:   265:     "ethereum_mainnet" = "https://eth.llamarpc.com"
 668:   266:     "polygon" = "https://polygon.llamarpc.com"
 669:   267:     "arbitrum" = "https://arbitrum.llamarpc.com"
 670:   268:     "optimism" = "https://optimism.llamarpc.com"
 671:   269:     "base" = "https://base.llamarpc.com"
 672:   270: }
 673:   271:
 674:   272: $configPath = "$PWD\rpc_endpoints.json"
 675:   273: try {
 676:   274:     $rpcConfig | ConvertTo-Json | Set-Content $configPath -Encoding UTF8
 677:   275:     Write-InstallLog "Configuration RPC sauvegard√©e dans $configPath" -Type "SUCCESS"
 678:   276: } catch {
 679:   277:     Write-InstallLog "Erreur sauvegarde RPC" -Type "ERROR"
 680:   278: }

 685:   283: # V√©rifier Foundry avec notre fonction am√©lior√©e
 686:   284: $forgeInstalled = Test-CommandExists "forge"
 687:   285:
 688:   286: # V√©rifications des autres outils

 696:   294: )

 700:   298:
 701:   299: foreach ($tool in $toolsToVerify) {
 702:   300:     if ($tool.Installed) {
 703:   301:         Write-Host "  ‚úÖ $($tool.Name)" -ForegroundColor Green
 704:   302:     } else {

 706:   304:     }
 707:   305: }
 708:   306:
 709:   307: # V√©rifier Viem
 710:   308: $viemInstalled = Test-Path "node_modules/viem"

 712:   310: if ($viemInstalled) {
 713:   311:     Write-Host "  ‚úÖ Viem (local)" -ForegroundColor Green
 714:   312: } else {

 716:   314: }
 717:   315:
 718:   316: Write-Host ("`n" + "-" * 50) -ForegroundColor Gray
 719:   317:
 720:   318: # 8. CR√âATION DU FICHIER DE R√âSUM√â
 721:   319: $summary = @"
 722:   320: === R√âSUM√â DE L'INSTALLATION BLOCKCHAIN ===
 723:   321: Date: $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
 724:   322: R√©pertoire: $PWD
 725:   323:
 726:   324: STATUT DES INSTALLATIONS:
 727:   325: $(foreach ($tool in $toolsToVerify) {
 728:   326:     $status = if ($tool.Installed) { "‚úì" } else { "‚úó" }
 729:   327:     "  $status $($tool.Name)"
 730:   328: })
 731:   329:
 732:   330: $(if ($viemInstalled) { "  ‚úì Viem (local)" } else { "  ‚úó Viem" })
 733:   331:
 734:   332: FICHIERS CONFIGUR√âS:
 735:   333: ‚Ä¢ rpc_endpoints.json - Endpoints RPC
 736:   334:
 737:   335: PROCHAINES √âTAPES:
 738:   336: 1. Pour Foundry: Ex√©cuter 'forge --version' pour v√©rifier
 739:   337: 2. Pour d√©velopper: npx hardhat init
 740:   338: 3. Pour tester: forge test

 746:   344: "@
 747:   345:

 749:   347:     $summary | Out-File "$PWD\installation_summary.txt" -Encoding UTF8
 750:   348:     Write-InstallLog "R√©sum√© sauvegard√© dans installation_summary.txt" -Type "SUCCESS"
 751:   349: } catch {
 752:   350:     Write-InstallLog "Erreur sauvegarde r√©sum√©" -Type "ERROR"
 753:   351: }
 754:   352:
 755:   353: Write-Host "`n=== INSTALLATION TERMIN√âE ===" -ForegroundColor Green
 756:   354: Write-Host "Consultez 'installation_summary.txt' pour le rapport complet" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 757:   355:
 758:   356: if (-not $forgeInstalled) {
 759:   357:     Write-Host "`n‚ö†  Foundry d√©tect√© sur D:\foundry\ mais pas accessible" -ForegroundColor Red
 760:   358:     Write-Host "Pour rendre Foundry accessible:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
 761:   359:
 762:   360:     Write-Host "`nOption 1 - Ajouter au PATH de cette session:" -ForegroundColor White
 763:   361:     Write-Host "   `$env:Path += ';D:\foundry'" -ForegroundColor Gray
 764:   362:     Write-Host "   forge --version" -ForegroundColor Gray
 765:   363:
 766:   364:     Write-Host "`nOption 2 - Ajouter au PATH syst√®me (red√©marrage requis):" -ForegroundColor White

 768:   366:     Write-Host "   Red√©marrez PowerShell" -ForegroundColor Gray
 769:   367:

 774:   372: }

 807:    28: function Show-Menu {
 808:    29:     Clear-Host
 809:    30:     Write-Host "=" * 60 -ForegroundColor Cyan
 810:    31:     Write-Host "SHARE SPLIT 1M - SmartContractDevPipeline" -ForegroundColor White
 811:    32:     Write-Host "=" * 60 -ForegroundColor Cyan
 812:    33:     Write-Host ""
 813:    34:     Write-Host "=== MENU PRINCIPAL ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 814:    35:     Write-Host "1. Publier sur GitHub Repository" -ForegroundColor White
 815:    36:     Write-Host "2. Partager sur GitHub Gists" -ForegroundColor White
 816:    37:     Write-Host "3. G√©n√©rer seulement les fichiers locaux" -ForegroundColor White
 817:    38:     Write-Host "4. Quitter" -ForegroundColor White
 818:    39:     Write-Host ""
 819:    40: }
 820:    41:
 821:    42: function Read-ValidatedInput {
 822:    43:     param(
 823:    44:         [string]$Prompt,
 824:    45:         [string]$DefaultValue = "",
 825:    46:         [switch]$Required
 826:    47:     )
 827:    48:
 828:    49:     while ($true) {
 829:    50:         if ($DefaultValue) {
 830:    51:             $inputText = Read-Host "$Prompt [$DefaultValue]"
 831:    52:             if ([string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($inputText)) {
 832:    53:                 $inputText = $DefaultValue
 833:    54:             }
 834:    55:         } else {
 835:    56:             $inputText = Read-Host $Prompt
 836:    57:         }
 837:    58:
 838:    59:         if (-not $Required -or (-not [string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($inputText))) {
 839:    60:             return $inputText
 840:    61:         } else {
 841:    62:             Write-Host "Ce champ est requis. Veuillez entrer une valeur." -ForegroundColor Red
 842:    63:         }
 843:    64:     }
 844:    65: }
 845:    66:
 846:    67: function Test-GitHubToken {
 847:    68:     param([string]$Token, [string]$Username)
 848:    69:
 849:    70:     Write-Host "V√©rification du token GitHub..." -NoNewline
 850:    71:
 851:    72:     try {
 852:    73:         $headers = @{
 853:    74:             "Authorization" = "token $Token"
 854:    75:             "Accept" = "application/vnd.github.v3+json"
 855:    76:         }
 856:    77:
 857:    78:         $response = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "https://api.github.com/user" -Headers $headers -Method Get
 858:    79:
 859:    80:         if ($response.login -eq $Username) {
 860:    81:             Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
 861:    82:             Write-Host "   Connect√© en tant que: $($response.login)" -ForegroundColor Green
 862:    83:             Write-Host "   Nom: $($response.name)" -ForegroundColor Green
 863:    84:             return $true
 864:    85:         } else {
 865:    86:             Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
 866:    87:             Write-Host "   Le token ne correspond pas √† l'utilisateur $Username" -ForegroundColor Red
 867:    88:             return $false
 868:    89:         }
 869:    90:     } catch {
 870:    91:         Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
 871:    92:         Write-Host "   Erreur: $($_.Exception.Message)" -ForegroundColor Red
 872:    93:         return $false
 873:    94:     }
 874:    95: }
 875:    96:
 876:    97: function Get-FilesToShare {
 877:    98:     $files = @()
 878:    99:
 879:   100:     # Fichiers principaux
 880:   101:     $mainFiles = @(
 881:   102:         "ShareSplit1M.ps1",
 882:   103:         "smart-contract-dev-pipeline.sh",
 883:   104:         "automated-deployment.ps1",
 884:   105:         "security-audit-checklist.md",
 885:   106:         "gas-optimization-guide.md",
 886:   107:         "README.md"
 887:   108:     )
 888:   109:
 889:   110:     foreach ($file in $mainFiles) {
 890:   111:         if (Test-Path $file) {
 891:   112:             $files += $file
 892:   113:         }
 893:   114:     }
 894:   115:
 895:   116:     # Dossiers suppl√©mentaires
 896:   117:     $folders = @("scripts", "templates", "configs")
 897:   118:     foreach ($folder in $folders) {
 898:   119:         if (Test-Path $folder -PathType Container) {
 899:   120:             $folderFiles = Get-ChildItem -Path $folder -File -Recurse | Where-Object { $_.Extension -in ".ps1", ".sh", ".md", ".yml", ".yaml", ".json", ".sol", ".js", ".ts" }
 900:   121:             foreach ($file in $folderFiles) {
 901:   122:                 $files += $file.FullName
 902:   123:             }
 903:   124:         }
 904:   125:     }
 905:   126:
 906:   127:     return $files
 907:   128: }
 908:   129:
 909:   130: function Create-ZipArchive {
 910:   131:     param([array]$Files, [string]$OutputPath)
 911:   132:
 912:   133:     Write-Host "Cr√©ation de l'archive ZIP..." -NoNewline
 913:   134:
 914:   135:     try {
 915:   136:         Compress-Archive -Path $Files -DestinationPath $OutputPath -Force
 916:   137:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
 917:   138:         Write-Host "   Archive cr√©√©e: $OutputPath" -ForegroundColor Green
 918:   139:         return $true
 919:   140:     } catch {
 920:   141:         Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
 921:   142:         Write-Host "   Erreur: $($_.Exception.Message)" -ForegroundColor Red
 922:   143:         return $false
 923:   144:     }
 924:   145: }
 925:   146:
 926:   147: # ==================== FONCTIONS GITHUB ====================
 927:   148:
 928:   149: function Publish-Repository {
 929:   150:     param([hashtable]$config)
 930:   151:
 931:   152:     Write-Host "`n=== PUBLICATION SUR GITHUB REPOSITORY ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 932:   153:     Write-Host "V√©rification du r√©pertoire..." -NoNewline
 933:   154:
 934:   155:     # V√©rifier le r√©pertoire courant
 935:   156:     if (-not (Test-Path -Path ".git")) {
 936:   157:         Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
 937:   158:         Write-Host "‚ùå Erreur: Ce r√©pertoire n'est pas un d√©p√¥t Git." -ForegroundColor Red
 938:   159:         Write-Host "   Ex√©cutez ce script depuis le r√©pertoire de votre projet Git." -ForegroundColor Yellow
 939:   160:         return $false
 940:   161:     }
 941:   162:     Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
 942:   163:
 943:   164:     Write-Host "Nettoyage Git..." -NoNewline
 944:   165:     git clean -fd 2>&1 | Out-Null
 945:   166:     git reset --hard 2>&1 | Out-Null
 946:   167:     Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
 947:   168:
 948:   169:     Write-Host "Configuration Git..." -NoNewline
 949:   170:     git config user.name $config.GITHUB_USERNAME 2>&1 | Out-Null
 950:   171:     git config user.email "$($config.GITHUB_USERNAME)@users.noreply.github.com" 2>&1 | Out-Null
 951:   172:     Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
 952:   173:
 953:   174:     Write-Host "Remote: https://github.com/$($config.GITHUB_USERNAME)/$($config.GITHUB_REPO_NAME)" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 954:   175:     $remoteUrl = "https://x-access-token:${newToken}@github.com/$($config.GITHUB_USERNAME)/$($config.GITHUB_REPO_NAME).git"
 955:   176:     git remote remove origin 2>&1 | Out-Null
 956:   177:     git remote add origin $remoteUrl 2>&1 | Out-Null
 957:   178:
 958:   179:     Write-Host "Ajout fichiers..." -NoNewline
 959:   180:     git add . 2>&1 | Out-Null
 960:   181:     Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
 961:   182:
 962:   183:     Write-Host "Commit..." -NoNewline
 963:   184:     $commitResult = git commit -m "SmartContractDevPipeline - $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm')" 2>&1
 964:   185:     if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
 965:   186:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
 966:   187:     } else {
 967:   188:         # Si pas de changements, cr√©er un commit vide
 968:   189:         if ($commitResult -match "nothing to commit") {
 969:   190:             git commit --allow-empty -m "SmartContractDevPipeline - $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm')" 2>&1 | Out-Null
 970:   191:             Write-Host " (commit vide) ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Yellow
 971:   192:         } else {
 972:   193:             Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
 973:   194:             Write-Host "‚ùå Erreur: $commitResult" -ForegroundColor Red
 974:   195:             return $false
 975:   196:         }
 976:   197:     }
 977:   198:
 978:   199:     Write-Host "Branche..." -NoNewline
 979:   200:     git branch -M main 2>&1 | Out-Null
 980:   201:     Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
 981:   202:
 982:   203:     # CORRECTION UNIQUE : Section push modifi√©e
 983:   204:     # Push vers GitHub
 984:   205:     Write-Host "Push vers GitHub..." -NoNewline
 985:   206:
 986:   207:     # CORRECTION : Approche en deux √©tapes au lieu de --allow-unrelated-histories --force
 987:   208:     $pushResult = git push -u origin main 2>&1
 988:   209:
 989:   210:     if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) {
 990:   211:         if ($pushResult -match "failed to push some refs" -or $pushResult -match "unrelated histories" -or $pushResult -match "non-fast-forward") {
 991:   212:             Write-Host " (tentative avec --force)..." -NoNewline -ForegroundColor Yellow
 992:   213:             $pushResult = git push -u origin main --force 2>&1
 993:   214:         }
 994:   215:     }
 995:   216:
 996:   217:     if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
 997:   218:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
 998:   219:     } else {
 999:   220:         Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
1000:   221:         Write-Host "‚ùå Erreur: $pushResult" -ForegroundColor Red
1001:   222:         return $false
1002:   223:     }
1003:   224:
1004:   225:     Write-Host "`n‚úÖ Publication r√©ussie sur GitHub !" -ForegroundColor Green
1005:   226:     Write-Host "üìÇ Repository: https://github.com/$($config.GITHUB_USERNAME)/$($config.GITHUB_REPO_NAME)" -ForegroundColor Cyan
1006:   227:     return $true
1007:   228: }
1008:   229:
1009:   230: function Share-Gists {
1010:   231:     param([hashtable]$config)
1011:   232:
1012:   233:     Write-Host "`n=== PARTAGE SUR GITHUB GISTS ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
1013:   234:
1014:   235:     $files = Get-FilesToShare
1015:   236:
1016:   237:     if ($files.Count -eq 0) {
1017:   238:         Write-Host "‚ùå Aucun fichier √† partager trouv√©." -ForegroundColor Red
1018:   239:         return $false
1019:   240:     }
1020:   241:
1021:   242:     Write-Host "Fichiers √† partager ($($files.Count) trouv√©s):" -ForegroundColor White
1022:   243:     foreach ($file in $files) {
1023:   244:         Write-Host "  ‚Ä¢ $file" -ForegroundColor Gray
1024:   245:     }
1025:   246:
1026:   247:     Write-Host "`nCr√©ation des Gists..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
1027:   248:
1028:   249:     $successCount = 0
1029:   250:     $failedCount = 0
1030:   251:     $gistLinks = @()
1031:   252:
1032:   253:     foreach ($file in $files) {
1033:   254:         Write-Host "  $file..." -NoNewline
1034:   255:
1035:   256:         try {
1036:   257:             $content = Get-Content -Path $file -Raw -Encoding UTF8
1037:   258:             $fileName = Split-Path $file -Leaf
1038:   259:
1039:   260:             $body = @{
1040:   261:                 description = "SmartContractDevPipeline - $fileName"
1041:   262:                 public = $true
1042:   263:                 files = @{
1043:   264:                     $fileName = @{ content = $content }
1044:   265:                 }
1045:   266:             } | ConvertTo-Json
1046:   267:
1047:   268:             $headers = @{
1048:   269:                 "Authorization" = "token $($config.GITHUB_TOKEN)"
1049:   270:                 "Accept" = "application/vnd.github.v3+json"
1050:   271:             }
1051:   272:
1052:   273:             $response = Invoke-RestMethod `
1053:   274:                 -Uri "https://api.github.com/gists" `
1054:   275:                 -Headers $headers `
1055:   276:                 -Method Post `
1056:   277:                 -Body $body `
1057:   278:                 -ContentType "application/json"
1058:   279:
1059:   280:             $successCount++
1060:   281:             $gistLinks += "$fileName : $($response.html_url)"
1061:   282:             Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
1062:   283:         } catch {
1063:   284:             $failedCount++
1064:   285:             Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
1065:   286:             Write-Host "    Erreur: $($_.Exception.Message)" -ForegroundColor Red
1066:   287:         }
1067:   288:     }
1068:   289:
1069:   290:     Write-Host "`n=== R√âSUM√â GISTS ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
1070:   291:     Write-Host "Gists cr√©√©s avec succ√®s: $successCount" -ForegroundColor Green
1071:   292:     Write-Host "Gists √©chou√©s: $failedCount" -ForegroundColor $(if ($failedCount -gt 0) { "Red" } else { "Green" })
1072:   293:
1073:   294:     if ($gistLinks.Count -gt 0) {
1074:   295:         Write-Host "`nüìã Liens des Gists:" -ForegroundColor Cyan
1075:   296:         foreach ($link in $gistLinks) {
1076:   297:             Write-Host "  ‚Ä¢ $link" -ForegroundColor White
1077:   298:         }
1078:   299:     }
1079:   300:
1080:   301:     return $true
1081:   302: }
1082:   303:
1083:   304: function Generate-LocalFiles {
1084:   305:     param([hashtable]$config)
1085:   306:
1086:   307:     Write-Host "`n=== G√âN√âRATION DE FICHIERS LOCAUX ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
1087:   308:
1088:   309:     $files = Get-FilesToShare
1089:   310:
1090:   311:     if ($files.Count -eq 0) {
1091:   312:         Write-Host "‚ùå Aucun fichier trouv√© √† partager." -ForegroundColor Red
1092:   313:         return $false
1093:   314:     }
1094:   315:
1095:   316:     Write-Host "Fichiers trouv√©s ($($files.Count)):" -ForegroundColor White
1096:   317:     foreach ($file in $files) {
1097:   318:         Write-Host "  ‚Ä¢ $file" -ForegroundColor Gray
1098:   319:     }
1099:   320:
1100:   321:     # Cr√©er un dossier pour les fichiers partag√©s
1101:   322:     $shareDir = "SmartContractDevPipeline_Share_$(Get-Date -Format 'yyyyMMdd_HHmmss')"
1102:   323:     New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $shareDir -Force | Out-Null
1103:   324:
1104:   325:     Write-Host "`nCopie des fichiers dans: $shareDir" -NoNewline
1105:   326:
1106:   327:     foreach ($file in $files) {
1107:   328:         $destFile = Join-Path $shareDir (Split-Path $file -Leaf)
1108:   329:         Copy-Item -Path $file -Destination $destFile -Force
1109:   330:     }
1110:   331:
1111:   332:     Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
1112:   333:
1113:   334:     # Cr√©er une archive ZIP
1114:   335:     $zipPath = "$shareDir.zip"
1115:   336:     if (Create-ZipArchive -Files (Get-ChildItem -Path $shareDir -File).FullName -OutputPath $zipPath) {
1116:   337:         Write-Host "`n‚úÖ Fichiers g√©n√©r√©s avec succ√®s !" -ForegroundColor Green
1117:   338:         Write-Host "üìÅ Dossier: $shareDir" -ForegroundColor Cyan
1118:   339:         Write-Host "üì¶ Archive: $zipPath" -ForegroundColor Cyan
1119:   340:     }
1120:   341:
1121:   342:     return $true
1122:   343: }
1123:   344:
1124:   345: function Test-GitPush {
1125:   346:     param([hashtable]$config, [string]$newToken)
1126:   347:
1127:   348:     Write-Host "Test Git push..." -NoNewline
1128:   349:     $testDir = "test_push_$(Get-Date -Format 'HHmmss')"
1129:   350:     New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $testDir -Force | Out-Null
1130:   351:     Set-Location $testDir
1131:   352:
1132:   353:     git init
1133:   354:     git config user.name "$($config.GITHUB_USERNAME)"
1134:   355:     git config user.email "$($config.GITHUB_USERNAME)@users.noreply.github.com"
1135:   356:
1136:   357:     # Cr√©er un fichier test
1137:   358:     "Test file" | Out-File -FilePath "test.txt" -Encoding UTF8
1138:   359:
1139:   360:     git add .
1140:   361:     git commit -m "Test" --quiet
1141:   362:
1142:   363:     # IMPORTANT: Cr√©er la branche main avant de pousser
1143:   364:     git branch -M main
1144:   365:
1145:   366:     # Essayer avec x-access-token
1146:   367:     $remoteUrl = "https://x-access-token:${newToken}@github.com/$($config.GITHUB_USERNAME)/$($config.GITHUB_REPO_NAME).git"
1147:   368:     git remote add origin $remoteUrl
1148:   369:
1149:   370:     # CORRECTION : Approche en deux √©tapes
1150:   371:     Write-Host "  Tentative de push..." -NoNewline
1151:   372:     $pushOutput = git push -u origin main 2>&1
1152:   373:
1153:   374:     if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) {
1154:   375:         if ($pushOutput -match "failed to push some refs" -or $pushOutput -match "unrelated histories") {
1155:   376:             Write-Host " √©chou√©, tentative avec --force..." -NoNewline -ForegroundColor Yellow
1156:   377:             $pushOutput = git push -u origin main --force 2>&1
1157:   378:         }
1158:   379:     }
1159:   380:
1160:   381:     if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
1161:   382:         Write-Host " ‚úì Git push OK!" -ForegroundColor Green
1162:   383:     } else {
1163:   384:         Write-Host " ‚úó Git push √©chou√©" -ForegroundColor Red
1164:   385:         # Afficher l'erreur pour diagnostiquer
1165:   386:         Write-Host "Erreur: $pushOutput" -ForegroundColor Red
1166:   387:
1167:   388:         # V√©rifier si c'est un probl√®me de branche
1168:   389:         if ($pushOutput -match "src refspec main does not match any") {
1169:   390:             Write-Host "ASTUCE: La branche 'main' n'existe pas localement" -ForegroundColor Yellow
1170:   391:         }
1171:   392:     }
1172:   393:
1173:   394:     # Nettoyer
1174:   395:     Set-Location ..
1175:   396:     Remove-Item $testDir -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
1176:   397: }
1177:   398:
1178:   399: # ==================== PROGRAMME PRINCIPAL ====================
1179:   400:
1180:   401: # Point d'entr√©e
1181:   402: Clear-Host
1182:   403: Write-Host "SHARE SPLIT 1M - SmartContractDevPipeline" -ForegroundColor Cyan
1183:   404: Write-Host "=" * 60 -ForegroundColor Cyan
1184:   405:
1185:   406: # Configuration
1186:   407: $config = $defaultConfig.Clone()
1187:   408:
1188:   409: Write-Host "`n=== CONFIGURATION GITHUB ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
1189:   410:
1190:   411: $config.GITHUB_USERNAME = Read-ValidatedInput -Prompt "Nom d'utilisateur GitHub" -Required
1191:   412: $config.GITHUB_REPO_NAME = Read-ValidatedInput -Prompt "Nom du repository GitHub" -DefaultValue "SmartContractDevPipeline"
1192:   413: $config.GITHUB_TOKEN = Read-ValidatedInput -Prompt "Token GitHub (classic, avec permissions repo et gist)" -Required -MaskInput
1193:   414:
1194:   415: Write-Host "`nConfiguration enregistr√©e:" -ForegroundColor Cyan
1195:   416: Write-Host "  Utilisateur: $($config.GITHUB_USERNAME)" -ForegroundColor White
1196:   417: Write-Host "  Repository: $($config.GITHUB_REPO_NAME)" -ForegroundColor White
1197:   418: Write-Host "  Token: ******" -ForegroundColor White
1198:   419:
1199:   420: # Test du token
1200:   421: if (-not (Test-GitHubToken -Token $config.GITHUB_TOKEN -Username $config.GITHUB_USERNAME)) {
1201:   422:     Write-Host "`n‚ùå Le token GitHub est invalide." -ForegroundColor Red
1202:   423:     Write-Host "Veuillez v√©rifier votre token et r√©essayer." -ForegroundColor Yellow
1203:   424:     Read-Host "`nAppuyez sur Entr√©e pour quitter"
1204:   425:     exit 1
1205:   426: }
1206:   427:
1207:   428: # Initialiser la variable newToken (utilis√©e dans Publish-Repository)
1208:   429: $newToken = $config.GITHUB_TOKEN
1209:   430:
1210:   431: # Test Git push
1211:   432: Test-GitPush -config $config -newToken $newToken
1212:   433:
1213:   434: # Menu principal
1214:   435: do {
1215:   436:     Show-Menu
1216:   437:     $choice = Read-Host "Votre choix [1-4]"
1217:   438:
1218:   439:     switch ($choice) {
1219:   440:         "1" {
1220:   441:             # Publication sur GitHub Repository
1221:   442:             Publish-Repository -config $config
1222:   443:             Read-Host "`nAppuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
1223:   444:         }
1224:   445:         "2" {
1225:   446:             # Partage sur GitHub Gists
1226:   447:             Share-Gists -config $config
1227:   448:             Read-Host "`nAppuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
1228:   449:         }
1229:   450:         "3" {
1230:   451:             # G√©n√©ration de fichiers locaux
1231:   452:             Generate-LocalFiles -config $config
1232:   453:             Read-Host "`nAppuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
1233:   454:         }
1234:   455:         "4" {
1235:   456:             Write-Host "`nAu revoir !" -ForegroundColor Cyan
1236:   457:             exit 0
1237:   458:         }
1238:   459:         default {
1239:   460:             Write-Host "Choix invalide. Veuillez s√©lectionner une option entre 1 et 4." -ForegroundColor Red
1240:   461:             Start-Sleep -Seconds 2
1241:   462:         }
1242:   463:     }
1243:   464: } while ($true)
1244: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1245: 
1246: SCRIPT 4 | quick-start.ps1
1247: Size: 12346 bytes | Type: .ps1 | Modified: 2026-01-16 21:54:48.466787
1248: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1249:     1: # setup.ps1 - Version sans accents
1250:     2: Write-Host "=== SMART CONTRACT PIPELINE SETUP ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
1251:     3: Write-Host "Complete installation script" -ForegroundColor Yellow
1252:     4: Write-Host ""
1253:     5:
1254:     6: # Ask for confirmation
1255:     7: $confirm = Read-Host "Do you want to install all components? (Y/N)"
1256:     8: if ($confirm -ne "Y" -and $confirm -ne "y") {
1257:     9:     Write-Host "Installation cancelled" -ForegroundColor Yellow
1258:    10:     exit
1259:    11: }
1260:    12:
1261:    13: # 1. Check PowerShell version
1262:    14: Write-Host "`n1. CHECKING POWERSHELL..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
1263:    15: if ($PSVersionTable.PSVersion.Major -lt 5) {
1264:    16:     Write-Host "X PowerShell 5.0 or higher required" -ForegroundColor Red
1265:    17:     exit 1
1266:    18: }
1267:    19: Write-Host "V PowerShell $($PSVersionTable.PSVersion)" -ForegroundColor Green
1268:    20:
1269:    21: # 2. Check required tools
1270:    22: Write-Host "`n2. CHECKING REQUIRED TOOLS..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
1271:    23:
1272:    24: $tools = @(
1273:    25:     @{Name="Node.js"; Test="node --version"; Install="https://nodejs.org"},
1274:    26:     @{Name="Python"; Test="python --version"; Install="https://python.org"},
1275:    27:     @{Name="Git"; Test="git --version"; Install="https://git-scm.com"}
1276:    28: )
1277:    29:
1278:    30: foreach ($tool in $tools) {
1279:    31:     Write-Host "Checking $($tool.Name)..." -ForegroundColor Gray
1280:    32:     try {
1281:    33:         Invoke-Expression $tool.Test 2>$null
1282:    34:         Write-Host "V $($tool.Name) is installed" -ForegroundColor Green
1283:    35:     } catch {
1284:    36:         Write-Host "X $($tool.Name) is NOT installed" -ForegroundColor Red
1285:    37:         Write-Host "  Install from: $($tool.Install)" -ForegroundColor Cyan
1286:    38:     }
1287:    39: }
1288:    40:
1289:    41: # 3. Create project structure
1290:    42: Write-Host "`n3. CREATING PROJECT STRUCTURE..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
1291:    43:
1292:    44: $folders = @(
1293:    45:     "agents",
1294:    46:     "agents\architect",
1295:    47:     "agents\coder",
1296:    48:     "agents\communication",
1297:    49:     "agents\documenter",
1298:    50:     "agents\formal_verification",
1299:    51:     "agents\frontend_web3",
1300:    52:     "agents\fuzzing_simulation",
1301:    53:     "agents\quality_metrics",
1302:    54:     "agents\smart_contract",
1303:    55:     "agents\tester",
1304:    56:     "agents\shared",
1305:    57:     "config",
1306:    58:     "context",
1307:    59:     "memory",
1308:    60:     "memory\vector_store",
1309:    61:     "memory\history",
1310:    62:     "memory\learnings",
1311:    63:     "workspace",
1312:    64:     "workspace\contracts",
1313:    65:     "workspace\frontend",
1314:    66:     "sprints",
1315:    67:     "reports",
1316:    68:     "logs",
1317:    69:     "scripts",
1318:    70:     "tests"
1319:    71: )
1320:    72:
1321:    73: foreach ($folder in $folders) {
1322:    74:     New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $folder -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Out-Null
1323:    75:     Write-Host "  [FOLDER] $folder" -ForegroundColor Gray
1324:    76: }
1325:    77:
1326:    78: # 4. Create essential files
1327:    79: Write-Host "`n4. CREATING ESSENTIAL FILES..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
1328:    80:
1329:    81: # package.json
1330:    82: @'
1331:    83: {
1332:    84:   "name": "smart-contract-pipeline",
1333:    85:   "version": "1.0.0",
1334:    86:   "description": "Automated Smart Contract Development Pipeline with AI Agents",
1335:    87:   "main": "main.py",
1336:    88:   "scripts": {
1337:    89:     "start": "python main.py",
1338:    90:     "test": "python -m pytest",
1339:    91:     "hardhat": "cd workspace\\contracts && npx hardhat",
1340:    92:     "frontend": "cd workspace\\frontend && npm run dev"
1341:    93:   },
1342:    94:   "keywords": ["blockchain", "smart-contract", "ai", "web3"],
1343:    95:   "author": "SmartContractPipeline",
1344:    96:   "license": "MIT"
1345:    97: }
1346:    98: '@ | Out-File -FilePath "package.json" -Force -Encoding UTF8
1347:    99: Write-Host "V package.json created" -ForegroundColor Green
1348:   100:
1349:   101: # requirements.txt
1350:   102: @'
1351:   103: # Core AI & ML
1352:   104: langchain>=0.1.0
1353:   105: chromadb>=0.4.0
1354:   106:
1355:   107: # Web3 & Blockchain
1356:   108: web3>=6.0.0
1357:   109: eth-account>=0.11.0
1358:   110:
1359:   111: # Web Framework & API
1360:   112: fastapi>=0.104.0
1361:   113: requests>=2.31.0
1362:   114:
1363:   115: # Data Processing
1364:   116: pyyaml>=6.0.0
1365:   117: python-dotenv>=1.0.0
1366:   118:
1367:   119: # Utilities
1368:   120: pydantic>=2.0.0
1369:   121: pytest>=7.4.0
1370:   122: '@ | Out-File -FilePath "requirements.txt" -Force -Encoding UTF8
1371:   123: Write-Host "V requirements.txt created" -ForegroundColor Green
1372:   124:
1373:   125: # Create Python virtual environment
1374:   126: Write-Host "`n5. SETTING UP PYTHON ENVIRONMENT..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
1375:   127: if (-not (Test-Path ".venv")) {
1376:   128:     python -m venv .venv
1377:   129:     Write-Host "V Python virtual environment created" -ForegroundColor Green
1378:   130: }
1379:   131:
1380:   132: # Activate and install Python dependencies
1381:   133: try {
1382:   134:     & .\.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1
1383:   135:     python -m pip install --upgrade pip
1384:   136:     pip install -r requirements.txt
1385:   137:     Write-Host "V Python dependencies installed" -ForegroundColor Green
1386:   138: } catch {
1387:   139:     Write-Host "X Error installing Python dependencies: $_" -ForegroundColor Red
1388:   140: }
1389:   141:
1390:   142: # 6. Initialize Hardhat project
1391:   143: Write-Host "`n6. INITIALIZING HARPHAT..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
1392:   144: Set-Location "workspace\contracts"
1393:   145:
1394:   146: try {
1395:   147:     # Check if Hardhat is installed
1396:   148:     npx hardhat --version 2>$null
1397:   149:     Write-Host "V Hardhat is installed" -ForegroundColor Green
1398:   150: } catch {
1399:   151:     Write-Host "Installing Hardhat..." -ForegroundColor Gray
1400:   152:     npm init -y
1401:   153:     npm install --save-dev hardhat @nomicfoundation/hardhat-toolbox
1402:   154: }
1403:   155:
1404:   156: # Initialize Hardhat project if not exists
1405:   157: if (-not (Test-Path "hardhat.config.js") -and -not (Test-Path "hardhat.config.ts")) {
1406:   158:     npx hardhat init --typescript
1407:   159:     npm install @openzeppelin/contracts ethers
1408:   160:     Write-Host "V Hardhat project initialized" -ForegroundColor Green
1409:   161: }
1410:   162:
1411:   163: Set-Location ..\..
1412:   164:
1413:   165: # 7. Create basic agent
1414:   166: Write-Host "`n7. CREATING BASIC AGENT..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
1415:   167:
1416:   168: $agentCode = @'
1417:   169: # agents/smart_contract/agent.py
1418:   170: import json
1419:   171: from typing import Dict, Any
1420:   172:
1421:   173: class SmartContractAgent:
1422:   174:     """Basic Smart Contract Agent"""
1423:   175:
1424:   176:     def __init__(self):
1425:   177:         self.name = "Smart Contract Agent"
1426:   178:         self.version = "1.0.0"
1427:   179:
1428:   180:     def generate_contract(self, requirements: Dict[str, Any]) -> str:
1429:   181:         """Generate a smart contract based on requirements"""
1430:   182:         contract_name = requirements.get("name", "MyContract")
1431:   183:
1432:   184:         template = f'''// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT
1433:   185: pragma solidity ^0.8.19;
1434:   186:
1435:   187: contract {contract_name} {{
1436:   188:     address public owner;
1437:   189:     string public name;
1438:   190:     string public symbol;
1439:   191:
1440:   192:     constructor(string memory _name, string memory _symbol) {{
1441:   193:         owner = msg.sender;
1442:   194:         name = _name;
1443:   195:         symbol = _symbol;
1444:   196:     }}
1445:   197:
1446:   198:     modifier onlyOwner() {{
1447:   199:         require(msg.sender == owner, "Not owner");
1448:   200:         _;
1449:   201:     }}
1450:   202:
1451:   203:     function transferOwnership(address newOwner) public onlyOwner {{
1452:   204:         require(newOwner != address(0), "Invalid address");
1453:   205:         owner = newOwner;
1454:   206:     }}
1455:   207:
1456:   208:     function getContractInfo() public view returns (string memory, string memory, address) {{
1457:   209:         return (name, symbol, owner);
1458:   210:     }}
1459:   211: }}
1460:   212: '''
1461:   213:
1462:   214:         return template
1463:   215:
1464:   216:     def get_agent_info(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
1465:   217:         """Get agent information"""
1466:   218:         return {
1467:   219:             "name": self.name,
1468:   220:             "version": self.version,
1469:   221:             "capabilities": ["contract_generation", "basic_validation"]
1470:   222:         }
1471:   223: '@
1472:   224:
1473:   225: New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path "agents\smart_contract" -Force | Out-Null
1474:   226: $agentCode | Out-File -FilePath "agents\smart_contract\agent.py" -Force -Encoding UTF8
1475:   227: Write-Host "V Basic agent created" -ForegroundColor Green
1476:   228:
1477:   229: # 8. Create test script
1478:   230: Write-Host "`n8. CREATING TEST SCRIPT..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
1479:   231:
1480:   232: $testScript = @'
1481:   233: # test_basic.py
1482:   234: import sys
1483:   235: import os
1484:   236:
1485:   237: # Add agents directory to path
1486:   238: sys.path.append(os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), "agents"))
1487:   239:
1488:   240: def test_smart_contract_agent():
1489:   241:     """Test the basic smart contract agent"""
1490:   242:     print("ü§ñ Testing Smart Contract Agent")
1491:   243:     print("=" * 40)
1492:   244:
1493:   245:     try:
1494:   246:         from smart_contract.agent import SmartContractAgent
1495:   247:
1496:   248:         # Create agent
1497:   249:         agent = SmartContractAgent()
1498:   250:         print(f"Agent: {agent.name} v{agent.version}")
1499:   251:
1500:   252:         # Test contract generation
1501:   253:         requirements = {
1502:   254:             "name": "MyToken",
1503:   255:             "symbol": "MTK"
1504:   256:         }
1505:   257:
1506:   258:         contract = agent.generate_contract(requirements)
1507:   259:
1508:   260:         print("‚úÖ Contract generated successfully")
1509:   261:         print(f"üìÑ Contract length: {len(contract)} characters")
1510:   262:
1511:   263:         # Show agent info
1512:   264:         info = agent.get_agent_info()
1513:   265:         print(f"üîß Capabilities: {', '.join(info['capabilities'])}")
1514:   266:
1515:   267:         return True
1516:   268:
1517:   269:     except Exception as e:
1518:   270:         print(f"‚ùå Error: {e}")
1519:   271:         import traceback
1520:   272:         traceback.print_exc()
1521:   273:         return False
1522:   274:
1523:   275: if __name__ == "__main__":
1524:   276:     success = test_smart_contract_agent()
1525:   277:     print("=" * 40)
1526:   278:     if success:
1527:   279:         print("üéâ All tests passed!")
1528:   280:     else:
1529:   281:         print("üí• Some tests failed")
1530:   282:     sys.exit(0 if success else 1)
1531:   283: '@
1532:   284:
1533:   285: $testScript | Out-File -FilePath "test_basic.py" -Force -Encoding UTF8
1534:   286: Write-Host "V Test script created" -ForegroundColor Green
1535:   287:
1536:   288: # 9. Create main.py
1537:   289: Write-Host "`n9. CREATING MAIN APPLICATION..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
1538:   290:
1539:   291: $mainApp = @'
1540:   292: # main.py
1541:   293: import asyncio
1542:   294: import sys
1543:   295: import os
1544:   296: from typing import Dict, Any
1545:   297:
1546:   298: class Pipeline:
1547:   299:     """Main pipeline orchestrator"""
1548:   300:
1549:   301:     def __init__(self):
1550:   302:         self.agents = {}
1551:   303:
1552:   304:     async def initialize(self):
1553:   305:         """Initialize the pipeline"""
1554:   306:         print("üöÄ Initializing Smart Contract Pipeline...")
1555:   307:
1556:   308:         # Load agents
1557:   309:         await self._load_agents()
1558:   310:
1559:   311:         print(f"‚úÖ Pipeline initialized with {len(self.agents)} agents")
1560:   312:         return True
1561:   313:
1562:   314:     async def _load_agents(self):
1563:   315:         """Load all available agents"""
1564:   316:         agents_dir = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), "agents")
1565:   317:
1566:   318:         # Load Smart Contract Agent
1567:   319:         try:
1568:   320:             from agents.smart_contract.agent import SmartContractAgent
1569:   321:             self.agents["smart_contract"] = SmartContractAgent()
1570:   322:             print("‚úÖ Smart Contract Agent loaded")
1571:   323:         except ImportError as e:
1572:   324:             print(f"‚ùå Failed to load Smart Contract Agent: {e}")
1573:   325:
1574:   326:     async def run(self):
1575:   327:         """Run the main pipeline"""
1576:   328:         print("üéØ Smart Contract Pipeline Ready!")
1577:   329:         print("=" * 50)
1578:   330:
1579:   331:         while True:
1580:   332:             print("`nAvailable commands:")
1581:   333:             print("1. Generate Smart Contract")
1582:   334:             print("2. Test Agent")
1583:   335:             print("3. Exit")
1584:   336:
1585:   337:             choice = input("Select option (1-3): ").strip()
1586:   338:
1587:   339:             if choice == "1":
1588:   340:                 await self.generate_contract()
1589:   341:             elif choice == "2":
1590:   342:                 await self.test_agent()
1591:   343:             elif choice == "3":
1592:   344:                 print("üëã Goodbye!")
1593:   345:                 break
1594:   346:             else:
1595:   347:                 print("‚ùå Invalid choice")
1596:   348:
1597:   349:     async def generate_contract(self):
1598:   350:         """Generate a smart contract"""
1599:   351:         print("`nüìù Smart Contract Generator")
1600:   352:         print("-" * 30)
1601:   353:
1602:   354:         name = input("Contract name: ").strip() or "MyContract"
1603:   355:         symbol = input("Contract symbol: ").strip() or "MC"
1604:   356:
1605:   357:         if "smart_contract" in self.agents:
1606:   358:             agent = self.agents["smart_contract"]
1607:   359:
1608:   360:             requirements = {
1609:   361:                 "name": name,
1610:   362:                 "symbol": symbol
1611:   363:             }
1612:   364:
1613:   365:             contract = agent.generate_contract(requirements)
1614:   366:
1615:   367:             print("‚úÖ Contract generated!")
1616:   368:             print("-" * 30)
1617:   369:             print(contract[:500] + "..." if len(contract) > 500 else contract)
1618:   370:             print("-" * 30)
1619:   371:
1620:   372:             # Save to file
1621:   373:             filename = f"contracts/{name}.sol"
1622:   374:             os.makedirs("contracts", exist_ok=True)
1623:   375:             with open(filename, "w") as f:
1624:   376:                 f.write(contract)
1625:   377:
1626:   378:             print(f"üìÑ Contract saved to {filename}")
1627:   379:         else:
1628:   380:             print("‚ùå Smart Contract Agent not available")
1629:   381:
1630:   382:     async def test_agent(self):
1631:   383:         """Test the agent"""
1632:   384:         print("`nüß™ Testing Agent...")
1633:   385:
1634:   386:         if "smart_contract" in self.agents:
1635:   387:             agent = self.agents["smart_contract"]
1636:   388:             info = agent.get_agent_info()
1637:   389:
1638:   390:             print(f"Agent: {info['name']}")
1639:   391:             print(f"Version: {info['version']}")
1640:   392:             print(f"Capabilities: {', '.join(info['capabilities'])}")
1641:   393:             print("‚úÖ Agent is working correctly")
1642:   394:         else:
1643:   395:             print("‚ùå No agents available")
1644:   396:
1645:   397: async def main():
1646:   398:     """Main entry point"""
1647:   399:     pipeline = Pipeline()
1648:   400:
1649:   401:     if await pipeline.initialize():
1650:   402:         await pipeline.run()
1651:   403:     else:
1652:   404:         print("‚ùå Failed to initialize pipeline")
1653:   405:
1654:   406: if __name__ == "__main__":
1655:   407:     asyncio.run(main())
1656:   408: '@
1657:   409:
1658:   410: $mainApp | Out-File -FilePath "main.py" -Force -Encoding UTF8
1659:   411: Write-Host "V Main application created" -ForegroundColor Green
1660:   412:
1661:   413: # 10. Create README
1662:   414: Write-Host "`n10. CREATING DOCUMENTATION..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
1663:   415:
1664:   416: $readme = @'
1665:   417: # Smart Contract Pipeline
1666:   418:
1667:   419: Automated Smart Contract development pipeline with AI agents.
1668:   420:
1669:   421: ## Quick Start
1670:   422:
1671:   423: 1. Run the setup script:
1672:   424: ```powershell
1673:   425: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File .\setup.ps1
1674: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1675: 
1676: SCRIPT 5 | setup-project.ps1
1677: Size: 7286 bytes | Type: .ps1 | Modified: 2026-01-16 21:44:57.548825
1678: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1679:     1: # setup-project.ps1 - Version corrig√©e
1680:     2: Write-Host "=== SETUP COMPLET DU PROJET SMART CONTRACT PIPELINE ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
1681:     3: Write-Host ""
1682:     4:
1683:     5: # 1. V√©rifier et installer les pr√©requis
1684:     6: Write-Host "1. INSTALLATION DES PREREQUIS..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
1685:     7: if (-not (Test-Path ".\install-prerequis.ps1")) {
1686:     8:     Write-Host "‚ùå Script install-prerequis.ps1 non trouv√©" -ForegroundColor Red
1687:     9:     exit 1
1688:    10: }
1689:    11: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File .\install-prerequis.ps1
1690:    12:
1691:    13: # 2. Attendre que l'utilisateur red√©marre PowerShell si n√©cessaire
1692:    14: Write-Host "`n2. VERIFICATION DE L'INSTALLATION..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
1693:    15: Read-Host "Si on vous a demand√© de red√©marrer PowerShell, faites-le maintenant. Appuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer"
1694:    16:
1695:    17: # 3. Installer les outils blockchain
1696:    18: Write-Host "`n3. INSTALLATION DES OUTILS BLOCKCHAIN..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
1697:    19: if (Test-Path ".\install-blockchain.ps1") {
1698:    20:     powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File .\install-blockchain.ps1
1699:    21: } else {
1700:    22:     Write-Host "‚ö†Ô∏è  Script install-blockchain.ps1 non trouv√©, installation manuelle..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
1701:    23: }
1702:    24:
1703:    25: # 4. Initialiser Hardhat dans le dossier workspace/contracts
1704:    26: Write-Host "`n4. INITIALISATION HARPHAT..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
1705:    27: $contractsDir = ".\workspace\contracts"
1706:    28: if (-not (Test-Path $contractsDir)) {
1707:    29:     New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $contractsDir -Force | Out-Null
1708:    30: }
1709:    31:
1710:    32: Set-Location $contractsDir
1711:    33:
1712:    34: # V√©rifier si Hardhat est install√©
1713:    35: try {
1714:    36:     npx hardhat --version 2>&1 | Out-Null
1715:    37:     Write-Host "‚úÖ Hardhat est install√©" -ForegroundColor Green
1716:    38: } catch {
1717:    39:     Write-Host "‚ùå Hardhat non install√©, installation..." -ForegroundColor Red
1718:    40:     npm init -y
1719:    41:     npm install --save-dev hardhat
1720:    42: }
1721:    43:
1722:    44: # Initialiser un projet Hardhat
1723:    45: if (-not (Test-Path "hardhat.config.js") -and -not (Test-Path "hardhat.config.ts")) {
1724:    46:     Write-Host "Initialisation d'un nouveau projet Hardhat..." -ForegroundColor Gray
1725:    47:     npx hardhat init --typescript
1726:    48:
1727:    49:     # Ajouter des d√©pendances suppl√©mentaires
1728:    50:     npm install --save-dev @nomicfoundation/hardhat-toolbox @typechain/hardhat typechain @typechain/ethers-v6 @openzeppelin/contracts dotenv
1729:    51:     npm install ethers
1730:    52: } else {
1731:    53:     Write-Host "‚úÖ Projet Hardhat d√©j√† initialis√©" -ForegroundColor Green
1732:    54: }
1733:    55:
1734:    56: # Retour au dossier principal
1735:    57: Set-Location ..\..
1736:    58:
1737:    59: # 5. Cr√©er la structure du projet
1738:    60: Write-Host "`n5. CREATION DE LA STRUCTURE DU PROJET..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
1739:    61: if (Test-Path ".\setup-structure.ps1") {
1740:    62:     powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File .\setup-structure.ps1
1741:    63: } else {
1742:    64:     # Cr√©er la structure de base
1743:    65:     $folders = @(
1744:    66:         "agents",
1745:    67:         "agents\architect",
1746:    68:         "agents\coder",
1747:    69:         "agents\communication",
1748:    70:         "agents\documenter",

1752:    74:         "agents\quality_metrics",
1753:    75:         "agents\smart_contract",
1754:    76:         "agents\tester",
1755:    77:         "agents\orchestrator",
1756:    78:         "agents\shared",
1757:    79:         "config",
1758:    80:         "context",
1759:    81:         "memory",
1760:    82:         "memory\vector_store",
1761:    83:         "memory\history",
1762:    84:         "memory\learnings",
1763:    85:         "workspace",
1764:    86:         "workspace\contracts",
1765:    87:         "workspace\frontend",
1766:    88:         "sprints",
1767:    89:         "reports",
1768:    90:         "logs",
1769:    91:         "scripts",
1770:    92:         "tests"
1771:    93:     )
1772:    94:
1773:    95:     foreach ($folder in $folders) {
1774:    96:         New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $folder -Force | Out-Null
1775:    97:         Write-Host "  üìÅ $folder" -ForegroundColor Gray
1776:    98:     }
1777:    99: }
1778:   100:
1779:   101: # 6. Cr√©er les fichiers de base
1780:   102: Write-Host "`n6. CREATION DES FICHIERS DE BASE..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
1781:   103:
1782:   104: # package.json principal
1783:   105: $packageJson = @'
1784:   106: {
1785:   107:   "name": "smart-contract-pipeline",
1786:   108:   "version": "1.0.0",
1787:   109:   "description": "Pipeline automatis√© de d√©veloppement Smart Contract avec agents IA",
1788:   110:   "main": "index.js",
1789:   111:   "scripts": {
1790:   112:     "start": "python main.py",
1791:   113:     "test": "python -m pytest",
1792:   114:     "setup": "powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File .\\setup-project.ps1",
1793:   115:     "deploy-agents": "powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File .\\deploy-all-agents.ps1",
1794:   116:     "deploy-subagents": "powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File .\\deploy-subagents.ps1",
1795:   117:     "test-all": "python test_all_agents.py",
1796:   118:     "hardhat": "cd workspace\\contracts && npx hardhat",
1797:   119:     "frontend": "cd workspace\\frontend && npm run dev"
1798:   120:   },
1799:   121:   "keywords": ["blockchain", "smart-contract", "ai", "automation", "web3"],
1800:   122:   "author": "SmartContractPipeline",
1801:   123:   "license": "MIT",
1802:   124:   "dependencies": {},
1803:   125:   "devDependencies": {}
1804:   126: }
1805:   127: '@
1806:   128:
1807:   129: $packageJson | Out-File -FilePath "package.json" -Force -Encoding UTF8
1808:   130:
1809:   131: # requirements.txt
1810:   132: $requirements = @'
1811:   133: # Core AI & ML
1812:   134: langchain==0.1.0
1813:   135: langgraph==0.0.5

1837:   159: black==23.11.0

1839:   161: '@
1840:   162:
1841:   163: $requirements | Out-File -FilePath "requirements.txt" -Force -Encoding UTF8
1842:   164:
1843:   165: # 7. Cr√©er l'environnement virtuel Python
1844:   166: Write-Host "`n7. CREATION ENVIRONNEMENT VIRTUEL PYTHON..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
1845:   167: if (-not (Test-Path ".venv")) {
1846:   168:     python -m venv .venv
1847:   169:     Write-Host "‚úÖ Environnement virtuel cr√©√©" -ForegroundColor Green
1848:   170: } else {

1850:   172: }

1854:   176: & .\.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1

1866:   188: }

1871:   193: Write-Host "="*60 -ForegroundColor Cyan
