1898:     6: rem Configuration GitHub
1899:     7: set GITHUB_USERNAME=poolsyncdefi-ui
1900:     8: set GITHUB_REPO=structured-lending-protocol-clean
1901:     9: set GITHUB_TOKEN=
1902:    10:
1903:    11: :menu
1904:    12: cls
1905:    13: echo.
1906:    14: echo ========================================
1907:    15: echo   FINAL SHARE - BATCH ONLY
1908:    16: echo ========================================
1909:    17: echo.
1910:    18: echo 1. CREATE FULL SHARE (all files with line numbers)
1911:    19: echo 2. CREATE DIFF SHARE (changed files only)
1912:    20: echo 3. GIT COMMIT + PUSH
1913:    21: echo 4. PUBLISH TO GITHUB REPOSITORY
1914:    22: echo 5. SHARE TO GITHUB GISTS
1915:    23: echo 6. EXIT
1916:    24: echo.
1917:    25:
1918:    26: set /p choice=Enter choice (1-6):
1919:    27:
1920:    28: if "%choice%"=="1" goto fullshare
1921:    29: if "%choice%"=="2" goto diffshare
1922:    30: if "%choice%"=="3" goto gitpush
1923:    31: if "%choice%"=="4" goto githubrepo
1924:    32: if "%choice%"=="5" goto githubgists
1925:    33: if "%choice%"=="6" exit /b 0
1926:    34: goto menu
1927:    35:
1928:    36: :fullshare
1929:    37: cls
1930:    38: echo Creating project share with line numbers and full paths...
1931:    39:
1932:    40: rem Create header
1933:    41: echo ============================================================================== > PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1934:    42: echo STRUCTURED LENDING PROTOCOL - FULL PROJECT SHARE >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1935:    43: echo ============================================================================== >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1936:    44: echo GitHub: %GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO% >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1937:    45: echo Repo URL: https://github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO% >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1938:    46: echo Date: %date% Time: %time% >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1939:    47: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1940:    48:
1941:    49: rem Get git info
1942:    50: echo [GIT INFORMATION] >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1943:    51: echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1944:    52: for /f "delims=" %%i in ('git branch --show-current 2^>nul') do echo Branch: %%i >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1945:    53: for /f "delims=" %%i in ('git rev-parse --short HEAD 2^>nul') do echo Commit: %%i >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1946:    54: for /f "delims=" %%i in ('git log --oneline -1 --pretty=format:"%%s" 2^>nul') do echo Last commit: %%i >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1947:    55: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1948:    56:
1949:    57: rem === CONTRACTS DIRECTORY ===
1950:    58: echo [CONTRACTS DIRECTORY - *.sol files] >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1951:    59: echo ============================================================================== >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1952:    60: set contract_count=0
1953:    61: for /r contracts %%f in (*.sol) do (
1954:    62:     set /a contract_count+=1
1955:    63:
1956:    64:     set "filepath=%%f"
1957:    65:     set "filename=%%~nxf"
1958:    66:     set "filesize=%%~z"
1959:    67:     set "filemodified=%%~tf"
1960:    68:
1961:    69:     echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1962:    70:     echo FILE %contract_count% ^| !filepath! >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1963:    71:     echo Size: !filesize! bytes ^| Modified: !filemodified! >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1964:    72:     echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1965:    73:
1966:    74:     if exist "%%f" (
1967:    75:         setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
1968:    76:         set line_num=1
1969:    77:         for /f "tokens=* delims=" %%a in ('type "%%f"') do (
1970:    78:             echo !line_num!: %%a >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1971:    79:             set /a line_num+=1
1972:    80:         )
1973:    81:         endlocal
1974:    82:     ) else (
1975:    83:         echo [FILE NOT FOUND] >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1976:    84:     )
1977:    85:     echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1978:    86: )
1979:    87:
1980:    88: rem === SCRIPTS DIRECTORY ===
1981:    89: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1982:    90: echo [SCRIPTS DIRECTORY - *.js, *.bat, *.sh, *.txt files] >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1983:    91: echo ============================================================================== >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1984:    92: set script_count=0
1985:    93: for /r scripts %%f in (*.js *.bat *.sh *.txt) do (
1986:    94:     if exist "%%f" (
1987:    95:         set /a script_count+=1
1988:    96:
1989:    97:         set "filepath=%%f"
1990:    98:         set "filename=%%~nxf"
1991:    99:         set "filesize=%%~z"
1992:   100:         set "filemodified=%%~tf"
1993:   101:         set "fileext=%%~xf"
1994:   102:
1995:   103:         echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1996:   104:         echo SCRIPT !script_count! ^| !filepath! >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1997:   105:         echo Size: !filesize! bytes ^| Type: !fileext! ^| Modified: !filemodified! >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1998:   106:         echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
1999:   107:
2000:   108:         setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
2001:   109:         set line_num=1
2002:   110:         for /f "tokens=* delims=" %%a in ('type "%%f"') do (
2003:   111:             echo !line_num!: %%a >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
2004:   112:             set /a line_num+=1
2005:   113:         )
2006:   114:         endlocal
2007:   115:         echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
2008:   116:     )
2009:   117: )
2010:   118:
2011:   119: rem === TESTS DIRECTORY ===
2012:   120: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
2013:   121: echo [TESTS DIRECTORY - *.js, *.txt files] >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
2014:   122: echo ============================================================================== >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
2015:   123: set test_count=0
2016:   124: for /r test %%f in (*.js *.txt) do (
2017:   125:     if exist "%%f" (
2018:   126:         set /a test_count+=1
2019:   127:
2020:   128:         set "filepath=%%f"
2021:   129:         set "filename=%%~nxf"
2022:   130:         set "filesize=%%~z"
2023:   131:         set "filemodified=%%~tf"
2024:   132:         set "fileext=%%~xf"
2025:   133:
2026:   134:         echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
2027:   135:         echo TEST !test_count! ^| !filepath! >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
2028:   136:         echo Size: !filesize! bytes ^| Type: !fileext! ^| Modified: !filemodified! >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
2029:   137:         echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
2030:   138:
2031:   139:         setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
2032:   140:         set line_num=1
2033:   141:         for /f "tokens=* delims=" %%a in ('type "%%f"') do (
2034:   142:             echo !line_num!: %%a >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
2035:   143:             set /a line_num+=1
2036:   144:         )

2040:   148: )

2043:   151: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt

2066:   174: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt

2070:   178: echo Total script files: %script_count% >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt

2074:   182: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt

2081:   189: echo.

2087:   195: :diffshare
2088:   196: cls
2089:   197: echo Creating diff report...
2090:   198:
2091:   199: rem Create diff report
2092:   200: echo ============================================================================== > DIFF_REPORT.txt
2093:   201: echo STRUCTURED LENDING PROTOCOL - DIFF REPORT >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2094:   202: echo ============================================================================== >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2095:   203: echo Date: %date% Time: %time% >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2096:   204: echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2097:   205:
2098:   206: rem Get git information
2099:   207: echo [GIT STATUS] >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2100:   208: echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2101:   209: git status >> DIFF_REPORT.txt 2>nul
2102:   210: echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2103:   211:
2104:   212: rem Get changed files with details
2105:   213: echo [CHANGED FILES DETAIL] >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2106:   214: echo ============================================================================== >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2107:   215: set changed_count=0
2108:   216: for /f "tokens=1,*" %%a in ('git status --porcelain 2^>nul') do (
2109:   217:     set status=%%a
2110:   218:     set "file=%%b"
2111:   219:
2112:   220:     if exist "!file!" (
2113:   221:         set /a changed_count+=1
2114:   222:
2115:   223:         set "filepath=!file!"
2116:   224:         set "filesize=%%~z"
2117:   225:         set "filemodified=%%~tf"
2118:   226:
2119:   227:         echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2120:   228:         echo FILE !changed_count! ^| !filepath! >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2121:   229:         echo Status: !status! ^| Size: !filesize! bytes ^| Modified: !filemodified! >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2122:   230:         echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2123:   231:
2124:   232:         if "!status!"=="??" (
2125:   233:             echo [NEW FILE - FULL CONTENT WITH LINE NUMBERS] >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2126:   234:             echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2127:   235:             setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
2128:   236:             set line_num=1
2129:   237:             for /f "tokens=* delims=" %%l in ('type "!file!"') do (
2130:   238:                 echo !line_num!: %%l >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2131:   239:                 set /a line_num+=1
2132:   240:             )
2133:   241:             endlocal
2134:   242:         ) else (
2135:   243:             echo [MODIFICATIONS - GIT DIFF OUTPUT] >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2136:   244:             echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2137:   245:             git diff "!file!" >> DIFF_REPORT.txt 2>nul
2138:   246:             if errorlevel 1 (
2139:   247:                 git diff --cached "!file!" >> DIFF_REPORT.txt 2>nul
2140:   248:             )
2141:   249:             echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2142:   250:             echo [CURRENT FILE CONTENT WITH LINE NUMBERS] >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2143:   251:             echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2144:   252:             setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
2145:   253:             set line_num=1
2146:   254:             for /f "tokens=* delims=" %%l in ('type "!file!"') do (
2147:   255:                 echo !line_num!: %%l >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2148:   256:                 set /a line_num+=1
2149:   257:             )
2150:   258:             endlocal
2151:   259:         )
2152:   260:         echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2153:   261:     )
2154:   262: )
2155:   263:
2156:   264: if %changed_count%==0 (
2157:   265:     echo No changes detected in the working directory. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2158:   266:     echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2159:   267: )
2160:   268:
2161:   269: if %changed_count% gtr 0 (
2162:   270:     echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2163:   271:     echo [LINE-BY-LINE CHANGES SUMMARY] >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2164:   272:     echo ============================================================================== >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2165:   273:     for /f "tokens=2" %%f in ('git status --porcelain 2^>nul ^| findstr /r "^M ^A ^??"') do (
2166:   274:         if exist "%%f" (
2167:   275:             echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2168:   276:             echo FILE: %%f >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2169:   277:             echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2170:   278:             git diff --unified=0 "%%f" 2>nul | findstr "+" "-" >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2171:   279:             echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2172:   280:         )
2173:   281:     )
2174:   282: )
2175:   283:
2176:   284: echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2177:   285: echo [GIT DIFF SUMMARY] >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2178:   286: echo ============================================================================== >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2179:   287: git diff --stat >> DIFF_REPORT.txt 2>nul
2180:   288: if errorlevel 1 (
2181:   289:     echo No staged changes. Use 'git diff --cached' for staged changes. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2182:   290: )
2183:   291:
2184:   292: rem Summary
2185:   293: echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2186:   294: echo [REPORT SUMMARY] >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2187:   295: echo ============================================================================== >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2188:   296: echo Total changed files: %changed_count% >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2189:   297: echo Report generated: %date% %time% >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2190:   298: echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2191:   299: echo INSTRUCTIONS FOR CODE REVIEW: >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2192:   300: echo 1. Files are listed with full paths for precise location >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2193:   301: echo 2. Line numbers are included for specific references >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2194:   302: echo 3. Changes marked with + (additions) and - (deletions) >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2195:   303: echo 4. New files show complete content >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2196:   304: echo ============================================================================== >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
2197:   305:
2198:   306: cls
2199:   307: echo File created: DIFF_REPORT.txt
2200:   308: echo Changed files: %changed_count%
2201:   309: echo.
2202:   310: echo Copy content to pastebin.com and share the URL
2203:   311: echo.
2204:   312: pause
2205:   313: goto menu
2206:   314:
2207:   315: :gitpush
2208:   316: cls
2209:   317: echo GitHub: https://github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%
2210:   318: echo.
2211:   319: set /p msg=Commit message:
2212:   320: if "%msg%"=="" set msg="Project update"
2213:   321: echo.
2214:   322: git add .
2215:   323: git commit -m "%msg%"
2216:   324: git push
2217:   325: echo.
2218:   326: echo Verify commit: https://github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%/commits/main
2219:   327: echo.
2220:   328: pause
2221:   329: goto menu
2222:   330:
2223:   331: :githubrepo
2224:   332: cls
2225:   333: echo ========================================
2226:   334: echo   PUBLISH TO GITHUB REPOSITORY
2227:   335: echo ========================================
2228:   336: echo.
2229:   337: echo Repository: %GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%
2230:   338: echo URL: https://github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%
2231:   339: echo.
2232:   340:
2233:   341: rem Check if Git is installed
2234:   342: git --version >nul 2>&1
2235:   343: if errorlevel 1 (
2236:   344:     echo ERROR: Git is not installed or not in PATH
2237:   345:     echo Please install Git from: https://git-scm.com/downloads
2238:   346:     echo.
2239:   347:     pause
2240:   348:     goto menu
2241:   349: )
2242:   350:
2243:   351: rem Check if GitHub token is set
2244:   352: if "%GITHUB_TOKEN%"=="" (
2245:   353:     echo GITHUB_TOKEN is not configured.
2246:   354:     echo.
2247:   355:     echo To create a GitHub token:
2248:   356:     echo 1. Go to https://github.com/settings/tokens
2249:   357:     echo 2. Click "Generate new token (classic)"
2250:   358:     echo 3. Give it a name
2251:   359:     echo 4. Select "repo" (FULL scope)
2252:   360:     echo 5. Click "Generate token"
2253:   361:     echo 6. Copy the token (starts with 'ghp_')
2254:   362:     echo.
2255:   363:     set /p GITHUB_TOKEN=Enter your GitHub token:
2256:   364:     if "%GITHUB_TOKEN%"=="" (
2257:   365:         echo No token entered. Operation cancelled.
2258:   366:         echo.
2259:   367:         pause
2260:   368:         goto menu
2261:   369:     )
2262:   370: )
2263:   371:
2264:   372: rem Configure remote URL with token
2265:   373: echo Configuring Git remote with token...
2266:   374: git remote remove origin 2>nul
2267:   375: git remote add origin https://x-access-token:%GITHUB_TOKEN%@github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%.git
2268:   376:
2269:   377: if errorlevel 1 (
2270:   378:     echo ERROR: Failed to configure Git remote
2271:   379:     echo.
2272:   380:     pause
2273:   381:     goto menu
2274:   382: )
2275:   383:
2276:   384: rem Configure Git user
2277:   385: echo Configuring Git user...
2278:   386: git config user.name "%GITHUB_USERNAME%"
2279:   387: git config user.email "%GITHUB_USERNAME%@users.noreply.github.com"
2280:   388:
2281:   389: rem Add all files
2282:   390: echo Adding files to Git...
2283:   391: git add .
2284:   392:
2285:   393: rem Commit
2286:   394: set /p commit_msg=Enter commit message (press Enter for default):
2287:   395: if "%commit_msg%"=="" set commit_msg="üöÄ Automated publication: Structured Lending Protocol - %date% %time%"
2288:   396: echo Committing with message: %commit_msg%
2289:   397: git commit -m "%commit_msg%"
2290:   398:
2291:   399: rem Push to GitHub
2292:   400: echo Pushing to GitHub repository...
2293:   401: git branch -M main
2294:   402: git push -u origin main --force
2295:   403:
2296:   404: if errorlevel 1 (
2297:   405:     echo ERROR: Failed to push to GitHub
2298:   406:     echo Check your token permissions and repository access
2299:   407:     echo.
2300:   408:
2301:   409:     rem Try alternative method
2302:   410:     echo Trying alternative authentication method...
2303:   411:     git remote remove origin
2304:   412:     git remote add origin https://%GITHUB_USERNAME%:%GITHUB_TOKEN%@github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%.git
2305:   413:     git push -u origin main --force
2306:   414:
2307:   415:     if errorlevel 1 (
2308:   416:         echo ERROR: All authentication methods failed
2309:   417:         echo Please verify:
2310:   418:         echo 1. Token has "repo" permissions
2311:   419:         echo 2. Repository exists: %GITHUB_REPO%
2312:   420:         echo 3. Token is not expired
2313:   421:         echo.
2314:   422:     ) else (
2315:   423:         echo SUCCESS: Repository published successfully!
2316:   424:         echo URL: https://github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%
2317:   425:     )
2318:   426: ) else (
2319:   427:     echo SUCCESS: Repository published successfully!
2320:   428:     echo URL: https://github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%
2321:   429:     echo.
2322:   430:     echo Check your repository at:
2323:   431:     echo https://github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%
2324:   432: )
2325:   433:
2326:   434: rem Clear token from memory for security
2327:   435: set GITHUB_TOKEN=
2328:   436: echo.
2329:   437: pause
2330:   438: goto menu
2331:   439:
2332:   440: :githubgists
2333:   441: cls
2334:   442: echo ========================================
2335:   443: echo   SHARE TO GITHUB GISTS
2336:   444: echo ========================================
2337:   445: echo.
2338:   446: echo Gists are like pastebin but integrated with GitHub
2339:   447: echo Each file can be up to 1MB
2340:   448: echo.
2341:   449:
2342:   450: rem Check if curl is installed
2343:   451: where curl >nul 2>&1
2344:   452: if errorlevel 1 (
2345:   453:     echo ERROR: curl is not installed or not in PATH
2346:   454:     echo Please install curl or use Windows PowerShell alternative
2347:   455:     echo.
2348:   456:     pause
2349:   457:     goto menu
2350:   458: )
2351:   459:
2352:   460: rem Check if GitHub token is set
2353:   461: if "%GITHUB_TOKEN%"=="" (
2354:   462:     echo GITHUB_TOKEN is not configured.
2355:   463:     echo.
2356:   464:     echo To create a GitHub token:
2357:   465:     echo 1. Go to https://github.com/settings/tokens
2358:   466:     echo 2. Click "Generate new token (classic)"
2359:   467:     echo 3. Give it a name
2360:   468:     echo 4. Select "gist" permission
2361:   469:     echo 5. Click "Generate token"
2362:   470:     echo 6. Copy the token (starts with 'ghp_')
2363:   471:     echo.
2364:   472:     set /p GITHUB_TOKEN=Enter your GitHub token (with gist permission):
2365:   473:     if "%GITHUB_TOKEN%"=="" (
2366:   474:         echo No token entered. Operation cancelled.
2367:   475:         echo.
2368:   476:         pause
2369:   477:         goto menu
2370:   478:     )
2371:   479: )
2372:   480:
2373:   481: echo Checking GitHub token...
2374:   482: curl -s -H "Authorization: token %GITHUB_TOKEN%" https://api.github.com/user > temp_user.json
2375:   483: findstr "login" temp_user.json >nul
2376:   484: if errorlevel 1 (
2377:   485:     echo ERROR: Invalid GitHub token or no permission
2378:   486:     echo Please verify:
2379:   487:     echo 1. Token has "gist" permission
2380:   488:     echo 2. Token is not expired
2381:   489:     echo 3. Token starts with "ghp_"
2382:   490:     echo.
2383:   491:     del temp_user.json 2>nul
2384:   492:     pause
2385:   493:     goto menu
2386:   494: )
2387:   495:
2388:   496: for /f "tokens=2 delims=:," %%a in ('findstr "login" temp_user.json') do set github_login=%%a
2389:   497: set github_login=%github_login:"=%
2390:   498: set github_login=%github_login: =%
2391:   499: del temp_user.json 2>nul
2392:   500:
2393:   501: echo Token valid for user: %github_login%
2394:   502: echo.
2395:   503:
2396:   504: rem Check if share files exist
2397:   505: if not exist "PROJECT_SHARE.txt" (
2398:   506:     echo PROJECT_SHARE.txt not found.
2399:   507:     echo Would you like to create it first? (Y/N)
2400:   508:     set /p create_choice=
2401:   509:     if /i "%create_choice%"=="Y" goto fullshare
2402:   510:     echo Operation cancelled.
2403:   511:     echo.
2404:   512:     pause
2405:   513:     goto menu
2406:   514: )
2407:   515:
2408:   516: rem Read the file and check size
2409:   517: for %%F in ("PROJECT_SHARE.txt") do set filesize=%%~zF
2410:   518: set /a filesize_kb=%filesize%/1024
2411:   519: set /a filesize_mb=%filesize_kb%/1024
2412:   520:
2413:   521: echo File: PROJECT_SHARE.txt
2414:   522: echo Size: %filesize% bytes (%filesize_kb% KB, %filesize_mb% MB)
2415:   523: echo.
2416:   524:
2417:   525: if %filesize% gtr 1000000 (
2418:   526:     echo WARNING: File is larger than 1MB (%filesize_mb%.%filesize_kb% MB)
2419:   527:     echo Gists have a 1MB limit per file.
2420:   528:     echo.
2421:   529:     echo Options:
2422:   530:     echo 1. Split file into multiple parts (recommended)
2423:   531:     echo 2. Try to upload anyway (may fail)
2424:   532:     echo 3. Cancel
2425:   533:     echo.
2426:   534:     set /p split_choice=Choose option (1-3):
2427:   535:
2428:   536:     if "%split_choice%"=="1" goto splitfile
2429:   537:     if "%split_choice%"=="3" goto menu
2430:   538: )
2431:   539:
2432:   540: rem Prepare file content for JSON
2433:   541: echo Preparing file content for upload...
2434:   542: powershell -Command "(Get-Content -Path 'PROJECT_SHARE.txt' -Raw) -replace '\"', '\"' -replace '\\', '\\' -replace '`t', '\t' -replace '`r`n', '\n' | Set-Content -Path 'temp_content.txt' -Force"
2435:   543:
2436:   544: rem Create JSON payload
2437:   545: echo Creating Gist...
2438:   546: (
2439:   547: echo {
2440:   548: echo   "description": "Structured Lending Protocol - Full Project Share ^(%date% ^)",
2441:   549: echo   "public": false,
2442:   550: echo   "files": {
2443:   551: echo     "PROJECT_SHARE.txt": {
2444:   552: echo       "content":
2445:   553: ) > temp_payload.json
2446:   554:
2447:   555: type temp_content.txt >> temp_payload.json
2448:   556:
2449:   557: (
2450:   558: echo
2451:   559: echo     }
2452:   560: echo   }
2453:   561: echo }
2454:   562: ) >> temp_payload.json
2455:   563:
2456:   564: rem Upload to GitHub Gists
2457:   565: echo Uploading to GitHub Gists...
2458:   566: curl -s -X POST ^
2459:   567:   -H "Authorization: token %GITHUB_TOKEN%" ^
2460:   568:   -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" ^
2461:   569:   https://api.github.com/gists ^
2462:   570:   -d @temp_payload.json > temp_response.json
2463:   571:
2464:   572: rem Check response
2465:   573: findstr "html_url" temp_response.json >nul
2466:   574: if errorlevel 1 (
2467:   575:     echo ERROR: Failed to create Gist
2468:   576:     echo Response:
2469:   577:     type temp_response.json
2470:   578:     echo.
2471:   579:
2472:   580:     rem Try to parse error
2473:   581:     for /f "tokens=2 delims=:," %%a in ('findstr "message" temp_response.json') do (
2474:   582:         set error_msg=%%a
2475:   583:         set error_msg=!error_msg:"=!
2476:   584:         echo Error: !error_msg!
2477:   585:     )
2478:   586: ) else (
2479:   587:     for /f "tokens=2 delims=:," %%a in ('findstr "html_url" temp_response.json') do (
2480:   588:         set gist_url=%%a
2481:   589:         set gist_url=!gist_url:"=!
2482:   590:         set gist_url=!gist_url: =!
2483:   591:     )
2484:   592:
2485:   593:     echo SUCCESS: Gist created successfully!
2486:   594:     echo.
2487:   595:     echo Gist URL: !gist_url!
2488:   596:     echo.
2489:   597:     echo You can share this URL for code review.
2490:   598:
2491:   599:     rem Save Gist info to file
2492:   600:     echo Gist URL: !gist_url! > GIST_INFO.txt
2493:   601:     echo Created: %date% %time% >> GIST_INFO.txt
2494:   602:     echo Description: Structured Lending Protocol - Full Project Share >> GIST_INFO.txt
2495:   603:     echo File: PROJECT_SHARE.txt >> GIST_INFO.txt
2496:   604:     echo.
2497:   605:     echo Gist information saved to: GIST_INFO.txt
2498:   606: )
2499:   607:
2500:   608: rem Cleanup
2501:   609: del temp_content.txt 2>nul
2502:   610: del temp_payload.json 2>nul
2503:   611: del temp_response.json 2>nul
2504:   612: set GITHUB_TOKEN=
2505:   613:
2506:   614: echo.
2507:   615: pause
2508:   616: goto menu
2509:   617:
2510:   618: :splitfile
2511:   619: cls
2512:   620: echo ========================================
2513:   621: echo   SPLIT FILE FOR GITHUB GISTS
2514:   622: echo ========================================
2515:   623: echo.
2516:   624: echo Splitting PROJECT_SHARE.txt for GitHub Gists...
2517:   625: echo Gist limit: 1MB per file
2518:   626: echo.
2519:   627:
2520:   628: rem Calculate number of parts needed
2521:   629: set /a parts_needed=(%filesize% / 1000000) + 1
2522:   630: echo File size: %filesize% bytes
2523:   631: echo Parts needed: %parts_needed%
2524:   632: echo.
2525:   633:
2526:   634: set /p gist_desc=Enter description for Gists:
2527:   635: if "%gist_desc%"=="" set gist_desc="Structured Lending Protocol - Part"
2528:   636:
2529:   637: echo Creating %parts_needed% parts...
2530:   638: set part_num=1
2531:   639: set current_line=1
2532:   640: set total_lines=0
2533:   641:
2534:   642: rem Count total lines first
2535:   643: for /f %%i in ('type "PROJECT_SHARE.txt" ^| find /c /v ""') do set total_lines=%%i
2536:   644: set /a lines_per_part=%total_lines% / %parts_needed%
2537:   645:
2538:   646: echo Total lines: %total_lines%
2539:   647: echo Lines per part: %lines_per_part%
2540:   648: echo.
2541:   649:
2542:   650: :splitloop
2543:   651: if %part_num% gtr %parts_needed% goto splitdone
2544:   652:
2545:   653: set start_line=%current_line%
2546:   654: set /a end_line=%current_line% + %lines_per_part% - 1
2547:   655: if %end_line% gtr %total_lines% set end_line=%total_lines%
2548:   656:
2549:   657: echo Creating part %part_num%: lines %start_line%-%end_line%
2550:   658:
2551:   659: rem Extract part using PowerShell
2552:   660: powershell -Command "Get-Content -Path 'PROJECT_SHARE.txt' -TotalCount %end_line% | Select-Object -Last %lines_per_part% | Set-Content -Path 'PROJECT_SHARE_PART%part_num%.txt' -Force"
2553:   661:
2554:   662: rem Upload this part to Gist
2555:   663: echo Uploading part %part_num% to Gist...
2556:   664: powershell -Command "(Get-Content -Path 'PROJECT_SHARE_PART%part_num%.txt' -Raw) -replace '\"', '\"' -replace '\\', '\\' -replace '`t', '\t' -replace '`r`n', '\n' | Set-Content -Path 'temp_content_part.txt' -Force"
2557:   665:
2558:   666: (
2559:   667: echo {
2560:   668: echo   "description": "%gist_desc% %part_num%/%parts_needed%",
2561:   669: echo   "public": false,
2562:   670: echo   "files": {
2563:   671: echo     "PROJECT_SHARE_PART%part_num%.txt": {
2564:   672: echo       "content":
2565:   673: ) > temp_payload_part.json
2566:   674:
2567:   675: type temp_content_part.txt >> temp_payload_part.json
2568:   676:
2569:   677: (
2570:   678: echo
2571:   679: echo     }
2572:   680: echo   }
2573:   681: echo }
2574:   682: ) >> temp_payload_part.json
2575:   683:
2576:   684: curl -s -X POST ^
2577:   685:   -H "Authorization: token %GITHUB_TOKEN%" ^
2578:   686:   -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" ^
2579:   687:   https://api.github.com/gists ^
2580:   688:   -d @temp_payload_part.json > temp_response_part.json
2581:   689:
2582:   690: findstr "html_url" temp_response_part.json >nul
2583:   691: if errorlevel 1 (
2584:   692:     echo ERROR: Failed to create Gist for part %part_num%
2585:   693: ) else (
2586:   694:     for /f "tokens=2 delims=:," %%a in ('findstr "html_url" temp_response_part.json') do (
2587:   695:         set gist_url_part=%%a
2588:   696:         set gist_url_part=!gist_url_part:"=!
2589:   697:         set gist_url_part=!gist_url_part: =!
2590:   698:     )
2591:   699:     echo SUCCESS: Part %part_num% created: !gist_url_part!
2592:   700:
2593:   701:     rem Save Gist URL
2594:   702:     echo Part %part_num%: !gist_url_part! >> GISTS_INDEX.txt
2595:   703: )
2596:   704:
2597:   705: rem Cleanup for this part
2598:   706: del temp_content_part.txt 2>nul
2599:   707: del temp_payload_part.json 2>nul
2600:   708: del temp_response_part.json 2>nul
2601:   709:
2602:   710: set /a current_line=%end_line% + 1
2603:   711: set /a part_num+=1
2604:   712: goto splitloop
2605:   713:
2606:   714: :splitdone
2607:   715: echo.
2608:   716: echo All parts created successfully!
2609:   717: if exist "GISTS_INDEX.txt" (
2610:   718:     echo.
2611:   719:     echo Gist URLs saved to: GISTS_INDEX.txt
2612:   720:     echo.
2613:   721:     type GISTS_INDEX.txt
2614:   722: )
2615:   723:
2616:   724: rem Create master index
2617:   725: echo Creating master index file...
2618:   726: (
2619:   727: echo ========================================
2620:   728: echo   GITHUB GISTS INDEX
2621:   729: echo ========================================
2622:   730: echo Project: Structured Lending Protocol
2623:   731: echo Split into: %parts_needed% parts
2624:   732: echo Date: %date% Time: %time%
2625:   733: echo.
2626:   734: echo GIST URLs:
2627:   735: echo.
2628:   736: ) > GISTS_MASTER_INDEX.txt
2629:   737:
2630:   738: if exist "GISTS_INDEX.txt" type GISTS_INDEX.txt >> GISTS_MASTER_INDEX.txt
2631:   739:
2632:   740: echo.
2633:   741: echo Master index saved to: GISTS_MASTER_INDEX.txt
2634:   742: echo.
2635:   743:
2636:   744: rem Cleanup part files
2637:   745: for /l %%i in (1,1,%parts_needed%) do (
2638:   746:     del PROJECT_SHARE_PART%%i.txt 2>nul
2639:   747: )
2640:   748:
2641:   749: set GITHUB_TOKEN=
2642:   750: pause
2643:   751: goto menu
2644: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2645: 
2646: SCRIPT 7 | ShareSplit1M-option2et3a implementer.ps1
2647: Size: 12525 bytes | Type: .ps1 | Modified: 2026-01-21 19:37:49.515099
2648: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2649:     1: # ShareSplit1M_Working.ps1
2650:     2: # ============================================================================
2651:     3: # CONFIGURATION
2652:     4: # ============================================================================
2653:     5: # Lecture de la configuration
2654:     6: $configPath = ".\..\project_config.json"
2655:     7: if (Test-Path $configPath) {
2656:     8:     $config = Get-Content $configPath -Raw | ConvertFrom-Json
2657:     9:     $PROJECT_NAME = $config.PROJECT_NAME
2658:    10:     $PROJECT_PATH = $config.PROJECT_PATH
2659:    11:     $GITHUB_TOKEN = $config.GITHUB_TOKEN
2660:    12:     $GITHUB_USERNAME = $config.GITHUB_USERNAME
2661:    13:     $GITHUB_REPO_NAME = $config.GITHUB_REPO_NAME
2662:    14:     $GITHUB_REPO_PRIVATE = $config.GITHUB_REPO_PRIVATE
2663:    15:     $GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION = $config.GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION
2664:    16: } else {
2665:    17:     Write-Host "Fichier de configuration non trouv√©. Utilisation des valeurs par d√©faut." -ForegroundColor Yellow
2666:    18:     $PROJECT_NAME = "MonProjet"
2667:    19:     $PROJECT_PATH = "."
2668:    20:     $GITHUB_TOKEN = ""
2669:    21:     $GITHUB_USERNAME = ""
2670:    22:     $GITHUB_REPO_NAME = ""
2671:    23:     $GITHUB_REPO_PRIVATE = $false
2672:    24:     $GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION = "Projet partag√© automatiquement"
2673:    25: }
2674:    26:
2675:    27: # ============================================================================
2676:    28: # FONCTION POUR PUBLIER SUR GITHUB REPOSITORY - VERSION FONCTIONNELLE
2677:    29: # ============================================================================
2678:    30: function Publish-ToGitHubRepo-Working {
2679:    31:     param(
2680:    32:         [string]$Token,
2681:    33:         [string]$Username,
2682:    34:         [string]$RepoName,
2683:    35:         [string]$Description,
2684:    36:         [bool]$IsPrivate
2685:    37:     )
2686:    38:
2687:    39:     Write-Host "`n=== PUBLICATION SUR GITHUB REPOSITORY ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
2688:    40:
2689:    41:     # CRITIQUE: V√©rifier que nous sommes dans le bon r√©pertoire
2690:    42:     Write-Host "V√©rification du r√©pertoire..." -NoNewline
2691:    43:     $currentDir = Get-Location
2692:    44:     $projectDir = Resolve-Path $PROJECT_PATH -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
2693:    45:
2694:    46:     if ($currentDir.Path -ne $projectDir.Path) {
2695:    47:         Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
2696:    48:         Write-Host "ERREUR: Vous devez √™tre dans le dossier du projet!" -ForegroundColor Red
2697:    49:         Write-Host "Actuel: $currentDir" -ForegroundColor Yellow
2698:    50:         Write-Host "Projet: $projectDir" -ForegroundColor Yellow
2699:    51:         Write-Host "Ex√©cutez: cd '$PROJECT_PATH'" -ForegroundColor Cyan
2700:    52:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Mauvais r√©pertoire" }
2701:    53:     }
2702:    54:     Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
2703:    55:
2704:    56:     # CRITIQUE: V√©rifier le token
2705:    57:     if ([string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($Token) -or $Token -notmatch "^ghp_[a-zA-Z0-9]{36,}$") {
2706:    58:         Write-Host "‚ùå Token invalide ou manquant" -ForegroundColor Red
2707:    59:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Token GitHub invalide" }
2708:    60:     }
2709:    61:
2710:    62:     # CRITIQUE: V√©rifier que Git est install√©
2711:    63:     try {
2712:    64:         git --version | Out-Null
2713:    65:     } catch {
2714:    66:         Write-Host "‚ùå Git non install√©" -ForegroundColor Red
2715:    67:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Git non install√©" }
2716:    68:     }
2717:    69:
2718:    70:     # CRITIQUE: Nettoyer la configuration Git
2719:    71:     Write-Host "Nettoyage Git..." -NoNewline
2720:    72:     git config --global --unset credential.helper 2>$null
2721:    73:     git config --global credential.helper "" 2>$null
2722:    74:     Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
2723:    75:
2724:    76:     try {
2725:    77:         # CRITIQUE: Initialiser Git si n√©cessaire
2726:    78:         if (-not (Test-Path ".git")) {
2727:    79:             Write-Host "Initialisation Git..." -NoNewline
2728:    80:             git init
2729:    81:             Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
2730:    82:         } else {
2731:    83:             Write-Host "‚úì Git d√©j√† initialis√©" -ForegroundColor Gray
2732:    84:         }
2733:    85:
2734:    86:         # CRITIQUE: Configurer Git
2735:    87:         Write-Host "Configuration Git..." -NoNewline
2736:    88:         git config user.name "$Username"
2737:    89:         git config user.email "$Username@users.noreply.github.com"
2738:    90:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
2739:    91:
2740:    92:         # CRITIQUE: Cr√©er le .gitignore pour exclure les fichiers sensibles
2741:    93:         $gitignoreContent = @"
2742:    94: # Fichiers sensibles
2743:    95: project_config.json
2744:    96: *.backup
2745:    97: *.bak
2746:    98:
2747:    99: # Fichiers g√©n√©r√©s
2748:   100: PROJECT_SHARE_*
2749:   101: GISTS_INDEX*
2750:   102: GITHUB_PUBLISH_*
2751:   103:
2752:   104: # Dossiers syst√®me
2753:   105: node_modules/
2754:   106: .vscode/
2755:   107: .idea/
2756:   108: __pycache__/
2757:   109: .env
2758:   110: "@
2759:   111:         $gitignoreContent | Out-File ".gitignore" -Encoding UTF8
2760:   112:
2761:   113:         # CRITIQUE: Pr√©parer l'URL avec le token
2762:   114:         $remoteUrl = "https://x-access-token:${Token}@github.com/${Username}/${RepoName}.git"
2763:   115:         Write-Host "Remote: https://github.com/${Username}/${RepoName}" -ForegroundColor Gray
2764:   116:
2765:   117:         # CRITIQUE: G√©rer le remote
2766:   118:         git remote remove origin 2>$null
2767:   119:         git remote add origin $remoteUrl
2768:   120:
2769:   121:         # Ajouter tous les fichiers
2770:   122:         Write-Host "Ajout fichiers..." -NoNewline
2771:   123:         git add .
2772:   124:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
2773:   125:
2774:   126:         # Commit
2775:   127:         Write-Host "Commit..." -NoNewline
2776:   128:         $commitMsg = "üöÄ Publication: $PROJECT_NAME - $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')"
2777:   129:         git commit -m $commitMsg --quiet
2778:   130:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
2779:   131:
2780:   132:         # CRITIQUE: Cr√©er la branche main
2781:   133:         Write-Host "Branche..." -NoNewline
2782:   134:         git branch -M main
2783:   135:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
2784:   136:
2785:   137:         # CORRECTION: Push avec l'approche en deux √©tapes
2786:   138:         Write-Host "Push vers GitHub..." -NoNewline
2787:   139:         # D√©sactiver les prompts
2788:   140:         $env:GIT_TERMINAL_PROMPT = "0"
2789:   141:
2790:   142:         # Premi√®re tentative : push normal
2791:   143:         $pushOutput = git push -u origin main 2>&1
2792:   144:
2793:   145:         # Si √©chec avec erreur d'histoires non li√©es, essayer avec --force
2794:   146:         if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) {
2795:   147:             if ($pushOutput -match "failed to push some refs" -or $pushOutput -match "unrelated histories" -or $pushOutput -match "non-fast-forward") {
2796:   148:                 Write-Host " (tentative avec --force)..." -NoNewline -ForegroundColor Yellow
2797:   149:                 $pushOutput = git push -u origin main --force 2>&1
2798:   150:             }
2799:   151:         }
2800:   152:
2801:   153:         if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
2802:   154:             Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
2803:   155:             Write-Host "‚úÖ PUBLICATION R√âUSSIE !" -ForegroundColor Green
2804:   156:             Write-Host "üîó https://github.com/$Username/$RepoName" -ForegroundColor Cyan
2805:   157:             return @{
2806:   158:                 success = $true
2807:   159:                 repo_url = "https://github.com/$Username/$RepoName"
2808:   160:                 message = "Publication r√©ussie"
2809:   161:             }
2810:   162:         } else {
2811:   163:             Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
2812:   164:             # Analyser l'erreur
2813:   165:             $errorMsg = "Erreur Git"
2814:   166:             if ($pushOutput -match "Authentication failed") {
2815:   167:                 $errorMsg = "Token invalide - Reg√©n√©rez-le sur GitHub"
2816:   168:             } elseif ($pushOutput -match "Repository not found") {
2817:   169:                 $errorMsg = "Repository non trouv√© - Cr√©ez-le d'abord sur GitHub"
2818:   170:             } elseif ($pushOutput -match "GH013" -or $pushOutput -match "secret") {
2819:   171:                 $errorMsg = "GitHub a bloqu√© le push (secret d√©tect√©) - Autorisez-le sur GitHub"
2820:   172:             } else {
2821:   173:                 $errorMsg = "Erreur: $($pushOutput | Select-Object -First 2)"
2822:   174:             }
2823:   175:             Write-Host "‚ùå $errorMsg" -ForegroundColor Red
2824:   176:             return @{
2825:   177:                 success = $false
2826:   178:                 error = $errorMsg
2827:   179:                 git_output = $pushOutput
2828:   180:             }
2829:   181:         }
2830:   182:     } catch {
2831:   183:         Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
2832:   184:         Write-Host "‚ùå Erreur inattendue: $_" -ForegroundColor Red
2833:   185:         return @{
2834:   186:             success = $false
2835:   187:             error = $_.Exception.Message
2836:   188:         }
2837:   189:     }
2838:   190: }
2839:   191:
2840:   192: # ============================================================================
2841:   193: # MENU PRINCIPAL FONCTIONNEL
2842:   194: # ============================================================================
2843:   195: function Show-MainMenu {
2844:   196:     Clear-Host
2845:   197:     Write-Host ""
2846:   198:     Write-Host "=" * 60 -ForegroundColor Cyan
2847:   199:     Write-Host "SHARE SPLIT 1M - $PROJECT_NAME" -ForegroundColor Cyan
2848:   200:     Write-Host "=" * 60 -ForegroundColor Cyan
2849:   201:     Write-Host ""
2850:   202:     Write-Host "=== MENU PRINCIPAL ===" -ForegroundColor Yellow
2851:   203:     Write-Host "1. Publier sur GitHub Repository" -ForegroundColor Green
2852:   204:     Write-Host "2. Partager sur GitHub Gists" -ForegroundColor Yellow
2853:   205:     Write-Host "3. G√©n√©rer seulement les fichiers locaux" -ForegroundColor Yellow
2854:   206:     Write-Host "4. Quitter" -ForegroundColor Red
2855:   207:     Write-Host ""
2856:   208:     $choice = Read-Host "Votre choix [1-4]"
2857:   209:
2858:   210:     switch ($choice) {
2859:   211:         '1' {
2860:   212:             Write-Host "`n=== PUBLICATION GITHUB REPOSITORY ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
2861:   213:
2862:   214:             # V√©rifier le token
2863:   215:             if (-not $GITHUB_TOKEN -or $GITHUB_TOKEN -eq "*** REMOVED FOR SECURITY ***") {
2864:   216:                 Write-Host "üîë TOKEN GITHUB REQUIS" -ForegroundColor Yellow
2865:   217:                 Write-Host "Collez votre token GitHub (commence par 'ghp_'):"
2866:   218:                 $GITHUB_TOKEN = Read-Host
2867:   219:             }
2868:   220:
2869:   221:             # V√©rifier les autres informations
2870:   222:             if (-not $GITHUB_USERNAME) {
2871:   223:                 $GITHUB_USERNAME = Read-Host "Nom d'utilisateur GitHub"
2872:   224:             }
2873:   225:             if (-not $GITHUB_REPO_NAME) {
2874:   226:                 $GITHUB_REPO_NAME = Read-Host "Nom du repository"
2875:   227:             }
2876:   228:
2877:   229:             # CRITIQUE: S'assurer d'√™tre dans le bon r√©pertoire
2878:   230:             Write-Host "`nV√©rification du r√©pertoire..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
2879:   231:             if ((Get-Location).Path -ne (Resolve-Path $PROJECT_PATH).Path) {
2880:   232:                 Write-Host "ATTENTION: Vous devez √™tre dans: $PROJECT_PATH" -ForegroundColor Red
2881:   233:                 Write-Host "Ex√©cutez d'abord: cd '$PROJECT_PATH'" -ForegroundColor Cyan
2882:   234:                 Read-Host "Appuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
2883:   235:                 return
2884:   236:             }
2885:   237:
2886:   238:             # Ex√©cuter la publication
2887:   239:             $result = Publish-ToGitHubRepo-Working -Token $GITHUB_TOKEN `
2888:   240:                 -Username $GITHUB_USERNAME `
2889:   241:                 -RepoName $GITHUB_REPO_NAME `
2890:   242:                 -Description $GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION `
2891:   243:                 -IsPrivate $GITHUB_REPO_PRIVATE
2892:   244:
2893:   245:             if ($result.success) {
2894:   246:                 Write-Host ""
2895:   247:                 Write-Host "‚úÖ Publication r√©ussie sur GitHub!" -ForegroundColor Green
2896:   248:                 Write-Host "Repository: $($result.repo_url)" -ForegroundColor Cyan
2897:   249:             } else {
2898:   250:                 Write-Host ""
2899:   251:                 Write-Host "‚ùå √âchec de la publication" -ForegroundColor Red
2900:   252:                 Write-Host "Erreur: $($result.error)" -ForegroundColor Red
2901:   253:
2902:   254:                 # Conseils de d√©pannage
2903:   255:                 if ($result.error -match "Token") {
2904:   256:                     Write-Host "`n=== CONSEILS ===" -ForegroundColor Yellow
2905:   257:                     Write-Host "1. https://github.com/settings/tokens" -ForegroundColor Gray
2906:   258:                     Write-Host "2. 'Generate new token (classic)'" -ForegroundColor Gray
2907:   259:                     Write-Host "3. Permission: 'repo' (TOUTE la section)" -ForegroundColor Green
2908:   260:                     Write-Host "4. Copiez le token (ghp_...)" -ForegroundColor Gray
2909:   261:                 }
2910:   262:             }
2911:   263:             Write-Host ""
2912:   264:             Write-Host "Appuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
2913:   265:             Read-Host
2914:   266:         }
2915:   267:         '2' {
2916:   268:             Write-Host "`n=== GITHUB GISTS ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
2917:   269:             Write-Host "Fonctionnalit√© √† impl√©menter" -ForegroundColor Gray
2918:   270:             Write-Host ""
2919:   271:             Read-Host "Appuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
2920:   272:         }
2921:   273:         '3' {
2922:   274:             Write-Host "`n=== FICHIERS LOCAUX ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
2923:   275:             Write-Host "Fonctionnalit√© √† impl√©menter" -ForegroundColor Gray
2924:   276:             Write-Host ""
2925:   277:             Read-Host "Appuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
2926:   278:         }
2927:   279:         '4' {
2928:   280:             Write-Host "Au revoir!" -ForegroundColor Green
2929:   281:             exit 0
2930:   282:         }
2931:   283:         default {
2932:   284:             Write-Host "Choix invalide!" -ForegroundColor Red
2933:   285:             Start-Sleep -Seconds 1
2934:   286:         }
2935:   287:     }
2936:   288: }
2937:   289:
2938:   290: # ============================================================================
2939:   291: # POINT D'ENTR√âE
2940:   292: # ============================================================================
2941:   293: # Boucle principale
2942:   294: do {
2943:   295:     try {
2944:   296:         Show-MainMenu
2945:   297:     } catch {
2946:   298:         Write-Host "‚ùå Erreur: $_" -ForegroundColor Red
2947:   299:         Write-Host "Red√©marrage dans 3 secondes..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
2948:   300:         Start-Sleep -Seconds 3
2949:   301:     }
2950:   302: } while ($true)
2951: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2952:

2965:    10:     $PROJECT_PATH = $config.PROJECT_PATH
2966:    11:     $GITHUB_TOKEN = $config.GITHUB_TOKEN
2967:    12:     $GITHUB_USERNAME = $config.GITHUB_USERNAME
2968:    13:     $GITHUB_REPO_NAME = $config.GITHUB_REPO_NAME
2969:    14:     $GITHUB_REPO_PRIVATE = $config.GITHUB_REPO_PRIVATE
2970:    15:     $GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION = $config.GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION
2971:    16: } else {
2972:    17:     Write-Host "Fichier de configuration non trouv√©. Utilisation des valeurs par d√©faut." -ForegroundColor Yellow
2973:    18:     $PROJECT_NAME = "SmartContractDevPipeline"
2974:    19:     $PROJECT_PATH = "."
2975:    20:     $GITHUB_TOKEN = ""
2976:    21:     $GITHUB_USERNAME = ""
2977:    22:     $GITHUB_REPO_NAME = ""
2978:    23:     $GITHUB_REPO_PRIVATE = $false
2979:    24:     $GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION = "Pipeline de d√©veloppement de Smart Contracts"
2980:    25: }
2981:    26:

2984:    29: # ============================================================================

2986:    31: $TARGET_FILE_SIZE = 650KB  # Pour ~95% de remplissage
2987:    32: $EXCLUDE_PATTERNS = @("node_modules", ".git", ".vscode", ".idea", "dist", "build", "coverage", "*.log", "*.tmp", "*.cache", "package-lock.json", "yarn.lock", "PROJECT_SHARE_*", "GISTS_INDEX*", "GITHUB_PUBLISH_*")
2988:    33: $SHARE_FILENAME_PREFIX = "PROJECT_SHARE"
2989:    34: $INDEX_FILENAME = "${SHARE_FILENAME_PREFIX}_INDEX.txt"
2990:    35: $SHOW_LINE_NUMBERS = $true
2991:    36:
