4936:    29: }
4937:    30:
4938:    31: foreach ($folder in $agentsStructure.Keys) {
4939:    32:     $fullPath = "$projectPath\$folder"
4940:    33:     New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $fullPath -Force | Out-Null
4941:    34:
4942:    35:     foreach ($file in $agentsStructure[$folder]) {
4943:    36:         $filePath = "$fullPath\$file"
4944:    37:         if (-not (Test-Path $filePath)) {
4945:    38:             New-Item -ItemType File -Path $filePath -Force | Out-Null
4946:    39:         }
4947:    40:     }
4948:    41:     Write-Host "   üìÅ $folder cr√©√©" -ForegroundColor Green
4949:    42: }
4950:    43:
4951:    44: # 2. Cr√©er le fichier de versions
4952:    45: Write-Host "`n2. CREATION DU FICHIER DE VERSIONS..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
4953:    46: $versions = @{
4954:    47:     timestamp = Get-Date -Format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
4955:    48:     system = @{
4956:    49:         os = "Windows $( [System.Environment]::OSVersion.Version.ToString())"
4957:    50:         powershell = $PSVersionTable.PSVersion.ToString()
4958:    51:     }
4959:    52:     tools = @{}
4960:    53:     python = @{}
4961:    54:     node = @{}
4962:    55:     blockchain = @{}
4963:    56:     agents = @{}
4964:    57: }
4965:    58:
4966:    59: # R√©cup√©rer les versions des outils
4967:    60: try { $versions.tools.git = (git --version 2>&1).ToString().Replace('git version ', '').Trim() } catch { $versions.tools.git = "N/A" }
4968:    61: try { $versions.tools.docker = (docker --version 2>&1).ToString().Replace('Docker version ', '').Split(',')[0].Trim() } catch { $versions.tools.docker = "N/A" }
4969:    62:
4970:    63: # R√©cup√©rer les versions Python
4971:    64: try {
4972:    65:     $pythonVersion = (python --version 2>&1).ToString().Replace('Python ', '').Trim()
4973:    66:     $versions.python.version = $pythonVersion
4974:    67:
4975:    68:     # Packages Python
4976:    69:     $pythonPackages = @("langchain", "chromadb", "requests", "web3", "aiohttp")
4977:    70:     foreach ($pkg in $pythonPackages) {
4978:    71:         try {
4979:    72:             $version = python -c "import $pkg; print(getattr($pkg, '__version__', 'N/A'))" 2>$null
4980:    73:             if (-not $version -or $version -eq "N/A") {
4981:    74:                 $version = pip show $pkg 2>$null | Select-String "Version:" | ForEach-Object { $_.ToString().Replace('Version: ', '').Trim() }
4982:    75:             }
4983:    76:             $versions.python.$pkg = $version
4984:    77:         } catch {
4985:    78:             $versions.python.$pkg = "N/A"
4986:    79:         }
4987:    80:     }
4988:    81: } catch { $versions.python.version = "N/A" }
4989:    82:
4990:    83: # R√©cup√©rer les versions Node.js
4991:    84: try {
4992:    85:     $nodeVersion = (node --version 2>&1).ToString().Replace('v', '').Trim()
4993:    86:     $versions.node.version = $nodeVersion
4994:    87:
4995:    88:     # Packages Node.js globaux
4996:    89:     $nodePackages = @("npm", "yarn", "hardhat", "typescript", "next")
4997:    90:     foreach ($pkg in $nodePackages) {
4998:    91:         try {
4999:    92:             if ($pkg -eq "npm") {
5000:    93:                 $version = (npm --version 2>&1).ToString().Trim()
5001:    94:             } elseif ($pkg -eq "next") {
5002:    95:                 $version = (npx next --version 2>&1).ToString().Trim()
5003:    96:             } else {
5004:    97:                 $version = (npx $pkg --version 2>&1).ToString().Trim()
5005:    98:             }
5006:    99:             $versions.node.$pkg = $version
5007:   100:         } catch {
5008:   101:             $versions.node.$pkg = "N/A"
5009:   102:         }
5010:   103:     }
5011:   104: } catch { $versions.node.version = "N/A" }
5012:   105:
5013:   106: # R√©cup√©rer les versions blockchain
5014:   107: try { $versions.blockchain.foundry = (forge --version 2>&1 | Select-String "forge").ToString().Split(' ')[1].Trim() } catch { $versions.blockchain.foundry = "N/A" }
5015:   108: try { $versions.blockchain.slither = (slither --version 2>&1).ToString().Trim() } catch { $versions.blockchain.slither = "N/A" }
5016:   109: try { $versions.blockchain.anvil = (anvil --version 2>&1).ToString().Trim() } catch { $versions.blockchain.anvil = "N/A" }
5017:   110:
5018:   111: # Sauvegarder les versions
5019:   112: $versions | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10 | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\config\versions.json" -Force
5020:   113: Write-Host "   ‚úÖ Fichier de versions cr√©√©" -ForegroundColor Green
5021:   114:
5022:   115: # 3. Cr√©er les configurations des agents
5023:   116: Write-Host "`n3. CREATION DES CONFIGURATIONS D'AGENTS..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
5024:   117:

5026:   119: $architectConfig = @"

5031:   124: model: "ollama:deepseek-coder:6.7b"

5427:   520: "@
5428:   521:
5429:   522: $testerConfig | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\agents\tester\config.yaml" -Force -Encoding UTF8
5430:   523:
5431:   524: Write-Host "   ‚úÖ Configurations des 9 agents cr√©√©es" -ForegroundColor Green
5432:   525:
5433:   526: # 4. Cr√©er le base_agent.py (classe parente)
5434:   527: Write-Host "`n4. CREATION DE LA CLASSE BASE AGENT..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
5435:   528: $baseAgentCode = @'
5436:   529: # agents/shared/base_agent.py
5437:   530: import asyncio
5438:   531: import json
5439:   532: import logging
5440:   533: from abc import ABC, abstractmethod
5441:   534: from pathlib import Path
5442:   535: from typing import Dict, Any, Optional
5443:   536: import yaml
5444:   537:
5445:   538: class BaseAgent(ABC):
5446:   539:     """Classe de base pour tous les agents"""
5447:   540:
5448:   541:     def __init__(self, config_path: str):
5449:   542:         self.config = self._load_config(config_path)
5450:   543:         self.agent_id = self.config.get("agent_id", "unknown")
5451:   544:         self.name = self.config.get("name", "Unnamed Agent")
5452:   545:         self.version = self.config.get("version", "1.0.0")
5453:   546:         self.logger = self._setup_logger()
5454:   547:         self.memory = {}
5455:   548:         self.context = {}
5456:   549:
5457:   550:     def _load_config(self, config_path: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
5458:   551:         """Charge la configuration YAML"""
5459:   552:         try:
5460:   553:             with open(config_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
5461:   554:                 return yaml.safe_load(f)
5462:   555:         except Exception as e:
5463:   556:             print(f"Erreur lors du chargement de la configuration: {e}")
5464:   557:             return {}
5465:   558:
5466:   559:     def _setup_logger(self) -> logging.Logger:
5467:   560:         """Configure le logger"""
5468:   561:         logger = logging.getLogger(self.agent_id)
5469:   562:         if not logger.handlers:
5470:   563:             logger.setLevel(logging.INFO)
5471:   564:             handler = logging.StreamHandler()
5472:   565:             formatter = logging.Formatter(
5473:   566:                 f'%(asctime)s - {self.agent_id} - %(levelname)s - %(message)s'
5474:   567:             )
5475:   568:             handler.setFormatter(formatter)
5476:   569:             logger.addHandler(handler)
5477:   570:         return logger
5478:   571:
5479:   572:     @abstractmethod
5480:   573:     async def initialize(self) -> bool:
5481:   574:         """Initialise l'agent"""
5482:   575:         pass
5483:   576:
5484:   577:     @abstractmethod
5485:   578:     async def execute(self, task: Dict[str, Any], context: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
5486:   579:         """Ex√©cute une t√¢che"""
5487:   580:         pass
5488:   581:
5489:   582:     async def load_context(self, context_path: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
5490:   583:         """Charge le contexte depuis un fichier"""
5491:   584:         try:
5492:   585:             if Path(context_path).exists():
5493:   586:                 with open(context_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
5494:   587:                     self.context = json.load(f)
5495:   588:                     self.logger.info(f"Contexte charg√© depuis {context_path}")
5496:   589:                     return self.context
5497:   590:         except Exception as e:
5498:   591:             self.logger.error(f"Erreur lors du chargement du contexte: {e}")
5499:   592:         return {}
5500:   593:
5501:   594:     async def save_memory(self, memory_path: str) -> bool:
5502:   595:         """Sauvegarde la m√©moire de l'agent"""
5503:   596:         try:
5504:   597:             memory_dir = Path(memory_path).parent
5505:   598:             memory_dir.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
5506:   599:
5507:   600:             with open(memory_path, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
5508:   601:                 json.dump(self.memory, f, indent=2)
5509:   602:
5510:   603:             self.logger.info(f"M√©moire sauvegard√©e dans {memory_path}")
5511:   604:             return True
5512:   605:         except Exception as e:
5513:   606:             self.logger.error(f"Erreur lors de la sauvegarde de la m√©moire: {e}")
5514:   607:             return False
5515:   608:
5516:   609:     def get_agent_info(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
5517:   610:         """Retourne les informations de l'agent"""
5518:   611:         return {
5519:   612:             "agent_id": self.agent_id,
5520:   613:             "name": self.name,
5521:   614:             "version": self.version,
5522:   615:             "config": self.config,
5523:   616:             "tools": self.config.get("tools", []),
5524:   617:             "dependencies": self.config.get("dependencies", {})
5525:   618:         }
5526:   619:
5527:   620:     async def health_check(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
5528:   621:         """V√©rifie la sant√© de l'agent"""
5529:   622:         return {
5530:   623:             "status": "healthy",
5531:   624:             "agent_id": self.agent_id,
5532:   625:             "timestamp": asyncio.get_event_loop().time(),
5533:   626:             "memory_usage": len(str(self.memory)),
5534:   627:             "context_loaded": bool(self.context)
5535:   628:         }
5536:   629: '@
5537:   630:
5538:   631: $baseAgentCode | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\agents\shared\base_agent.py" -Force -Encoding UTF8
5539:   632:
5540:   633: # 5. Cr√©er l'orchestrateur principal
5541:   634: Write-Host "`n5. CREATION DE L'ORCHESTRATEUR PRINCIPAL..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
5542:   635: $orchestratorCode = @'
5543:   636: # agents/orchestrator/orchestrator.py
5544:   637: import asyncio
5545:   638: import json
5546:   639: import yaml
5547:   640: from typing import Dict, List, Any, Optional
5548:   641: from pathlib import Path
5549:   642: import logging
5550:   643: from datetime import datetime
5551:   644:
5552:   645: class Orchestrator:
5553:   646:     """Orchestrateur principal qui g√®re tous les agents"""
5554:   647:
5555:   648:     def __init__(self, project_root: str = "."):
5556:   649:         self.project_root = Path(project_root)
5557:   650:         self.agents = {}
5558:   651:         self.agent_status = {}
5559:   652:         self.task_queue = asyncio.Queue()
5560:   653:         self.results = {}
5561:   654:         self.versions = self._load_versions()
5562:   655:
5563:   656:         # Configuration
5564:   657:         self.config = {
5565:   658:             "max_concurrent_tasks": 3,
5566:   659:             "task_timeout": 300,  # 5 minutes
5567:   660:             "retry_attempts": 3
5568:   661:         }
5569:   662:
5570:   663:         self.logger = self._setup_logger()
5571:   664:
5572:   665:     def _setup_logger(self) -> logging.Logger:
5573:   666:         """Configure le logger"""
5574:   667:         logger = logging.getLogger("orchestrator")
5575:   668:         logger.setLevel(logging.INFO)
5576:   669:
5577:   670:         if not logger.handlers:
5578:   671:             # Handler console
5579:   672:             console_handler = logging.StreamHandler()
5580:   673:             console_formatter = logging.Formatter(
5581:   674:                 '%(asctime)s - %(name)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s'
5582:   675:             )
5583:   676:             console_handler.setFormatter(console_formatter)
5584:   677:             logger.addHandler(console_handler)
5585:   678:
5586:   679:             # Handler fichier
5587:   680:             log_file = self.project_root / "logs" / "orchestrator.log"
5588:   681:             log_file.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
5589:   682:
5590:   683:             file_handler = logging.FileHandler(log_file, encoding='utf-8')
5591:   684:             file_formatter = logging.Formatter(
5592:   685:                 '%(asctime)s - %(name)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s'
5593:   686:             )
5594:   687:             file_handler.setFormatter(file_formatter)
5595:   688:             logger.addHandler(file_handler)
5596:   689:
5597:   690:         return logger
5598:   691:
5599:   692:     def _load_versions(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
5600:   693:         """Charge les versions des outils"""
5601:   694:         versions_file = self.project_root / "config" / "versions.json"
5602:   695:         if versions_file.exists():
5603:   696:             with open(versions_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
5604:   697:                 return json.load(f)
5605:   698:         return {}
5606:   699:
5607:   700:     async def register_agent(self, agent_name: str, agent_instance):
5608:   701:         """Enregistre un agent"""
5609:   702:         self.agents[agent_name] = agent_instance
5610:   703:         self.agent_status[agent_name] = {
5611:   704:             "registered": datetime.now().isoformat(),
5612:   705:             "status": "idle",
5613:   706:             "tasks_completed": 0,
5614:   707:             "last_active": None
5615:   708:         }
5616:   709:
5617:   710:         self.logger.info(f"Agent enregistr√©: {agent_name}")
5618:   711:
5619:   712:         # Initialiser l'agent
5620:   713:         try:
5621:   714:             await agent_instance.initialize()
5622:   715:             self.agent_status[agent_name]["status"] = "ready"
5623:   716:             self.logger.info(f"Agent {agent_name} initialis√© avec succ√®s")
5624:   717:         except Exception as e:
5625:   718:             self.agent_status[agent_name]["status"] = "error"
5626:   719:             self.logger.error(f"Erreur lors de l'initialisation de {agent_name}: {e}")
5627:   720:
5628:   721:     async def get_all_agents_info(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
5629:   722:         """Retourne les informations de tous les agents"""
5630:   723:         agents_info = {}
5631:   724:         for agent_name, agent_instance in self.agents.items():
5632:   725:             try:
5633:   726:                 agents_info[agent_name] = agent_instance.get_agent_info()
5634:   727:                 agents_info[agent_name]["status"] = self.agent_status[agent_name]["status"]
5635:   728:             except Exception as e:
5636:   729:                 self.logger.error(f"Erreur lors de la r√©cup√©ration des infos de {agent_name}: {e}")
5637:   730:
5638:   731:         return {
5639:   732:             "total_agents": len(self.agents),
5640:   733:             "agents": agents_info,
5641:   734:             "system_versions": self.versions,
5642:   735:             "timestamp": datetime.now().isoformat()
5643:   736:         }
5644:   737:
5645:   738:     async def run_task_pipeline(self, pipeline_config: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
5646:   739:         """Ex√©cute un pipeline de t√¢ches"""
5647:   740:         self.logger.info(f"D√©marrage du pipeline: {pipeline_config.get('name', 'unnamed')}")
5648:   741:
5649:   742:         results = {}
5650:   743:         tasks = pipeline_config.get("tasks", [])
5651:   744:
5652:   745:         for task in tasks:
5653:   746:             task_name = task.get("name", "unnamed_task")
5654:   747:             agent_name = task.get("agent")
5655:   748:
5656:   749:             if agent_name not in self.agents:
5657:   750:                 self.logger.error(f"Agent {agent_name} non trouv√© pour la t√¢che {task_name}")
5658:   751:                 continue
5659:   752:
5660:   753:             self.logger.info(f"Ex√©cution de la t√¢che {task_name} avec l'agent {agent_name}")
5661:   754:
5662:   755:             try:
5663:   756:                 # Mettre √† jour le statut de l'agent
5664:   757:                 self.agent_status[agent_name]["status"] = "busy"
5665:   758:                 self.agent_status[agent_name]["last_active"] = datetime.now().isoformat()
5666:   759:
5667:   760:                 # Ex√©cuter la t√¢che
5668:   761:                 result = await self.agents[agent_name].execute(
5669:   762:                     task=task,
5670:   763:                     context={
5671:   764:                         "pipeline": pipeline_config,
5672:   765:                         "previous_results": results,
5673:   766:                         "versions": self.versions
5674:   767:                     }
5675:   768:                 )
5676:   769:
5677:   770:                 # Enregistrer le r√©sultat
5678:   771:                 results[task_name] = result
5679:   772:                 self.agent_status[agent_name]["tasks_completed"] += 1
5680:   773:                 self.agent_status[agent_name]["status"] = "ready"
5681:   774:
5682:   775:                 self.logger.info(f"T√¢che {task_name} termin√©e avec succ√®s")
5683:   776:
5684:   777:             except asyncio.TimeoutError:
5685:   778:                 self.logger.error(f"Timeout sur la t√¢che {task_name}")
5686:   779:                 self.agent_status[agent_name]["status"] = "timeout"
5687:   780:                 results[task_name] = {"status": "timeout", "error": "Task timeout"}
5688:   781:
5689:   782:             except Exception as e:
5690:   783:                 self.logger.error(f"Erreur lors de l'ex√©cution de {task_name}: {e}")
5691:   784:                 self.agent_status[agent_name]["status"] = "error"
5692:   785:                 results[task_name] = {"status": "error", "error": str(e)}
5693:   786:
5694:   787:         # Sauvegarder les r√©sultats
5695:   788:         await self._save_pipeline_results(pipeline_config, results)
5696:   789:
5697:   790:         return {
5698:   791:             "pipeline": pipeline_config.get("name"),
5699:   792:             "results": results,
5700:   793:             "summary": self._generate_summary(results),
5701:   794:             "agents_status": self.agent_status,
5702:   795:             "timestamp": datetime.now().isoformat()
5703:   796:         }
5704:   797:
5705:   798:     async def _save_pipeline_results(self, pipeline_config: Dict[str, Any], results: Dict[str, Any]):
5706:   799:         """Sauvegarde les r√©sultats du pipeline"""
5707:   800:         try:
5708:   801:             results_dir = self.project_root / "results" / "pipelines"
5709:   802:             results_dir.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
5710:   803:
5711:   804:             timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S")
5712:   805:             pipeline_name = pipeline_config.get("name", "unnamed").replace(" ", "_").lower()
5713:   806:
5714:   807:             result_file = results_dir / f"{pipeline_name}_{timestamp}.json"
5715:   808:
5716:   809:             full_results = {
5717:   810:                 "pipeline": pipeline_config,
5718:   811:                 "results": results,
5719:   812:                 "agents_info": await self.get_all_agents_info(),
5720:   813:                 "system_versions": self.versions,
5721:   814:                 "metadata": {
5722:   815:                     "execution_time": datetime.now().isoformat(),
5723:   816:                     "total_tasks": len(pipeline_config.get("tasks", [])),
5724:   817:                     "successful_tasks": sum(1 for r in results.values() if r.get("status") == "success")
5725:   818:                 }
5726:   819:             }
5727:   820:
5728:   821:             with open(result_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
5729:   822:                 json.dump(full_results, f, indent=2, default=str)
5730:   823:
5731:   824:             self.logger.info(f"R√©sultats sauvegard√©s dans {result_file}")
5732:   825:
5733:   826:         except Exception as e:
5734:   827:             self.logger.error(f"Erreur lors de la sauvegarde des r√©sultats: {e}")
5735:   828:
5736:   829:     def _generate_summary(self, results: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
5737:   830:         """G√©n√®re un r√©sum√© des r√©sultats"""
5738:   831:         total = len(results)
5739:   832:         successful = sum(1 for r in results.values() if r.get("status") in ["success", "completed"])
5740:   833:         failed = total - successful
5741:   834:
5742:   835:         return {
5743:   836:             "total_tasks": total,
5744:   837:             "successful_tasks": successful,
5745:   838:             "failed_tasks": failed,
5746:   839:             "success_rate": (successful / total * 100) if total > 0 else 0
5747:   840:         }
5748:   841:
5749:   842:     async def health_check_all(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
5750:   843:         """V√©rifie la sant√© de tous les agents"""
5751:   844:         health_results = {}
5752:   845:
5753:   846:         for agent_name, agent_instance in self.agents.items():
5754:   847:             try:
5755:   848:                 health = await agent_instance.health_check()
5756:   849:                 health_results[agent_name] = health
5757:   850:                 self.agent_status[agent_name]["last_health_check"] = datetime.now().isoformat()
5758:   851:             except Exception as e:
5759:   852:                 health_results[agent_name] = {
5760:   853:                     "status": "unhealthy",
5761:   854:                     "error": str(e)
5762:   855:                 }
5763:   856:                 self.agent_status[agent_name]["status"] = "error"
5764:   857:
5765:   858:         return {
5766:   859:             "timestamp": datetime.now().isoformat(),
5767:   860:             "total_agents": len(self.agents),
5768:   861:             "healthy_agents": sum(1 for h in health_results.values() if h.get("status") == "healthy"),
5769:   862:             "agents": health_results
5770:   863:         }
5771:   864: '@
5772:   865:
5773:   866: $orchestratorCode | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\agents\orchestrator\orchestrator.py" -Force -Encoding UTF8

5826:   919:
5827:   920: # 7. Cr√©er le script de test des agents
5828:   921: Write-Host "`n7. CREATION DU SCRIPT DE TEST..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
5829:   922: $testScript = @'
5830:   923: # test_all_agents.py
5831:   924: import asyncio
5832:   925: import sys
5833:   926: from pathlib import Path
5834:   927:
5835:   928: # Ajouter le dossier agents au path
5836:   929: agents_dir = Path(__file__).parent / "agents"
5837:   930: sys.path.insert(0, str(agents_dir))
5838:   931:
5839:   932: from orchestrator.orchestrator import Orchestrator
5840:   933: from shared.base_agent import BaseAgent
5841:   934:
5842:   935: class MockAgent(BaseAgent):
5843:   936:     """Agent mock pour les tests"""
5844:   937:
5845:   938:     def __init__(self, agent_id, name):
5846:   939:         self.agent_id = agent_id
5847:   940:         self.name = name
5848:   941:         self.config = {"agent_id": agent_id, "name": name}
5849:   942:         self.logger = None
5850:   943:         self.memory = {}
5851:   944:         self.context = {}
5852:   945:
5853:   946:     async def initialize(self):
5854:   947:         return True
5855:   948:
5856:   949:     async def execute(self, task, context):
5857:   950:         return {
5858:   951:             "status": "success",
5859:   952:             "agent": self.agent_id,
5860:   953:             "task": task.get("name"),
5861:   954:             "result": f"Mock result from {self.name}",
5862:   955:             "timestamp": asyncio.get_event_loop().time()
5863:   956:         }
5864:   957:
5865:   958:     def get_agent_info(self):
5866:   959:         return {
5867:   960:             "agent_id": self.agent_id,
5868:   961:             "name": self.name,
5869:   962:             "version": "1.0.0",
5870:   963:             "config": self.config
5871:   964:         }
5872:   965:
5873:   966:     async def health_check(self):
5874:   967:         return {
5875:   968:             "status": "healthy",
5876:   969:             "agent_id": self.agent_id,
5877:   970:             "timestamp": asyncio.get_event_loop().time()
5878:   971:         }
5879:   972:
5880:   973: async def test_all_agents():
5881:   974:     """Teste tous les agents"""

6222:   167:
6223:   168: $agentCode = @'
6224:   169: # agents/smart_contract/agent.py
6225:   170: import json
6226:   171: from typing import Dict, Any
6227:   172:
6228:   173: class SmartContractAgent:
6229:   174:     """Basic Smart Contract Agent"""
6230:   175:
6231:   176:     def __init__(self):
6232:   177:         self.name = "Smart Contract Agent"
6233:   178:         self.version = "1.0.0"
6234:   179:
6235:   180:     def generate_contract(self, requirements: Dict[str, Any]) -> str:
6236:   181:         """Generate a smart contract based on requirements"""
6237:   182:         contract_name = requirements.get("name", "MyContract")
6238:   183:
6239:   184:         template = f'''// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT
6240:   185: pragma solidity ^0.8.19;
6241:   186:
6242:   187: contract {contract_name} {{
6243:   188:     address public owner;
6244:   189:     string public name;
6245:   190:     string public symbol;
6246:   191:
6247:   192:     constructor(string memory _name, string memory _symbol) {{
6248:   193:         owner = msg.sender;
6249:   194:         name = _name;
6250:   195:         symbol = _symbol;
6251:   196:     }}
6252:   197:
6253:   198:     modifier onlyOwner() {{
6254:   199:         require(msg.sender == owner, "Not owner");
6255:   200:         _;
6256:   201:     }}
6257:   202:
6258:   203:     function transferOwnership(address newOwner) public onlyOwner {{
6259:   204:         require(newOwner != address(0), "Invalid address");
6260:   205:         owner = newOwner;
6261:   206:     }}
6262:   207:
6263:   208:     function getContractInfo() public view returns (string memory, string memory, address) {{
6264:   209:         return (name, symbol, owner);
6265:   210:     }}
6266:   211: }}
6267:   212: '''
6268:   213:
6269:   214:         return template
6270:   215:
6271:   216:     def get_agent_info(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
6272:   217:         """Get agent information"""
6273:   218:         return {
6274:   219:             "name": self.name,
6275:   220:             "version": self.version,
6276:   221:             "capabilities": ["contract_generation", "basic_validation"]
6277:   222:         }
6278:   223: '@
6279:   224:
6280:   225: New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path "agents\smart_contract" -Force | Out-Null
6281:   226: $agentCode | Out-File -FilePath "agents\smart_contract\agent.py" -Force -Encoding UTF8
6282:   227: Write-Host "V Basic agent created" -ForegroundColor Green
6283:   228:
6284:   229: # 8. Create test script
6285:   230: Write-Host "`n8. CREATING TEST SCRIPT..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
6286:   231:
6287:   232: $testScript = @'
6288:   233: # test_basic.py
6289:   234: import sys
6290:   235: import os
6291:   236:
6292:   237: # Add agents directory to path
6293:   238: sys.path.append(os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), "agents"))
6294:   239:
6295:   240: def test_smart_contract_agent():
6296:   241:     """Test the basic smart contract agent"""
6297:   242:     print("ü§ñ Testing Smart Contract Agent")
6298:   243:     print("=" * 40)
6299:   244:
6300:   245:     try:
6301:   246:         from smart_contract.agent import SmartContractAgent
6302:   247:
6303:   248:         # Create agent
6304:   249:         agent = SmartContractAgent()
6305:   250:         print(f"Agent: {agent.name} v{agent.version}")
6306:   251:
6307:   252:         # Test contract generation
6308:   253:         requirements = {
6309:   254:             "name": "MyToken",
6310:   255:             "symbol": "MTK"
6311:   256:         }
6312:   257:
6313:   258:         contract = agent.generate_contract(requirements)
6314:   259:
6315:   260:         print("‚úÖ Contract generated successfully")
6316:   261:         print(f"üìÑ Contract length: {len(contract)} characters")
6317:   262:
6318:   263:         # Show agent info
6319:   264:         info = agent.get_agent_info()
6320:   265:         print(f"üîß Capabilities: {', '.join(info['capabilities'])}")
6321:   266:
6322:   267:         return True
6323:   268:
6324:   269:     except Exception as e:
6325:   270:         print(f"‚ùå Error: {e}")
6326:   271:         import traceback
6327:   272:         traceback.print_exc()
6328:   273:         return False
6329:   274:
6330:   275: if __name__ == "__main__":
6331:   276:     success = test_smart_contract_agent()
6332:   277:     print("=" * 40)
6333:   278:     if success:
6334:   279:         print("üéâ All tests passed!")
6335:   280:     else:
6336:   281:         print("üí• Some tests failed")
6337:   282:     sys.exit(0 if success else 1)
6338:   283: '@
6339:   284:
6340:   285: $testScript | Out-File -FilePath "test_basic.py" -Force -Encoding UTF8
6341:   286: Write-Host "V Test script created" -ForegroundColor Green
6342:   287:
6343:   288: # 9. Create main.py
6344:   289: Write-Host "`n9. CREATING MAIN APPLICATION..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
6345:   290:
6346:   291: $mainApp = @'
6347:   292: # main.py
6348:   293: import asyncio
6349:   294: import sys
6350:   295: import os
6351:   296: from typing import Dict, Any
6352:   297:
6353:   298: class Pipeline:
6354:   299:     """Main pipeline orchestrator"""
6355:   300:
6356:   301:     def __init__(self):
6357:   302:         self.agents = {}
6358:   303:
6359:   304:     async def initialize(self):
6360:   305:         """Initialize the pipeline"""
6361:   306:         print("üöÄ Initializing Smart Contract Pipeline...")
6362:   307:
6363:   308:         # Load agents
6364:   309:         await self._load_agents()
6365:   310:
6366:   311:         print(f"‚úÖ Pipeline initialized with {len(self.agents)} agents")
6367:   312:         return True
6368:   313:
6369:   314:     async def _load_agents(self):
6370:   315:         """Load all available agents"""
6371:   316:         agents_dir = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), "agents")
6372:   317:
6373:   318:         # Load Smart Contract Agent
6374:   319:         try:
6375:   320:             from agents.smart_contract.agent import SmartContractAgent
6376:   321:             self.agents["smart_contract"] = SmartContractAgent()
6377:   322:             print("‚úÖ Smart Contract Agent loaded")
6378:   323:         except ImportError as e:
6379:   324:             print(f"‚ùå Failed to load Smart Contract Agent: {e}")
6380:   325:
6381:   326:     async def run(self):
6382:   327:         """Run the main pipeline"""
6383:   328:         print("üéØ Smart Contract Pipeline Ready!")
6384:   329:         print("=" * 50)
6385:   330:
6386:   331:         while True:
6387:   332:             print("`nAvailable commands:")
6388:   333:             print("1. Generate Smart Contract")
6389:   334:             print("2. Test Agent")
6390:   335:             print("3. Exit")
6391:   336:
6392:   337:             choice = input("Select option (1-3): ").strip()
6393:   338:
6394:   339:             if choice == "1":
6395:   340:                 await self.generate_contract()
6396:   341:             elif choice == "2":
6397:   342:                 await self.test_agent()
6398:   343:             elif choice == "3":
6399:   344:                 print("üëã Goodbye!")
6400:   345:                 break
6401:   346:             else:
6402:   347:                 print("‚ùå Invalid choice")
6403:   348:
6404:   349:     async def generate_contract(self):
6405:   350:         """Generate a smart contract"""
6406:   351:         print("`nüìù Smart Contract Generator")
6407:   352:         print("-" * 30)
6408:   353:
6409:   354:         name = input("Contract name: ").strip() or "MyContract"
6410:   355:         symbol = input("Contract symbol: ").strip() or "MC"
6411:   356:
6412:   357:         if "smart_contract" in self.agents:
6413:   358:             agent = self.agents["smart_contract"]
6414:   359:
6415:   360:             requirements = {
6416:   361:                 "name": name,
6417:   362:                 "symbol": symbol
6418:   363:             }
6419:   364:
6420:   365:             contract = agent.generate_contract(requirements)
6421:   366:
6422:   367:             print("‚úÖ Contract generated!")
6423:   368:             print("-" * 30)
6424:   369:             print(contract[:500] + "..." if len(contract) > 500 else contract)
6425:   370:             print("-" * 30)
6426:   371:
6427:   372:             # Save to file
6428:   373:             filename = f"contracts/{name}.sol"
6429:   374:             os.makedirs("contracts", exist_ok=True)
6430:   375:             with open(filename, "w") as f:
6431:   376:                 f.write(contract)
6432:   377:
6433:   378:             print(f"üìÑ Contract saved to {filename}")
6434:   379:         else:
6435:   380:             print("‚ùå Smart Contract Agent not available")
6436:   381:
6437:   382:     async def test_agent(self):
6438:   383:         """Test the agent"""
6439:   384:         print("`nüß™ Testing Agent...")
6440:   385:
6441:   386:         if "smart_contract" in self.agents:
6442:   387:             agent = self.agents["smart_contract"]
6443:   388:             info = agent.get_agent_info()
6444:   389:
6445:   390:             print(f"Agent: {info['name']}")
6446:   391:             print(f"Version: {info['version']}")
6447:   392:             print(f"Capabilities: {', '.join(info['capabilities'])}")
6448:   393:             print("‚úÖ Agent is working correctly")
6449:   394:         else:
6450:   395:             print("‚ùå No agents available")
6451:   396:
6452:   397: async def main():
6453:   398:     """Main entry point"""
6454:   399:     pipeline = Pipeline()
6455:   400:
6456:   401:     if await pipeline.initialize():
6457:   402:         await pipeline.run()
6458:   403:     else:
6459:   404:         print("‚ùå Failed to initialize pipeline")
6460:   405:
6461:   406: if __name__ == "__main__":
6462:   407:     asyncio.run(main())
6463:   408: '@
