8911:    70:
8912:    71: # Code du sous-agent Solidity
8913:    72: $solidityAgentCode = @'
8914:    73: # agents/smart_contract/sous_agents/solidity_expert.py
8915:    74: import asyncio
8916:    75: from typing import Dict, Any, List
8917:    76: from pathlib import Path
8918:    77: import json
8919:    78: from ...shared.base_agent import BaseAgent
8920:    79:
8921:    80: class SolidityExpertSubAgent(BaseAgent):
8922:    81:     """Sous-agent sp√©cialis√© en d√©veloppement Solidity"""
8923:    82:
8924:    83:     def __init__(self, config_path: str):
8925:    84:         super().__init__(config_path)
8926:    85:         self.solidity_versions = self.config.get("capabilities", {}).get("solidity_versions", [])
8927:    86:         self.patterns = self.config.get("capabilities", {}).get("patterns", [])
8928:    87:         self.recommended_version = "0.8.19"
8929:    88:
8930:    89:     async def initialize(self) -> bool:
8931:    90:         """Initialise le sous-agent"""
8932:    91:         self.logger.info(f"Initialisation du Solidity Expert")
8933:    92:         self.logger.info(f"Version recommand√©e: {self.recommended_version}")
8934:    93:         return True
8935:    94:
8936:    95:     async def develop_smart_contract(self, requirements: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
8937:    96:         """D√©veloppe un smart contract Solidity"""
8938:    97:         self.logger.info(f"D√©veloppement du contrat: {requirements.get('name', 'Unnamed Contract')}")
8939:    98:
8940:    99:         # Analyse des besoins
8941:   100:         contract_analysis = await self._analyze_requirements(requirements)
8942:   101:
8943:   102:         # S√©lection du pattern
8944:   103:         pattern = await self._select_pattern(requirements)
8945:   104:
8946:   105:         # G√©n√©ration du contrat
8947:   106:         contract_code = await self._generate_contract_code(requirements, pattern)
8948:   107:
8949:   108:         # Optimisation du gas
8950:   109:         optimized_code = await self._optimize_gas(contract_code)
8951:   110:
8952:   111:         # G√©n√©ration des tests
8953:   112:         tests = await self._generate_tests(optimized_code, requirements)
8954:   113:
8955:   114:         # Documentation
8956:   115:         documentation = await self._generate_documentation(optimized_code, requirements)
8957:   116:
8958:   117:         return {
8959:   118:             "contract_analysis": contract_analysis,
8960:   119:             "selected_pattern": pattern,
8961:   120:             "contract_code": optimized_code,
8962:   121:             "tests": tests,
8963:   122:             "documentation": documentation,
8964:   123:             "gas_estimation": await self._estimate_gas_costs(optimized_code)
8965:   124:         }
8966:   125:
8967:   126:     async def _analyze_requirements(self, requirements: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
8968:   127:         """Analyse les besoins du contrat"""
8969:   128:         analysis = {
8970:   129:             "contract_type": requirements.get("type", "custom"),
8971:   130:             "security_requirements": requirements.get("security", {}),
8972:   131:             "upgradeability_needed": requirements.get("upgradeable", False),
8973:   132:             "access_control_needed": requirements.get("access_control", False),
8974:   133:             "composability_needed": requirements.get("composable", False),
8975:   134:             "token_standard": requirements.get("token_standard")
8976:   135:         }
8977:   136:         return analysis
8978:   137:
8979:   138:     async def _select_pattern(self, requirements: Dict[str, Any]) -> str:
8980:   139:         """S√©lectionne le pattern de contrat appropri√©"""
8981:   140:         if requirements.get("upgradeable"):
8982:   141:             if "proxy" in requirements.get("upgrade_type", "").lower():
8983:   142:                 return "Proxy Pattern (Transparent)"
8984:   143:             else:
8985:   144:                 return "Proxy Pattern (UUPS)"
8986:   145:
8987:   146:         if requirements.get("factory_deployment"):
8988:   147:             return "Factory Pattern"
8989:   148:
8990:   149:         if requirements.get("modular"):
8991:   150:             return "Diamond Pattern (EIP-2535)"
8992:   151:
8993:   152:         return "Standard Contract"
8994:   153:
8995:   154:     async def _generate_contract_code(self, requirements: Dict[str, Any], pattern: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
8996:   155:         """G√©n√®re le code du contrat"""
8997:   156:         # Version Solidity
8998:   157:         version = self.recommended_version
8999:   158:
9000:   159:         # Imports
9001:   160:         imports = await self._generate_imports(requirements)
9002:   161:
9003:   162:         # Contrat principal
9004:   163:         contract_body = await self._generate_contract_body(requirements, pattern)
9005:   164:
9006:   165:         # Interfaces
9007:   166:         interfaces = await self._generate_interfaces(requirements)
9008:   167:
9009:   168:         # Libraries
9010:   169:         libraries = await self._generate_libraries(requirements)
9011:   170:
9012:   171:         return {
9013:   172:             "version": version,
9014:   173:             "imports": imports,
9015:   174:             "contract": contract_body,
9016:   175:             "interfaces": interfaces,
9017:   176:             "libraries": libraries
9018:   177:         }
9019:   178:
9020:   179:     async def _optimize_gas(self, contract_code: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
9021:   180:         """Optimise le contrat pour r√©duire le gas"""
9022:   181:         optimizations = []
9023:   182:
9024:   183:         # Optimisation des variables de storage
9025:   184:         if "storage_variables" in contract_code:
9026:   185:             optimized_storage = await self._optimize_storage_layout(contract_code["storage_variables"])
9027:   186:             optimizations.append({
9028:   187:                 "type": "storage_optimization",
9029:   188:                 "description": "R√©organisation des variables de storage",
9030:   189:                 "gas_saving": "~5000 gas"
9031:   190:             })
9032:   191:             contract_code["storage_variables"] = optimized_storage
9033:   192:
9034:   193:         # Optimisation des fonctions
9035:   194:         if "functions" in contract_code:
9036:   195:             optimized_functions = await self._optimize_functions(contract_code["functions"])
9037:   196:             optimizations.append({
9038:   197:                 "type": "function_optimization",
9039:   198:                 "description": "Optimisation des fonctions pour r√©duire le gas",
9040:   199:                 "gas_saving": "~200-1000 gas par appel"
9041:   200:             })
9042:   201:             contract_code["functions"] = optimized_functions
9043:   202:
9044:   203:         # Utilisation de assembly pour les op√©rations critiques
9045:   204:         if contract_code.get("needs_assembly_optimization", False):
9046:   205:             contract_code = await self._apply_assembly_optimizations(contract_code)
9047:   206:             optimizations.append({
9048:   207:                 "type": "assembly_optimization",
9049:   208:                 "description": "Utilisation d'assembly pour les op√©rations critiques",
9050:   209:                 "gas_saving": "~30-50% sur les op√©rations math√©matiques"
9051:   210:             })
9052:   211:
9053:   212:         contract_code["optimizations_applied"] = optimizations
9054:   213:         return contract_code
9055:   214:
9056:   215:     async def execute(self, task: Dict[str, Any], context: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
9057:   216:         """Ex√©cute une t√¢che de d√©veloppement Solidity"""
9058:   217:         task_type = task.get("type", "develop_contract")
9059:   218:
9060:   219:         if task_type == "develop_contract":
9061:   220:             return await self.develop_smart_contract(task.get("requirements", {}))
9062:   221:         elif task_type == "optimize_gas":
9063:   222:             return await self.optimize_existing_contract(task.get("contract_code", {}))
9064:   223:         elif task_type == "add_feature":
9065:   224:             return await self.add_feature_to_contract(task.get("feature", {}), task.get("contract_code", {}))
9066:   225:         elif task_type == "audit_contract":
9067:   226:             return await self.audit_contract(task.get("contract_code", {}))
9068:   227:         else:
9069:   228:             return {"error": f"Type de t√¢che non support√©: {task_type}"}
9070:   229:
9071:   230:     async def optimize_existing_contract(self, contract_code: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
9072:   231:         """Optimise un contrat existant"""
9073:   232:         # Analyse du contrat
9074:   233:         analysis = await self._analyze_contract_code(contract_code)
9075:   234:
9076:   235:         # Identification des optimisations possibles
9077:   236:         optimizations = await self._identify_optimizations(analysis)
9078:   237:
9079:   238:         # Application des optimisations
9080:   239:         optimized_code = await self._apply_optimizations(contract_code, optimizations)
9081:   240:
9082:   241:         # Calcul des √©conomies estim√©es
9083:   242:         gas_savings = await self._calculate_gas_savings(contract_code, optimized_code)
9084:   243:
9085:   244:         return {
9086:   245:             "original_analysis": analysis,
9087:   246:             "optimizations_applied": optimizations,
9088:   247:             "optimized_code": optimized_code,
9089:   248:             "gas_savings_estimate": gas_savings,
9090:   249:             "recommendations": await self._generate_recommendations(analysis)
9091:   250:         }
9092:   251:
9093:   252:     async def audit_contract(self, contract_code: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
9094:   253:         """Audite un contrat pour trouver des vuln√©rabilit√©s"""
9095:   254:         vulnerabilities = []
9096:   255:
9097:   256:         # V√©rification des vuln√©rabilit√©s courantes
9098:   257:         common_checks = [
9099:   258:             self._check_reentrancy,
9100:   259:             self._check_overflow_underflow,
9101:   260:             self._check_access_control,
9102:   261:             self._check_gas_limits,
9103:   262:             self._check_timestamp_dependency,
9104:   263:             self._check_randomness,
9105:   264:             self._check_front_running
9106:   265:         ]
9107:   266:
9108:   267:         for check in common_checks:
9109:   268:             try:
9110:   269:                 result = await check(contract_code)
9111:   270:                 if result["found"]:
9112:   271:                     vulnerabilities.append(result)
9113:   272:             except Exception as e:
9114:   273:                 self.logger.error(f"Erreur lors de la v√©rification: {e}")
9115:   274:
9116:   275:         # G√©n√©ration du rapport
9117:   276:         severity_levels = {
9118:   277:             "critical": sum(1 for v in vulnerabilities if v["severity"] == "critical"),
9119:   278:             "high": sum(1 for v in vulnerabilities if v["severity"] == "high"),
9120:   279:             "medium": sum(1 for v in vulnerabilities if v["severity"] == "medium"),
9121:   280:             "low": sum(1 for v in vulnerabilities if v["severity"] == "low")
9122:   281:         }
9123:   282:
9124:   283:         return {
9125:   284:             "vulnerabilities_found": vulnerabilities,
9126:   285:             "severity_summary": severity_levels,
9127:   286:             "total_vulnerabilities": len(vulnerabilities),
9128:   287:             "recommended_fixes": await self._generate_fixes(vulnerabilities),
9129:   288:             "security_score": await self._calculate_security_score(severity_levels)
9130:   289:         }
9131:   290: '@
9132:   291:
9133:   292: $solidityAgentCode | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\agents\smart_contract\sous_agents\solidity_expert.py" -Force -Encoding UTF8
9134: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

9209: SCRIPT 28 | learning\collective_learning.py
9210: Size: 4545 bytes | Type: .py | Modified: 2026-01-15 15:23:21.322240
9211: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9212:     1: # learning/collective_learning.py
9213:     2: import hashlib
9214:     3: from typing import Dict, List
9215:     4: from pathlib import Path
9216:     5:
9217:     6: class CollectiveLearningSystem:
9218:     7:     """Syst√®me d'apprentissage partag√© bas√© sur fichiers"""
9219:     8:
9220:     9:     def __init__(self, knowledge_base_path: Path):
9221:    10:         self.knowledge_base = knowledge_base_path
9222:    11:         self.knowledge_base.mkdir(exist_ok=True)
9223:    12:
9224:    13:         # Sous-r√©pertoires
9225:    14:         self.patterns_dir = self.knowledge_base / "patterns"
9226:    15:         self.solutions_dir = self.knowledge_base / "solutions"
9227:    16:         self.mistakes_dir = self.knowledge_base / "mistakes"
9228:    17:         self.best_practices_dir = self.knowledge_base / "best_practices"
9229:    18:
9230:    19:         for dir in [self.patterns_dir, self.solutions_dir,
9231:    20:                    self.mistakes_dir, self.best_practices_dir]:
9232:    21:             dir.mkdir(exist_ok=True)
9233:    22:
9234:    23:     def store_solution(self, problem_hash: str, solution: Dict, agent_id: str):
9235:    24:         """Stocke une solution √† un probl√®me"""
9236:    25:         solution_file = self.solutions_dir / f"{problem_hash}.json"
9237:    26:
9238:    27:         data = {
9239:    28:             "problem_hash": problem_hash,
9240:    29:             "solution": solution,
9241:    30:             "agent": agent_id,
9242:    31:             "timestamp": datetime.now().isoformat(),
9243:    32:             "effectiveness": 1.0,  # Sera mis √† jour avec le feedback
9244:    33:             "usage_count": 1
9245:    34:         }
9246:    35:
9247:    36:         if solution_file.exists():
9248:    37:             # Mise √† jour du compteur d'utilisation
9249:    38:             with open(solution_file, "r") as f:
9250:    39:                 existing = json.load(f)
9251:    40:                 existing["usage_count"] += 1
9252:    41:
9253:    42:             data = existing
9254:    43:
9255:    44:         with open(solution_file, "w") as f:
9256:    45:             json.dump(data, f, indent=2)
9257:    46:
9258:    47:     def find_similar_solutions(self, problem_description: str,
9259:    48:                               threshold: float = 0.8) -> List[Dict]:
9260:    49:         """Trouve des solutions similaires"""
9261:    50:         problem_hash = self._hash_description(problem_description)
9262:    51:
9263:    52:         solutions = []
9264:    53:         for solution_file in self.solutions_dir.glob("*.json"):
9265:    54:             with open(solution_file, "r") as f:
9266:    55:                 solution_data = json.load(f)
9267:    56:
9268:    57:                 # Calcul de similarit√© basique
9269:    58:                 similarity = self._calculate_similarity(
9270:    59:                     problem_hash,
9271:    60:                     solution_data["problem_hash"]
9272:    61:                 )
9273:    62:
9274:    63:                 if similarity >= threshold:
9275:    64:                     solutions.append(solution_data)
9276:    65:
9277:    66:         return sorted(solutions, key=lambda x: x["effectiveness"], reverse=True)
9278:    67:
9279:    68:     def learn_from_mistake(self, agent_id: str, task: Dict,
9280:    69:                           error: str, correction: Dict):
9281:    70:         """Apprend d'une erreur et la partage"""
9282:    71:         mistake_id = f"{agent_id}_{datetime.now().timestamp()}"
9283:    72:         mistake_file = self.mistakes_dir / f"{mistake_id}.json"
9284:    73:
9285:    74:         with open(mistake_file, "w") as f:
9286:    75:             json.dump({
9287:    76:                 "agent": agent_id,
9288:    77:                 "task": task,
9289:    78:                 "error": error,
9290:    79:                 "correction": correction,
9291:    80:                 "timestamp": datetime.now().isoformat(),
9292:    81:                 "learned_by": [agent_id]  # Liste des agents ayant appris
9293:    82:             }, f, indent=2)
9294:    83:
9295:    84:         # Notifie les autres agents
9296:    85:         self._broadcast_learning(agent_id, "mistake_learned", mistake_id)
9297:    86:
9298:    87:     def _broadcast_learning(self, from_agent: str, learning_type: str,
9299:    88:                           content_id: str):
9300:    89:         """Diffuse un apprentissage √† tous les agents"""
9301:    90:         learning_event = {
9302:    91:             "type": learning_type,
9303:    92:             "from": from_agent,
9304:    93:             "content_id": content_id,
9305:    94:             "timestamp": datetime.now().isoformat()
9306:    95:         }
9307:    96:
9308:    97:         # √âcrit dans un fichier partag√© que tous les agents lisent
9309:    98:         event_file = self.knowledge_base / "learning_events.jsonl"
9310:    99:
9311:   100:         with open(event_file, "a") as f:
9312:   101:             f.write(json.dumps(learning_event) + "\n")
9313:   102:
9314:   103:     @staticmethod
9315:   104:     def _hash_description(description: str) -> str:
9316:   105:         """Hash une description pour comparaison"""
9317:   106:         return hashlib.md5(description.encode()).hexdigest()[:10]
9318:   107:
9319:   108:     @staticmethod
9320:   109:     def _calculate_similarity(hash1: str, hash2: str) -> float:
9321:   110:         """Calcule la similarit√© entre deux hashes"""
9322:   111:         # Simple similarit√© de Levenshtein normalis√©e
9323:   112:         from Levenshtein import distance
9324:   113:         max_len = max(len(hash1), len(hash2))
9325:   114:         if max_len == 0:
9326:   115:             return 1.0
9327:   116:         return 1 - distance(hash1, hash2) / max_len
9328: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

9480:    60:         $this.VenvPath = Join-Path $projectRoot "venv"

9495:    75:
9496:    76: function Initialize-Configuration {
9497:    77:     [OutputType([InstallationConfig])]
9498:    78:     param()
9499:    79:
9500:    80:     try {
9501:    81:         $projectRoot = $PSScriptRoot
9502:    82:

9504:    84:         if (-not (Test-Path (Join-Path $projectRoot "agents"))) {
9505:    85:             throw "Dossier 'agents' introuvable. Mauvais r√©pertoire ?"
9506:    86:         }
9507:    87:

9509:    89:         $config = [InstallationConfig]::new($projectRoot)
9510:    90:         $global:ScriptConfig = $config
9511:    91:
9512:    92:         Write-Host "Configuration initialis√©e" -ForegroundColor Green
9513:    93:         return $config
9514:    94:
9515:    95:     } catch {
9516:    96:         Write-Host "ERREUR Initialisation: $_" -ForegroundColor Red
9517:    97:         throw
9518:    98:     }
9519:    99: }
9520:   100:
9521:   101: function Get-Config {
9522:   102:     [OutputType([InstallationConfig])]
9523:   103:     param()
9524:   104:
9525:   105:     if ($null -eq $global:ScriptConfig) {
9526:   106:         throw "Configuration non initialis√©e"
9527:   107:     }
9528:   108:     return $global:ScriptConfig
9529:   109: }
9530:   110:
9531:   111: # -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
9532:   112: # UTILITAIRES
9533:   113: # -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
9534:   114:
9535:   115: function Write-Log {
9536:   116:     param(
9537:   117:         [string]$Message,
9538:   118:         [string]$Level = 'Info',
9539:   119:         [switch]$NoNewLine
9540:   120:     )
9541:   121:
9542:   122:     $timestamp = Get-Date -Format "HH:mm:ss"
9543:   123:     $colors = @{Info='White'; Success='Green'; Warning='Yellow'; Error='Red'}
9544:   124:     $symbols = @{Info='¬ª'; Success='‚úì'; Warning='‚ö†'; Error='‚úó'}
9545:   125:
9546:   126:     $output = "[$timestamp] $($symbols[$Level]) $Message"
9547:   127:     Write-Host $output -ForegroundColor $colors[$Level] -NoNewLine:$NoNewLine
9548:   128:
9549:   129:     # Log fichier
9550:   130:     try {
9551:   131:         $config = Get-Config
9552:   132:         $logFile = Join-Path $config.LogDir "install-$(Get-Date -Format 'yyyyMMdd').log"
9553:   133:         "[$timestamp] [$Level] $Message" | Out-File $logFile -Append -Encoding UTF8
9554:   134:     } catch {}
9555:   135: }
9556:   136:
9557:   137: function Test-Admin {
9558:   138:     try {
9559:   139:         $identity = [Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity]::GetCurrent()
9560:   140:         $principal = New-Object Security.Principal.WindowsPrincipal($identity)
9561:   141:         return $principal.IsInRole([Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole]::Administrator)
9562:   142:     } catch {
9563:   143:         return $false
9564:   144:     }
9565:   145: }
9566:   146:
9567:   147: function Test-DriveSpace {
9568:   148:     try {
9569:   149:         $drive = Get-PSDrive -Name "D" -ErrorAction Stop
9570:   150:         $freeGB = [math]::Round($drive.Free / 1GB, 2)
9571:   151:         Write-Log "D: a $freeGB GB libre" -Level Info
9572:   152:         return ($freeGB -ge 20)
9573:   153:     } catch {
9574:   154:         Write-Log "Impossible de v√©rifier D:" -Level Error
9575:   155:         return $false
9576:   156:     }
9577:   157: }
9578:   158:
9579:   159: # -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
9580:   160: # FONCTIONS D'INSTALLATION
9581:   161: # -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
9582:   162:
9583:   163: function Install-Chocolatey {
9584:   164:     if (Get-Command choco -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) {
9585:   165:         Write-Log "Chocolatey d√©j√† install√©" -Level Success
9586:   166:         return $true
9587:   167:     }
9588:   168:
9589:   169:     Write-Log "Installation Chocolatey..." -Level Info
9590:   170:
9591:   171:     try {
9592:   172:         $originalPolicy = Get-ExecutionPolicy -Scope Process
9593:   173:         Set-ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Scope Process -Force
9594:   174:
9595:   175:         [System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol -bor 3072
9596:   176:         iex ((New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://community.chocolatey.org/install.ps1'))
9597:   177:
9598:   178:         Set-ExecutionPolicy $originalPolicy -Scope Process -Force
9599:   179:
9600:   180:         Start-Sleep -Seconds 3
9601:   181:         if (Get-Command choco -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) {
9602:   182:             Write-Log "Chocolatey install√©" -Level Success
9603:   183:             return $true
9604:   184:         }
9605:   185:         throw "Installation √©chou√©e"
9606:   186:     } catch {
9607:   187:         Write-Log "√âchec Chocolatey: $_" -Level Error
9608:   188:         return $false
9609:   189:     }
9610:   190: }
9611:   191:
9612:   192: function Install-BasePackages {
9613:   193:     $config = Get-Config
9614:   194:     Write-Log "Installation packages..." -Level Info
9615:   195:
9616:   196:     $success = 0
9617:   197:     foreach ($package in $config.ChocolateyPackages) {
9618:   198:         try {
9619:   199:             Write-Log "  $package..." -Level Info -NoNewLine
9620:   200:
9621:   201:             if (choco list --local-only $package --exact) {
9622:   202:                 Write-Log " (d√©j√† install√©)" -Level Success
9623:   203:                 $success++
9624:   204:                 continue
9625:   205:             }
9626:   206:
9627:   207:             choco install $package -y --no-progress
9628:   208:             if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
9629:   209:                 Write-Log " ‚úì" -Level Success
9630:   210:                 $success++
9631:   211:             } else {
9632:   212:                 Write-Log " (code $LASTEXITCODE)" -Level Warning
9633:   213:             }
9634:   214:         } catch {
9635:   215:             Write-Log " (erreur)" -Level Warning
9636:   216:         }
9637:   217:     }
9638:   218:
9639:   219:     refreshenv
9640:   220:     return $true
9641:   221: }
9642:   222:
9643:   223: function Install-Python {
9644:   224:     if (Get-Command python -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) {
9645:   225:         $version = python --version 2>&1
9646:   226:         Write-Log "Python: $version" -Level Success
9647:   227:         return $true
9648:   228:     }
9649:   229:
9650:   230:     Write-Log "Installation Python..." -Level Info
9651:   231:
9652:   232:     try {
9653:   233:         choco install python311 -y --no-progress
9654:   234:         refreshenv
9655:   235:         Start-Sleep -Seconds 3
9656:   236:
9657:   237:         if (Get-Command python -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) {
9658:   238:             Write-Log "Python install√©" -Level Success
9659:   239:             return $true
9660:   240:         }
9661:   241:         throw "Python non d√©tect√©"
9662:   242:     } catch {
9663:   243:         Write-Log "√âchec Python: $_" -Level Error
9664:   244:         return $false
9665:   245:     }
9666:   246: }
9667:   247:
9668:   248: function Setup-PythonEnvironment {
9669:   249:     $config = Get-Config
9670:   250:     Write-Log "Configuration environnement Python..." -Level Info
9671:   251:
9672:   252:     # Environnement virtuel
9673:   253:     if (-not (Test-Path $config.VenvPath)) {
9674:   254:         try {
9675:   255:             python -m venv $config.VenvPath
9676:   256:             Write-Log "Environnement cr√©√©" -Level Success
9677:   257:         } catch {
9678:   258:             Write-Log "√âchec cr√©ation environnement: $_" -Level Error
9679:   259:             return $false
9680:   260:         }
9681:   261:     }
9682:   262:
9683:   263:     # Activer
9684:   264:     try {
9685:   265:         $activate = Join-Path $config.VenvPath "Scripts\Activate.ps1"
9686:   266:         if (Test-Path $activate) {
9687:   267:             . $activate
9688:   268:         }
9689:   269:     } catch {}
9690:   270:
9691:   271:     # Mettre √† jour pip
9692:   272:     try {
9693:   273:         python -m pip install --upgrade pip --disable-pip-version-check
9694:   274:     } catch {}
9695:   275:
9696:   276:     return $true
9697:   277: }
9698:   278:
9699:   279: function Install-PythonDependencies {
9700:   280:     $config = Get-Config
9701:   281:
9702:   282:     # Cr√©er requirements.txt si absent
9703:   283:     if (-not (Test-Path $config.RequirementsFile)) {
9704:   284:         @"
9705:   285: fastapi>=0.104.0
9706:   286: uvicorn[standard]>=0.24.0
9707:   287: web3>=6.10.0
9708:   288: pydantic>=2.4.0
9709:   289: langchain>=0.1.0
9710:   290: ollama>=0.1.0
9711:   291: requests>=2.31.0
9712:   292: "@ | Out-File $config.RequirementsFile -Encoding UTF8
9713:   293:     }
9714:   294:
9715:   295:     Write-Log "Installation d√©pendances..." -Level Info
9716:   296:
9717:   297:     try {
9718:   298:         pip install -r $config.RequirementsFile --no-cache-dir
9719:   299:         Write-Log "D√©pendances install√©es" -Level Success
9720:   300:         return $true
9721:   301:     } catch {
9722:   302:         Write-Log "√âchec d√©pendances: $_" -Level Error
9723:   303:         return $false
9724:   304:     }
9725:   305: }
9726:   306:
9727:   307: function Install-Ollama {
9728:   308:     Write-Log "Installation d'Ollama..." -Level Info
9729:   309:
9730:   310:     # Chemin D: cible
9731:   311:     $ollamaPath = "D:\Ollama"
9732:   312:     $ollamaExe = Join-Path $ollamaPath "ollama.exe"
9733:   313:
9734:   314:     # V√©rifier si d√©j√† install√© sur D:
9735:   315:     if (Test-Path $ollamaExe) {
9736:   316:         $version = & $ollamaExe --version 2>&1
9737:   317:         Write-Log "[OK] Ollama d√©j√† install√© sur D:: $version" -Level Success
9738:   318:         return $true
9739:   319:     }
9740:   320:
9741:   321:     # T√©l√©charger
9742:   322:     Write-Log "T√©l√©chargement d'Ollama (1.2GB)..." -Level Info
9743:   323:
9744:   324:     try {
9745:   325:         $installerPath = Join-Path $Script:Config.TempDir "OllamaSetup.exe"
9746:   326:
9747:   327:         # Nettoyer l'ancien fichier
9748:   328:         if (Test-Path $installerPath) {
9749:   329:             Remove-Item -Path $installerPath -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
9750:   330:         }
9751:   331:
9752:   332:         # T√©l√©charger
9753:   333:         $progressPreference = 'SilentlyContinue'
9754:   334:         Invoke-WebRequest -Uri $Script:Config.Urls.Ollama -OutFile $installerPath -UseBasicParsing
9755:   335:
9756:   336:         $size = [math]::Round((Get-Item $installerPath).Length/1MB, 2)
9757:   337:         Write-Log "[OK] T√©l√©chargement r√©ussi ($size MB)" -Level Success
9758:   338:
9759:   339:         # === M√âTHODE D√âFINITIVE : Installation Interactive avec Contr√¥le ===
9760:   340:
9761:   341:         # 1. Pr√©parer D:\Ollama
9762:   342:         if (-not (Test-Path $ollamaPath)) {
9763:   343:             New-Item -Path $ollamaPath -ItemType Directory -Force | Out-Null
9764:   344:             Write-Log "Dossier pr√©par√©: $ollamaPath" -Level Info
9765:   345:         }
9766:   346:
9767:   347:         # 2. Instructions CLAIRES
9768:   348:         Write-Host "`n" -ForegroundColor Cyan
9769:   349:         Write-Host "‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê" -ForegroundColor Cyan
9770:   350:         Write-Host "‚îÇ                INSTALLATION OLLAMA - IMPORTANT             ‚îÇ" -ForegroundColor Red
9771:   351:         Write-Host "‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î§" -ForegroundColor Cyan
9772:   352:         Write-Host "‚îÇ L'installateur va s'ouvrir. SUIVEZ CES √âTAPES :           ‚îÇ" -ForegroundColor Yellow
9773:   353:         Write-Host "‚îÇ                                                            ‚îÇ" -ForegroundColor Yellow
9774:   354:         Write-Host "‚îÇ 1. Dans l'installateur, cliquez sur 'Browse...'           ‚îÇ" -ForegroundColor White
9775:   355:         Write-Host "‚îÇ 2. Naviguez vers : D:\                                    ‚îÇ" -ForegroundColor White
9776:   356:         Write-Host "‚îÇ 3. Cliquez sur 'Make New Folder'                          ‚îÇ" -ForegroundColor White
9777:   357:         Write-Host "‚îÇ 4. Nommez le dossier : Ollama                            ‚îÇ" -ForegroundColor White
9778:   358:         Write-Host "‚îÇ 5. S√©lectionnez D:\Ollama                                 ‚îÇ" -ForegroundColor Green
9779:   359:         WriteHost "‚îÇ 6. D√©cochez 'Create Desktop Shortcut' (optionnel)         ‚îÇ" -ForegroundColor White
9780:   360:         Write-Host "‚îÇ 7. Cliquez sur Install                                    ‚îÇ" -ForegroundColor White
9781:   361:         Write-Host "‚îÇ                                                            ‚îÇ" -ForegroundColor Yellow
9782:   362:         Write-Host "‚îÇ ‚ö†  NE LAISSEZ PAS l'installation par d√©faut sur C:\ !     ‚îÇ" -ForegroundColor Red
9783:   363:         Write-Host "‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò" -ForegroundColor Cyan
9784:   364:         Write-Host "`n"
9785:   365:
9786:   366:         # 3. Donner le temps de lire
9787:   367:         Write-Host "L'installateur s'ouvre dans 10 secondes..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
9788:   368:         for ($i = 10; $i -gt 0; $i--) {
9789:   369:             Write-Host "  $i..." -ForegroundColor Gray -NoNewline
9790:   370:             Start-Sleep -Seconds 1
9791:   371:         }
9792:   372:         Write-Host "`n"
9793:   373:
9794:   374:         # 4. Ouvrir l'installateur
9795:   375:         Write-Log "Ouverture de l'installateur Ollama..." -Level Info
9796:   376:         $process = Start-Process -FilePath $installerPath -Wait -PassThru
9797:   377:
9798:   378:         # 5. Attendre et v√©rifier
9799:   379:         Write-Log "Attente de l'installation..." -Level Info
9800:   380:         Start-Sleep -Seconds 20
9801:   381:
9802:   382:         # 6. V√©rifier l'installation sur D:
9803:   383:         if (Test-Path $ollamaExe) {
9804:   384:             Write-Log "[OK] Ollama install√© sur D:" -Level Success
9805:   385:
9806:   386:             # Configurer le PATH
9807:   387:             $env:Path += ";$ollamaPath"
9808:   388:             [Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable("Path", $env:Path, [EnvironmentVariableTarget]::Machine)
9809:   389:
9810:   390:             # Configurer les mod√®les sur D:
9811:   391:             $modelsPath = "D:\Ollama\Models"
9812:   392:             if (-not (Test-Path $modelsPath)) {
9813:   393:                 New-Item -Path $modelsPath -ItemType Directory -Force | Out-Null
9814:   394:             }
9815:   395:
9816:   396:             [Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable("OLLAMA_MODELS", $modelsPath, [EnvironmentVariableTarget]::User)
9817:   397:             [Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable("OLLAMA_MODELS", $modelsPath, [EnvironmentVariableTarget]::Machine)
9818:   398:             $env:OLLAMA_MODELS = $modelsPath
9819:   399:
9820:   400:             Write-Log "Dossier des mod√®les configur√©: $modelsPath" -Level Success
9821:   401:
9822:   402:             # D√©marrer le service
9823:   403:             Write-Log "D√©marrage du service Ollama..." -Level Info
9824:   404:             Start-Process $ollamaExe -ArgumentList "serve" -WindowStyle Hidden
9825:   405:             Start-Sleep -Seconds 10
9826:   406:
9827:   407:             # T√©l√©charger les mod√®les
9828:   408:             Write-Log "T√©l√©chargement des mod√®les IA..." -Level Info
9829:   409:
9830:   410:             foreach ($model in $Script:Config.OllamaModels) {
9831:   411:                 try {
9832:   412:                     Write-Log "  T√©l√©chargement de $model..." -Level Info -NoNewLine
9833:   413:                     & $ollamaExe pull $model 2>&1 | Out-Null
9834:   414:                     Write-Log " [OK]" -Level Success
9835:   415:                 } catch {
9836:   416:                     Write-Log " [ECHEC]" -Level Warning
9837:   417:                 }
9838:   418:             }
9839:   419:
9840:   420:             Write-Log "[OK] Ollama install√© et configur√© sur D:" -Level Success
9841:   421:             return $true
9842:   422:
9843:   423:         } else {
9844:   424:             # V√©rifier si install√© sur C: par erreur
9845:   425:             $ollamaC = Get-Command ollama -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
9846:   426:             if ($ollamaC) {
9847:   427:                 Write-Log "[ERREUR] Ollama install√© sur C: au lieu de D:" -Level Error
9848:   428:                 Write-Host "`n‚ö† PROBLEME DETECTE : Ollama est install√© sur C:\" -ForegroundColor Red
9849:   429:                 Write-Host "Pour corriger :" -ForegroundColor Yellow
9850:   430:                 Write-Host "1. D√©sinstallez Ollama depuis le Panneau de configuration" -ForegroundColor White
9851:   431:                 Write-Host "2. Relancez ce script" -ForegroundColor White
9852:   432:                 Write-Host "3. Cette fois, CHOISISSEZ D:\Ollama dans l'installateur" -ForegroundColor White
9853:   433:             } else {
9854:   434:                 Write-Log "[ERREUR] Ollama non install√©" -Level Error
9855:   435:             }
9856:   436:
9857:   437:             return $false
9858:   438:         }
9859:   439:
9860:   440:     } catch {
9861:   441:         Write-Log "√âchec de l'installation d'Ollama: $_" -Level Error
9862:   442:
9863:   443:         # Instructions de secours
9864:   444:         Write-Host "`n" + ("="*60) -ForegroundColor Yellow
9865:   445:         Write-Host "INSTRUCTIONS MANUELLES" -ForegroundColor Yellow
9866:   446:         Write-Host "="*60 -ForegroundColor Yellow
9867:   447:         Write-Host "1. Ouvrez : https://ollama.com/download/OllamaSetup.exe" -ForegroundColor White
9868:   448:         Write-Host "2. Enregistrez le fichier dans : D:\Temp\" -ForegroundColor White
9869:   449:         Write-Host "3. Ex√©cutez l'installateur" -ForegroundColor White
9870:   450:         Write-Host "4. IMPORTANT : Choisissez D:\Ollama comme chemin" -ForegroundColor Green
9871:   451:         Write-Host "5. Apr√®s installation, testez : ollama --version" -ForegroundColor White
9872:   452:         Write-Host "="*60 -ForegroundColor Yellow
9873:   453:
9874:   454:         return $false
9875:   455:     }
9876:   456: }

9882:   462:         return $true

9886:   466:
9887:   467:     try {
9888:   468:         choco install nodejs-lts -y --no-progress
9889:   469:         refreshenv
9890:   470:         Start-Sleep -Seconds 3
9891:   471:
9892:   472:         if (Get-Command node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) {
9893:   473:             Write-Log "Node.js install√©" -Level Success
9894:   474:             return $true
9895:   475:         }
9896:   476:         return $false
9897:   477:     } catch {
9898:   478:         Write-Log "√âchec Node.js: $_" -Level Warning
9899:   479:         return $false
9900:   480:     }
9901:   481: }

9903:   483: function Install-Git {

9907:   487:         return $true

9911:   491:

9913:   493:         choco install git -y --no-progress
9914:   494:         refreshenv
9915:   495:         Write-Log "Git install√©" -Level Success
9916:   496:         return $true
9917:   497:     } catch {
9918:   498:         Write-Log "√âchec Git: $_" -Level Warning
9919:   499:         return $false
9920:   500:     }

9922:   502:
9923:   503: function Test-Installations {
9924:   504:     $config = Get-Config
9925:   505:     Write-Log "Validation finale..." -Level Info
9926:   506:
9927:   507:     $tests = @(
9928:   508:         @{Name="Python"; Test={Get-Command python -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue}},
9929:   509:         @{Name="Environnement"; Test={Test-Path $config.VenvPath}},
9930:   510:         @{Name="Node.js"; Test={Get-Command node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue}},
9931:   511:         @{Name="Git"; Test={Get-Command git -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue}},
9932:   512:         @{Name="Ollama"; Test={
9933:   513:             $ollamaExe = Join-Path $config.InstallPaths.Ollama "ollama.exe"
9934:   514:             (Test-Path $ollamaExe) -or (Get-Command ollama -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)
9935:   515:         }}
9936:   516:     )
9937:   517:
9938:   518:     $allPassed = $true
9939:   519:     foreach ($test in $tests) {
9940:   520:         $passed = & $test.Test
9941:   521:         $status = if ($passed) { "‚úì" } else { "‚úó" }
9942:   522:         $level = if ($passed) { "Success" } else { "Warning" }
9943:   523:
9944:   524:         Write-Log "$status $($test.Name)" -Level $level
9945:   525:
9946:   526:         if (-not $passed -and $test.Name -in @("Python", "Environnement")) {
9947:   527:             $allPassed = $false
9948:   528:         }
9949:   529:     }
9950:   530:
9951:   531:     return $allPassed
9952:   532: }
9953:   533:
9954:   534: # -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
9955:   535: # FONCTION PRINCIPALE
9956:   536: # -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

9961:   541:     Write-Host "SMART CONTRACT PIPELINE - INSTALLATION COMPL√àTE" -ForegroundColor Cyan
9962:   542:     Write-Host "Version: 2.2.0" -ForegroundColor Cyan

9983:   563:             throw "Espace D: insuffisant"

10023:   603:         }

10032:   612:

10061:   641:

10063:   643:         Write-Log "ERREUR: $_" -Level Error

10065:   645:     } finally {

10068:   648:     }
10069:   649: }

10078:   658:         deactivate 2>$null
10079:   659:     }

10086:   666: }

10173:     4: # ========== FONCTIONS ==========
10174:     5: function Test-CommandExists {
10175:     6:     param([string]$CommandName)
10176:     7:     try {
10177:     8:         # Essayer d'abord la m√©thode standard
10178:     9:         $cmd = Get-Command $CommandName -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
10179:    10:         if ($null -ne $cmd) {
10180:    11:             return $true
10181:    12:         }
10182:    13:
10183:    14:         # V√©rifier sur le disque D: sp√©cifiquement
10184:    15:         if ($CommandName -eq "forge") {
10185:    16:             $forgePaths = @(
10186:    17:                 "D:\Foundry\forge.exe",
10187:    18:                 "D:\foundry\forge.exe",
10188:    19:                 "$env:ProgramFiles\Foundry\bin\forge.exe",
10189:    20:                 "$env:USERPROFILE\.foundry\bin\forge.exe"
10190:    21:             )
10191:    22:
10192:    23:             foreach ($path in $forgePaths) {
10193:    24:                 if (Test-Path $path) {
10194:    25:                     # Ajouter au PATH de la session si trouv√©
10195:    26:                     $binDir = Split-Path $path -Parent
10196:    27:                     if ($env:Path -notlike "*$binDir*") {
10197:    28:                         $env:Path += ";$binDir"
10198:    29:                     }
10199:    30:                     return $true
10200:    31:                 }
10201:    32:             }
10202:    33:         }
10203:    34:
10204:    35:         return $false
10205:    36:     } catch {
10206:    37:         return $false
10207:    38:     }
10208:    39: }
10209:    40:
10210:    41: function Write-InstallLog {
10211:    42:     param([string]$Message, [string]$Type = "INFO")
10212:    43:     $timestamp = Get-Date -Format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
10213:    44:     $color = "White"
10214:    45:     if ($Type -eq "SUCCESS") { $color = "Green" }
10215:    46:     elseif ($Type -eq "ERROR") { $color = "Red" }
10216:    47:     elseif ($Type -eq "WARNING") { $color = "Yellow" }
10217:    48:     Write-Host "[$timestamp] $Type : $Message" -ForegroundColor $color
10218:    49: }
10219:    50:
10220:    51: function Invoke-Silent {
10221:    52:     param([string]$Command)
10222:    53:     try {
10223:    54:         Invoke-Expression $Command 2>$null 1>$null
10224:    55:         return $true
10225:    56:     } catch {
10226:    57:         return $false
10227:    58:     }
10228:    59: }
10229:    60:
10230:    61: # ========== INSTALLATION DES OUTILS ==========
10231:    62: Write-Host "`n=== INSTALLATION DES OUTILS BLOCKCHAIN ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
10232:    63: $installDate = Get-Date -Format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
10233:    64: Write-Host "Date: $installDate`n"
10234:    65:
10235:    66: # 1. V√âRIFICATION FOUNDRY (VERSION CORRIG√âE POUR D:)
10236:    67: Write-Host "1. V√âRIFICATION FOUNDRY..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
10237:    68:
10238:    69: # V√©rifier sp√©cifiquement sur D:
10239:    70: $foundryFound = $false
10240:    71: $foundryPath = $null
10241:    72:
10242:    73: $possiblePaths = @(
10243:    74:     "D:\Foundry\forge.exe",
10244:    75:     "D:\foundry\forge.exe",  # Votre installation
10245:    76:     "D:\Foundry\bin\forge.exe",
10246:    77:     "D:\foundry\bin\forge.exe",
10247:    78:     "$env:ProgramFiles\Foundry\bin\forge.exe",
10248:    79:     "$env:USERPROFILE\.foundry\bin\forge.exe"
10249:    80: )

10252:    83:     if (Test-Path $path) {
10253:    84:         $foundryFound = $true
10254:    85:         $foundryPath = $path

10256:    87:
10257:    88:         # Ajouter au PATH de la session si n√©cessaire
10258:    89:         if ($env:Path -notlike "*$binDir*") {
10259:    90:             $env:Path += ";$binDir"
10260:    91:             Write-InstallLog "Ajout√© au PATH de la session: $binDir" -Type "INFO"
10261:    92:         }
10262:    93:         break
10263:    94:     }
10264:    95: }
10265:    96:
10266:    97: if ($foundryFound) {
10267:    98:     Write-InstallLog "Foundry trouv√© √†: $foundryPath" -Type "SUCCESS"
10268:    99:

10271:   102:         $forgeVersion = forge --version 2>&1 | Select-Object -First 1
10272:   103:         if ($forgeVersion -match "forge") {
10273:   104:             Write-InstallLog "Version: $forgeVersion" -Type "INFO"
10274:   105:         } else {
10275:   106:             # Essayer en appelant directement
10276:   107:             $directPath = $foundryPath
10277:   108:             & $directPath --version 2>&1 | ForEach-Object {
10278:   109:                 if ($_ -match "forge") {
10279:   110:                     Write-InstallLog "Version: $_" -Type "INFO"
10280:   111:                 }
10281:   112:             }
10282:   113:         }
10283:   114:     } catch {
10284:   115:         Write-InstallLog "Impossible de v√©rifier la version de Foundry" -Type "WARNING"
10285:   116:     }
10286:   117: } else {
10287:   118:     Write-InstallLog "Foundry non d√©tect√©" -Type "WARNING"
10288:   119:     Write-Host "`nFoundry semble √™tre install√© sur D:\foundry\" -ForegroundColor Yellow
10289:   120:     Write-Host "Mais n'est pas dans le PATH de cette session." -ForegroundColor White
10290:   121:     Write-Host "`nPour corriger:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
10291:   122:     Write-Host "1. Ajoutez D:\foundry\ au PATH syst√®me:" -ForegroundColor White

10346:   177: }

10352:   183:         continue
10353:   184:     }

10361:   192:         } catch {

10363:   194:         }
10364:   195:     } elseif ($tool.Type -eq "pip") {

10366:   197:             Invoke-Silent $tool.Install
10367:   198:             Write-InstallLog "$($tool.Name) install√©" -Type "SUCCESS"
10368:   199:         } catch {

10370:   201:         }
10371:   202:     }

10378:   209:     @{Name="TypeScript"; Command="tsc"; Install="npm install -g typescript"},
10379:   210:     @{Name="Yarn"; Command="yarn"; Install="npm install -g yarn"}
10380:   211: )
10381:   212:
10382:   213: foreach ($tool in $frontendTools) {
10383:   214:     if (Test-CommandExists $tool.Command) {

10387:   218:         try {

10544: SCRIPT 33 | storage\file_based_storage.py
10545: Size: 4782 bytes | Type: .py | Modified: 2026-01-15 15:24:16.678642
10546: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10547:     1: # storage/file_based_storage.py
10548:     2: import json
10549:     3: import yaml
10550:     4: import pickle
10551:     5: from pathlib import Path
10552:     6: from typing import Any, Dict, List
10553:     7: from dataclasses import dataclass, asdict
10554:     8:
10555:     9: @dataclass
10556:    10: class AgentState:
10557:    11:     """√âtat d'un agent stock√© dans des fichiers"""
10558:    12:     agent_id: str
10559:    13:     current_task: Dict[str, Any]
10560:    14:     context: Dict[str, Any]
10561:    15:     memory: List[Dict[str, Any]]
10562:    16:     performance: Dict[str, float]
10563:    17:
10564:    18:     def save(self, base_path: Path):
10565:    19:         """Sauvegarde l'√©tat dans des fichiers"""
10566:    20:         agent_dir = base_path / self.agent_id
10567:    21:         agent_dir.mkdir(exist_ok=True)
10568:    22:
10569:    23:         # Sauvegarde en JSON (lisible)
10570:    24:         with open(agent_dir / "state.json", "w") as f:
10571:    25:             json.dump(asdict(self), f, indent=2)
10572:    26:
10573:    27:         # Sauvegarde en pickle pour la performance
10574:    28:         with open(agent_dir / "state.pkl", "wb") as f:
10575:    29:             pickle.dump(self, f)
10576:    30:
10577:    31:         # Sauvegarde du contexte s√©par√©ment
10578:    32:         context_file = agent_dir / "context" / f"context_{datetime.now().timestamp()}.json"
10579:    33:         context_file.parent.mkdir(exist_ok=True)
10580:    34:         with open(context_file, "w") as f:
10581:    35:             json.dump(self.context, f, indent=2)
10582:    36:
10583:    37:     @classmethod
10584:    38:     def load(cls, agent_id: str, base_path: Path):
10585:    39:         """Charge l'√©tat depuis les fichiers"""
10586:    40:         agent_dir = base_path / agent_id
10587:    41:
10588:    42:         try:
10589:    43:             # Essaye d'abord le pickle (plus rapide)
10590:    44:             with open(agent_dir / "state.pkl", "rb") as f:
10591:    45:                 return pickle.load(f)
10592:    46:         except:
10593:    47:             # Fallback sur JSON
10594:    48:             with open(agent_dir / "state.json", "r") as f:
10595:    49:                 data = json.load(f)
10596:    50:                 return cls(**data)
10597:    51:
10598:    52: class ProjectFileSystem:
10599:    53:     """Gestionnaire du syst√®me de fichiers du projet"""
10600:    54:
10601:    55:     def __init__(self, project_root: Path):
10602:    56:         self.root = project_root
10603:    57:
10604:    58:         # Structure de base
10605:    59:         self.directories = {
10606:    60:             "agents": self.root / "agents",
10607:    61:             "context": self.root / "context",
10608:    62:             "memory": self.root / "memory",
10609:    63:             "workspace": self.root / "workspace",
10610:    64:             "sprints": self.root / "sprints",
10611:    65:             "reports": self.root / "reports",
10612:    66:             "logs": self.root / "logs",
10613:    67:         }
10614:    68:
10615:    69:         # Initialisation
10616:    70:         self._init_structure()
10617:    71:
10618:    72:     def _init_structure(self):
10619:    73:         """Cr√©e la structure de dossiers"""
10620:    74:         for dir_path in self.directories.values():
10621:    75:             dir_path.mkdir(exist_ok=True, parents=True)
10622:    76:
10623:    77:             # Sous-structure sp√©cifique
10624:    78:             if dir_path.name == "agents":
10625:    79:                 for agent_type in ["coder", "tester", "architect", "documenter"]:
10626:    80:                     (dir_path / agent_type).mkdir(exist_ok=True)
10627:    81:
10628:    82:             if dir_path.name == "memory":
10629:    83:                 for sub in ["vector_store", "history", "learnings"]:
10630:    84:                     (dir_path / sub).mkdir(exist_ok=True)
10631:    85:
10632:    86:     def get_agent_state_path(self, agent_id: str) -> Path:
10633:    87:         """Retourne le chemin de l'√©tat d'un agent"""
10634:    88:         return self.directories["agents"] / agent_id
10635:    89:
10636:    90:     def save_task_result(self, task_id: str, result: Dict[str, Any]):
10637:    91:         """Sauvegarde le r√©sultat d'une t√¢che"""
10638:    92:         task_file = self.directories["sprints"] / "current" / f"task_{task_id}.json"
10639:    93:         task_file.parent.mkdir(exist_ok=True)
10640:    94:
10641:    95:         with open(task_file, "w") as f:
10642:    96:             json.dump({
10643:    97:                 "task_id": task_id,
10644:    98:                 "result": result,
10645:    99:                 "timestamp": datetime.now().isoformat(),
10646:   100:                 "agent": result.get("agent", "unknown")
10647:   101:             }, f, indent=2)
10648:   102:
10649:   103:     def load_agent_context(self, agent_id: str, limit: int = 10) -> List[Dict]:
10650:   104:         """Charge le contexte r√©cent d'un agent"""
10651:   105:         context_dir = self.get_agent_state_path(agent_id) / "context"
10652:   106:
10653:   107:         if not context_dir.exists():
10654:   108:             return []
10655:   109:
10656:   110:         # R√©cup√®re les fichiers de contexte les plus r√©cents
10657:   111:         context_files = sorted(context_dir.glob("*.json"),
10658:   112:                              key=lambda x: x.stat().st_mtime,
10659:   113:                              reverse=True)[:limit]
10660:   114:
10661:   115:         contexts = []
10662:   116:         for file in context_files:
10663:   117:             with open(file, "r") as f:
10664:   118:                 contexts.append(json.load(f))
10665:   119:
10666:   120:         return contexts
10667:   121:
10668:   122: # Utilisation
10669:   123: project_fs = ProjectFileSystem(Path("./project_data"))
10670:   124:
10671:   125: # Sauvegarde d'√©tat
10672:   126: agent_state = AgentState(
10673:   127:     agent_id="coder_001",
10674:   128:     current_task={"id": "TASK-123", "description": "Implement login"},
10675:   129:     context={"files": ["auth.py"], "dependencies": ["flask"]},
10676:   130:     memory=[{"task": "previous", "result": "success"}],
10677:   131:     performance={"accuracy": 0.95, "speed": 120}
10678:   132: )
10679:   133:
10680:   134: agent_state.save(project_fs.get_agent_state_path("coder_001"))

30235:    31:    11:     @{Parent="architect"; Name="cloud_architect"; Type="Cloud Architecture"},

30256:    52:    32: )
30257:    53:    33:

30259:    55:    35:
30260:    56:    36: foreach ($subAgent in $subAgents) {
30261:    57:    37:     $parentDir = "$projectPath\agents\$($subAgent.Parent)\sous_agents"
30262:    58:    38:     $agentDir = "$parentDir\$($subAgent.Name)"
30263:    59:    39:
30264:    60:    40:     # Cr√©er le dossier du sous-agent
30265:    61:    41:     New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $agentDir -Force | Out-Null

30268:    64:    44:     $files = @("config.yaml", "agent.py", "tools.py", "__init__.py")

30270:    66:    46:         $filePath = "$agentDir\$file"
30271:    67:    47:         if (-not (Test-Path $filePath)) {
30272:    68:    48:             New-Item -ItemType File -Path $filePath -Force | Out-Null
30273:    69:    49:         }
30274:    70:    50:     }

30276:    72:    52:     Write-Host "   ‚úÖ $($subAgent.Parent)/$($subAgent.Name) ($($subAgent.Type))" -ForegroundColor Green
30277:    73:    53: }
30278:    74:    54:
30279:    75:    55: # 2. Cr√©er les fichiers __init__.py pour l'import
30280:    76:    56: Write-Host "`n2. CONFIGURATION DES IMPORTS..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
30281:    77:    57:
30282:    78:    58: foreach ($parent in @("architect", "coder", "smart_contract", "frontend_web3", "tester")) {
30283:    79:    59:     $initFile = "$projectPath\agents\$parent\sous_agents\__init__.py"
30284:    80:    60:
30285:    81:    61:     $imports = @'
30286:    82:    62: # Import des sous-agents
30287:    83:    63: try:
30288:    84:    64:     from .cloud_architect import CloudArchitectSubAgent
30289:    85:    65:     from .blockchain_architect import BlockchainArchitectSubAgent
30290:    86:    66:     from .microservices_architect import MicroservicesArchitectSubAgent
30291:    87:    67: except ImportError as e:
30292:    88:    68:     print(f"Erreur d'import des sous-agents: {e}")
30293:    89:    69:
30294:    90:    70: __all__ = [
30295:    91:    71:     "CloudArchitectSubAgent",
30296:    92:    72:     "BlockchainArchitectSubAgent",
30297:    93:    73:     "MicroservicesArchitectSubAgent"
30298:    94:    74: ]
30299:    95:    75: '@
30300:    96:    76:
30301:    97:    77:     # Adapter les imports selon le parent
30302:    98:    78:     if ($parent -eq "coder") {
30303:    99:    79:         $imports = $imports.Replace("cloud_architect", "backend_coder")
30304:   100:    80:         $imports = $imports.Replace("blockchain_architect", "frontend_coder")
30305:   101:    81:         $imports = $imports.Replace("microservices_architect", "devops_coder")
30306:   102:    82:         $imports = $imports.Replace("CloudArchitectSubAgent", "BackendCoderSubAgent")
30307:   103:    83:         $imports = $imports.Replace("BlockchainArchitectSubAgent", "FrontendCoderSubAgent")
30308:   104:    84:         $imports = $imports.Replace("MicroservicesArchitectSubAgent", "DevOpsCoderSubAgent")
30309:   105:    85:     }
30310:   106:    86:
30311:   107:    87:     $imports | Out-File -FilePath $initFile -Force -Encoding UTF8
30312:   108:    88:     Write-Host "   ‚úÖ $parent/__init__.py cr√©√©" -ForegroundColor Green
30313:   109:    89: }
30314:   110:    90:
30315:   111:    91: # 3. Mettre √† jour l'agent parent pour g√©rer les sous-agents
30316:   112:    92: Write-Host "`n3. MISE A JOUR DES AGENTS PARENTS..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
30317:   113:    93:
30318:   114:    94: foreach ($parent in @("architect", "coder", "smart_contract", "frontend_web3", "tester")) {
30319:   115:    95:     $parentAgentFile = "$projectPath\agents\$parent\agent.py"
30320:   116:    96:
30321:   117:    97:     if (Test-Path $parentAgentFile) {
30322:   118:    98:         $parentCode = Get-Content $parentAgentFile -Raw
30323:   119:    99:
30324:   120:   100:         # Ajouter la gestion des sous-agents
30325:   121:   101:         $subAgentManagement = @'
30326:   122:   102:
30327:   123:   103:     # Gestion des sous-agents
30328:   124:   104:     def __init__(self, config_path: str):
30329:   125:   105:         super().__init__(config_path)
30330:   126:   106:         self.sub_agents = {}
30331:   127:   107:         self._initialize_sub_agents()
30332:   128:   108:
30333:   129:   109:     def _initialize_sub_agents(self):
30334:   130:   110:         """Initialise les sous-agents sp√©cialis√©s"""
30335:   131:   111:         try:
30336:   132:   112:             from .sous_agents import *
30337:   133:   113:
30338:   134:   114:             # Cr√©ation dynamique des sous-agents bas√©e sur la configuration
30339:   135:   115:             sub_agent_configs = self.config.get("sub_agents", {})
30340:   136:   116:
30341:   137:   117:             for agent_name, agent_config in sub_agent_configs.items():
30342:   138:   118:                 agent_class_name = f"{agent_name.capitalize().replace('_', '')}SubAgent"
30343:   139:   119:                 agent_class = globals().get(agent_class_name)
30344:   140:   120:
30345:   141:   121:                 if agent_class:
30346:   142:   122:                     sub_agent = agent_class(agent_config.get("config_path", ""))
30347:   143:   123:                     self.sub_agents[agent_name] = sub_agent
30348:   144:   124:                     self.logger.info(f"Sous-agent {agent_name} initialis√©")
30349:   145:   125:                 else:
30350:   146:   126:                     self.logger.warning(f"Classe non trouv√©e pour le sous-agent {agent_name}")
30351:   147:   127:
30352:   148:   128:         except ImportError as e:
30353:   149:   129:             self.logger.error(f"Erreur lors de l'import des sous-agents: {e}")
30354:   150:   130:
30355:   151:   131:     async def delegate_to_sub_agent(self, task_type: str, task_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
30356:   152:   132:         """D√©l√®gue une t√¢che √† un sous-agent appropri√©"""
30357:   153:   133:         # Logique de routage vers le bon sous-agent
30358:   154:   134:         sub_agent_mapping = self.config.get("sub_agent_mapping", {})
30359:   155:   135:
30360:   156:   136:         for pattern, agent_name in sub_agent_mapping.items():
30361:   157:   137:             if task_type.startswith(pattern):
30362:   158:   138:                 if agent_name in self.sub_agents:
30363:   159:   139:                     self.logger.info(f"D√©l√©gation de la t√¢che {task_type} au sous-agent {agent_name}")
30364:   160:   140:                     return await self.sub_agents[agent_name].execute(task_data, {})
30365:   161:   141:
30366:   162:   142:         # Fallback: utiliser l'agent principal
30367:   163:   143:         self.logger.info(f"Aucun sous-agent trouv√© pour {task_type}, utilisation de l'agent principal")
30368:   164:   144:         return await self.execute(task_data, {})
30369:   165:   145:
30370:   166:   146:     async def get_sub_agents_status(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
30371:   167:   147:         """Retourne le statut de tous les sous-agents"""
30372:   168:   148:         status = {}
30373:   169:   149:
30374:   170:   150:         for agent_name, agent_instance in self.sub_agents.items():
30375:   171:   151:             try:
30376:   172:   152:                 health = await agent_instance.health_check()
30377:   173:   153:                 status[agent_name] = {
30378:   174:   154:                     "status": health.get("status", "unknown"),
30379:   175:   155:                     "agent_info": agent_instance.get_agent_info()
30380:   176:   156:                 }
30381:   177:   157:             except Exception as e:
30382:   178:   158:                 status[agent_name] = {
30383:   179:   159:                     "status": "error",
30384:   180:   160:                     "error": str(e)
30385:   181:   161:                 }
30386:   182:   162:
30387:   183:   163:         return {
30388:   184:   164:             "total_sub_agents": len(self.sub_agents),
30389:   185:   165:             "sub_agents": status
30390:   186:   166:         }
30391:   187:   167: '@
30392:   188:   168:
30393:   189:   169:         # Ins√©rer apr√®s la classe BaseAgent
30394:   190:   170:         if ($parentCode -match "class.*Agent\(BaseAgent\):") {
30395:   191:   171:             $modifiedCode = $parentCode -replace "(class.*Agent\(BaseAgent\):[\s\S]*?)(def __init__)", "`$1$subAgentManagement`n`n    `$2"
30396:   192:   172:             $modifiedCode | Out-File -FilePath $parentAgentFile -Force -Encoding UTF8

30398:   194:   174:         }
30399:   195:   175:     }
30400:   196:   176: }

30611:   407:     5: function Test-CommandExists {
30612:   408:     6:     param([string]$CommandName)
30613:   409:     7:     try {
30614:   410:     8:         # Essayer d'abord la m√©thode standard
30615:   411:     9:         $cmd = Get-Command $CommandName -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
30616:   412:    10:         if ($null -ne $cmd) {
30617:   413:    11:             return $true
30618:   414:    12:         }
30619:   415:    13:
30620:   416:    14:         # V√©rifier sur le disque D: sp√©cifiquement
30621:   417:    15:         if ($CommandName -eq "forge") {
30622:   418:    16:             $forgePaths = @(
30623:   419:    17:                 "D:\Foundry\forge.exe",
30624:   420:    18:                 "D:\foundry\forge.exe",
30625:   421:    19:                 "$env:ProgramFiles\Foundry\bin\forge.exe",
30626:   422:    20:                 "$env:USERPROFILE\.foundry\bin\forge.exe"
30627:   423:    21:             )
30628:   424:    22:
30629:   425:    23:             foreach ($path in $forgePaths) {
30630:   426:    24:                 if (Test-Path $path) {
30631:   427:    25:                     # Ajouter au PATH de la session si trouv√©
30632:   428:    26:                     $binDir = Split-Path $path -Parent
30633:   429:    27:                     if ($env:Path -notlike "*$binDir*") {
30634:   430:    28:                         $env:Path += ";$binDir"
30635:   431:    29:                     }
30636:   432:    30:                     return $true
30637:   433:    31:                 }
30638:   434:    32:             }
30639:   435:    33:         }
30640:   436:    34:
30641:   437:    35:         return $false
30642:   438:    36:     } catch {
30643:   439:    37:         return $false
30644:   440:    38:     }
30645:   441:    39: }
30646:   442:    40:
30647:   443:    41: function Write-InstallLog {
30648:   444:    42:     param([string]$Message, [string]$Type = "INFO")
30649:   445:    43:     $timestamp = Get-Date -Format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
30650:   446:    44:     $color = "White"
30651:   447:    45:     if ($Type -eq "SUCCESS") { $color = "Green" }
30652:   448:    46:     elseif ($Type -eq "ERROR") { $color = "Red" }
30653:   449:    47:     elseif ($Type -eq "WARNING") { $color = "Yellow" }
30654:   450:    48:     Write-Host "[$timestamp] $Type : $Message" -ForegroundColor $color
30655:   451:    49: }
30656:   452:    50:
30657:   453:    51: function Invoke-Silent {
30658:   454:    52:     param([string]$Command)
30659:   455:    53:     try {
30660:   456:    54:         Invoke-Expression $Command 2>$null 1>$null
30661:   457:    55:         return $true
30662:   458:    56:     } catch {
30663:   459:    57:         return $false
30664:   460:    58:     }
30665:   461:    59: }
30666:   462:    60:
30667:   463:    61: # ========== INSTALLATION DES OUTILS ==========
30668:   464:    62: Write-Host "`n=== INSTALLATION DES OUTILS BLOCKCHAIN ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
30669:   465:    63: $installDate = Get-Date -Format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
30670:   466:    64: Write-Host "Date: $installDate`n"
30671:   467:    65:
30672:   468:    66: # 1. V√âRIFICATION FOUNDRY (VERSION CORRIG√âE POUR D:)
30673:   469:    67: Write-Host "1. V√âRIFICATION FOUNDRY..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
30674:   470:    68:
30675:   471:    69: # V√©rifier sp√©cifiquement sur D:
30676:   472:    70: $foundryFound = $false
30677:   473:    71: $foundryPath = $null
30678:   474:    72:
30679:   475:    73: $possiblePaths = @(
30680:   476:    74:     "D:\Foundry\forge.exe",
30681:   477:    75:     "D:\foundry\forge.exe",  # Votre installation
30682:   478:    76:     "D:\Foundry\bin\forge.exe",
30683:   479:    77:     "D:\foundry\bin\forge.exe",
30684:   480:    78:     "$env:ProgramFiles\Foundry\bin\forge.exe",
30685:   481:    79:     "$env:USERPROFILE\.foundry\bin\forge.exe"
30686:   482:    80: )
30687:   483:    81:
30688:   484:    82: foreach ($path in $possiblePaths) {
30689:   485:    83:     if (Test-Path $path) {
30690:   486:    84:         $foundryFound = $true
30691:   487:    85:         $foundryPath = $path
30692:   488:    86:         $binDir = Split-Path $path -Parent
30693:   489:    87:
30694:   490:    88:         # Ajouter au PATH de la session si n√©cessaire
30695:   491:    89:         if ($env:Path -notlike "*$binDir*") {
30696:   492:    90:             $env:Path += ";$binDir"
30697:   493:    91:             Write-InstallLog "Ajout√© au PATH de la session: $binDir" -Type "INFO"
30698:   494:    92:         }
30699:   495:    93:         break
30700:   496:    94:     }
30701:   497:    95: }
30702:   498:    96:
30703:   499:    97: if ($foundryFound) {
30704:   500:    98:     Write-InstallLog "Foundry trouv√© √†: $foundryPath" -Type "SUCCESS"
30705:   501:    99:
30706:   502:   100:     # Tenter de v√©rifier la version
30707:   503:   101:     try {
30708:   504:   102:         $forgeVersion = forge --version 2>&1 | Select-Object -First 1
30709:   505:   103:         if ($forgeVersion -match "forge") {
30710:   506:   104:             Write-InstallLog "Version: $forgeVersion" -Type "INFO"
30711:   507:   105:         } else {
30712:   508:   106:             # Essayer en appelant directement
30713:   509:   107:             $directPath = $foundryPath
30714:   510:   108:             & $directPath --version 2>&1 | ForEach-Object {
30715:   511:   109:                 if ($_ -match "forge") {
30716:   512:   110:                     Write-InstallLog "Version: $_" -Type "INFO"
30717:   513:   111:                 }
30718:   514:   112:             }
30719:   515:   113:         }
30720:   516:   114:     } catch {
30721:   517:   115:         Write-InstallLog "Impossible de v√©rifier la version de Foundry" -Type "WARNING"
30722:   518:   116:     }
30723:   519:   117: } else {
30724:   520:   118:     Write-InstallLog "Foundry non d√©tect√©" -Type "WARNING"
30725:   521:   119:     Write-Host "`nFoundry semble √™tre install√© sur D:\foundry\" -ForegroundColor Yellow
30726:   522:   120:     Write-Host "Mais n'est pas dans le PATH de cette session." -ForegroundColor White
30727:   523:   121:     Write-Host "`nPour corriger:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
30728:   524:   122:     Write-Host "1. Ajoutez D:\foundry\ au PATH syst√®me:" -ForegroundColor White
30729:   525:   123:     Write-Host "   [Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable('Path', `$env:Path + ';D:\foundry', 'Machine')" -ForegroundColor Gray
30730:   526:   124:     Write-Host "2. Red√©marrez PowerShell" -ForegroundColor White
30731:   527:   125:     Write-Host "3. Testez: forge --version" -ForegroundColor White
30732:   528:   126:     Write-Host "`nOU ex√©cutez cette commande maintenant:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
30733:   529:   127:     Write-Host "   `$env:Path += ';D:\foundry'" -ForegroundColor Gray
30734:   530:   128: }
30735:   531:   129:
30736:   532:   130: # 2. INSTALLATION HARDHAT
30737:   533:   131: Write-Host "`n2. INSTALLATION HARDHAT..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
30738:   534:   132:
30739:   535:   133: if (Test-CommandExists "npm") {
30740:   536:   134:     # V√©rifier si Hardhat est d√©j√† disponible
30741:   537:   135:     $hardhatCheck = $false
30742:   538:   136:     try {
30743:   539:   137:         $output = npx hardhat --version 2>$null
30744:   540:   138:         if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
30745:   541:   139:             $hardhatCheck = $true
30746:   542:   140:         }
30747:   543:   141:     } catch {
30748:   544:   142:         $hardhatCheck = $false
30749:   545:   143:     }

30751:   547:   145:     if (-not $hardhatCheck) {

30754:   550:   148:             npm install -g hardhat 2>$null

30800:   596:   194:         }

31011:   807:    28: function Show-Menu {
31012:   808:    29:     Clear-Host
31013:   809:    30:     Write-Host "=" * 60 -ForegroundColor Cyan
31014:   810:    31:     Write-Host "SHARE SPLIT 1M - SmartContractDevPipeline" -ForegroundColor White

31016:   812:    33:     Write-Host ""
31017:   813:    34:     Write-Host "=== MENU PRINCIPAL ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
31018:   814:    35:     Write-Host "1. Publier sur GitHub Repository" -ForegroundColor White
31019:   815:    36:     Write-Host "2. Partager sur GitHub Gists" -ForegroundColor White
31020:   816:    37:     Write-Host "3. G√©n√©rer seulement les fichiers locaux" -ForegroundColor White

31022:   818:    39:     Write-Host ""
