32097:  1893:     1: @echo off
32098:  1894:     2: chcp 65001
32099:  1895:     3: title Final Share - Batch Only
32100:  1896:     4: color 0A
32101:  1897:     5:
32102:  1898:     6: rem Configuration GitHub
32103:  1899:     7: set GITHUB_USERNAME=poolsyncdefi-ui
32104:  1900:     8: set GITHUB_REPO=structured-lending-protocol-clean
32105:  1901:     9: set GITHUB_TOKEN=
32106:  1902:    10:
32107:  1903:    11: :menu
32108:  1904:    12: cls
32109:  1905:    13: echo.
32110:  1906:    14: echo ========================================
32111:  1907:    15: echo   FINAL SHARE - BATCH ONLY
32112:  1908:    16: echo ========================================
32113:  1909:    17: echo.
32114:  1910:    18: echo 1. CREATE FULL SHARE (all files with line numbers)
32115:  1911:    19: echo 2. CREATE DIFF SHARE (changed files only)
32116:  1912:    20: echo 3. GIT COMMIT + PUSH
32117:  1913:    21: echo 4. PUBLISH TO GITHUB REPOSITORY
32118:  1914:    22: echo 5. SHARE TO GITHUB GISTS
32119:  1915:    23: echo 6. EXIT
32120:  1916:    24: echo.
32121:  1917:    25:
32122:  1918:    26: set /p choice=Enter choice (1-6):
32123:  1919:    27:
32124:  1920:    28: if "%choice%"=="1" goto fullshare
32125:  1921:    29: if "%choice%"=="2" goto diffshare
32126:  1922:    30: if "%choice%"=="3" goto gitpush
32127:  1923:    31: if "%choice%"=="4" goto githubrepo
32128:  1924:    32: if "%choice%"=="5" goto githubgists
32129:  1925:    33: if "%choice%"=="6" exit /b 0
32130:  1926:    34: goto menu
32131:  1927:    35:
32132:  1928:    36: :fullshare
32133:  1929:    37: cls
32134:  1930:    38: echo Creating project share with line numbers and full paths...
32135:  1931:    39:
32136:  1932:    40: rem Create header
32137:  1933:    41: echo ============================================================================== > PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32138:  1934:    42: echo STRUCTURED LENDING PROTOCOL - FULL PROJECT SHARE >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32139:  1935:    43: echo ============================================================================== >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32140:  1936:    44: echo GitHub: %GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO% >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32141:  1937:    45: echo Repo URL: https://github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO% >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32142:  1938:    46: echo Date: %date% Time: %time% >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32143:  1939:    47: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32144:  1940:    48:
32145:  1941:    49: rem Get git info
32146:  1942:    50: echo [GIT INFORMATION] >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32147:  1943:    51: echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32148:  1944:    52: for /f "delims=" %%i in ('git branch --show-current 2^>nul') do echo Branch: %%i >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32149:  1945:    53: for /f "delims=" %%i in ('git rev-parse --short HEAD 2^>nul') do echo Commit: %%i >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32150:  1946:    54: for /f "delims=" %%i in ('git log --oneline -1 --pretty=format:"%%s" 2^>nul') do echo Last commit: %%i >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32151:  1947:    55: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32152:  1948:    56:
32153:  1949:    57: rem === CONTRACTS DIRECTORY ===
32154:  1950:    58: echo [CONTRACTS DIRECTORY - *.sol files] >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32155:  1951:    59: echo ============================================================================== >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32156:  1952:    60: set contract_count=0
32157:  1953:    61: for /r contracts %%f in (*.sol) do (
32158:  1954:    62:     set /a contract_count+=1
32159:  1955:    63:
32160:  1956:    64:     set "filepath=%%f"
32161:  1957:    65:     set "filename=%%~nxf"
32162:  1958:    66:     set "filesize=%%~z"
32163:  1959:    67:     set "filemodified=%%~tf"
32164:  1960:    68:
32165:  1961:    69:     echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32166:  1962:    70:     echo FILE %contract_count% ^| !filepath! >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32167:  1963:    71:     echo Size: !filesize! bytes ^| Modified: !filemodified! >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32168:  1964:    72:     echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32169:  1965:    73:
32170:  1966:    74:     if exist "%%f" (
32171:  1967:    75:         setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
32172:  1968:    76:         set line_num=1
32173:  1969:    77:         for /f "tokens=* delims=" %%a in ('type "%%f"') do (
32174:  1970:    78:             echo !line_num!: %%a >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32175:  1971:    79:             set /a line_num+=1
32176:  1972:    80:         )
32177:  1973:    81:         endlocal
32178:  1974:    82:     ) else (
32179:  1975:    83:         echo [FILE NOT FOUND] >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32180:  1976:    84:     )
32181:  1977:    85:     echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32182:  1978:    86: )
32183:  1979:    87:
32184:  1980:    88: rem === SCRIPTS DIRECTORY ===
32185:  1981:    89: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32186:  1982:    90: echo [SCRIPTS DIRECTORY - *.js, *.bat, *.sh, *.txt files] >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32187:  1983:    91: echo ============================================================================== >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32188:  1984:    92: set script_count=0
32189:  1985:    93: for /r scripts %%f in (*.js *.bat *.sh *.txt) do (
32190:  1986:    94:     if exist "%%f" (
32191:  1987:    95:         set /a script_count+=1
32192:  1988:    96:
32193:  1989:    97:         set "filepath=%%f"
32194:  1990:    98:         set "filename=%%~nxf"
32195:  1991:    99:         set "filesize=%%~z"
32196:  1992:   100:         set "filemodified=%%~tf"
32197:  1993:   101:         set "fileext=%%~xf"
32198:  1994:   102:
32199:  1995:   103:         echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32200:  1996:   104:         echo SCRIPT !script_count! ^| !filepath! >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32201:  1997:   105:         echo Size: !filesize! bytes ^| Type: !fileext! ^| Modified: !filemodified! >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32202:  1998:   106:         echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32203:  1999:   107:
32204:  2000:   108:         setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
32205:  2001:   109:         set line_num=1
32206:  2002:   110:         for /f "tokens=* delims=" %%a in ('type "%%f"') do (
32207:  2003:   111:             echo !line_num!: %%a >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32208:  2004:   112:             set /a line_num+=1
32209:  2005:   113:         )
32210:  2006:   114:         endlocal
32211:  2007:   115:         echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32212:  2008:   116:     )
32213:  2009:   117: )
32214:  2010:   118:
32215:  2011:   119: rem === TESTS DIRECTORY ===
32216:  2012:   120: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32217:  2013:   121: echo [TESTS DIRECTORY - *.js, *.txt files] >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32218:  2014:   122: echo ============================================================================== >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32219:  2015:   123: set test_count=0
32220:  2016:   124: for /r test %%f in (*.js *.txt) do (
32221:  2017:   125:     if exist "%%f" (
32222:  2018:   126:         set /a test_count+=1
32223:  2019:   127:
32224:  2020:   128:         set "filepath=%%f"
32225:  2021:   129:         set "filename=%%~nxf"
32226:  2022:   130:         set "filesize=%%~z"
32227:  2023:   131:         set "filemodified=%%~tf"
32228:  2024:   132:         set "fileext=%%~xf"
32229:  2025:   133:
32230:  2026:   134:         echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32231:  2027:   135:         echo TEST !test_count! ^| !filepath! >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32232:  2028:   136:         echo Size: !filesize! bytes ^| Type: !fileext! ^| Modified: !filemodified! >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32233:  2029:   137:         echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32234:  2030:   138:
32235:  2031:   139:         setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
32236:  2032:   140:         set line_num=1
32237:  2033:   141:         for /f "tokens=* delims=" %%a in ('type "%%f"') do (
32238:  2034:   142:             echo !line_num!: %%a >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32239:  2035:   143:             set /a line_num+=1
32240:  2036:   144:         )
32241:  2037:   145:         endlocal
32242:  2038:   146:         echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32243:  2039:   147:     )
32244:  2040:   148: )
32245:  2041:   149:
32246:  2042:   150: rem === PROJECT STRUCTURE ===
32247:  2043:   151: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32248:  2044:   152: echo [PROJECT FILE STRUCTURE] >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32249:  2045:   153: echo ============================================================================== >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32250:  2046:   154: echo Listing all project files... >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32251:  2047:   155: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32252:  2048:   156:
32253:  2049:   157: echo CONTRACTS: >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32254:  2050:   158: dir contracts /b /s >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32255:  2051:   159: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32256:  2052:   160:
32257:  2053:   161: echo SCRIPTS: >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32258:  2054:   162: dir scripts /b /s >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32259:  2055:   163: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32260:  2056:   164:
32261:  2057:   165: echo TESTS: >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32262:  2058:   166: dir test /b /s >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32263:  2059:   167: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32264:  2060:   168:
32265:  2061:   169: echo CONFIG FILES: >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32266:  2062:   170: dir *.json *.toml *.yml *.yaml *.config *.cfg /b >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32267:  2063:   171: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32268:  2064:   172:
32269:  2065:   173: rem === SUMMARY ===
32270:  2066:   174: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32271:  2067:   175: echo [SUMMARY] >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32272:  2068:   176: echo ============================================================================== >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32273:  2069:   177: echo Total contract files: %contract_count% >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32274:  2070:   178: echo Total script files: %script_count% >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32275:  2071:   179: echo Total test files: %test_count% >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32276:  2072:   180: set /a total_files=contract_count+script_count+test_count
32277:  2073:   181: echo Total code files: %total_files% >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32278:  2074:   182: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32279:  2075:   183: echo Generated: %date% %time% >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32280:  2076:   184: echo ============================================================================== >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32281:  2077:   185:
32282:  2078:   186: cls
32283:  2079:   187: echo File created: PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32284:  2080:   188: echo Files: %total_files% total (%contract_count% contracts, %script_count% scripts, %test_count% tests)
32285:  2081:   189: echo.
32286:  2082:   190: echo Copy content to pastebin.com and share the URL
32287:  2083:   191: echo.
32288:  2084:   192: pause
32289:  2085:   193: goto menu
32290:  2086:   194:
32291:  2087:   195: :diffshare
32292:  2088:   196: cls
32293:  2089:   197: echo Creating diff report...
32294:  2090:   198:
32295:  2091:   199: rem Create diff report
32296:  2092:   200: echo ============================================================================== > DIFF_REPORT.txt
32297:  2093:   201: echo STRUCTURED LENDING PROTOCOL - DIFF REPORT >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32298:  2094:   202: echo ============================================================================== >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32299:  2095:   203: echo Date: %date% Time: %time% >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32300:  2096:   204: echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32301:  2097:   205:
32302:  2098:   206: rem Get git information
32303:  2099:   207: echo [GIT STATUS] >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32304:  2100:   208: echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32305:  2101:   209: git status >> DIFF_REPORT.txt 2>nul
32306:  2102:   210: echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32307:  2103:   211:
32308:  2104:   212: rem Get changed files with details
32309:  2105:   213: echo [CHANGED FILES DETAIL] >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32310:  2106:   214: echo ============================================================================== >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32311:  2107:   215: set changed_count=0
32312:  2108:   216: for /f "tokens=1,*" %%a in ('git status --porcelain 2^>nul') do (
32313:  2109:   217:     set status=%%a
32314:  2110:   218:     set "file=%%b"
32315:  2111:   219:
32316:  2112:   220:     if exist "!file!" (
32317:  2113:   221:         set /a changed_count+=1
32318:  2114:   222:
32319:  2115:   223:         set "filepath=!file!"
32320:  2116:   224:         set "filesize=%%~z"
32321:  2117:   225:         set "filemodified=%%~tf"
32322:  2118:   226:
32323:  2119:   227:         echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32324:  2120:   228:         echo FILE !changed_count! ^| !filepath! >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32325:  2121:   229:         echo Status: !status! ^| Size: !filesize! bytes ^| Modified: !filemodified! >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32326:  2122:   230:         echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32327:  2123:   231:
32328:  2124:   232:         if "!status!"=="??" (
32329:  2125:   233:             echo [NEW FILE - FULL CONTENT WITH LINE NUMBERS] >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32330:  2126:   234:             echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32331:  2127:   235:             setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
32332:  2128:   236:             set line_num=1
32333:  2129:   237:             for /f "tokens=* delims=" %%l in ('type "!file!"') do (
32334:  2130:   238:                 echo !line_num!: %%l >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32335:  2131:   239:                 set /a line_num+=1
32336:  2132:   240:             )
32337:  2133:   241:             endlocal
32338:  2134:   242:         ) else (
32339:  2135:   243:             echo [MODIFICATIONS - GIT DIFF OUTPUT] >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32340:  2136:   244:             echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32341:  2137:   245:             git diff "!file!" >> DIFF_REPORT.txt 2>nul
32342:  2138:   246:             if errorlevel 1 (
32343:  2139:   247:                 git diff --cached "!file!" >> DIFF_REPORT.txt 2>nul
32344:  2140:   248:             )
32345:  2141:   249:             echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32346:  2142:   250:             echo [CURRENT FILE CONTENT WITH LINE NUMBERS] >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32347:  2143:   251:             echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32348:  2144:   252:             setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
32349:  2145:   253:             set line_num=1
32350:  2146:   254:             for /f "tokens=* delims=" %%l in ('type "!file!"') do (
32351:  2147:   255:                 echo !line_num!: %%l >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32352:  2148:   256:                 set /a line_num+=1
32353:  2149:   257:             )
32354:  2150:   258:             endlocal
32355:  2151:   259:         )
32356:  2152:   260:         echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32357:  2153:   261:     )
32358:  2154:   262: )
32359:  2155:   263:
32360:  2156:   264: if %changed_count%==0 (
32361:  2157:   265:     echo No changes detected in the working directory. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32362:  2158:   266:     echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32363:  2159:   267: )
32364:  2160:   268:
32365:  2161:   269: if %changed_count% gtr 0 (
32366:  2162:   270:     echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32367:  2163:   271:     echo [LINE-BY-LINE CHANGES SUMMARY] >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32368:  2164:   272:     echo ============================================================================== >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32369:  2165:   273:     for /f "tokens=2" %%f in ('git status --porcelain 2^>nul ^| findstr /r "^M ^A ^??"') do (
32370:  2166:   274:         if exist "%%f" (
32371:  2167:   275:             echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32372:  2168:   276:             echo FILE: %%f >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32373:  2169:   277:             echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32374:  2170:   278:             git diff --unified=0 "%%f" 2>nul | findstr "+" "-" >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32375:  2171:   279:             echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32376:  2172:   280:         )
32377:  2173:   281:     )
32378:  2174:   282: )
32379:  2175:   283:
32380:  2176:   284: echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32381:  2177:   285: echo [GIT DIFF SUMMARY] >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32382:  2178:   286: echo ============================================================================== >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32383:  2179:   287: git diff --stat >> DIFF_REPORT.txt 2>nul
32384:  2180:   288: if errorlevel 1 (
32385:  2181:   289:     echo No staged changes. Use 'git diff --cached' for staged changes. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32386:  2182:   290: )
32387:  2183:   291:
32388:  2184:   292: rem Summary
32389:  2185:   293: echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32390:  2186:   294: echo [REPORT SUMMARY] >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32391:  2187:   295: echo ============================================================================== >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32392:  2188:   296: echo Total changed files: %changed_count% >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32393:  2189:   297: echo Report generated: %date% %time% >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32394:  2190:   298: echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32395:  2191:   299: echo INSTRUCTIONS FOR CODE REVIEW: >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32396:  2192:   300: echo 1. Files are listed with full paths for precise location >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32397:  2193:   301: echo 2. Line numbers are included for specific references >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32398:  2194:   302: echo 3. Changes marked with + (additions) and - (deletions) >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32399:  2195:   303: echo 4. New files show complete content >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32400:  2196:   304: echo ============================================================================== >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
32401:  2197:   305:
32402:  2198:   306: cls
32403:  2199:   307: echo File created: DIFF_REPORT.txt
32404:  2200:   308: echo Changed files: %changed_count%
32405:  2201:   309: echo.
32406:  2202:   310: echo Copy content to pastebin.com and share the URL
32407:  2203:   311: echo.
32408:  2204:   312: pause
32409:  2205:   313: goto menu
32410:  2206:   314:
32411:  2207:   315: :gitpush
32412:  2208:   316: cls
32413:  2209:   317: echo GitHub: https://github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%
32414:  2210:   318: echo.
32415:  2211:   319: set /p msg=Commit message:
32416:  2212:   320: if "%msg%"=="" set msg="Project update"
32417:  2213:   321: echo.
32418:  2214:   322: git add .
32419:  2215:   323: git commit -m "%msg%"
32420:  2216:   324: git push
32421:  2217:   325: echo.
32422:  2218:   326: echo Verify commit: https://github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%/commits/main
32423:  2219:   327: echo.
32424:  2220:   328: pause
32425:  2221:   329: goto menu
32426:  2222:   330:
32427:  2223:   331: :githubrepo
32428:  2224:   332: cls
32429:  2225:   333: echo ========================================
32430:  2226:   334: echo   PUBLISH TO GITHUB REPOSITORY
32431:  2227:   335: echo ========================================
32432:  2228:   336: echo.
32433:  2229:   337: echo Repository: %GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%
32434:  2230:   338: echo URL: https://github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%
32435:  2231:   339: echo.
32436:  2232:   340:
32437:  2233:   341: rem Check if Git is installed
32438:  2234:   342: git --version >nul 2>&1
32439:  2235:   343: if errorlevel 1 (
32440:  2236:   344:     echo ERROR: Git is not installed or not in PATH
32441:  2237:   345:     echo Please install Git from: https://git-scm.com/downloads
32442:  2238:   346:     echo.
32443:  2239:   347:     pause
32444:  2240:   348:     goto menu
32445:  2241:   349: )
32446:  2242:   350:
32447:  2243:   351: rem Check if GitHub token is set
32448:  2244:   352: if "%GITHUB_TOKEN%"=="" (
32449:  2245:   353:     echo GITHUB_TOKEN is not configured.
32450:  2246:   354:     echo.
32451:  2247:   355:     echo To create a GitHub token:
32452:  2248:   356:     echo 1. Go to https://github.com/settings/tokens
32453:  2249:   357:     echo 2. Click "Generate new token (classic)"
32454:  2250:   358:     echo 3. Give it a name
32455:  2251:   359:     echo 4. Select "repo" (FULL scope)
32456:  2252:   360:     echo 5. Click "Generate token"
32457:  2253:   361:     echo 6. Copy the token (starts with 'ghp_')
32458:  2254:   362:     echo.
32459:  2255:   363:     set /p GITHUB_TOKEN=Enter your GitHub token:
32460:  2256:   364:     if "%GITHUB_TOKEN%"=="" (
32461:  2257:   365:         echo No token entered. Operation cancelled.
32462:  2258:   366:         echo.
32463:  2259:   367:         pause
32464:  2260:   368:         goto menu
32465:  2261:   369:     )
32466:  2262:   370: )
32467:  2263:   371:
32468:  2264:   372: rem Configure remote URL with token
32469:  2265:   373: echo Configuring Git remote with token...
32470:  2266:   374: git remote remove origin 2>nul
32471:  2267:   375: git remote add origin https://x-access-token:%GITHUB_TOKEN%@github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%.git
32472:  2268:   376:
32473:  2269:   377: if errorlevel 1 (
32474:  2270:   378:     echo ERROR: Failed to configure Git remote
32475:  2271:   379:     echo.
32476:  2272:   380:     pause
32477:  2273:   381:     goto menu
32478:  2274:   382: )
32479:  2275:   383:
32480:  2276:   384: rem Configure Git user
32481:  2277:   385: echo Configuring Git user...
32482:  2278:   386: git config user.name "%GITHUB_USERNAME%"
32483:  2279:   387: git config user.email "%GITHUB_USERNAME%@users.noreply.github.com"
32484:  2280:   388:
32485:  2281:   389: rem Add all files
32486:  2282:   390: echo Adding files to Git...
32487:  2283:   391: git add .
32488:  2284:   392:
32489:  2285:   393: rem Commit
32490:  2286:   394: set /p commit_msg=Enter commit message (press Enter for default):
32491:  2287:   395: if "%commit_msg%"=="" set commit_msg="üöÄ Automated publication: Structured Lending Protocol - %date% %time%"
32492:  2288:   396: echo Committing with message: %commit_msg%
32493:  2289:   397: git commit -m "%commit_msg%"
32494:  2290:   398:
32495:  2291:   399: rem Push to GitHub
32496:  2292:   400: echo Pushing to GitHub repository...
32497:  2293:   401: git branch -M main
32498:  2294:   402: git push -u origin main --force
32499:  2295:   403:
32500:  2296:   404: if errorlevel 1 (
32501:  2297:   405:     echo ERROR: Failed to push to GitHub
32502:  2298:   406:     echo Check your token permissions and repository access
32503:  2299:   407:     echo.
32504:  2300:   408:
32505:  2301:   409:     rem Try alternative method
32506:  2302:   410:     echo Trying alternative authentication method...
32507:  2303:   411:     git remote remove origin
32508:  2304:   412:     git remote add origin https://%GITHUB_USERNAME%:%GITHUB_TOKEN%@github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%.git
32509:  2305:   413:     git push -u origin main --force
32510:  2306:   414:
32511:  2307:   415:     if errorlevel 1 (
32512:  2308:   416:         echo ERROR: All authentication methods failed
32513:  2309:   417:         echo Please verify:
32514:  2310:   418:         echo 1. Token has "repo" permissions
32515:  2311:   419:         echo 2. Repository exists: %GITHUB_REPO%
32516:  2312:   420:         echo 3. Token is not expired
32517:  2313:   421:         echo.
32518:  2314:   422:     ) else (
32519:  2315:   423:         echo SUCCESS: Repository published successfully!
32520:  2316:   424:         echo URL: https://github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%
32521:  2317:   425:     )
32522:  2318:   426: ) else (
32523:  2319:   427:     echo SUCCESS: Repository published successfully!
32524:  2320:   428:     echo URL: https://github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%
32525:  2321:   429:     echo.
32526:  2322:   430:     echo Check your repository at:
32527:  2323:   431:     echo https://github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%
32528:  2324:   432: )
32529:  2325:   433:
32530:  2326:   434: rem Clear token from memory for security
32531:  2327:   435: set GITHUB_TOKEN=
32532:  2328:   436: echo.
32533:  2329:   437: pause
32534:  2330:   438: goto menu
32535:  2331:   439:
32536:  2332:   440: :githubgists
32537:  2333:   441: cls
32538:  2334:   442: echo ========================================
32539:  2335:   443: echo   SHARE TO GITHUB GISTS
32540:  2336:   444: echo ========================================
32541:  2337:   445: echo.
32542:  2338:   446: echo Gists are like pastebin but integrated with GitHub
32543:  2339:   447: echo Each file can be up to 1MB
32544:  2340:   448: echo.
32545:  2341:   449:
32546:  2342:   450: rem Check if curl is installed
32547:  2343:   451: where curl >nul 2>&1
32548:  2344:   452: if errorlevel 1 (
32549:  2345:   453:     echo ERROR: curl is not installed or not in PATH
32550:  2346:   454:     echo Please install curl or use Windows PowerShell alternative
32551:  2347:   455:     echo.
32552:  2348:   456:     pause
32553:  2349:   457:     goto menu
32554:  2350:   458: )
32555:  2351:   459:
32556:  2352:   460: rem Check if GitHub token is set
32557:  2353:   461: if "%GITHUB_TOKEN%"=="" (
32558:  2354:   462:     echo GITHUB_TOKEN is not configured.
32559:  2355:   463:     echo.
32560:  2356:   464:     echo To create a GitHub token:
32561:  2357:   465:     echo 1. Go to https://github.com/settings/tokens
32562:  2358:   466:     echo 2. Click "Generate new token (classic)"
32563:  2359:   467:     echo 3. Give it a name
32564:  2360:   468:     echo 4. Select "gist" permission
32565:  2361:   469:     echo 5. Click "Generate token"
32566:  2362:   470:     echo 6. Copy the token (starts with 'ghp_')
32567:  2363:   471:     echo.
32568:  2364:   472:     set /p GITHUB_TOKEN=Enter your GitHub token (with gist permission):
32569:  2365:   473:     if "%GITHUB_TOKEN%"=="" (
32570:  2366:   474:         echo No token entered. Operation cancelled.
32571:  2367:   475:         echo.
32572:  2368:   476:         pause
32573:  2369:   477:         goto menu
32574:  2370:   478:     )
32575:  2371:   479: )
32576:  2372:   480:
32577:  2373:   481: echo Checking GitHub token...
32578:  2374:   482: curl -s -H "Authorization: token %GITHUB_TOKEN%" https://api.github.com/user > temp_user.json
32579:  2375:   483: findstr "login" temp_user.json >nul
32580:  2376:   484: if errorlevel 1 (
32581:  2377:   485:     echo ERROR: Invalid GitHub token or no permission
32582:  2378:   486:     echo Please verify:
32583:  2379:   487:     echo 1. Token has "gist" permission
32584:  2380:   488:     echo 2. Token is not expired
32585:  2381:   489:     echo 3. Token starts with "ghp_"
32586:  2382:   490:     echo.
32587:  2383:   491:     del temp_user.json 2>nul
32588:  2384:   492:     pause
32589:  2385:   493:     goto menu
32590:  2386:   494: )
32591:  2387:   495:
32592:  2388:   496: for /f "tokens=2 delims=:," %%a in ('findstr "login" temp_user.json') do set github_login=%%a
32593:  2389:   497: set github_login=%github_login:"=%
32594:  2390:   498: set github_login=%github_login: =%
32595:  2391:   499: del temp_user.json 2>nul
32596:  2392:   500:
32597:  2393:   501: echo Token valid for user: %github_login%
32598:  2394:   502: echo.
32599:  2395:   503:
32600:  2396:   504: rem Check if share files exist
32601:  2397:   505: if not exist "PROJECT_SHARE.txt" (
32602:  2398:   506:     echo PROJECT_SHARE.txt not found.
32603:  2399:   507:     echo Would you like to create it first? (Y/N)
32604:  2400:   508:     set /p create_choice=
32605:  2401:   509:     if /i "%create_choice%"=="Y" goto fullshare
32606:  2402:   510:     echo Operation cancelled.
32607:  2403:   511:     echo.
32608:  2404:   512:     pause
32609:  2405:   513:     goto menu
32610:  2406:   514: )
32611:  2407:   515:
32612:  2408:   516: rem Read the file and check size
32613:  2409:   517: for %%F in ("PROJECT_SHARE.txt") do set filesize=%%~zF
32614:  2410:   518: set /a filesize_kb=%filesize%/1024
32615:  2411:   519: set /a filesize_mb=%filesize_kb%/1024
32616:  2412:   520:
32617:  2413:   521: echo File: PROJECT_SHARE.txt
32618:  2414:   522: echo Size: %filesize% bytes (%filesize_kb% KB, %filesize_mb% MB)
32619:  2415:   523: echo.
32620:  2416:   524:
32621:  2417:   525: if %filesize% gtr 1000000 (
32622:  2418:   526:     echo WARNING: File is larger than 1MB (%filesize_mb%.%filesize_kb% MB)
32623:  2419:   527:     echo Gists have a 1MB limit per file.
32624:  2420:   528:     echo.
32625:  2421:   529:     echo Options:
32626:  2422:   530:     echo 1. Split file into multiple parts (recommended)
32627:  2423:   531:     echo 2. Try to upload anyway (may fail)
32628:  2424:   532:     echo 3. Cancel
32629:  2425:   533:     echo.
32630:  2426:   534:     set /p split_choice=Choose option (1-3):
32631:  2427:   535:
32632:  2428:   536:     if "%split_choice%"=="1" goto splitfile
32633:  2429:   537:     if "%split_choice%"=="3" goto menu
32634:  2430:   538: )
32635:  2431:   539:
32636:  2432:   540: rem Prepare file content for JSON
32637:  2433:   541: echo Preparing file content for upload...
32638:  2434:   542: powershell -Command "(Get-Content -Path 'PROJECT_SHARE.txt' -Raw) -replace '\"', '\"' -replace '\\', '\\' -replace '`t', '\t' -replace '`r`n', '\n' | Set-Content -Path 'temp_content.txt' -Force"
32639:  2435:   543:
32640:  2436:   544: rem Create JSON payload
32641:  2437:   545: echo Creating Gist...
32642:  2438:   546: (
32643:  2439:   547: echo {
32644:  2440:   548: echo   "description": "Structured Lending Protocol - Full Project Share ^(%date% ^)",
32645:  2441:   549: echo   "public": false,
32646:  2442:   550: echo   "files": {
32647:  2443:   551: echo     "PROJECT_SHARE.txt": {
32648:  2444:   552: echo       "content":
32649:  2445:   553: ) > temp_payload.json
32650:  2446:   554:
32651:  2447:   555: type temp_content.txt >> temp_payload.json
32652:  2448:   556:
32653:  2449:   557: (
32654:  2450:   558: echo
32655:  2451:   559: echo     }
32656:  2452:   560: echo   }
32657:  2453:   561: echo }
32658:  2454:   562: ) >> temp_payload.json
32659:  2455:   563:
32660:  2456:   564: rem Upload to GitHub Gists
32661:  2457:   565: echo Uploading to GitHub Gists...
32662:  2458:   566: curl -s -X POST ^
32663:  2459:   567:   -H "Authorization: token %GITHUB_TOKEN%" ^
32664:  2460:   568:   -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" ^
32665:  2461:   569:   https://api.github.com/gists ^
32666:  2462:   570:   -d @temp_payload.json > temp_response.json
32667:  2463:   571:
32668:  2464:   572: rem Check response
32669:  2465:   573: findstr "html_url" temp_response.json >nul
32670:  2466:   574: if errorlevel 1 (
32671:  2467:   575:     echo ERROR: Failed to create Gist
32672:  2468:   576:     echo Response:
32673:  2469:   577:     type temp_response.json
32674:  2470:   578:     echo.
32675:  2471:   579:
32676:  2472:   580:     rem Try to parse error
32677:  2473:   581:     for /f "tokens=2 delims=:," %%a in ('findstr "message" temp_response.json') do (
32678:  2474:   582:         set error_msg=%%a
32679:  2475:   583:         set error_msg=!error_msg:"=!
32680:  2476:   584:         echo Error: !error_msg!
32681:  2477:   585:     )
32682:  2478:   586: ) else (
32683:  2479:   587:     for /f "tokens=2 delims=:," %%a in ('findstr "html_url" temp_response.json') do (
32684:  2480:   588:         set gist_url=%%a
32685:  2481:   589:         set gist_url=!gist_url:"=!
32686:  2482:   590:         set gist_url=!gist_url: =!
32687:  2483:   591:     )
32688:  2484:   592:
32689:  2485:   593:     echo SUCCESS: Gist created successfully!
32690:  2486:   594:     echo.
32691:  2487:   595:     echo Gist URL: !gist_url!
32692:  2488:   596:     echo.
32693:  2489:   597:     echo You can share this URL for code review.
32694:  2490:   598:
32695:  2491:   599:     rem Save Gist info to file
32696:  2492:   600:     echo Gist URL: !gist_url! > GIST_INFO.txt
32697:  2493:   601:     echo Created: %date% %time% >> GIST_INFO.txt
32698:  2494:   602:     echo Description: Structured Lending Protocol - Full Project Share >> GIST_INFO.txt
32699:  2495:   603:     echo File: PROJECT_SHARE.txt >> GIST_INFO.txt
32700:  2496:   604:     echo.
32701:  2497:   605:     echo Gist information saved to: GIST_INFO.txt
32702:  2498:   606: )
32703:  2499:   607:
32704:  2500:   608: rem Cleanup
32705:  2501:   609: del temp_content.txt 2>nul
32706:  2502:   610: del temp_payload.json 2>nul
32707:  2503:   611: del temp_response.json 2>nul
32708:  2504:   612: set GITHUB_TOKEN=
32709:  2505:   613:
32710:  2506:   614: echo.
32711:  2507:   615: pause
32712:  2508:   616: goto menu
32713:  2509:   617:
32714:  2510:   618: :splitfile
32715:  2511:   619: cls
32716:  2512:   620: echo ========================================
32717:  2513:   621: echo   SPLIT FILE FOR GITHUB GISTS
32718:  2514:   622: echo ========================================
32719:  2515:   623: echo.
32720:  2516:   624: echo Splitting PROJECT_SHARE.txt for GitHub Gists...
32721:  2517:   625: echo Gist limit: 1MB per file
32722:  2518:   626: echo.
32723:  2519:   627:
32724:  2520:   628: rem Calculate number of parts needed
32725:  2521:   629: set /a parts_needed=(%filesize% / 1000000) + 1
32726:  2522:   630: echo File size: %filesize% bytes
32727:  2523:   631: echo Parts needed: %parts_needed%
32728:  2524:   632: echo.
32729:  2525:   633:
32730:  2526:   634: set /p gist_desc=Enter description for Gists:
32731:  2527:   635: if "%gist_desc%"=="" set gist_desc="Structured Lending Protocol - Part"
32732:  2528:   636:
32733:  2529:   637: echo Creating %parts_needed% parts...
32734:  2530:   638: set part_num=1
32735:  2531:   639: set current_line=1
32736:  2532:   640: set total_lines=0
32737:  2533:   641:
32738:  2534:   642: rem Count total lines first
32739:  2535:   643: for /f %%i in ('type "PROJECT_SHARE.txt" ^| find /c /v ""') do set total_lines=%%i
32740:  2536:   644: set /a lines_per_part=%total_lines% / %parts_needed%
32741:  2537:   645:
32742:  2538:   646: echo Total lines: %total_lines%
32743:  2539:   647: echo Lines per part: %lines_per_part%
32744:  2540:   648: echo.
32745:  2541:   649:
32746:  2542:   650: :splitloop
32747:  2543:   651: if %part_num% gtr %parts_needed% goto splitdone
32748:  2544:   652:
32749:  2545:   653: set start_line=%current_line%
32750:  2546:   654: set /a end_line=%current_line% + %lines_per_part% - 1
32751:  2547:   655: if %end_line% gtr %total_lines% set end_line=%total_lines%
32752:  2548:   656:
32753:  2549:   657: echo Creating part %part_num%: lines %start_line%-%end_line%
32754:  2550:   658:
32755:  2551:   659: rem Extract part using PowerShell
32756:  2552:   660: powershell -Command "Get-Content -Path 'PROJECT_SHARE.txt' -TotalCount %end_line% | Select-Object -Last %lines_per_part% | Set-Content -Path 'PROJECT_SHARE_PART%part_num%.txt' -Force"
32757:  2553:   661:
32758:  2554:   662: rem Upload this part to Gist
32759:  2555:   663: echo Uploading part %part_num% to Gist...
32760:  2556:   664: powershell -Command "(Get-Content -Path 'PROJECT_SHARE_PART%part_num%.txt' -Raw) -replace '\"', '\"' -replace '\\', '\\' -replace '`t', '\t' -replace '`r`n', '\n' | Set-Content -Path 'temp_content_part.txt' -Force"
32761:  2557:   665:
32762:  2558:   666: (
32763:  2559:   667: echo {
32764:  2560:   668: echo   "description": "%gist_desc% %part_num%/%parts_needed%",
32765:  2561:   669: echo   "public": false,
32766:  2562:   670: echo   "files": {
32767:  2563:   671: echo     "PROJECT_SHARE_PART%part_num%.txt": {
32768:  2564:   672: echo       "content":
32769:  2565:   673: ) > temp_payload_part.json
32770:  2566:   674:
32771:  2567:   675: type temp_content_part.txt >> temp_payload_part.json
32772:  2568:   676:
32773:  2569:   677: (
32774:  2570:   678: echo
32775:  2571:   679: echo     }
32776:  2572:   680: echo   }
32777:  2573:   681: echo }
32778:  2574:   682: ) >> temp_payload_part.json
32779:  2575:   683:
32780:  2576:   684: curl -s -X POST ^
32781:  2577:   685:   -H "Authorization: token %GITHUB_TOKEN%" ^
32782:  2578:   686:   -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" ^
32783:  2579:   687:   https://api.github.com/gists ^
32784:  2580:   688:   -d @temp_payload_part.json > temp_response_part.json
32785:  2581:   689:
32786:  2582:   690: findstr "html_url" temp_response_part.json >nul
32787:  2583:   691: if errorlevel 1 (
32788:  2584:   692:     echo ERROR: Failed to create Gist for part %part_num%
32789:  2585:   693: ) else (
32790:  2586:   694:     for /f "tokens=2 delims=:," %%a in ('findstr "html_url" temp_response_part.json') do (
32791:  2587:   695:         set gist_url_part=%%a
32792:  2588:   696:         set gist_url_part=!gist_url_part:"=!
32793:  2589:   697:         set gist_url_part=!gist_url_part: =!
32794:  2590:   698:     )
32795:  2591:   699:     echo SUCCESS: Part %part_num% created: !gist_url_part!
32796:  2592:   700:
32797:  2593:   701:     rem Save Gist URL
32798:  2594:   702:     echo Part %part_num%: !gist_url_part! >> GISTS_INDEX.txt
32799:  2595:   703: )
32800:  2596:   704:
32801:  2597:   705: rem Cleanup for this part
32802:  2598:   706: del temp_content_part.txt 2>nul
32803:  2599:   707: del temp_payload_part.json 2>nul
32804:  2600:   708: del temp_response_part.json 2>nul
32805:  2601:   709:
32806:  2602:   710: set /a current_line=%end_line% + 1
32807:  2603:   711: set /a part_num+=1
32808:  2604:   712: goto splitloop
32809:  2605:   713:
32810:  2606:   714: :splitdone
32811:  2607:   715: echo.
32812:  2608:   716: echo All parts created successfully!
32813:  2609:   717: if exist "GISTS_INDEX.txt" (
32814:  2610:   718:     echo.
32815:  2611:   719:     echo Gist URLs saved to: GISTS_INDEX.txt
32816:  2612:   720:     echo.
32817:  2613:   721:     type GISTS_INDEX.txt
32818:  2614:   722: )
32819:  2615:   723:
32820:  2616:   724: rem Create master index
32821:  2617:   725: echo Creating master index file...
32822:  2618:   726: (
32823:  2619:   727: echo ========================================
32824:  2620:   728: echo   GITHUB GISTS INDEX
32825:  2621:   729: echo ========================================
32826:  2622:   730: echo Project: Structured Lending Protocol
32827:  2623:   731: echo Split into: %parts_needed% parts
32828:  2624:   732: echo Date: %date% Time: %time%
32829:  2625:   733: echo.
32830:  2626:   734: echo GIST URLs:
32831:  2627:   735: echo.
32832:  2628:   736: ) > GISTS_MASTER_INDEX.txt
32833:  2629:   737:
32834:  2630:   738: if exist "GISTS_INDEX.txt" type GISTS_INDEX.txt >> GISTS_MASTER_INDEX.txt
32835:  2631:   739:
32836:  2632:   740: echo.
32837:  2633:   741: echo Master index saved to: GISTS_MASTER_INDEX.txt
32838:  2634:   742: echo.
32839:  2635:   743:
32840:  2636:   744: rem Cleanup part files
32841:  2637:   745: for /l %%i in (1,1,%parts_needed%) do (
32842:  2638:   746:     del PROJECT_SHARE_PART%%i.txt 2>nul
32843:  2639:   747: )
32844:  2640:   748:
32845:  2641:   749: set GITHUB_TOKEN=
32846:  2642:   750: pause
32847:  2643:   751: goto menu
32848:  2644: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
32849:  2645:
32850:  2646: SCRIPT 7 | ShareSplit1M-option2et3a implementer.ps1
32851:  2647: Size: 12525 bytes | Type: .ps1 | Modified: 2026-01-21 19:37:49.515099
32852:  2648: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
32853:  2649:     1: # ShareSplit1M_Working.ps1
32854:  2650:     2: # ============================================================================
32855:  2651:     3: # CONFIGURATION
32856:  2652:     4: # ============================================================================
32857:  2653:     5: # Lecture de la configuration
32858:  2654:     6: $configPath = ".\..\project_config.json"
32859:  2655:     7: if (Test-Path $configPath) {
32860:  2656:     8:     $config = Get-Content $configPath -Raw | ConvertFrom-Json
32861:  2657:     9:     $PROJECT_NAME = $config.PROJECT_NAME
32862:  2658:    10:     $PROJECT_PATH = $config.PROJECT_PATH
32863:  2659:    11:     $GITHUB_TOKEN = $config.GITHUB_TOKEN
32864:  2660:    12:     $GITHUB_USERNAME = $config.GITHUB_USERNAME
32865:  2661:    13:     $GITHUB_REPO_NAME = $config.GITHUB_REPO_NAME
32866:  2662:    14:     $GITHUB_REPO_PRIVATE = $config.GITHUB_REPO_PRIVATE
32867:  2663:    15:     $GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION = $config.GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION
32868:  2664:    16: } else {
32869:  2665:    17:     Write-Host "Fichier de configuration non trouv√©. Utilisation des valeurs par d√©faut." -ForegroundColor Yellow
32870:  2666:    18:     $PROJECT_NAME = "MonProjet"
32871:  2667:    19:     $PROJECT_PATH = "."
32872:  2668:    20:     $GITHUB_TOKEN = ""
32873:  2669:    21:     $GITHUB_USERNAME = ""
32874:  2670:    22:     $GITHUB_REPO_NAME = ""
32875:  2671:    23:     $GITHUB_REPO_PRIVATE = $false
32876:  2672:    24:     $GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION = "Projet partag√© automatiquement"
32877:  2673:    25: }
32878:  2674:    26:
32879:  2675:    27: # ============================================================================
32880:  2676:    28: # FONCTION POUR PUBLIER SUR GITHUB REPOSITORY - VERSION FONCTIONNELLE
32881:  2677:    29: # ============================================================================
32882:  2678:    30: function Publish-ToGitHubRepo-Working {
32883:  2679:    31:     param(
32884:  2680:    32:         [string]$Token,
32885:  2681:    33:         [string]$Username,
32886:  2682:    34:         [string]$RepoName,
32887:  2683:    35:         [string]$Description,
32888:  2684:    36:         [bool]$IsPrivate
32889:  2685:    37:     )
32890:  2686:    38:
32891:  2687:    39:     Write-Host "`n=== PUBLICATION SUR GITHUB REPOSITORY ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
32892:  2688:    40:
32893:  2689:    41:     # CRITIQUE: V√©rifier que nous sommes dans le bon r√©pertoire
32894:  2690:    42:     Write-Host "V√©rification du r√©pertoire..." -NoNewline
32895:  2691:    43:     $currentDir = Get-Location
32896:  2692:    44:     $projectDir = Resolve-Path $PROJECT_PATH -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
32897:  2693:    45:
32898:  2694:    46:     if ($currentDir.Path -ne $projectDir.Path) {
32899:  2695:    47:         Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
32900:  2696:    48:         Write-Host "ERREUR: Vous devez √™tre dans le dossier du projet!" -ForegroundColor Red
32901:  2697:    49:         Write-Host "Actuel: $currentDir" -ForegroundColor Yellow
32902:  2698:    50:         Write-Host "Projet: $projectDir" -ForegroundColor Yellow
32903:  2699:    51:         Write-Host "Ex√©cutez: cd '$PROJECT_PATH'" -ForegroundColor Cyan
32904:  2700:    52:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Mauvais r√©pertoire" }
32905:  2701:    53:     }
32906:  2702:    54:     Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
32907:  2703:    55:
32908:  2704:    56:     # CRITIQUE: V√©rifier le token
32909:  2705:    57:     if ([string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($Token) -or $Token -notmatch "^ghp_[a-zA-Z0-9]{36,}$") {
32910:  2706:    58:         Write-Host "‚ùå Token invalide ou manquant" -ForegroundColor Red
32911:  2707:    59:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Token GitHub invalide" }
32912:  2708:    60:     }
32913:  2709:    61:
32914:  2710:    62:     # CRITIQUE: V√©rifier que Git est install√©
32915:  2711:    63:     try {
32916:  2712:    64:         git --version | Out-Null
32917:  2713:    65:     } catch {
32918:  2714:    66:         Write-Host "‚ùå Git non install√©" -ForegroundColor Red
32919:  2715:    67:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Git non install√©" }
32920:  2716:    68:     }
32921:  2717:    69:
32922:  2718:    70:     # CRITIQUE: Nettoyer la configuration Git
32923:  2719:    71:     Write-Host "Nettoyage Git..." -NoNewline
32924:  2720:    72:     git config --global --unset credential.helper 2>$null
32925:  2721:    73:     git config --global credential.helper "" 2>$null
32926:  2722:    74:     Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
32927:  2723:    75:
32928:  2724:    76:     try {
32929:  2725:    77:         # CRITIQUE: Initialiser Git si n√©cessaire
32930:  2726:    78:         if (-not (Test-Path ".git")) {
32931:  2727:    79:             Write-Host "Initialisation Git..." -NoNewline
32932:  2728:    80:             git init
32933:  2729:    81:             Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
32934:  2730:    82:         } else {
32935:  2731:    83:             Write-Host "‚úì Git d√©j√† initialis√©" -ForegroundColor Gray
32936:  2732:    84:         }
32937:  2733:    85:
32938:  2734:    86:         # CRITIQUE: Configurer Git
32939:  2735:    87:         Write-Host "Configuration Git..." -NoNewline
32940:  2736:    88:         git config user.name "$Username"
32941:  2737:    89:         git config user.email "$Username@users.noreply.github.com"
32942:  2738:    90:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
32943:  2739:    91:
32944:  2740:    92:         # CRITIQUE: Cr√©er le .gitignore pour exclure les fichiers sensibles
32945:  2741:    93:         $gitignoreContent = @"
32946:  2742:    94: # Fichiers sensibles
32947:  2743:    95: project_config.json
32948:  2744:    96: *.backup
32949:  2745:    97: *.bak
32950:  2746:    98:
32951:  2747:    99: # Fichiers g√©n√©r√©s
32952:  2748:   100: PROJECT_SHARE_*
32953:  2749:   101: GISTS_INDEX*
32954:  2750:   102: GITHUB_PUBLISH_*
32955:  2751:   103:
32956:  2752:   104: # Dossiers syst√®me
32957:  2753:   105: node_modules/
32958:  2754:   106: .vscode/
32959:  2755:   107: .idea/
32960:  2756:   108: __pycache__/
32961:  2757:   109: .env
32962:  2758:   110: "@
32963:  2759:   111:         $gitignoreContent | Out-File ".gitignore" -Encoding UTF8
32964:  2760:   112:
32965:  2761:   113:         # CRITIQUE: Pr√©parer l'URL avec le token
32966:  2762:   114:         $remoteUrl = "https://x-access-token:${Token}@github.com/${Username}/${RepoName}.git"
32967:  2763:   115:         Write-Host "Remote: https://github.com/${Username}/${RepoName}" -ForegroundColor Gray
32968:  2764:   116:
32969:  2765:   117:         # CRITIQUE: G√©rer le remote
32970:  2766:   118:         git remote remove origin 2>$null
32971:  2767:   119:         git remote add origin $remoteUrl
32972:  2768:   120:
32973:  2769:   121:         # Ajouter tous les fichiers
32974:  2770:   122:         Write-Host "Ajout fichiers..." -NoNewline
32975:  2771:   123:         git add .
32976:  2772:   124:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
32977:  2773:   125:
32978:  2774:   126:         # Commit
32979:  2775:   127:         Write-Host "Commit..." -NoNewline
32980:  2776:   128:         $commitMsg = "üöÄ Publication: $PROJECT_NAME - $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')"
32981:  2777:   129:         git commit -m $commitMsg --quiet
32982:  2778:   130:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
32983:  2779:   131:
32984:  2780:   132:         # CRITIQUE: Cr√©er la branche main
32985:  2781:   133:         Write-Host "Branche..." -NoNewline
32986:  2782:   134:         git branch -M main
32987:  2783:   135:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
32988:  2784:   136:
32989:  2785:   137:         # CORRECTION: Push avec l'approche en deux √©tapes
32990:  2786:   138:         Write-Host "Push vers GitHub..." -NoNewline
32991:  2787:   139:         # D√©sactiver les prompts
32992:  2788:   140:         $env:GIT_TERMINAL_PROMPT = "0"
32993:  2789:   141:
32994:  2790:   142:         # Premi√®re tentative : push normal
32995:  2791:   143:         $pushOutput = git push -u origin main 2>&1
32996:  2792:   144:
32997:  2793:   145:         # Si √©chec avec erreur d'histoires non li√©es, essayer avec --force
32998:  2794:   146:         if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) {
32999:  2795:   147:             if ($pushOutput -match "failed to push some refs" -or $pushOutput -match "unrelated histories" -or $pushOutput -match "non-fast-forward") {
33000:  2796:   148:                 Write-Host " (tentative avec --force)..." -NoNewline -ForegroundColor Yellow
33001:  2797:   149:                 $pushOutput = git push -u origin main --force 2>&1
33002:  2798:   150:             }
33003:  2799:   151:         }
33004:  2800:   152:
33005:  2801:   153:         if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
33006:  2802:   154:             Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
33007:  2803:   155:             Write-Host "‚úÖ PUBLICATION R√âUSSIE !" -ForegroundColor Green
33008:  2804:   156:             Write-Host "üîó https://github.com/$Username/$RepoName" -ForegroundColor Cyan
33009:  2805:   157:             return @{
33010:  2806:   158:                 success = $true
33011:  2807:   159:                 repo_url = "https://github.com/$Username/$RepoName"
33012:  2808:   160:                 message = "Publication r√©ussie"
33013:  2809:   161:             }
33014:  2810:   162:         } else {
33015:  2811:   163:             Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
33016:  2812:   164:             # Analyser l'erreur
33017:  2813:   165:             $errorMsg = "Erreur Git"
33018:  2814:   166:             if ($pushOutput -match "Authentication failed") {
33019:  2815:   167:                 $errorMsg = "Token invalide - Reg√©n√©rez-le sur GitHub"
33020:  2816:   168:             } elseif ($pushOutput -match "Repository not found") {
33021:  2817:   169:                 $errorMsg = "Repository non trouv√© - Cr√©ez-le d'abord sur GitHub"
33022:  2818:   170:             } elseif ($pushOutput -match "GH013" -or $pushOutput -match "secret") {
33023:  2819:   171:                 $errorMsg = "GitHub a bloqu√© le push (secret d√©tect√©) - Autorisez-le sur GitHub"
33024:  2820:   172:             } else {
33025:  2821:   173:                 $errorMsg = "Erreur: $($pushOutput | Select-Object -First 2)"
33026:  2822:   174:             }
33027:  2823:   175:             Write-Host "‚ùå $errorMsg" -ForegroundColor Red
33028:  2824:   176:             return @{
33029:  2825:   177:                 success = $false
33030:  2826:   178:                 error = $errorMsg
33031:  2827:   179:                 git_output = $pushOutput
33032:  2828:   180:             }
33033:  2829:   181:         }
33034:  2830:   182:     } catch {
33035:  2831:   183:         Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
33036:  2832:   184:         Write-Host "‚ùå Erreur inattendue: $_" -ForegroundColor Red
33037:  2833:   185:         return @{
33038:  2834:   186:             success = $false
33039:  2835:   187:             error = $_.Exception.Message
33040:  2836:   188:         }
33041:  2837:   189:     }
33042:  2838:   190: }
33043:  2839:   191:
33044:  2840:   192: # ============================================================================
33045:  2841:   193: # MENU PRINCIPAL FONCTIONNEL
33046:  2842:   194: # ============================================================================
33047:  2843:   195: function Show-MainMenu {
33048:  2844:   196:     Clear-Host
33049:  2845:   197:     Write-Host ""
33050:  2846:   198:     Write-Host "=" * 60 -ForegroundColor Cyan
33051:  2847:   199:     Write-Host "SHARE SPLIT 1M - $PROJECT_NAME" -ForegroundColor Cyan
33052:  2848:   200:     Write-Host "=" * 60 -ForegroundColor Cyan
33053:  2849:   201:     Write-Host ""
33054:  2850:   202:     Write-Host "=== MENU PRINCIPAL ===" -ForegroundColor Yellow
33055:  2851:   203:     Write-Host "1. Publier sur GitHub Repository" -ForegroundColor Green
33056:  2852:   204:     Write-Host "2. Partager sur GitHub Gists" -ForegroundColor Yellow
33057:  2853:   205:     Write-Host "3. G√©n√©rer seulement les fichiers locaux" -ForegroundColor Yellow
33058:  2854:   206:     Write-Host "4. Quitter" -ForegroundColor Red
33059:  2855:   207:     Write-Host ""
33060:  2856:   208:     $choice = Read-Host "Votre choix [1-4]"
33061:  2857:   209:
33062:  2858:   210:     switch ($choice) {
33063:  2859:   211:         '1' {
33064:  2860:   212:             Write-Host "`n=== PUBLICATION GITHUB REPOSITORY ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
33065:  2861:   213:
33066:  2862:   214:             # V√©rifier le token
33067:  2863:   215:             if (-not $GITHUB_TOKEN -or $GITHUB_TOKEN -eq "*** REMOVED FOR SECURITY ***") {
33068:  2864:   216:                 Write-Host "üîë TOKEN GITHUB REQUIS" -ForegroundColor Yellow
33069:  2865:   217:                 Write-Host "Collez votre token GitHub (commence par 'ghp_'):"
33070:  2866:   218:                 $GITHUB_TOKEN = Read-Host
33071:  2867:   219:             }
33072:  2868:   220:
33073:  2869:   221:             # V√©rifier les autres informations
33074:  2870:   222:             if (-not $GITHUB_USERNAME) {
33075:  2871:   223:                 $GITHUB_USERNAME = Read-Host "Nom d'utilisateur GitHub"
33076:  2872:   224:             }
33077:  2873:   225:             if (-not $GITHUB_REPO_NAME) {
33078:  2874:   226:                 $GITHUB_REPO_NAME = Read-Host "Nom du repository"
33079:  2875:   227:             }
33080:  2876:   228:
33081:  2877:   229:             # CRITIQUE: S'assurer d'√™tre dans le bon r√©pertoire
33082:  2878:   230:             Write-Host "`nV√©rification du r√©pertoire..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
33083:  2879:   231:             if ((Get-Location).Path -ne (Resolve-Path $PROJECT_PATH).Path) {
33084:  2880:   232:                 Write-Host "ATTENTION: Vous devez √™tre dans: $PROJECT_PATH" -ForegroundColor Red
33085:  2881:   233:                 Write-Host "Ex√©cutez d'abord: cd '$PROJECT_PATH'" -ForegroundColor Cyan
33086:  2882:   234:                 Read-Host "Appuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
33087:  2883:   235:                 return
33088:  2884:   236:             }
33089:  2885:   237:
33090:  2886:   238:             # Ex√©cuter la publication
33091:  2887:   239:             $result = Publish-ToGitHubRepo-Working -Token $GITHUB_TOKEN `
33092:  2888:   240:                 -Username $GITHUB_USERNAME `
33093:  2889:   241:                 -RepoName $GITHUB_REPO_NAME `
33094:  2890:   242:                 -Description $GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION `
33095:  2891:   243:                 -IsPrivate $GITHUB_REPO_PRIVATE
33096:  2892:   244:
33097:  2893:   245:             if ($result.success) {
33098:  2894:   246:                 Write-Host ""
33099:  2895:   247:                 Write-Host "‚úÖ Publication r√©ussie sur GitHub!" -ForegroundColor Green
33100:  2896:   248:                 Write-Host "Repository: $($result.repo_url)" -ForegroundColor Cyan
33101:  2897:   249:             } else {
33102:  2898:   250:                 Write-Host ""
33103:  2899:   251:                 Write-Host "‚ùå √âchec de la publication" -ForegroundColor Red
33104:  2900:   252:                 Write-Host "Erreur: $($result.error)" -ForegroundColor Red
33105:  2901:   253:
33106:  2902:   254:                 # Conseils de d√©pannage
33107:  2903:   255:                 if ($result.error -match "Token") {
33108:  2904:   256:                     Write-Host "`n=== CONSEILS ===" -ForegroundColor Yellow
33109:  2905:   257:                     Write-Host "1. https://github.com/settings/tokens" -ForegroundColor Gray
33110:  2906:   258:                     Write-Host "2. 'Generate new token (classic)'" -ForegroundColor Gray
33111:  2907:   259:                     Write-Host "3. Permission: 'repo' (TOUTE la section)" -ForegroundColor Green
33112:  2908:   260:                     Write-Host "4. Copiez le token (ghp_...)" -ForegroundColor Gray
33113:  2909:   261:                 }
33114:  2910:   262:             }
33115:  2911:   263:             Write-Host ""
33116:  2912:   264:             Write-Host "Appuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
33117:  2913:   265:             Read-Host
33118:  2914:   266:         }
33119:  2915:   267:         '2' {
33120:  2916:   268:             Write-Host "`n=== GITHUB GISTS ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
33121:  2917:   269:             Write-Host "Fonctionnalit√© √† impl√©menter" -ForegroundColor Gray
33122:  2918:   270:             Write-Host ""
33123:  2919:   271:             Read-Host "Appuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
33124:  2920:   272:         }
33125:  2921:   273:         '3' {
33126:  2922:   274:             Write-Host "`n=== FICHIERS LOCAUX ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
33127:  2923:   275:             Write-Host "Fonctionnalit√© √† impl√©menter" -ForegroundColor Gray
33128:  2924:   276:             Write-Host ""
33129:  2925:   277:             Read-Host "Appuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
33130:  2926:   278:         }
33131:  2927:   279:         '4' {
33132:  2928:   280:             Write-Host "Au revoir!" -ForegroundColor Green
33133:  2929:   281:             exit 0
33134:  2930:   282:         }
33135:  2931:   283:         default {
33136:  2932:   284:             Write-Host "Choix invalide!" -ForegroundColor Red
33137:  2933:   285:             Start-Sleep -Seconds 1
33138:  2934:   286:         }
33139:  2935:   287:     }
33140:  2936:   288: }
33141:  2937:   289:
33142:  2938:   290: # ============================================================================

33146:  2942:   294: do {

33148:  2944:   296:         Show-MainMenu
33149:  2945:   297:     } catch {
33150:  2946:   298:         Write-Host "‚ùå Erreur: $_" -ForegroundColor Red
33151:  2947:   299:         Write-Host "Red√©marrage dans 3 secondes..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
33152:  2948:   300:         Start-Sleep -Seconds 3
33153:  2949:   301:     }
33154:  2950:   302: } while ($true)

33175:  2971:    16: } else {

33177:  2973:    18:     $PROJECT_NAME = "SmartContractDevPipeline"
33178:  2974:    19:     $PROJECT_PATH = "."
33179:  2975:    20:     $GITHUB_TOKEN = ""
33180:  2976:    21:     $GITHUB_USERNAME = ""

33182:  2978:    23:     $GITHUB_REPO_PRIVATE = $false
33183:  2979:    24:     $GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION = "Pipeline de d√©veloppement de Smart Contracts"
33184:  2980:    25: }

33191:  2987:    32: $EXCLUDE_PATTERNS = @("node_modules", ".git", ".vscode", ".idea", "dist", "build", "coverage", "*.log", "*.tmp", "*.cache", "package-lock.json", "yarn.lock", "PROJECT_SHARE_*", "GISTS_INDEX*", "GITHUB_PUBLISH_*")
33192:  2988:    33: $SHARE_FILENAME_PREFIX = "PROJECT_SHARE"
33193:  2989:    34: $INDEX_FILENAME = "${SHARE_FILENAME_PREFIX}_INDEX.txt"
33194:  2990:    35: $SHOW_LINE_NUMBERS = $true
