34433:  4229:   341:                 f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
34434:  4230:   342:
34435:  4231:   343:         # Structure du projet (version filtr√©e)
34436:  4232:   344:         f.write("\n[PROJECT FILE STRUCTURE - FILTERED]\n")
34437:  4233:   345:         f.write("="*80 + "\n")
34438:  4234:   346:         f.write("Listing filtered project files...\n\n")
34439:  4235:   347:
34440:  4236:   348:         for item in all_files:
34441:  4237:   349:             relative_path = item.relative_to(project_path)
34442:  4238:   350:             f.write(f"{relative_path}\n")
34443:  4239:   351:
34444:  4240:   352:         # R√©sum√©
34445:  4241:   353:         total_files = sum(file_counters.values())
34446:  4242:   354:         f.write("\n" + "="*80 + "\n")
34447:  4243:   355:         f.write("[SUMMARY]\n")
34448:  4244:   356:         f.write("="*80 + "\n")
34449:  4245:   357:         f.write(f"Total contract files: {file_counters['contracts']}\n")
34450:  4246:   358:         f.write(f"Total script files: {file_counters['scripts']}\n")
34451:  4247:   359:         f.write(f"Total test files: {file_counters['tests']}\n")
34452:  4248:   360:         f.write(f"Total other files: {file_counters['other']}\n")
34453:  4249:   361:         f.write(f"Total code files: {total_files}\n")
34454:  4250:   362:         f.write(f"\nGenerated: {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n")
34455:  4251:   363:         f.write("="*80 + "\n")
34456:  4252:   364:
34457:  4253:   365:     print(f"\n‚úì Fichier cr√©√©: PROJECT_SHARE.txt")
34458:  4254:   366:     print(f"‚úì Fichiers inclus: {total_files}")
34459:  4255:   367:     print(f"  - Contrats: {file_counters['contracts']}")
34460:  4256:   368:     print(f"  - Scripts: {file_counters['scripts']}")
34461:  4257:   369:     print(f"  - Tests: {file_counters['tests']}")
34462:  4258:   370:     print(f"  - Autres: {file_counters['other']}")
34463:  4259:   371:     return True
34464:  4260:   372:
34465:  4261:   373: def create_diff_share():
34466:  4262:   374:     """Cr√©e un rapport des changements"""
34467:  4263:   375:     print("\n" + "="*60)
34468:  4264:   376:     print("CREATE DIFF SHARE")
34469:  4265:   377:     print("="*60)
34470:  4266:   378:
34471:  4267:   379:     # V√©rifier si on est dans un repo Git
34472:  4268:   380:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git status")
34473:  4269:   381:     if code != 0:
34474:  4270:   382:         print("‚úó Pas dans un repository Git ou Git non install√©")
34475:  4271:   383:         return False
34476:  4272:   384:
34477:  4273:   385:     with open("DIFF_REPORT.txt", "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
34478:  4274:   386:         # En-t√™te
34479:  4275:   387:         f.write("="*80 + "\n")
34480:  4276:   388:         f.write("STRUCTURED LENDING PROTOCOL - DIFF REPORT\n")
34481:  4277:   389:         f.write("="*80 + "\n")
34482:  4278:   390:         f.write(f"Date: {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n")
34483:  4279:   391:         f.write("\n")
34484:  4280:   392:
34485:  4281:   393:         # Status Git
34486:  4282:   394:         f.write("[GIT STATUS]\n")
34487:  4283:   395:         f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
34488:  4284:   396:         code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git status --porcelain")
34489:  4285:   397:         if code == 0 and stdout.strip():
34490:  4286:   398:             changed_files = stdout.strip().split('\n')
34491:  4287:   399:             f.write(f"Changed files: {len(changed_files)}\n\n")
34492:  4288:   400:
34493:  4289:   401:             for file_status in changed_files:
34494:  4290:   402:                 if file_status.strip():
34495:  4291:   403:                     status = file_status[:2].strip()
34496:  4292:   404:                     filename = file_status[3:].strip()
34497:  4293:   405:                     f.write(f"{status}: {filename}\n")
34498:  4294:   406:
34499:  4295:   407:                     # Afficher les diff√©rences
34500:  4296:   408:                     if status in ['M', 'A', '??']:
34501:  4297:   409:                         f.write("-"*40 + "\n")
34502:  4298:   410:                         if status == '??':  # Nouveau fichier
34503:  4299:   411:                             if os.path.exists(filename):
34504:  4300:   412:                                 with open(filename, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as nf:
34505:  4301:   413:                                     lines = nf.readlines()
34506:  4302:   414:                                     for i, line in enumerate(lines, 1):
34507:  4303:   415:                                         f.write(f"{i:4d}: {line.rstrip()}\n")
34508:  4304:   416:                         else:  # Fichier modifi√©
34509:  4305:   417:                             code, diff_output, _ = run_command(f"git diff {filename}")
34510:  4306:   418:                             if code == 0 and diff_output:
34511:  4307:   419:                                 f.write("Changes:\n")
34512:  4308:   420:                                 f.write(diff_output)
34513:  4309:   421:                         f.write("-"*40 + "\n")
34514:  4310:   422:         else:
34515:  4311:   423:             f.write("No changes detected in the working directory.\n")
34516:  4312:   424:
34517:  4313:   425:         f.write("\n" + "="*80 + "\n")
34518:  4314:   426:         f.write("[GIT DIFF SUMMARY]\n")
34519:  4315:   427:         f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
34520:  4316:   428:         code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git diff --stat")
34521:  4317:   429:         if code == 0 and stdout:
34522:  4318:   430:             f.write(stdout)
34523:  4319:   431:         else:
34524:  4320:   432:             f.write("No staged changes.\n")
34525:  4321:   433:
34526:  4322:   434:     print("‚úì Fichier cr√©√©: DIFF_REPORT.txt")
34527:  4323:   435:     return True
34528:  4324:   436:
34529:  4325:   437: def git_commit_push_publish(config):
34530:  4326:   438:     """Commit, push et publication sur GitHub"""
34531:  4327:   439:     print("\n" + "="*60)
34532:  4328:   440:     print("GIT COMMIT + PUSH + PUBLISH TO GITHUB")
34533:  4329:   441:     print("="*60)
34534:  4330:   442:
34535:  4331:   443:     github_token = config.get("GITHUB_TOKEN")
34536:  4332:   444:     username = config.get("GITHUB_USERNAME")
34537:  4333:   445:     repo_name = config.get("GITHUB_REPO_NAME")
34538:  4334:   446:
34539:  4335:   447:     # V√©rifier le token
34540:  4336:   448:     if not github_token or github_token.strip() == "":
34541:  4337:   449:         print("\nüîë TOKEN GITHUB REQUIS")
34542:  4338:   450:         print("Pour cr√©er un token:")
34543:  4339:   451:         print("1. https://github.com/settings/tokens")
34544:  4340:   452:         print("2. 'Generate new token (classic)'")
34545:  4341:   453:         print("3. Donnez un nom")
34546:  4342:   454:         print("4. S√©lectionnez 'repo' (TOUTE la section)")
34547:  4343:   455:         print("5. 'Generate token'")
34548:  4344:   456:         print("6. Copiez le token (commence par 'ghp_')\n")
34549:  4345:   457:
34550:  4346:   458:         github_token = input("Collez votre token GitHub: ").strip()
34551:  4347:   459:         if github_token:
34552:  4348:   460:             if config.save_token(github_token):
34553:  4349:   461:                 print("‚úì Token sauvegard√©")
34554:  4350:   462:             else:
34555:  4351:   463:                 print("‚ö† Token non sauvegard√© dans la config")
34556:  4352:   464:         else:
34557:  4353:   465:             print("‚úó Aucun token fourni")
34558:  4354:   466:             return False
34559:  4355:   467:
34560:  4356:   468:     # Demander le message de commit
34561:  4357:   469:     commit_msg = input("\nMessage de commit (ENTER pour d√©faut): ").strip()
34562:  4358:   470:     if not commit_msg:
34563:  4359:   471:         commit_msg = f"üöÄ Automated commit: {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}"
34564:  4360:   472:
34565:  4361:   473:     # √âtape 1: V√©rifier Git
34566:  4362:   474:     print("\n1. V√©rification Git...")
34567:  4363:   475:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git --version")
34568:  4364:   476:     if code != 0:
34569:  4365:   477:         print("‚úó Git non install√©")
34570:  4366:   478:         print("T√©l√©chargez depuis: https://git-scm.com/downloads")
34571:  4367:   479:         return False
34572:  4368:   480:     print("‚úì Git install√©")
34573:  4369:   481:
34574:  4370:   482:     # √âtape 2: Ajouter les fichiers
34575:  4371:   483:     print("2. Ajout des fichiers...")
34576:  4372:   484:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git add .")
34577:  4373:   485:     if code != 0:
34578:  4374:   486:         print(f"‚úó Erreur git add: {stderr}")
34579:  4375:   487:         return False
34580:  4376:   488:     print("‚úì Fichiers ajout√©s")
34581:  4377:   489:
34582:  4378:   490:     # √âtape 3: Commit
34583:  4379:   491:     print("3. Commit...")
34584:  4380:   492:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command(f'git commit -m "{commit_msg}"')
34585:  4381:   493:     if code != 0:
34586:  4382:   494:         print(f"‚ö† Erreur commit (peut √™tre normal si pas de changements): {stderr}")
34587:  4383:   495:
34588:  4384:   496:     # √âtape 4: Configurer remote
34589:  4385:   497:     print("4. Configuration remote GitHub...")
34590:  4386:   498:     remote_url = f"https://x-access-token:{github_token}@github.com/{username}/{repo_name}.git"
34591:  4387:   499:
34592:  4388:   500:     # Supprimer et recr√©er le remote
34593:  4389:   501:     run_command("git remote remove origin")
34594:  4390:   502:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command(f'git remote add origin "{remote_url}"')
34595:  4391:   503:     if code != 0:
34596:  4392:   504:         print(f"‚úó Erreur configuration remote: {stderr}")
34597:  4393:   505:         return False
34598:  4394:   506:     print("‚úì Remote configur√©")
34599:  4395:   507:
34600:  4396:   508:     # √âtape 5: Push
34601:  4397:   509:     print("5. Push vers GitHub...")
34602:  4398:   510:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git branch -M main")
34603:  4399:   511:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git push -u origin main --force")
34604:  4400:   512:
34605:  4401:   513:     if code == 0:
34606:  4402:   514:         print("\n" + "="*60)
34607:  4403:   515:         print("‚úÖ PUBLICATION R√âUSSIE !")
34608:  4404:   516:         print("="*60)
34609:  4405:   517:         print(f"Repository: https://github.com/{username}/{repo_name}")
34610:  4406:   518:         print(f"Commit: {commit_msg}")
34611:  4407:   519:
34612:  4408:   520:         # Afficher le dernier commit
34613:  4409:   521:         code, last_commit, _ = run_command('git log --oneline -1')
34614:  4410:   522:         if code == 0:
34615:  4411:   523:             print(f"Dernier commit: {last_commit.strip()}")
34616:  4412:   524:
34617:  4413:   525:         return True
34618:  4414:   526:     else:
34619:  4415:   527:         print(f"\n‚úó ERREUR PUSH: {stderr}")
34620:  4416:   528:
34621:  4417:   529:         # Essayer m√©thode alternative
34622:  4418:   530:         print("\nEssai m√©thode alternative...")
34623:  4419:   531:         alt_remote_url = f"https://{username}:{github_token}@github.com/{username}/{repo_name}.git"
34624:  4420:   532:         run_command("git remote remove origin")
34625:  4421:   533:         run_command(f'git remote add origin "{alt_remote_url}"')
34626:  4422:   534:
34627:  4423:   535:         code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git push -u origin main --force")
34628:  4424:   536:         if code == 0:
34629:  4425:   537:             print("‚úÖ Publication r√©ussie avec m√©thode alternative!")
34630:  4426:   538:             print(f"Repository: https://github.com/{username}/{repo_name}")
34631:  4427:   539:             return True
34632:  4428:   540:         else:
34633:  4429:   541:             print(f"‚úó √âchec m√©thode alternative: {stderr}")
34634:  4430:   542:             return False
34635:  4431:   543:
34636:  4432:   544: def share_to_github_gists(config):
34637:  4433:   545:     """Partage sur GitHub Gists"""
34638:  4434:   546:     print("\n" + "="*60)
34639:  4435:   547:     print("SHARE TO GITHUB GISTS")
34640:  4436:   548:     print("="*60)
34641:  4437:   549:
34642:  4438:   550:     github_token = config.get("GITHUB_TOKEN")
34643:  4439:   551:
34644:  4440:   552:     # V√©rifier le token
34645:  4441:   553:     if not github_token or github_token.strip() == "":
34646:  4442:   554:         print("\nüîë TOKEN GITHUB REQUIS")
34647:  4443:   555:         print("Pour cr√©er un token:")
34648:  4444:   556:         print("1. https://github.com/settings/tokens")
34649:  4445:   557:         print("2. 'Generate new token (classic)'")
34650:  4446:   558:         print("3. Donnez un nom")
34651:  4447:   559:         print("4. S√©lectionnez 'gist' permission")
34652:  4448:   560:         print("5. 'Generate token'")
34653:  4449:   561:         print("6. Copiez le token (commence par 'ghp_')\n")
34654:  4450:   562:
34655:  4451:   563:         github_token = input("Collez votre token GitHub (avec permission gist): ").strip()
34656:  4452:   564:         if github_token:
34657:  4453:   565:             if config.save_token(github_token):
34658:  4454:   566:                 print("‚úì Token sauvegard√©")
34659:  4455:   567:             else:
34660:  4456:   568:                 print("‚ö† Token non sauvegard√© dans la config")
34661:  4457:   569:         else:
34662:  4458:   570:             print("‚úó Aucun token fourni")
34663:  4459:   571:             return False
34664:  4460:   572:
34665:  4461:   573:     # V√©rifier si le fichier de partage existe
34666:  4462:   574:     if not os.path.exists("PROJECT_SHARE.txt"):
34667:  4463:   575:         print("\n‚ö† PROJECT_SHARE.txt non trouv√©")
34668:  4464:   576:         create = input("Cr√©er le fichier de partage d'abord? (o/n): ").lower()
34669:  4465:   577:         if create == 'o':
34670:  4466:   578:             create_full_share(config)
34671:  4467:   579:         else:
34672:  4468:   580:             print("‚úó Op√©ration annul√©e")
34673:  4469:   581:             return False
34674:  4470:   582:
34675:  4471:   583:     # V√©rifier la taille du fichier
34676:  4472:   584:     file_size = os.path.getsize("PROJECT_SHARE.txt")
34677:  4473:   585:     file_size_mb = file_size / (1024 * 1024)
34678:  4474:   586:
34679:  4475:   587:     print(f"\nFichier: PROJECT_SHARE.txt")
34680:  4476:   588:     print(f"Taille: {file_size} bytes ({file_size_mb:.2f} MB)")
34681:  4477:   589:     print(f"Limite Gist: 1 MB")
34682:  4478:   590:
34683:  4479:   591:     if file_size_mb > 1:
34684:  4480:   592:         print("\n‚ö† Le fichier d√©passe la limite de 1 MB pour les Gists")
34685:  4481:   593:         print("Options:")
34686:  4482:   594:         print("1. Diviser en plusieurs Gists")
34687:  4483:   595:         print("2. Essayer quand m√™me (peut √©chouer)")
34688:  4484:   596:         print("3. Annuler")
34689:  4485:   597:
34690:  4486:   598:         choice = input("\nVotre choix (1-3): ").strip()
34691:  4487:   599:         if choice == '3':
34692:  4488:   600:             return False
34693:  4489:   601:         elif choice == '1':
34694:  4490:   602:             return split_and_upload_gists(config, github_token)
34695:  4491:   603:
34696:  4492:   604:     # Lire le contenu du fichier
34697:  4493:   605:     try:
34698:  4494:   606:         with open("PROJECT_SHARE.txt", 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
34699:  4495:   607:             content = f.read()
34700:  4496:   608:     except Exception as e:
34701:  4497:   609:         print(f"‚úó Erreur lecture fichier: {e}")
34702:  4498:   610:         return False
34703:  4499:   611:
34704:  4500:   612:     # Pr√©parer la requ√™te API
34705:  4501:   613:     headers = {
34706:  4502:   614:         "Authorization": f"token {github_token}",
34707:  4503:   615:         "Accept": "application/vnd.github.v3+json"
34708:  4504:   616:     }
34709:  4505:   617:
34710:  4506:   618:     data = {
34711:  4507:   619:         "description": f"{config.get('PROJECT_NAME')} - Full Project Share {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d')}",
34712:  4508:   620:         "public": False,
34713:  4509:   621:         "files": {
34714:  4510:   622:             "PROJECT_SHARE.txt": {
34715:  4511:   623:                 "content": content
34716:  4512:   624:             }
34717:  4513:   625:         }
34718:  4514:   626:     }
34719:  4515:   627:
34720:  4516:   628:     print("\nEnvoi vers GitHub Gists...")
34721:  4517:   629:     try:
34722:  4518:   630:         response = requests.post("https://api.github.com/gists",
34723:  4519:   631:                                 headers=headers,
34724:  4520:   632:                                 json=data)
34725:  4521:   633:
34726:  4522:   634:         if response.status_code == 201:
34727:  4523:   635:             gist_data = response.json()
34728:  4524:   636:             gist_url = gist_data["html_url"]
34729:  4525:   637:             gist_id = gist_data["id"]
34730:  4526:   638:
34731:  4527:   639:             print("\n" + "="*60)
34732:  4528:   640:             print("‚úÖ GIST CR√â√â AVEC SUCC√àS !")
34733:  4529:   641:             print("="*60)
34734:  4530:   642:             print(f"URL: {gist_url}")
34735:  4531:   643:             print(f"ID: {gist_id}")
34736:  4532:   644:
34737:  4533:   645:             # Sauvegarder l'info du Gist
34738:  4534:   646:             with open("GIST_INFO.txt", "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
34739:  4535:   647:                 f.write(f"Gist URL: {gist_url}\n")
34740:  4536:   648:                 f.write(f"Gist ID: {gist_id}\n")
34741:  4537:   649:                 f.write(f"Created: {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n")
34742:  4538:   650:                 f.write(f"Description: {data['description']}\n")
34743:  4539:   651:                 f.write(f"File: PROJECT_SHARE.txt\n")
34744:  4540:   652:                 f.write(f"Size: {file_size} bytes\n")
34745:  4541:   653:
34746:  4542:   654:             print(f"\n‚úì Informations sauvegard√©es dans: GIST_INFO.txt")
34747:  4543:   655:             return True
34748:  4544:   656:         else:
34749:  4545:   657:             print(f"‚úó Erreur API GitHub: {response.status_code}")
34750:  4546:   658:             print(f"Message: {response.text}")
34751:  4547:   659:             return False
34752:  4548:   660:
34753:  4549:   661:     except Exception as e:
34754:  4550:   662:         print(f"‚úó Erreur connexion: {e}")
34755:  4551:   663:         return False
34756:  4552:   664:
34757:  4553:   665: def split_and_upload_gists(config, github_token):
34758:  4554:   666:     """Divise et upload sur plusieurs Gists"""
34759:  4555:   667:     print("\n" + "="*60)
34760:  4556:   668:     print("SPLIT AND UPLOAD TO MULTIPLE GISTS")
34761:  4557:   669:     print("="*60)
34762:  4558:   670:
34763:  4559:   671:     # Lire le fichier
34764:  4560:   672:     try:
34765:  4561:   673:         with open("PROJECT_SHARE.txt", 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
34766:  4562:   674:             lines = f.readlines()
34767:  4563:   675:     except Exception as e:
34768:  4564:   676:         print(f"‚úó Erreur lecture fichier: {e}")
34769:  4565:   677:         return False
34770:  4566:   678:
34771:  4567:   679:     total_lines = len(lines)
34772:  4568:   680:     max_lines_per_gist = 10000  # Environ 500KB-1MB selon la taille des lignes
34773:  4569:   681:     num_parts = (total_lines // max_lines_per_gist) + 1
34774:  4570:   682:
34775:  4571:   683:     print(f"Lignes totales: {total_lines}")
34776:  4572:   684:     print(f"Lignes par Gist: {max_lines_per_gist}")
34777:  4573:   685:     print(f"Nombre de parties: {num_parts}")
34778:  4574:   686:
34779:  4575:   687:     gist_urls = []
34780:  4576:   688:
34781:  4577:   689:     for part_num in range(1, num_parts + 1):
34782:  4578:   690:         start_idx = (part_num - 1) * max_lines_per_gist
34783:  4579:   691:         end_idx = min(part_num * max_lines_per_gist, total_lines)
34784:  4580:   692:
34785:  4581:   693:         print(f"\nPartie {part_num}/{num_parts} (lignes {start_idx+1}-{end_idx})")
34786:  4582:   694:
34787:  4583:   695:         # Extraire les lignes pour cette partie
34788:  4584:   696:         part_lines = lines[start_idx:end_idx]
34789:  4585:   697:         part_content = "".join(part_lines)
34790:  4586:   698:
34791:  4587:   699:         # Pr√©parer la requ√™te API
34792:  4588:   700:         headers = {
34793:  4589:   701:             "Authorization": f"token {github_token}",
34794:  4590:   702:             "Accept": "application/vnd.github.v3+json"
34795:  4591:   703:         }
34796:  4592:   704:
34797:  4593:   705:         data = {
34798:  4594:   706:             "description": f"{config.get('PROJECT_NAME')} - Part {part_num}/{num_parts} {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d')}",
34799:  4595:   707:             "public": False,
34800:  4596:   708:             "files": {
34801:  4597:   709:                 f"PROJECT_SHARE_PART{part_num}.txt": {
34802:  4598:   710:                     "content": part_content
34803:  4599:   711:                 }
34804:  4600:   712:             }
34805:  4601:   713:         }
34806:  4602:   714:
34807:  4603:   715:         try:
34808:  4604:   716:             response = requests.post("https://api.github.com/gists",
34809:  4605:   717:                                     headers=headers,
34810:  4606:   718:                                     json=data)
34811:  4607:   719:
34812:  4608:   720:             if response.status_code == 201:
34813:  4609:   721:                 gist_data = response.json()
34814:  4610:   722:                 gist_url = gist_data["html_url"]
34815:  4611:   723:                 gist_urls.append(gist_url)
34816:  4612:   724:                 print(f"‚úì Partie {part_num} cr√©√©e: {gist_url}")
34817:  4613:   725:             else:
34818:  4614:   726:                 print(f"‚úó Erreur partie {part_num}: {response.status_code}")
34819:  4615:   727:
34820:  4616:   728:         except Exception as e:
34821:  4617:   729:             print(f"‚úó Erreur partie {part_num}: {e}")
34822:  4618:   730:
34823:  4619:   731:     # Cr√©er un index des Gists
34824:  4620:   732:     if gist_urls:
34825:  4621:   733:         with open("GISTS_INDEX.txt", "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
34826:  4622:   734:             f.write("="*60 + "\n")
34827:  4623:   735:             f.write("GITHUB GISTS INDEX\n")
34828:  4624:   736:             f.write("="*60 + "\n")
34829:  4625:   737:             f.write(f"Project: {config.get('PROJECT_NAME')}\n")
34830:  4626:   738:             f.write(f"Split into: {len(gist_urls)} parts\n")
34831:  4627:   739:             f.write(f"Date: {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n")
34832:  4628:   740:             f.write("\nGIST URLs:\n\n")
34833:  4629:   741:
34834:  4630:   742:             for i, url in enumerate(gist_urls, 1):
34835:  4631:   743:                 f.write(f"Part {i}: {url}\n")
34836:  4632:   744:
34837:  4633:   745:         print("\n" + "="*60)
34838:  4634:   746:         print("‚úÖ TOUS LES GISTS CR√â√âS !")
34839:  4635:   747:         print("="*60)
34840:  4636:   748:         print(f"Nombre de Gists: {len(gist_urls)}")
34841:  4637:   749:         print(f"Index sauvegard√© dans: GISTS_INDEX.txt")
34842:  4638:   750:
34843:  4639:   751:         # Afficher les URLs
34844:  4640:   752:         print("\nURLs des Gists:")
34845:  4641:   753:         for i, url in enumerate(gist_urls, 1):
34846:  4642:   754:             print(f"  Part {i}: {url}")
34847:  4643:   755:
34848:  4644:   756:         return True
34849:  4645:   757:
34850:  4646:   758:     return False
34851:  4647:   759:

35015:  4811:   923:     print("\n" + "="*60)

35023:  4819:   931:
35024:  4820:   932:     headers = {
35025:  4821:   933:         "Authorization": f"token {token}",

35124:  4920:    13:
35125:  4921:    14: # 1. Cr√©er la structure compl√®te des agents
35126:  4922:    15: Write-Host "1. CREATION DE LA STRUCTURE DES AGENTS..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
35127:  4923:    16: $agentsStructure = @{
35128:  4924:    17:     "agents/architect" = @("config.yaml", "agent.py", "tools.py")
35129:  4925:    18:     "agents/coder" = @("config.yaml", "agent.py", "tools.py")
35130:  4926:    19:     "agents/communication" = @("config.yaml", "agent.py", "message_bus.py", "event_system.py")
35131:  4927:    20:     "agents/documenter" = @("config.yaml", "agent.py", "tools.py")
35132:  4928:    21:     "agents/formal_verification" = @("config.yaml", "agent.py", "tools.py")
35133:  4929:    22:     "agents/frontend_web3" = @("config.yaml", "agent.py", "tools.py", "web3_hooks.py")
35134:  4930:    23:     "agents/fuzzing_simulation" = @("config.yaml", "agent.py", "tools.py", "simulator.py")
35135:  4931:    24:     "agents/quality_metrics" = @("config.yaml", "agent.py", "tools.py", "metrics.py")
35136:  4932:    25:     "agents/smart_contract" = @("config.yaml", "agent.py", "tools.py", "security.py")
35137:  4933:    26:     "agents/tester" = @("config.yaml", "agent.py", "tools.py", "test_generator.py")
35138:  4934:    27:     "agents/orchestrator" = @("orchestrator.py", "task_manager.py", "state_manager.py")
35139:  4935:    28:     "agents/shared" = @("base_agent.py", "memory.py", "context_manager.py")
35140:  4936:    29: }
35141:  4937:    30:
35142:  4938:    31: foreach ($folder in $agentsStructure.Keys) {
35143:  4939:    32:     $fullPath = "$projectPath\$folder"
35144:  4940:    33:     New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $fullPath -Force | Out-Null
35145:  4941:    34:
35146:  4942:    35:     foreach ($file in $agentsStructure[$folder]) {
35147:  4943:    36:         $filePath = "$fullPath\$file"
35148:  4944:    37:         if (-not (Test-Path $filePath)) {
35149:  4945:    38:             New-Item -ItemType File -Path $filePath -Force | Out-Null
35150:  4946:    39:         }
35151:  4947:    40:     }
35152:  4948:    41:     Write-Host "   üìÅ $folder cr√©√©" -ForegroundColor Green
35153:  4949:    42: }
35154:  4950:    43:
35155:  4951:    44: # 2. Cr√©er le fichier de versions
35156:  4952:    45: Write-Host "`n2. CREATION DU FICHIER DE VERSIONS..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
35157:  4953:    46: $versions = @{
35158:  4954:    47:     timestamp = Get-Date -Format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
35159:  4955:    48:     system = @{
35160:  4956:    49:         os = "Windows $( [System.Environment]::OSVersion.Version.ToString())"
35161:  4957:    50:         powershell = $PSVersionTable.PSVersion.ToString()
35162:  4958:    51:     }
35163:  4959:    52:     tools = @{}
35164:  4960:    53:     python = @{}
35165:  4961:    54:     node = @{}
35166:  4962:    55:     blockchain = @{}
35167:  4963:    56:     agents = @{}
35168:  4964:    57: }
35169:  4965:    58:
35170:  4966:    59: # R√©cup√©rer les versions des outils
35171:  4967:    60: try { $versions.tools.git = (git --version 2>&1).ToString().Replace('git version ', '').Trim() } catch { $versions.tools.git = "N/A" }
35172:  4968:    61: try { $versions.tools.docker = (docker --version 2>&1).ToString().Replace('Docker version ', '').Split(',')[0].Trim() } catch { $versions.tools.docker = "N/A" }
35173:  4969:    62:
35174:  4970:    63: # R√©cup√©rer les versions Python
35175:  4971:    64: try {
35176:  4972:    65:     $pythonVersion = (python --version 2>&1).ToString().Replace('Python ', '').Trim()
35177:  4973:    66:     $versions.python.version = $pythonVersion
35178:  4974:    67:
35179:  4975:    68:     # Packages Python
35180:  4976:    69:     $pythonPackages = @("langchain", "chromadb", "requests", "web3", "aiohttp")
35181:  4977:    70:     foreach ($pkg in $pythonPackages) {
35182:  4978:    71:         try {
35183:  4979:    72:             $version = python -c "import $pkg; print(getattr($pkg, '__version__', 'N/A'))" 2>$null
35184:  4980:    73:             if (-not $version -or $version -eq "N/A") {
35185:  4981:    74:                 $version = pip show $pkg 2>$null | Select-String "Version:" | ForEach-Object { $_.ToString().Replace('Version: ', '').Trim() }
35186:  4982:    75:             }
35187:  4983:    76:             $versions.python.$pkg = $version
35188:  4984:    77:         } catch {
35189:  4985:    78:             $versions.python.$pkg = "N/A"
35190:  4986:    79:         }
35191:  4987:    80:     }
35192:  4988:    81: } catch { $versions.python.version = "N/A" }
35193:  4989:    82:
35194:  4990:    83: # R√©cup√©rer les versions Node.js
35195:  4991:    84: try {
35196:  4992:    85:     $nodeVersion = (node --version 2>&1).ToString().Replace('v', '').Trim()
35197:  4993:    86:     $versions.node.version = $nodeVersion
35198:  4994:    87:
35199:  4995:    88:     # Packages Node.js globaux
35200:  4996:    89:     $nodePackages = @("npm", "yarn", "hardhat", "typescript", "next")
35201:  4997:    90:     foreach ($pkg in $nodePackages) {
35202:  4998:    91:         try {
35203:  4999:    92:             if ($pkg -eq "npm") {
35204:  5000:    93:                 $version = (npm --version 2>&1).ToString().Trim()
35205:  5001:    94:             } elseif ($pkg -eq "next") {
35206:  5002:    95:                 $version = (npx next --version 2>&1).ToString().Trim()
35207:  5003:    96:             } else {
35208:  5004:    97:                 $version = (npx $pkg --version 2>&1).ToString().Trim()
35209:  5005:    98:             }
35210:  5006:    99:             $versions.node.$pkg = $version
35211:  5007:   100:         } catch {
35212:  5008:   101:             $versions.node.$pkg = "N/A"
35213:  5009:   102:         }
35214:  5010:   103:     }
35215:  5011:   104: } catch { $versions.node.version = "N/A" }
35216:  5012:   105:
35217:  5013:   106: # R√©cup√©rer les versions blockchain
35218:  5014:   107: try { $versions.blockchain.foundry = (forge --version 2>&1 | Select-String "forge").ToString().Split(' ')[1].Trim() } catch { $versions.blockchain.foundry = "N/A" }
35219:  5015:   108: try { $versions.blockchain.slither = (slither --version 2>&1).ToString().Trim() } catch { $versions.blockchain.slither = "N/A" }
35220:  5016:   109: try { $versions.blockchain.anvil = (anvil --version 2>&1).ToString().Trim() } catch { $versions.blockchain.anvil = "N/A" }
35221:  5017:   110:
35222:  5018:   111: # Sauvegarder les versions
35223:  5019:   112: $versions | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10 | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\config\versions.json" -Force
35224:  5020:   113: Write-Host "   ‚úÖ Fichier de versions cr√©√©" -ForegroundColor Green
35225:  5021:   114:
35226:  5022:   115: # 3. Cr√©er les configurations des agents
35227:  5023:   116: Write-Host "`n3. CREATION DES CONFIGURATIONS D'AGENTS..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
35228:  5024:   117:

35262:  5058:   151: "@

35504:  5300:   393: dependencies:
35505:  5301:   394:   foundry: ">=0.2.0"
35506:  5302:   395:   python: ">=3.8"
35507:  5303:   396: "@
35508:  5304:   397:
35509:  5305:   398: $fuzzingConfig | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\agents\fuzzing_simulation\config.yaml" -Force -Encoding UTF8

35631:  5427:   520: "@
35632:  5428:   521:
35633:  5429:   522: $testerConfig | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\agents\tester\config.yaml" -Force -Encoding UTF8
35634:  5430:   523:
35635:  5431:   524: Write-Host "   ‚úÖ Configurations des 9 agents cr√©√©es" -ForegroundColor Green
35636:  5432:   525:
35637:  5433:   526: # 4. Cr√©er le base_agent.py (classe parente)
35638:  5434:   527: Write-Host "`n4. CREATION DE LA CLASSE BASE AGENT..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
35639:  5435:   528: $baseAgentCode = @'
35640:  5436:   529: # agents/shared/base_agent.py
35641:  5437:   530: import asyncio
35642:  5438:   531: import json
35643:  5439:   532: import logging
35644:  5440:   533: from abc import ABC, abstractmethod
35645:  5441:   534: from pathlib import Path
35646:  5442:   535: from typing import Dict, Any, Optional
35647:  5443:   536: import yaml
35648:  5444:   537:
35649:  5445:   538: class BaseAgent(ABC):
35650:  5446:   539:     """Classe de base pour tous les agents"""
35651:  5447:   540:
35652:  5448:   541:     def __init__(self, config_path: str):
35653:  5449:   542:         self.config = self._load_config(config_path)
35654:  5450:   543:         self.agent_id = self.config.get("agent_id", "unknown")
35655:  5451:   544:         self.name = self.config.get("name", "Unnamed Agent")
35656:  5452:   545:         self.version = self.config.get("version", "1.0.0")
35657:  5453:   546:         self.logger = self._setup_logger()
35658:  5454:   547:         self.memory = {}
35659:  5455:   548:         self.context = {}
35660:  5456:   549:
35661:  5457:   550:     def _load_config(self, config_path: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
35662:  5458:   551:         """Charge la configuration YAML"""
35663:  5459:   552:         try:
35664:  5460:   553:             with open(config_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
35665:  5461:   554:                 return yaml.safe_load(f)
35666:  5462:   555:         except Exception as e:
35667:  5463:   556:             print(f"Erreur lors du chargement de la configuration: {e}")
35668:  5464:   557:             return {}
35669:  5465:   558:
35670:  5466:   559:     def _setup_logger(self) -> logging.Logger:
35671:  5467:   560:         """Configure le logger"""
35672:  5468:   561:         logger = logging.getLogger(self.agent_id)
35673:  5469:   562:         if not logger.handlers:
35674:  5470:   563:             logger.setLevel(logging.INFO)
35675:  5471:   564:             handler = logging.StreamHandler()
35676:  5472:   565:             formatter = logging.Formatter(
35677:  5473:   566:                 f'%(asctime)s - {self.agent_id} - %(levelname)s - %(message)s'
35678:  5474:   567:             )
35679:  5475:   568:             handler.setFormatter(formatter)
35680:  5476:   569:             logger.addHandler(handler)
35681:  5477:   570:         return logger
35682:  5478:   571:
35683:  5479:   572:     @abstractmethod
35684:  5480:   573:     async def initialize(self) -> bool:
35685:  5481:   574:         """Initialise l'agent"""
35686:  5482:   575:         pass
35687:  5483:   576:
35688:  5484:   577:     @abstractmethod
35689:  5485:   578:     async def execute(self, task: Dict[str, Any], context: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
35690:  5486:   579:         """Ex√©cute une t√¢che"""
35691:  5487:   580:         pass
35692:  5488:   581:
35693:  5489:   582:     async def load_context(self, context_path: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
35694:  5490:   583:         """Charge le contexte depuis un fichier"""
35695:  5491:   584:         try:
35696:  5492:   585:             if Path(context_path).exists():
35697:  5493:   586:                 with open(context_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
35698:  5494:   587:                     self.context = json.load(f)
35699:  5495:   588:                     self.logger.info(f"Contexte charg√© depuis {context_path}")
35700:  5496:   589:                     return self.context
35701:  5497:   590:         except Exception as e:
35702:  5498:   591:             self.logger.error(f"Erreur lors du chargement du contexte: {e}")
35703:  5499:   592:         return {}
35704:  5500:   593:
35705:  5501:   594:     async def save_memory(self, memory_path: str) -> bool:
35706:  5502:   595:         """Sauvegarde la m√©moire de l'agent"""
35707:  5503:   596:         try:
35708:  5504:   597:             memory_dir = Path(memory_path).parent
35709:  5505:   598:             memory_dir.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
35710:  5506:   599:
35711:  5507:   600:             with open(memory_path, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
35712:  5508:   601:                 json.dump(self.memory, f, indent=2)
35713:  5509:   602:
35714:  5510:   603:             self.logger.info(f"M√©moire sauvegard√©e dans {memory_path}")
35715:  5511:   604:             return True
35716:  5512:   605:         except Exception as e:
35717:  5513:   606:             self.logger.error(f"Erreur lors de la sauvegarde de la m√©moire: {e}")
35718:  5514:   607:             return False
35719:  5515:   608:
35720:  5516:   609:     def get_agent_info(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
35721:  5517:   610:         """Retourne les informations de l'agent"""
35722:  5518:   611:         return {
35723:  5519:   612:             "agent_id": self.agent_id,
35724:  5520:   613:             "name": self.name,
35725:  5521:   614:             "version": self.version,
35726:  5522:   615:             "config": self.config,
35727:  5523:   616:             "tools": self.config.get("tools", []),
35728:  5524:   617:             "dependencies": self.config.get("dependencies", {})
35729:  5525:   618:         }
35730:  5526:   619:
35731:  5527:   620:     async def health_check(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
35732:  5528:   621:         """V√©rifie la sant√© de l'agent"""
35733:  5529:   622:         return {
35734:  5530:   623:             "status": "healthy",
35735:  5531:   624:             "agent_id": self.agent_id,
35736:  5532:   625:             "timestamp": asyncio.get_event_loop().time(),
35737:  5533:   626:             "memory_usage": len(str(self.memory)),
35738:  5534:   627:             "context_loaded": bool(self.context)
35739:  5535:   628:         }
35740:  5536:   629: '@
35741:  5537:   630:
35742:  5538:   631: $baseAgentCode | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\agents\shared\base_agent.py" -Force -Encoding UTF8
35743:  5539:   632:
35744:  5540:   633: # 5. Cr√©er l'orchestrateur principal
35745:  5541:   634: Write-Host "`n5. CREATION DE L'ORCHESTRATEUR PRINCIPAL..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
35746:  5542:   635: $orchestratorCode = @'
35747:  5543:   636: # agents/orchestrator/orchestrator.py
35748:  5544:   637: import asyncio
35749:  5545:   638: import json
35750:  5546:   639: import yaml
35751:  5547:   640: from typing import Dict, List, Any, Optional
35752:  5548:   641: from pathlib import Path
35753:  5549:   642: import logging
35754:  5550:   643: from datetime import datetime
35755:  5551:   644:
35756:  5552:   645: class Orchestrator:
35757:  5553:   646:     """Orchestrateur principal qui g√®re tous les agents"""
35758:  5554:   647:
35759:  5555:   648:     def __init__(self, project_root: str = "."):
35760:  5556:   649:         self.project_root = Path(project_root)
35761:  5557:   650:         self.agents = {}
35762:  5558:   651:         self.agent_status = {}
35763:  5559:   652:         self.task_queue = asyncio.Queue()
35764:  5560:   653:         self.results = {}
35765:  5561:   654:         self.versions = self._load_versions()
35766:  5562:   655:
35767:  5563:   656:         # Configuration
35768:  5564:   657:         self.config = {
35769:  5565:   658:             "max_concurrent_tasks": 3,
35770:  5566:   659:             "task_timeout": 300,  # 5 minutes
35771:  5567:   660:             "retry_attempts": 3
35772:  5568:   661:         }
35773:  5569:   662:
35774:  5570:   663:         self.logger = self._setup_logger()
35775:  5571:   664:
35776:  5572:   665:     def _setup_logger(self) -> logging.Logger:
35777:  5573:   666:         """Configure le logger"""
35778:  5574:   667:         logger = logging.getLogger("orchestrator")
35779:  5575:   668:         logger.setLevel(logging.INFO)
35780:  5576:   669:
35781:  5577:   670:         if not logger.handlers:
35782:  5578:   671:             # Handler console
35783:  5579:   672:             console_handler = logging.StreamHandler()
35784:  5580:   673:             console_formatter = logging.Formatter(
35785:  5581:   674:                 '%(asctime)s - %(name)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s'
35786:  5582:   675:             )
35787:  5583:   676:             console_handler.setFormatter(console_formatter)
35788:  5584:   677:             logger.addHandler(console_handler)
35789:  5585:   678:
35790:  5586:   679:             # Handler fichier
35791:  5587:   680:             log_file = self.project_root / "logs" / "orchestrator.log"
35792:  5588:   681:             log_file.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
35793:  5589:   682:
35794:  5590:   683:             file_handler = logging.FileHandler(log_file, encoding='utf-8')
35795:  5591:   684:             file_formatter = logging.Formatter(
35796:  5592:   685:                 '%(asctime)s - %(name)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s'
35797:  5593:   686:             )
35798:  5594:   687:             file_handler.setFormatter(file_formatter)
35799:  5595:   688:             logger.addHandler(file_handler)
35800:  5596:   689:
35801:  5597:   690:         return logger
35802:  5598:   691:
35803:  5599:   692:     def _load_versions(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
35804:  5600:   693:         """Charge les versions des outils"""
35805:  5601:   694:         versions_file = self.project_root / "config" / "versions.json"
35806:  5602:   695:         if versions_file.exists():
35807:  5603:   696:             with open(versions_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
35808:  5604:   697:                 return json.load(f)
35809:  5605:   698:         return {}
35810:  5606:   699:
35811:  5607:   700:     async def register_agent(self, agent_name: str, agent_instance):
35812:  5608:   701:         """Enregistre un agent"""
35813:  5609:   702:         self.agents[agent_name] = agent_instance
35814:  5610:   703:         self.agent_status[agent_name] = {
35815:  5611:   704:             "registered": datetime.now().isoformat(),
35816:  5612:   705:             "status": "idle",
35817:  5613:   706:             "tasks_completed": 0,
35818:  5614:   707:             "last_active": None
35819:  5615:   708:         }
35820:  5616:   709:
35821:  5617:   710:         self.logger.info(f"Agent enregistr√©: {agent_name}")
35822:  5618:   711:
35823:  5619:   712:         # Initialiser l'agent
35824:  5620:   713:         try:
35825:  5621:   714:             await agent_instance.initialize()
35826:  5622:   715:             self.agent_status[agent_name]["status"] = "ready"
35827:  5623:   716:             self.logger.info(f"Agent {agent_name} initialis√© avec succ√®s")
35828:  5624:   717:         except Exception as e:
35829:  5625:   718:             self.agent_status[agent_name]["status"] = "error"
35830:  5626:   719:             self.logger.error(f"Erreur lors de l'initialisation de {agent_name}: {e}")
35831:  5627:   720:
35832:  5628:   721:     async def get_all_agents_info(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
35833:  5629:   722:         """Retourne les informations de tous les agents"""
35834:  5630:   723:         agents_info = {}
35835:  5631:   724:         for agent_name, agent_instance in self.agents.items():
35836:  5632:   725:             try:
35837:  5633:   726:                 agents_info[agent_name] = agent_instance.get_agent_info()
35838:  5634:   727:                 agents_info[agent_name]["status"] = self.agent_status[agent_name]["status"]
35839:  5635:   728:             except Exception as e:
35840:  5636:   729:                 self.logger.error(f"Erreur lors de la r√©cup√©ration des infos de {agent_name}: {e}")
35841:  5637:   730:
35842:  5638:   731:         return {
35843:  5639:   732:             "total_agents": len(self.agents),
35844:  5640:   733:             "agents": agents_info,
35845:  5641:   734:             "system_versions": self.versions,
35846:  5642:   735:             "timestamp": datetime.now().isoformat()
35847:  5643:   736:         }
35848:  5644:   737:
35849:  5645:   738:     async def run_task_pipeline(self, pipeline_config: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
35850:  5646:   739:         """Ex√©cute un pipeline de t√¢ches"""
35851:  5647:   740:         self.logger.info(f"D√©marrage du pipeline: {pipeline_config.get('name', 'unnamed')}")
35852:  5648:   741:
35853:  5649:   742:         results = {}
35854:  5650:   743:         tasks = pipeline_config.get("tasks", [])
35855:  5651:   744:
35856:  5652:   745:         for task in tasks:
35857:  5653:   746:             task_name = task.get("name", "unnamed_task")
35858:  5654:   747:             agent_name = task.get("agent")
35859:  5655:   748:
35860:  5656:   749:             if agent_name not in self.agents:
35861:  5657:   750:                 self.logger.error(f"Agent {agent_name} non trouv√© pour la t√¢che {task_name}")
35862:  5658:   751:                 continue
35863:  5659:   752:
35864:  5660:   753:             self.logger.info(f"Ex√©cution de la t√¢che {task_name} avec l'agent {agent_name}")
35865:  5661:   754:
35866:  5662:   755:             try:
35867:  5663:   756:                 # Mettre √† jour le statut de l'agent
35868:  5664:   757:                 self.agent_status[agent_name]["status"] = "busy"
35869:  5665:   758:                 self.agent_status[agent_name]["last_active"] = datetime.now().isoformat()
35870:  5666:   759:
35871:  5667:   760:                 # Ex√©cuter la t√¢che
35872:  5668:   761:                 result = await self.agents[agent_name].execute(
35873:  5669:   762:                     task=task,
35874:  5670:   763:                     context={
35875:  5671:   764:                         "pipeline": pipeline_config,
35876:  5672:   765:                         "previous_results": results,
35877:  5673:   766:                         "versions": self.versions
35878:  5674:   767:                     }
35879:  5675:   768:                 )
35880:  5676:   769:
35881:  5677:   770:                 # Enregistrer le r√©sultat
35882:  5678:   771:                 results[task_name] = result
35883:  5679:   772:                 self.agent_status[agent_name]["tasks_completed"] += 1
35884:  5680:   773:                 self.agent_status[agent_name]["status"] = "ready"
35885:  5681:   774:
35886:  5682:   775:                 self.logger.info(f"T√¢che {task_name} termin√©e avec succ√®s")
35887:  5683:   776:
35888:  5684:   777:             except asyncio.TimeoutError:
35889:  5685:   778:                 self.logger.error(f"Timeout sur la t√¢che {task_name}")
35890:  5686:   779:                 self.agent_status[agent_name]["status"] = "timeout"
35891:  5687:   780:                 results[task_name] = {"status": "timeout", "error": "Task timeout"}
35892:  5688:   781:
35893:  5689:   782:             except Exception as e:
35894:  5690:   783:                 self.logger.error(f"Erreur lors de l'ex√©cution de {task_name}: {e}")
35895:  5691:   784:                 self.agent_status[agent_name]["status"] = "error"
35896:  5692:   785:                 results[task_name] = {"status": "error", "error": str(e)}
35897:  5693:   786:
35898:  5694:   787:         # Sauvegarder les r√©sultats
35899:  5695:   788:         await self._save_pipeline_results(pipeline_config, results)
35900:  5696:   789:
35901:  5697:   790:         return {
35902:  5698:   791:             "pipeline": pipeline_config.get("name"),
35903:  5699:   792:             "results": results,
35904:  5700:   793:             "summary": self._generate_summary(results),
35905:  5701:   794:             "agents_status": self.agent_status,
35906:  5702:   795:             "timestamp": datetime.now().isoformat()
35907:  5703:   796:         }
35908:  5704:   797:
35909:  5705:   798:     async def _save_pipeline_results(self, pipeline_config: Dict[str, Any], results: Dict[str, Any]):
35910:  5706:   799:         """Sauvegarde les r√©sultats du pipeline"""
35911:  5707:   800:         try:
35912:  5708:   801:             results_dir = self.project_root / "results" / "pipelines"
35913:  5709:   802:             results_dir.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
35914:  5710:   803:
35915:  5711:   804:             timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S")
35916:  5712:   805:             pipeline_name = pipeline_config.get("name", "unnamed").replace(" ", "_").lower()
35917:  5713:   806:
35918:  5714:   807:             result_file = results_dir / f"{pipeline_name}_{timestamp}.json"
35919:  5715:   808:
35920:  5716:   809:             full_results = {
35921:  5717:   810:                 "pipeline": pipeline_config,
35922:  5718:   811:                 "results": results,
35923:  5719:   812:                 "agents_info": await self.get_all_agents_info(),
35924:  5720:   813:                 "system_versions": self.versions,
35925:  5721:   814:                 "metadata": {
35926:  5722:   815:                     "execution_time": datetime.now().isoformat(),
35927:  5723:   816:                     "total_tasks": len(pipeline_config.get("tasks", [])),
35928:  5724:   817:                     "successful_tasks": sum(1 for r in results.values() if r.get("status") == "success")
35929:  5725:   818:                 }
35930:  5726:   819:             }
35931:  5727:   820:
35932:  5728:   821:             with open(result_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
35933:  5729:   822:                 json.dump(full_results, f, indent=2, default=str)
35934:  5730:   823:
35935:  5731:   824:             self.logger.info(f"R√©sultats sauvegard√©s dans {result_file}")
35936:  5732:   825:
35937:  5733:   826:         except Exception as e:
35938:  5734:   827:             self.logger.error(f"Erreur lors de la sauvegarde des r√©sultats: {e}")
35939:  5735:   828:
35940:  5736:   829:     def _generate_summary(self, results: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
35941:  5737:   830:         """G√©n√®re un r√©sum√© des r√©sultats"""
35942:  5738:   831:         total = len(results)
35943:  5739:   832:         successful = sum(1 for r in results.values() if r.get("status") in ["success", "completed"])
35944:  5740:   833:         failed = total - successful
35945:  5741:   834:
35946:  5742:   835:         return {
35947:  5743:   836:             "total_tasks": total,
35948:  5744:   837:             "successful_tasks": successful,
35949:  5745:   838:             "failed_tasks": failed,
35950:  5746:   839:             "success_rate": (successful / total * 100) if total > 0 else 0
35951:  5747:   840:         }
35952:  5748:   841:
35953:  5749:   842:     async def health_check_all(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
35954:  5750:   843:         """V√©rifie la sant√© de tous les agents"""
35955:  5751:   844:         health_results = {}
35956:  5752:   845:
35957:  5753:   846:         for agent_name, agent_instance in self.agents.items():
35958:  5754:   847:             try:
35959:  5755:   848:                 health = await agent_instance.health_check()
35960:  5756:   849:                 health_results[agent_name] = health
35961:  5757:   850:                 self.agent_status[agent_name]["last_health_check"] = datetime.now().isoformat()
35962:  5758:   851:             except Exception as e:
35963:  5759:   852:                 health_results[agent_name] = {
35964:  5760:   853:                     "status": "unhealthy",
35965:  5761:   854:                     "error": str(e)
35966:  5762:   855:                 }
35967:  5763:   856:                 self.agent_status[agent_name]["status"] = "error"
35968:  5764:   857:
35969:  5765:   858:         return {
35970:  5766:   859:             "timestamp": datetime.now().isoformat(),
35971:  5767:   860:             "total_agents": len(self.agents),
35972:  5768:   861:             "healthy_agents": sum(1 for h in health_results.values() if h.get("status") == "healthy"),
35973:  5769:   862:             "agents": health_results
35974:  5770:   863:         }
35975:  5771:   864: '@
35976:  5772:   865:
35977:  5773:   866: $orchestratorCode | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\agents\orchestrator\orchestrator.py" -Force -Encoding UTF8
35978:  5774:   867:
35979:  5775:   868: # 6. Cr√©er le fichier de d√©pendances Python
35980:  5776:   869: Write-Host "`n6. CREATION DU FICHIER REQUIREMENTS.TXT..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
35981:  5777:   870: $requirements = @"
35982:  5778:   871: # D√©pendances Python principales

36027:  5823:   916: "@

36033:  5829:   922: $testScript = @'

36047:  5843:   936:     """Agent mock pour les tests"""
36048:  5844:   937:

36050:  5846:   939:         self.agent_id = agent_id
36051:  5847:   940:         self.name = name

36058:  5854:   947:         return True

36061:  5857:   950:         return {
36062:  5858:   951:             "status": "success",
36063:  5859:   952:             "agent": self.agent_id,
36064:  5860:   953:             "task": task.get("name"),
36065:  5861:   954:             "result": f"Mock result from {self.name}",
36066:  5862:   955:             "timestamp": asyncio.get_event_loop().time()
36067:  5863:   956:         }
36068:  5864:   957:

36071:  5867:   960:             "agent_id": self.agent_id,
36072:  5868:   961:             "name": self.name,
36073:  5869:   962:             "version": "1.0.0",
36074:  5870:   963:             "config": self.config
36075:  5871:   964:         }
36076:  5872:   965:

36079:  5875:   968:             "status": "healthy",
36080:  5876:   969:             "agent_id": self.agent_id,
36081:  5877:   970:             "timestamp": asyncio.get_event_loop().time()
36082:  5878:   971:         }
36083:  5879:   972:

36118:  5914:  1007:     health_results = await orchestrator.health_check_all()
36119:  5915:  1008:     for agent_name, health in health_results["agents"].items():
36120:  5916:  1009:         status = "‚úÖ" if health.get("status") == "healthy" else "‚ùå"
36121:  5917:  1010:         print(f"  {status} {agent_name}: {health.get('status')}")
36122:  5918:  1011:
36123:  5919:  1012:     # Ex√©cuter un pipeline de test
36124:  5920:  1013:     print("\nüöÄ EXECUTION PIPELINE TEST:")
36125:  5921:  1014:     pipeline_config = {

36128:  5924:  1017:         "tasks": [

36131:  5927:  1020:             {"name": "generate_tests", "agent": "tester"},
36132:  5928:  1021:             {"name": "verify_contract", "agent": "formal_verification"},

36206:  6002:  1095:     agents_deployed = @(

36223:  6019:  1112:     } else { @{} }

36227:  6023:  1116:

36229:  6025:  1118: Write-Host "üéâ DEPLOIEMENT COMPLET REUSSI !" -ForegroundColor Green
36230:  6026:  1119: Write-Host "="*60 -ForegroundColor Cyan

36430:  6226:   171: from typing import Dict, Any
36431:  6227:   172:
36432:  6228:   173: class SmartContractAgent:
36433:  6229:   174:     """Basic Smart Contract Agent"""
36434:  6230:   175:
36435:  6231:   176:     def __init__(self):
36436:  6232:   177:         self.name = "Smart Contract Agent"
36437:  6233:   178:         self.version = "1.0.0"
36438:  6234:   179:
36439:  6235:   180:     def generate_contract(self, requirements: Dict[str, Any]) -> str:
36440:  6236:   181:         """Generate a smart contract based on requirements"""
36441:  6237:   182:         contract_name = requirements.get("name", "MyContract")
36442:  6238:   183:
36443:  6239:   184:         template = f'''// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT
36444:  6240:   185: pragma solidity ^0.8.19;
36445:  6241:   186:
36446:  6242:   187: contract {contract_name} {{
36447:  6243:   188:     address public owner;
36448:  6244:   189:     string public name;
36449:  6245:   190:     string public symbol;
36450:  6246:   191:
36451:  6247:   192:     constructor(string memory _name, string memory _symbol) {{
36452:  6248:   193:         owner = msg.sender;
36453:  6249:   194:         name = _name;
36454:  6250:   195:         symbol = _symbol;
36455:  6251:   196:     }}
36456:  6252:   197:
36457:  6253:   198:     modifier onlyOwner() {{
36458:  6254:   199:         require(msg.sender == owner, "Not owner");
36459:  6255:   200:         _;
36460:  6256:   201:     }}
36461:  6257:   202:
36462:  6258:   203:     function transferOwnership(address newOwner) public onlyOwner {{
36463:  6259:   204:         require(newOwner != address(0), "Invalid address");
36464:  6260:   205:         owner = newOwner;
36465:  6261:   206:     }}
36466:  6262:   207:
36467:  6263:   208:     function getContractInfo() public view returns (string memory, string memory, address) {{
36468:  6264:   209:         return (name, symbol, owner);
36469:  6265:   210:     }}
36470:  6266:   211: }}
36471:  6267:   212: '''
36472:  6268:   213:
36473:  6269:   214:         return template
36474:  6270:   215:
36475:  6271:   216:     def get_agent_info(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
36476:  6272:   217:         """Get agent information"""
36477:  6273:   218:         return {
36478:  6274:   219:             "name": self.name,
36479:  6275:   220:             "version": self.version,
36480:  6276:   221:             "capabilities": ["contract_generation", "basic_validation"]
36481:  6277:   222:         }
36482:  6278:   223: '@
36483:  6279:   224:
36484:  6280:   225: New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path "agents\smart_contract" -Force | Out-Null
36485:  6281:   226: $agentCode | Out-File -FilePath "agents\smart_contract\agent.py" -Force -Encoding UTF8
36486:  6282:   227: Write-Host "V Basic agent created" -ForegroundColor Green
36487:  6283:   228:

36493:  6289:   234: import sys

36495:  6291:   236:
36496:  6292:   237: # Add agents directory to path
36497:  6293:   238: sys.path.append(os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), "agents"))
36498:  6294:   239:
36499:  6295:   240: def test_smart_contract_agent():
36500:  6296:   241:     """Test the basic smart contract agent"""
36501:  6297:   242:     print("ü§ñ Testing Smart Contract Agent")
36502:  6298:   243:     print("=" * 40)
36503:  6299:   244:
36504:  6300:   245:     try:
36505:  6301:   246:         from smart_contract.agent import SmartContractAgent
36506:  6302:   247:
36507:  6303:   248:         # Create agent
36508:  6304:   249:         agent = SmartContractAgent()
36509:  6305:   250:         print(f"Agent: {agent.name} v{agent.version}")
36510:  6306:   251:
36511:  6307:   252:         # Test contract generation
36512:  6308:   253:         requirements = {
36513:  6309:   254:             "name": "MyToken",
36514:  6310:   255:             "symbol": "MTK"
36515:  6311:   256:         }
36516:  6312:   257:
36517:  6313:   258:         contract = agent.generate_contract(requirements)
36518:  6314:   259:
36519:  6315:   260:         print("‚úÖ Contract generated successfully")
36520:  6316:   261:         print(f"üìÑ Contract length: {len(contract)} characters")
36521:  6317:   262:
36522:  6318:   263:         # Show agent info
36523:  6319:   264:         info = agent.get_agent_info()
36524:  6320:   265:         print(f"üîß Capabilities: {', '.join(info['capabilities'])}")
36525:  6321:   266:
36526:  6322:   267:         return True
36527:  6323:   268:

36529:  6325:   270:         print(f"‚ùå Error: {e}")
36530:  6326:   271:         import traceback
36531:  6327:   272:         traceback.print_exc()
36532:  6328:   273:         return False
36533:  6329:   274:

36535:  6331:   276:     success = test_smart_contract_agent()
36536:  6332:   277:     print("=" * 40)
36537:  6333:   278:     if success:
36538:  6334:   279:         print("üéâ All tests passed!")
36539:  6335:   280:     else:
36540:  6336:   281:         print("üí• Some tests failed")
36541:  6337:   282:     sys.exit(0 if success else 1)
36542:  6338:   283: '@

36551:  6347:   292: # main.py
36552:  6348:   293: import asyncio
36553:  6349:   294: import sys
36554:  6350:   295: import os
36555:  6351:   296: from typing import Dict, Any
36556:  6352:   297:
36557:  6353:   298: class Pipeline:
36558:  6354:   299:     """Main pipeline orchestrator"""
36559:  6355:   300:
36560:  6356:   301:     def __init__(self):
36561:  6357:   302:         self.agents = {}
36562:  6358:   303:
36563:  6359:   304:     async def initialize(self):
36564:  6360:   305:         """Initialize the pipeline"""
36565:  6361:   306:         print("üöÄ Initializing Smart Contract Pipeline...")
36566:  6362:   307:
36567:  6363:   308:         # Load agents
36568:  6364:   309:         await self._load_agents()
36569:  6365:   310:
36570:  6366:   311:         print(f"‚úÖ Pipeline initialized with {len(self.agents)} agents")
36571:  6367:   312:         return True
36572:  6368:   313:
36573:  6369:   314:     async def _load_agents(self):
36574:  6370:   315:         """Load all available agents"""
36575:  6371:   316:         agents_dir = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), "agents")
36576:  6372:   317:
36577:  6373:   318:         # Load Smart Contract Agent
36578:  6374:   319:         try:
36579:  6375:   320:             from agents.smart_contract.agent import SmartContractAgent
36580:  6376:   321:             self.agents["smart_contract"] = SmartContractAgent()
36581:  6377:   322:             print("‚úÖ Smart Contract Agent loaded")
36582:  6378:   323:         except ImportError as e:
36583:  6379:   324:             print(f"‚ùå Failed to load Smart Contract Agent: {e}")
36584:  6380:   325:
36585:  6381:   326:     async def run(self):
36586:  6382:   327:         """Run the main pipeline"""
36587:  6383:   328:         print("üéØ Smart Contract Pipeline Ready!")
36588:  6384:   329:         print("=" * 50)
36589:  6385:   330:
36590:  6386:   331:         while True:
36591:  6387:   332:             print("`nAvailable commands:")
36592:  6388:   333:             print("1. Generate Smart Contract")
36593:  6389:   334:             print("2. Test Agent")
36594:  6390:   335:             print("3. Exit")
36595:  6391:   336:
36596:  6392:   337:             choice = input("Select option (1-3): ").strip()
36597:  6393:   338:
36598:  6394:   339:             if choice == "1":
36599:  6395:   340:                 await self.generate_contract()
36600:  6396:   341:             elif choice == "2":
36601:  6397:   342:                 await self.test_agent()
36602:  6398:   343:             elif choice == "3":
36603:  6399:   344:                 print("üëã Goodbye!")
36604:  6400:   345:                 break
36605:  6401:   346:             else:
36606:  6402:   347:                 print("‚ùå Invalid choice")
36607:  6403:   348:
36608:  6404:   349:     async def generate_contract(self):
36609:  6405:   350:         """Generate a smart contract"""
36610:  6406:   351:         print("`nüìù Smart Contract Generator")
36611:  6407:   352:         print("-" * 30)
36612:  6408:   353:
36613:  6409:   354:         name = input("Contract name: ").strip() or "MyContract"
36614:  6410:   355:         symbol = input("Contract symbol: ").strip() or "MC"
36615:  6411:   356:
36616:  6412:   357:         if "smart_contract" in self.agents:
36617:  6413:   358:             agent = self.agents["smart_contract"]
36618:  6414:   359:
36619:  6415:   360:             requirements = {
36620:  6416:   361:                 "name": name,
36621:  6417:   362:                 "symbol": symbol
36622:  6418:   363:             }
36623:  6419:   364:
36624:  6420:   365:             contract = agent.generate_contract(requirements)
36625:  6421:   366:
36626:  6422:   367:             print("‚úÖ Contract generated!")
36627:  6423:   368:             print("-" * 30)
36628:  6424:   369:             print(contract[:500] + "..." if len(contract) > 500 else contract)
36629:  6425:   370:             print("-" * 30)
36630:  6426:   371:
36631:  6427:   372:             # Save to file
36632:  6428:   373:             filename = f"contracts/{name}.sol"
36633:  6429:   374:             os.makedirs("contracts", exist_ok=True)
36634:  6430:   375:             with open(filename, "w") as f:
36635:  6431:   376:                 f.write(contract)
36636:  6432:   377:
36637:  6433:   378:             print(f"üìÑ Contract saved to {filename}")
36638:  6434:   379:         else:
36639:  6435:   380:             print("‚ùå Smart Contract Agent not available")
36640:  6436:   381:
36641:  6437:   382:     async def test_agent(self):
36642:  6438:   383:         """Test the agent"""
36643:  6439:   384:         print("`nüß™ Testing Agent...")
36644:  6440:   385:
36645:  6441:   386:         if "smart_contract" in self.agents:
36646:  6442:   387:             agent = self.agents["smart_contract"]
36647:  6443:   388:             info = agent.get_agent_info()
36648:  6444:   389:
36649:  6445:   390:             print(f"Agent: {info['name']}")
36650:  6446:   391:             print(f"Version: {info['version']}")
36651:  6447:   392:             print(f"Capabilities: {', '.join(info['capabilities'])}")
36652:  6448:   393:             print("‚úÖ Agent is working correctly")
36653:  6449:   394:         else:
36654:  6450:   395:             print("‚ùå No agents available")
36655:  6451:   396:
36656:  6452:   397: async def main():
36657:  6453:   398:     """Main entry point"""
36658:  6454:   399:     pipeline = Pipeline()
36659:  6455:   400:
36660:  6456:   401:     if await pipeline.initialize():
36661:  6457:   402:         await pipeline.run()
36662:  6458:   403:     else:
36663:  6459:   404:         print("‚ùå Failed to initialize pipeline")
36664:  6460:   405:
36665:  6461:   406: if __name__ == "__main__":
36666:  6462:   407:     asyncio.run(main())
36667:  6463:   408: '@
36668:  6464:   409:
36669:  6465:   410: $mainApp | Out-File -FilePath "main.py" -Force -Encoding UTF8
36670:  6466:   411: Write-Host "V Main application created" -ForegroundColor Green
