39413:  9209: SCRIPT 28 | learning\collective_learning.py
39414:  9210: Size: 4545 bytes | Type: .py | Modified: 2026-01-15 15:23:21.322240
39415:  9211: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
39416:  9212:     1: # learning/collective_learning.py
39417:  9213:     2: import hashlib
39418:  9214:     3: from typing import Dict, List
39419:  9215:     4: from pathlib import Path
39420:  9216:     5:
39421:  9217:     6: class CollectiveLearningSystem:
39422:  9218:     7:     """Syst√®me d'apprentissage partag√© bas√© sur fichiers"""
39423:  9219:     8:
39424:  9220:     9:     def __init__(self, knowledge_base_path: Path):
39425:  9221:    10:         self.knowledge_base = knowledge_base_path
39426:  9222:    11:         self.knowledge_base.mkdir(exist_ok=True)
39427:  9223:    12:
39428:  9224:    13:         # Sous-r√©pertoires
39429:  9225:    14:         self.patterns_dir = self.knowledge_base / "patterns"
39430:  9226:    15:         self.solutions_dir = self.knowledge_base / "solutions"
39431:  9227:    16:         self.mistakes_dir = self.knowledge_base / "mistakes"
39432:  9228:    17:         self.best_practices_dir = self.knowledge_base / "best_practices"
39433:  9229:    18:
39434:  9230:    19:         for dir in [self.patterns_dir, self.solutions_dir,
39435:  9231:    20:                    self.mistakes_dir, self.best_practices_dir]:
39436:  9232:    21:             dir.mkdir(exist_ok=True)
39437:  9233:    22:
39438:  9234:    23:     def store_solution(self, problem_hash: str, solution: Dict, agent_id: str):
39439:  9235:    24:         """Stocke une solution √† un probl√®me"""
39440:  9236:    25:         solution_file = self.solutions_dir / f"{problem_hash}.json"
39441:  9237:    26:
39442:  9238:    27:         data = {
39443:  9239:    28:             "problem_hash": problem_hash,
39444:  9240:    29:             "solution": solution,
39445:  9241:    30:             "agent": agent_id,
39446:  9242:    31:             "timestamp": datetime.now().isoformat(),
39447:  9243:    32:             "effectiveness": 1.0,  # Sera mis √† jour avec le feedback
39448:  9244:    33:             "usage_count": 1
39449:  9245:    34:         }
39450:  9246:    35:
39451:  9247:    36:         if solution_file.exists():
39452:  9248:    37:             # Mise √† jour du compteur d'utilisation
39453:  9249:    38:             with open(solution_file, "r") as f:
39454:  9250:    39:                 existing = json.load(f)
39455:  9251:    40:                 existing["usage_count"] += 1
39456:  9252:    41:
39457:  9253:    42:             data = existing
39458:  9254:    43:
39459:  9255:    44:         with open(solution_file, "w") as f:
39460:  9256:    45:             json.dump(data, f, indent=2)
39461:  9257:    46:
39462:  9258:    47:     def find_similar_solutions(self, problem_description: str,
39463:  9259:    48:                               threshold: float = 0.8) -> List[Dict]:
39464:  9260:    49:         """Trouve des solutions similaires"""
39465:  9261:    50:         problem_hash = self._hash_description(problem_description)
39466:  9262:    51:
39467:  9263:    52:         solutions = []
39468:  9264:    53:         for solution_file in self.solutions_dir.glob("*.json"):
39469:  9265:    54:             with open(solution_file, "r") as f:
39470:  9266:    55:                 solution_data = json.load(f)
39471:  9267:    56:
39472:  9268:    57:                 # Calcul de similarit√© basique
39473:  9269:    58:                 similarity = self._calculate_similarity(
39474:  9270:    59:                     problem_hash,
39475:  9271:    60:                     solution_data["problem_hash"]
39476:  9272:    61:                 )
39477:  9273:    62:
39478:  9274:    63:                 if similarity >= threshold:
39479:  9275:    64:                     solutions.append(solution_data)
39480:  9276:    65:
39481:  9277:    66:         return sorted(solutions, key=lambda x: x["effectiveness"], reverse=True)
39482:  9278:    67:
39483:  9279:    68:     def learn_from_mistake(self, agent_id: str, task: Dict,
39484:  9280:    69:                           error: str, correction: Dict):
39485:  9281:    70:         """Apprend d'une erreur et la partage"""
39486:  9282:    71:         mistake_id = f"{agent_id}_{datetime.now().timestamp()}"
39487:  9283:    72:         mistake_file = self.mistakes_dir / f"{mistake_id}.json"
39488:  9284:    73:
39489:  9285:    74:         with open(mistake_file, "w") as f:
39490:  9286:    75:             json.dump({
39491:  9287:    76:                 "agent": agent_id,
39492:  9288:    77:                 "task": task,
39493:  9289:    78:                 "error": error,
39494:  9290:    79:                 "correction": correction,
39495:  9291:    80:                 "timestamp": datetime.now().isoformat(),
39496:  9292:    81:                 "learned_by": [agent_id]  # Liste des agents ayant appris
39497:  9293:    82:             }, f, indent=2)
39498:  9294:    83:
39499:  9295:    84:         # Notifie les autres agents
39500:  9296:    85:         self._broadcast_learning(agent_id, "mistake_learned", mistake_id)
39501:  9297:    86:
39502:  9298:    87:     def _broadcast_learning(self, from_agent: str, learning_type: str,
39503:  9299:    88:                           content_id: str):
39504:  9300:    89:         """Diffuse un apprentissage √† tous les agents"""
39505:  9301:    90:         learning_event = {
39506:  9302:    91:             "type": learning_type,
39507:  9303:    92:             "from": from_agent,
39508:  9304:    93:             "content_id": content_id,
39509:  9305:    94:             "timestamp": datetime.now().isoformat()
39510:  9306:    95:         }
39511:  9307:    96:
39512:  9308:    97:         # √âcrit dans un fichier partag√© que tous les agents lisent
39513:  9309:    98:         event_file = self.knowledge_base / "learning_events.jsonl"
39514:  9310:    99:
39515:  9311:   100:         with open(event_file, "a") as f:
39516:  9312:   101:             f.write(json.dumps(learning_event) + "\n")
39517:  9313:   102:
39518:  9314:   103:     @staticmethod
39519:  9315:   104:     def _hash_description(description: str) -> str:
39520:  9316:   105:         """Hash une description pour comparaison"""
39521:  9317:   106:         return hashlib.md5(description.encode()).hexdigest()[:10]
39522:  9318:   107:
39523:  9319:   108:     @staticmethod
39524:  9320:   109:     def _calculate_similarity(hash1: str, hash2: str) -> float:
39525:  9321:   110:         """Calcule la similarit√© entre deux hashes"""
39526:  9322:   111:         # Simple similarit√© de Levenshtein normalis√©e
39527:  9323:   112:         from Levenshtein import distance
39528:  9324:   113:         max_len = max(len(hash1), len(hash2))
39529:  9325:   114:         if max_len == 0:
39530:  9326:   115:             return 1.0
39531:  9327:   116:         return 1 - distance(hash1, hash2) / max_len
39532:  9328: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

39581:  9377:    45:
39582:  9378:    46:     # 5. Statistiques des agents
39583:  9379:    47:     Write-Host "`nüìä STATISTIQUES:" -ForegroundColor Green
39584:  9380:    48:     if (Test-Path "$env:USERPROFILE\Projects\SmartContractPipeline\workspace\contracts\results\contract_output.json") {
39585:  9381:    49:         $contractData = Get-Content "$env:USERPROFILE\Projects\SmartContractPipeline\workspace\contracts\results\contract_output.json" | ConvertFrom-Json
39586:  9382:    50:         Write-Host "  üìù Contrats g√©n√©r√©s: 1" -ForegroundColor White
39587:  9383:    51:         Write-Host "  ‚úÖ Tests: $($contractData.tests.success)" -ForegroundColor White
39588:  9384:    52:     }
39589:  9385:    53:
39590:  9386:    54:     # 6. Menu interactif
39591:  9387:    55:     Write-Host "`n" + "="*60 -ForegroundColor Cyan
39592:  9388:    56:     Write-Host "üîß MENU INTERACTIF" -ForegroundColor Yellow
39593:  9389:    57:     Write-Host "1. Red√©marrer le pipeline"
39594:  9390:    58:     Write-Host "2. Voir les logs"
39595:  9391:    59:     Write-Host "3. G√©n√©rer un nouveau contrat"
39596:  9392:    60:     Write-Host "4. Arr√™ter le syst√®me"
39597:  9393:    61:     Write-Host "Q. Quitter"
39598:  9394:    62:     Write-Host "="*60 -ForegroundColor Cyan
39599:  9395:    63:
39600:  9396:    64:     $choice = Read-Host "`nChoix"
39601:  9397:    65:
39602:  9398:    66:     switch ($choice) {
39603:  9399:    67:         "1" { .\run-pipeline.ps1 }
39604:  9400:    68:         "2" {
39605:  9401:    69:             Get-Content "$env:USERPROFILE\Projects\SmartContractPipeline\reports\health_monitor.json" | Write-Host
39606:  9402:    70:             Read-Host "Appuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer"
39607:  9403:    71:             Show-Dashboard
39608:  9404:    72:         }

39610:  9406:    74:             .\deploy-agents.ps1
39611:  9407:    75:             Show-Dashboard
39612:  9408:    76:         }
39613:  9409:    77:         "4" { .\stop-all.ps1 }
39614:  9410:    78:         "Q" { exit }
39615:  9411:    79:         default { Show-Dashboard }
39616:  9412:    80:     }
39617:  9413:    81: }

39721:  9517:    97:         throw

39723:  9519:    99: }

39738:  9534:   114:
39739:  9535:   115: function Write-Log {
39740:  9536:   116:     param(
39741:  9537:   117:         [string]$Message,
39742:  9538:   118:         [string]$Level = 'Info',
39743:  9539:   119:         [switch]$NoNewLine
39744:  9540:   120:     )
39745:  9541:   121:
39746:  9542:   122:     $timestamp = Get-Date -Format "HH:mm:ss"
39747:  9543:   123:     $colors = @{Info='White'; Success='Green'; Warning='Yellow'; Error='Red'}
39748:  9544:   124:     $symbols = @{Info='¬ª'; Success='‚úì'; Warning='‚ö†'; Error='‚úó'}
39749:  9545:   125:
39750:  9546:   126:     $output = "[$timestamp] $($symbols[$Level]) $Message"
39751:  9547:   127:     Write-Host $output -ForegroundColor $colors[$Level] -NoNewLine:$NoNewLine
39752:  9548:   128:
39753:  9549:   129:     # Log fichier
39754:  9550:   130:     try {
39755:  9551:   131:         $config = Get-Config
39756:  9552:   132:         $logFile = Join-Path $config.LogDir "install-$(Get-Date -Format 'yyyyMMdd').log"
39757:  9553:   133:         "[$timestamp] [$Level] $Message" | Out-File $logFile -Append -Encoding UTF8
39758:  9554:   134:     } catch {}
39759:  9555:   135: }
39760:  9556:   136:
39761:  9557:   137: function Test-Admin {
39762:  9558:   138:     try {
39763:  9559:   139:         $identity = [Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity]::GetCurrent()
39764:  9560:   140:         $principal = New-Object Security.Principal.WindowsPrincipal($identity)
39765:  9561:   141:         return $principal.IsInRole([Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole]::Administrator)
39766:  9562:   142:     } catch {
39767:  9563:   143:         return $false
39768:  9564:   144:     }
39769:  9565:   145: }
39770:  9566:   146:
39771:  9567:   147: function Test-DriveSpace {
39772:  9568:   148:     try {
39773:  9569:   149:         $drive = Get-PSDrive -Name "D" -ErrorAction Stop
39774:  9570:   150:         $freeGB = [math]::Round($drive.Free / 1GB, 2)
39775:  9571:   151:         Write-Log "D: a $freeGB GB libre" -Level Info
39776:  9572:   152:         return ($freeGB -ge 20)
39777:  9573:   153:     } catch {
39778:  9574:   154:         Write-Log "Impossible de v√©rifier D:" -Level Error
39779:  9575:   155:         return $false
39780:  9576:   156:     }
39781:  9577:   157: }

39787:  9583:   163: function Install-Chocolatey {
39788:  9584:   164:     if (Get-Command choco -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) {
39789:  9585:   165:         Write-Log "Chocolatey d√©j√† install√©" -Level Success
39790:  9586:   166:         return $true
39791:  9587:   167:     }
39792:  9588:   168:
39793:  9589:   169:     Write-Log "Installation Chocolatey..." -Level Info
39794:  9590:   170:
39795:  9591:   171:     try {
39796:  9592:   172:         $originalPolicy = Get-ExecutionPolicy -Scope Process
39797:  9593:   173:         Set-ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Scope Process -Force
39798:  9594:   174:
39799:  9595:   175:         [System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol -bor 3072
39800:  9596:   176:         iex ((New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://community.chocolatey.org/install.ps1'))
39801:  9597:   177:
39802:  9598:   178:         Set-ExecutionPolicy $originalPolicy -Scope Process -Force
39803:  9599:   179:
39804:  9600:   180:         Start-Sleep -Seconds 3
39805:  9601:   181:         if (Get-Command choco -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) {
39806:  9602:   182:             Write-Log "Chocolatey install√©" -Level Success
39807:  9603:   183:             return $true
39808:  9604:   184:         }
39809:  9605:   185:         throw "Installation √©chou√©e"
39810:  9606:   186:     } catch {
39811:  9607:   187:         Write-Log "√âchec Chocolatey: $_" -Level Error
39812:  9608:   188:         return $false
39813:  9609:   189:     }
39814:  9610:   190: }
39815:  9611:   191:
39816:  9612:   192: function Install-BasePackages {
39817:  9613:   193:     $config = Get-Config
39818:  9614:   194:     Write-Log "Installation packages..." -Level Info
39819:  9615:   195:
39820:  9616:   196:     $success = 0
39821:  9617:   197:     foreach ($package in $config.ChocolateyPackages) {
39822:  9618:   198:         try {
39823:  9619:   199:             Write-Log "  $package..." -Level Info -NoNewLine
39824:  9620:   200:
39825:  9621:   201:             if (choco list --local-only $package --exact) {
39826:  9622:   202:                 Write-Log " (d√©j√† install√©)" -Level Success
39827:  9623:   203:                 $success++
39828:  9624:   204:                 continue
39829:  9625:   205:             }
39830:  9626:   206:
39831:  9627:   207:             choco install $package -y --no-progress
39832:  9628:   208:             if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
39833:  9629:   209:                 Write-Log " ‚úì" -Level Success
39834:  9630:   210:                 $success++
39835:  9631:   211:             } else {
39836:  9632:   212:                 Write-Log " (code $LASTEXITCODE)" -Level Warning
39837:  9633:   213:             }
39838:  9634:   214:         } catch {
39839:  9635:   215:             Write-Log " (erreur)" -Level Warning
39840:  9636:   216:         }
39841:  9637:   217:     }
39842:  9638:   218:
39843:  9639:   219:     refreshenv
39844:  9640:   220:     return $true
39845:  9641:   221: }
39846:  9642:   222:
39847:  9643:   223: function Install-Python {
39848:  9644:   224:     if (Get-Command python -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) {
39849:  9645:   225:         $version = python --version 2>&1
39850:  9646:   226:         Write-Log "Python: $version" -Level Success
39851:  9647:   227:         return $true
39852:  9648:   228:     }
39853:  9649:   229:
39854:  9650:   230:     Write-Log "Installation Python..." -Level Info
39855:  9651:   231:
39856:  9652:   232:     try {
39857:  9653:   233:         choco install python311 -y --no-progress
39858:  9654:   234:         refreshenv
39859:  9655:   235:         Start-Sleep -Seconds 3
39860:  9656:   236:
39861:  9657:   237:         if (Get-Command python -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) {
39862:  9658:   238:             Write-Log "Python install√©" -Level Success
39863:  9659:   239:             return $true
39864:  9660:   240:         }
39865:  9661:   241:         throw "Python non d√©tect√©"
39866:  9662:   242:     } catch {
39867:  9663:   243:         Write-Log "√âchec Python: $_" -Level Error
39868:  9664:   244:         return $false
39869:  9665:   245:     }
39870:  9666:   246: }
39871:  9667:   247:
39872:  9668:   248: function Setup-PythonEnvironment {
39873:  9669:   249:     $config = Get-Config
39874:  9670:   250:     Write-Log "Configuration environnement Python..." -Level Info
39875:  9671:   251:
39876:  9672:   252:     # Environnement virtuel
39877:  9673:   253:     if (-not (Test-Path $config.VenvPath)) {
39878:  9674:   254:         try {
39879:  9675:   255:             python -m venv $config.VenvPath
39880:  9676:   256:             Write-Log "Environnement cr√©√©" -Level Success
39881:  9677:   257:         } catch {
39882:  9678:   258:             Write-Log "√âchec cr√©ation environnement: $_" -Level Error
39883:  9679:   259:             return $false
39884:  9680:   260:         }
39885:  9681:   261:     }
39886:  9682:   262:
39887:  9683:   263:     # Activer
39888:  9684:   264:     try {
39889:  9685:   265:         $activate = Join-Path $config.VenvPath "Scripts\Activate.ps1"
39890:  9686:   266:         if (Test-Path $activate) {
39891:  9687:   267:             . $activate
39892:  9688:   268:         }
39893:  9689:   269:     } catch {}
39894:  9690:   270:
39895:  9691:   271:     # Mettre √† jour pip
39896:  9692:   272:     try {
39897:  9693:   273:         python -m pip install --upgrade pip --disable-pip-version-check
39898:  9694:   274:     } catch {}
39899:  9695:   275:
39900:  9696:   276:     return $true
39901:  9697:   277: }
39902:  9698:   278:
39903:  9699:   279: function Install-PythonDependencies {

39905:  9701:   281:
39906:  9702:   282:     # Cr√©er requirements.txt si absent
39907:  9703:   283:     if (-not (Test-Path $config.RequirementsFile)) {
39908:  9704:   284:         @"
39909:  9705:   285: fastapi>=0.104.0
39910:  9706:   286: uvicorn[standard]>=0.24.0
39911:  9707:   287: web3>=6.10.0

39913:  9709:   289: langchain>=0.1.0
39914:  9710:   290: ollama>=0.1.0
39915:  9711:   291: requests>=2.31.0
39916:  9712:   292: "@ | Out-File $config.RequirementsFile -Encoding UTF8
39917:  9713:   293:     }
39918:  9714:   294:
39919:  9715:   295:     Write-Log "Installation d√©pendances..." -Level Info
39920:  9716:   296:
39921:  9717:   297:     try {
39922:  9718:   298:         pip install -r $config.RequirementsFile --no-cache-dir
39923:  9719:   299:         Write-Log "D√©pendances install√©es" -Level Success
39924:  9720:   300:         return $true
39925:  9721:   301:     } catch {
39926:  9722:   302:         Write-Log "√âchec d√©pendances: $_" -Level Error
39927:  9723:   303:         return $false
39928:  9724:   304:     }
39929:  9725:   305: }
39930:  9726:   306:
39931:  9727:   307: function Install-Ollama {
39932:  9728:   308:     Write-Log "Installation d'Ollama..." -Level Info
39933:  9729:   309:
39934:  9730:   310:     # Chemin D: cible
39935:  9731:   311:     $ollamaPath = "D:\Ollama"
39936:  9732:   312:     $ollamaExe = Join-Path $ollamaPath "ollama.exe"
39937:  9733:   313:
39938:  9734:   314:     # V√©rifier si d√©j√† install√© sur D:
39939:  9735:   315:     if (Test-Path $ollamaExe) {
39940:  9736:   316:         $version = & $ollamaExe --version 2>&1
39941:  9737:   317:         Write-Log "[OK] Ollama d√©j√† install√© sur D:: $version" -Level Success
39942:  9738:   318:         return $true
39943:  9739:   319:     }
39944:  9740:   320:
39945:  9741:   321:     # T√©l√©charger
39946:  9742:   322:     Write-Log "T√©l√©chargement d'Ollama (1.2GB)..." -Level Info
39947:  9743:   323:
39948:  9744:   324:     try {
39949:  9745:   325:         $installerPath = Join-Path $Script:Config.TempDir "OllamaSetup.exe"
39950:  9746:   326:
39951:  9747:   327:         # Nettoyer l'ancien fichier
39952:  9748:   328:         if (Test-Path $installerPath) {
39953:  9749:   329:             Remove-Item -Path $installerPath -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
39954:  9750:   330:         }
39955:  9751:   331:
39956:  9752:   332:         # T√©l√©charger
39957:  9753:   333:         $progressPreference = 'SilentlyContinue'
39958:  9754:   334:         Invoke-WebRequest -Uri $Script:Config.Urls.Ollama -OutFile $installerPath -UseBasicParsing
39959:  9755:   335:
39960:  9756:   336:         $size = [math]::Round((Get-Item $installerPath).Length/1MB, 2)
39961:  9757:   337:         Write-Log "[OK] T√©l√©chargement r√©ussi ($size MB)" -Level Success
39962:  9758:   338:
39963:  9759:   339:         # === M√âTHODE D√âFINITIVE : Installation Interactive avec Contr√¥le ===
39964:  9760:   340:
39965:  9761:   341:         # 1. Pr√©parer D:\Ollama
39966:  9762:   342:         if (-not (Test-Path $ollamaPath)) {
39967:  9763:   343:             New-Item -Path $ollamaPath -ItemType Directory -Force | Out-Null
39968:  9764:   344:             Write-Log "Dossier pr√©par√©: $ollamaPath" -Level Info
39969:  9765:   345:         }
39970:  9766:   346:
39971:  9767:   347:         # 2. Instructions CLAIRES
39972:  9768:   348:         Write-Host "`n" -ForegroundColor Cyan
39973:  9769:   349:         Write-Host "‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê" -ForegroundColor Cyan
39974:  9770:   350:         Write-Host "‚îÇ                INSTALLATION OLLAMA - IMPORTANT             ‚îÇ" -ForegroundColor Red

39988:  9784:   364:         Write-Host "`n"
39989:  9785:   365:

39991:  9787:   367:         Write-Host "L'installateur s'ouvre dans 10 secondes..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
39992:  9788:   368:         for ($i = 10; $i -gt 0; $i--) {
39993:  9789:   369:             Write-Host "  $i..." -ForegroundColor Gray -NoNewline
39994:  9790:   370:             Start-Sleep -Seconds 1
39995:  9791:   371:         }

39997:  9793:   373:
39998:  9794:   374:         # 4. Ouvrir l'installateur
39999:  9795:   375:         Write-Log "Ouverture de l'installateur Ollama..." -Level Info
40000:  9796:   376:         $process = Start-Process -FilePath $installerPath -Wait -PassThru
40001:  9797:   377:
40002:  9798:   378:         # 5. Attendre et v√©rifier
40003:  9799:   379:         Write-Log "Attente de l'installation..." -Level Info
40004:  9800:   380:         Start-Sleep -Seconds 20
40005:  9801:   381:
40006:  9802:   382:         # 6. V√©rifier l'installation sur D:
40007:  9803:   383:         if (Test-Path $ollamaExe) {
40008:  9804:   384:             Write-Log "[OK] Ollama install√© sur D:" -Level Success
40009:  9805:   385:
40010:  9806:   386:             # Configurer le PATH
40011:  9807:   387:             $env:Path += ";$ollamaPath"
40012:  9808:   388:             [Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable("Path", $env:Path, [EnvironmentVariableTarget]::Machine)
40013:  9809:   389:
40014:  9810:   390:             # Configurer les mod√®les sur D:
40015:  9811:   391:             $modelsPath = "D:\Ollama\Models"
40016:  9812:   392:             if (-not (Test-Path $modelsPath)) {
40017:  9813:   393:                 New-Item -Path $modelsPath -ItemType Directory -Force | Out-Null
40018:  9814:   394:             }
40019:  9815:   395:
40020:  9816:   396:             [Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable("OLLAMA_MODELS", $modelsPath, [EnvironmentVariableTarget]::User)
40021:  9817:   397:             [Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable("OLLAMA_MODELS", $modelsPath, [EnvironmentVariableTarget]::Machine)
40022:  9818:   398:             $env:OLLAMA_MODELS = $modelsPath
40023:  9819:   399:
40024:  9820:   400:             Write-Log "Dossier des mod√®les configur√©: $modelsPath" -Level Success
40025:  9821:   401:

40027:  9823:   403:             Write-Log "D√©marrage du service Ollama..." -Level Info
40028:  9824:   404:             Start-Process $ollamaExe -ArgumentList "serve" -WindowStyle Hidden
40029:  9825:   405:             Start-Sleep -Seconds 10
40030:  9826:   406:
40031:  9827:   407:             # T√©l√©charger les mod√®les
40032:  9828:   408:             Write-Log "T√©l√©chargement des mod√®les IA..." -Level Info
40033:  9829:   409:
40034:  9830:   410:             foreach ($model in $Script:Config.OllamaModels) {
40035:  9831:   411:                 try {
40036:  9832:   412:                     Write-Log "  T√©l√©chargement de $model..." -Level Info -NoNewLine
40037:  9833:   413:                     & $ollamaExe pull $model 2>&1 | Out-Null
40038:  9834:   414:                     Write-Log " [OK]" -Level Success
40039:  9835:   415:                 } catch {
40040:  9836:   416:                     Write-Log " [ECHEC]" -Level Warning
40041:  9837:   417:                 }
40042:  9838:   418:             }
40043:  9839:   419:

40045:  9841:   421:             return $true
40046:  9842:   422:

40048:  9844:   424:             # V√©rifier si install√© sur C: par erreur
40049:  9845:   425:             $ollamaC = Get-Command ollama -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
40050:  9846:   426:             if ($ollamaC) {

40081:  9877:   457:
40082:  9878:   458: function Install-NodeJS {
40083:  9879:   459:     if (Get-Command node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) {
40084:  9880:   460:         $version = node --version
40085:  9881:   461:         Write-Log "Node.js: $version" -Level Success
40086:  9882:   462:         return $true
40087:  9883:   463:     }
40088:  9884:   464:
40089:  9885:   465:     Write-Log "Installation Node.js..." -Level Info
40090:  9886:   466:
40091:  9887:   467:     try {
40092:  9888:   468:         choco install nodejs-lts -y --no-progress
40093:  9889:   469:         refreshenv
40094:  9890:   470:         Start-Sleep -Seconds 3
40095:  9891:   471:
40096:  9892:   472:         if (Get-Command node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) {
40097:  9893:   473:             Write-Log "Node.js install√©" -Level Success
40098:  9894:   474:             return $true
40099:  9895:   475:         }
40100:  9896:   476:         return $false
40101:  9897:   477:     } catch {
40102:  9898:   478:         Write-Log "√âchec Node.js: $_" -Level Warning
40103:  9899:   479:         return $false
40104:  9900:   480:     }
40105:  9901:   481: }
40106:  9902:   482:
40107:  9903:   483: function Install-Git {
40108:  9904:   484:     if (Get-Command git -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) {
40109:  9905:   485:         $version = git --version
40110:  9906:   486:         Write-Log "Git: $version" -Level Success
40111:  9907:   487:         return $true
40112:  9908:   488:     }
40113:  9909:   489:
40114:  9910:   490:     Write-Log "Installation Git..." -Level Info
40115:  9911:   491:
40116:  9912:   492:     try {
40117:  9913:   493:         choco install git -y --no-progress
40118:  9914:   494:         refreshenv
40119:  9915:   495:         Write-Log "Git install√©" -Level Success
40120:  9916:   496:         return $true
40121:  9917:   497:     } catch {
40122:  9918:   498:         Write-Log "√âchec Git: $_" -Level Warning
40123:  9919:   499:         return $false
40124:  9920:   500:     }
40125:  9921:   501: }
40126:  9922:   502:
40127:  9923:   503: function Test-Installations {
40128:  9924:   504:     $config = Get-Config
40129:  9925:   505:     Write-Log "Validation finale..." -Level Info
40130:  9926:   506:
40131:  9927:   507:     $tests = @(
40132:  9928:   508:         @{Name="Python"; Test={Get-Command python -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue}},
40133:  9929:   509:         @{Name="Environnement"; Test={Test-Path $config.VenvPath}},
40134:  9930:   510:         @{Name="Node.js"; Test={Get-Command node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue}},
40135:  9931:   511:         @{Name="Git"; Test={Get-Command git -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue}},
40136:  9932:   512:         @{Name="Ollama"; Test={
40137:  9933:   513:             $ollamaExe = Join-Path $config.InstallPaths.Ollama "ollama.exe"
40138:  9934:   514:             (Test-Path $ollamaExe) -or (Get-Command ollama -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)
40139:  9935:   515:         }}
40140:  9936:   516:     )
40141:  9937:   517:
40142:  9938:   518:     $allPassed = $true
40143:  9939:   519:     foreach ($test in $tests) {
40144:  9940:   520:         $passed = & $test.Test
40145:  9941:   521:         $status = if ($passed) { "‚úì" } else { "‚úó" }
40146:  9942:   522:         $level = if ($passed) { "Success" } else { "Warning" }
40147:  9943:   523:
40148:  9944:   524:         Write-Log "$status $($test.Name)" -Level $level
40149:  9945:   525:
40150:  9946:   526:         if (-not $passed -and $test.Name -in @("Python", "Environnement")) {
40151:  9947:   527:             $allPassed = $false
40152:  9948:   528:         }
40153:  9949:   529:     }
40154:  9950:   530:
40155:  9951:   531:     return $allPassed
40156:  9952:   532: }
40157:  9953:   533:
40158:  9954:   534: # -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
40159:  9955:   535: # FONCTION PRINCIPALE
40160:  9956:   536: # -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
40161:  9957:   537:
40162:  9958:   538: function Main {
40163:  9959:   539:     # En-t√™te
40164:  9960:   540:     Write-Host "`n" + ("="*70) -ForegroundColor Cyan
40165:  9961:   541:     Write-Host "SMART CONTRACT PIPELINE - INSTALLATION COMPL√àTE" -ForegroundColor Cyan
40166:  9962:   542:     Write-Host "Version: 2.2.0" -ForegroundColor Cyan
40167:  9963:   543:     Write-Host "="*70 -ForegroundColor Cyan
40168:  9964:   544:     Write-Host "`n"
40169:  9965:   545:
40170:  9966:   546:     try {
40171:  9967:   547:         # Initialisation
40172:  9968:   548:         $config = Initialize-Configuration
40173:  9969:   549:
40174:  9970:   550:         # Cr√©er logs
40175:  9971:   551:         if (-not (Test-Path $config.LogDir)) {
40176:  9972:   552:             New-Item -Path $config.LogDir -ItemType Directory -Force | Out-Null
40177:  9973:   553:         }
40178:  9974:   554:
40179:  9975:   555:         $logFile = Join-Path $config.LogDir "install-$(Get-Date -Format 'yyyyMMdd-HHmmss').log"
40180:  9976:   556:         Start-Transcript -Path $logFile -Append
40181:  9977:   557:
40182:  9978:   558:         Write-Log "D√©but installation compl√®te" -Level Info
40183:  9979:   559:
40184:  9980:   560:         # V√©rifications
40185:  9981:   561:         Write-Log "√âtape 1: V√©rifications syst√®me" -Level Info
40186:  9982:   562:         if (-not (Test-DriveSpace)) {
40187:  9983:   563:             throw "Espace D: insuffisant"
40188:  9984:   564:         }
40189:  9985:   565:
40190:  9986:   566:         if (-not (Test-Admin)) {
40191:  9987:   567:             Write-Log "‚ö† Administration recommand√©e" -Level Warning
40192:  9988:   568:         }
40193:  9989:   569:
40194:  9990:   570:         # Chocolatey
40195:  9991:   571:         Write-Log "`n√âtape 2: Chocolatey" -Level Info
40196:  9992:   572:         if (-not (Install-Chocolatey)) {
40197:  9993:   573:             throw "√âchec Chocolatey"
40198:  9994:   574:         }
40199:  9995:   575:
40200:  9996:   576:         # Packages
40201:  9997:   577:         Write-Log "`n√âtape 3: Packages syst√®me" -Level Info
40202:  9998:   578:         Install-BasePackages
40203:  9999:   579:
40204: 10000:   580:         # Python
40205: 10001:   581:         Write-Log "`n√âtape 4: Python" -Level Info
40206: 10002:   582:         if (-not (Install-Python)) {
40207: 10003:   583:             throw "√âchec Python"
40208: 10004:   584:         }
40209: 10005:   585:
40210: 10006:   586:         if (-not (Setup-PythonEnvironment)) {
40211: 10007:   587:             throw "√âchec environnement Python"
40212: 10008:   588:         }
40213: 10009:   589:
40214: 10010:   590:         if (-not (Install-PythonDependencies)) {
40215: 10011:   591:             throw "√âchec d√©pendances Python"
40216: 10012:   592:         }
40217: 10013:   593:
40218: 10014:   594:         # Node.js
40219: 10015:   595:         Write-Log "`n√âtape 5: Node.js" -Level Info
40220: 10016:   596:         Install-NodeJS
40221: 10017:   597:
40222: 10018:   598:         # Ollama (CRITIQUE - avec nettoyage)
40223: 10019:   599:         Write-Log "`n√âtape 6: Ollama (Agents IA)" -Level Info
40224: 10020:   600:         if (-not (Install-Ollama)) {
40225: 10021:   601:             Write-Log "Ollama n√©cessite installation manuelle" -Level Error
40226: 10022:   602:             # Mais on continue, c'est optionnel pour le pipeline de base
40227: 10023:   603:         }
40228: 10024:   604:
40229: 10025:   605:         # Git
40230: 10026:   606:         Write-Log "`n√âtape 7: Git" -Level Info
40231: 10027:   607:         Install-Git
40232: 10028:   608:
40233: 10029:   609:         # Validation
40234: 10030:   610:         Write-Log "`n√âtape 8: Validation" -Level Info
40235: 10031:   611:         $allPassed = Test-Installations
40236: 10032:   612:
40237: 10033:   613:         # Conclusion
40238: 10034:   614:         Write-Host "`n" + ("="*70) -ForegroundColor Cyan
40239: 10035:   615:         if ($allPassed) {
40240: 10036:   616:             Write-Host "‚úÖ INSTALLATION R√âUSSIE" -ForegroundColor Green
40241: 10037:   617:         } else {
40242: 10038:   618:             Write-Host "‚ö† INSTALLATION PARTIELLE" -ForegroundColor Yellow
40243: 10039:   619:         }
40244: 10040:   620:
40245: 10041:   621:         Write-Host "="*70 -ForegroundColor Cyan
40246: 10042:   622:
40247: 10043:   623:         # Instructions finales
40248: 10044:   624:         Write-Host "`nProchaines √©tapes:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
40249: 10045:   625:         Write-Host "1. Environnement virtuel activ√©" -ForegroundColor White
40250: 10046:   626:         Write-Host "2. Testez: python -c 'import web3; print(\"Web3 OK\")'" -ForegroundColor White
40251: 10047:   627:         Write-Host "3. Si Ollama install√©: ollama list" -ForegroundColor White
40252: 10048:   628:         Write-Host "4. Lancez le pipeline: python main.py" -ForegroundColor White
40253: 10049:   629:
40254: 10050:   630:         # Marqueur
40255: 10051:   631:         $marker = Join-Path $config.ProjectRoot ".installed"
40256: 10052:   632:         @{
40257: 10053:   633:             Date = Get-Date -Format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
40258: 10054:   634:             Version = $config.Version
40259: 10055:   635:             Success = $allPassed
40260: 10056:   636:             OllamaInstalled = (Test-Path (Join-Path $config.InstallPaths.Ollama "ollama.exe"))
40261: 10057:   637:         } | ConvertTo-Json | Out-File $marker -Encoding UTF8
40262: 10058:   638:
40263: 10059:   639:         Write-Log "Installation termin√©e" -Level Success
40264: 10060:   640:         return $allPassed
40265: 10061:   641:
40266: 10062:   642:     } catch {
40267: 10063:   643:         Write-Log "ERREUR: $_" -Level Error
40268: 10064:   644:         return $false
40269: 10065:   645:     } finally {
40270: 10066:   646:         Stop-Transcript | Out-Null
40271: 10067:   647:         Write-Host "`nLog: $logFile" -ForegroundColor Gray
40272: 10068:   648:     }
40273: 10069:   649: }
40274: 10070:   650:
40275: 10071:   651: # -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
40276: 10072:   652: # EX√âCUTION
40277: 10073:   653: # -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
40278: 10074:   654:
40279: 10075:   655: try {
40280: 10076:   656:     # D√©sactiver l'environnement virtuel actuel si pr√©sent
40281: 10077:   657:     if ($env:VIRTUAL_ENV) {
40282: 10078:   658:         deactivate 2>$null
40283: 10079:   659:     }
40284: 10080:   660:
40285: 10081:   661:     $success = Main
40286: 10082:   662:     exit $(if ($success) { 0 } else { 1 })
40287: 10083:   663: } catch {
40288: 10084:   664:     Write-Host "ERREUR FATALE: $_" -ForegroundColor Red
40289: 10085:   665:     exit 1
40290: 10086:   666: }

40378: 10174:     5: function Test-CommandExists {
40379: 10175:     6:     param([string]$CommandName)
40380: 10176:     7:     try {
40381: 10177:     8:         # Essayer d'abord la m√©thode standard
40382: 10178:     9:         $cmd = Get-Command $CommandName -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
40383: 10179:    10:         if ($null -ne $cmd) {
40384: 10180:    11:             return $true
40385: 10181:    12:         }
40386: 10182:    13:
40387: 10183:    14:         # V√©rifier sur le disque D: sp√©cifiquement
40388: 10184:    15:         if ($CommandName -eq "forge") {
40389: 10185:    16:             $forgePaths = @(
40390: 10186:    17:                 "D:\Foundry\forge.exe",
40391: 10187:    18:                 "D:\foundry\forge.exe",
40392: 10188:    19:                 "$env:ProgramFiles\Foundry\bin\forge.exe",
40393: 10189:    20:                 "$env:USERPROFILE\.foundry\bin\forge.exe"
40394: 10190:    21:             )
40395: 10191:    22:
40396: 10192:    23:             foreach ($path in $forgePaths) {
40397: 10193:    24:                 if (Test-Path $path) {
40398: 10194:    25:                     # Ajouter au PATH de la session si trouv√©
40399: 10195:    26:                     $binDir = Split-Path $path -Parent
40400: 10196:    27:                     if ($env:Path -notlike "*$binDir*") {
40401: 10197:    28:                         $env:Path += ";$binDir"
40402: 10198:    29:                     }
40403: 10199:    30:                     return $true
40404: 10200:    31:                 }
40405: 10201:    32:             }
40406: 10202:    33:         }
40407: 10203:    34:
40408: 10204:    35:         return $false
40409: 10205:    36:     } catch {
40410: 10206:    37:         return $false
40411: 10207:    38:     }
40412: 10208:    39: }
40413: 10209:    40:
40414: 10210:    41: function Write-InstallLog {
40415: 10211:    42:     param([string]$Message, [string]$Type = "INFO")
40416: 10212:    43:     $timestamp = Get-Date -Format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
40417: 10213:    44:     $color = "White"
40418: 10214:    45:     if ($Type -eq "SUCCESS") { $color = "Green" }
40419: 10215:    46:     elseif ($Type -eq "ERROR") { $color = "Red" }
40420: 10216:    47:     elseif ($Type -eq "WARNING") { $color = "Yellow" }
40421: 10217:    48:     Write-Host "[$timestamp] $Type : $Message" -ForegroundColor $color
40422: 10218:    49: }
40423: 10219:    50:
40424: 10220:    51: function Invoke-Silent {
40425: 10221:    52:     param([string]$Command)
40426: 10222:    53:     try {
40427: 10223:    54:         Invoke-Expression $Command 2>$null 1>$null
40428: 10224:    55:         return $true
40429: 10225:    56:     } catch {
40430: 10226:    57:         return $false
40431: 10227:    58:     }
40432: 10228:    59: }

40445: 10241:    72:

40447: 10243:    74:     "D:\Foundry\forge.exe",

40449: 10245:    76:     "D:\Foundry\bin\forge.exe",

40459: 10255:    86:         $binDir = Split-Path $path -Parent

40466: 10262:    93:         break
40467: 10263:    94:     }
40468: 10264:    95: }
40469: 10265:    96:

40476: 10272:   103:         if ($forgeVersion -match "forge") {

40478: 10274:   105:         } else {
40479: 10275:   106:             # Essayer en appelant directement
40480: 10276:   107:             $directPath = $foundryPath
40481: 10277:   108:             & $directPath --version 2>&1 | ForEach-Object {
40482: 10278:   109:                 if ($_ -match "forge") {

40484: 10280:   111:                 }
40485: 10281:   112:             }

40748: 10544: SCRIPT 33 | storage\file_based_storage.py
40749: 10545: Size: 4782 bytes | Type: .py | Modified: 2026-01-15 15:24:16.678642
40750: 10546: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
40751: 10547:     1: # storage/file_based_storage.py
40752: 10548:     2: import json
40753: 10549:     3: import yaml
40754: 10550:     4: import pickle
40755: 10551:     5: from pathlib import Path
40756: 10552:     6: from typing import Any, Dict, List
40757: 10553:     7: from dataclasses import dataclass, asdict
40758: 10554:     8:
40759: 10555:     9: @dataclass
40760: 10556:    10: class AgentState:
40761: 10557:    11:     """√âtat d'un agent stock√© dans des fichiers"""
40762: 10558:    12:     agent_id: str
40763: 10559:    13:     current_task: Dict[str, Any]
40764: 10560:    14:     context: Dict[str, Any]
40765: 10561:    15:     memory: List[Dict[str, Any]]
40766: 10562:    16:     performance: Dict[str, float]
40767: 10563:    17:
40768: 10564:    18:     def save(self, base_path: Path):
40769: 10565:    19:         """Sauvegarde l'√©tat dans des fichiers"""
40770: 10566:    20:         agent_dir = base_path / self.agent_id
40771: 10567:    21:         agent_dir.mkdir(exist_ok=True)
40772: 10568:    22:
40773: 10569:    23:         # Sauvegarde en JSON (lisible)
40774: 10570:    24:         with open(agent_dir / "state.json", "w") as f:
40775: 10571:    25:             json.dump(asdict(self), f, indent=2)
40776: 10572:    26:
40777: 10573:    27:         # Sauvegarde en pickle pour la performance
40778: 10574:    28:         with open(agent_dir / "state.pkl", "wb") as f:
40779: 10575:    29:             pickle.dump(self, f)
40780: 10576:    30:
40781: 10577:    31:         # Sauvegarde du contexte s√©par√©ment
40782: 10578:    32:         context_file = agent_dir / "context" / f"context_{datetime.now().timestamp()}.json"
40783: 10579:    33:         context_file.parent.mkdir(exist_ok=True)
40784: 10580:    34:         with open(context_file, "w") as f:
40785: 10581:    35:             json.dump(self.context, f, indent=2)
40786: 10582:    36:
40787: 10583:    37:     @classmethod
40788: 10584:    38:     def load(cls, agent_id: str, base_path: Path):
40789: 10585:    39:         """Charge l'√©tat depuis les fichiers"""
40790: 10586:    40:         agent_dir = base_path / agent_id
40791: 10587:    41:
40792: 10588:    42:         try:
40793: 10589:    43:             # Essaye d'abord le pickle (plus rapide)
40794: 10590:    44:             with open(agent_dir / "state.pkl", "rb") as f:
40795: 10591:    45:                 return pickle.load(f)
40796: 10592:    46:         except:
40797: 10593:    47:             # Fallback sur JSON
40798: 10594:    48:             with open(agent_dir / "state.json", "r") as f:
40799: 10595:    49:                 data = json.load(f)
40800: 10596:    50:                 return cls(**data)
40801: 10597:    51:
40802: 10598:    52: class ProjectFileSystem:
40803: 10599:    53:     """Gestionnaire du syst√®me de fichiers du projet"""
40804: 10600:    54:
40805: 10601:    55:     def __init__(self, project_root: Path):
40806: 10602:    56:         self.root = project_root
40807: 10603:    57:
40808: 10604:    58:         # Structure de base
40809: 10605:    59:         self.directories = {
40810: 10606:    60:             "agents": self.root / "agents",
40811: 10607:    61:             "context": self.root / "context",
40812: 10608:    62:             "memory": self.root / "memory",
40813: 10609:    63:             "workspace": self.root / "workspace",
40814: 10610:    64:             "sprints": self.root / "sprints",
40815: 10611:    65:             "reports": self.root / "reports",
40816: 10612:    66:             "logs": self.root / "logs",
40817: 10613:    67:         }
40818: 10614:    68:
40819: 10615:    69:         # Initialisation
40820: 10616:    70:         self._init_structure()
40821: 10617:    71:
40822: 10618:    72:     def _init_structure(self):
40823: 10619:    73:         """Cr√©e la structure de dossiers"""
40824: 10620:    74:         for dir_path in self.directories.values():
40825: 10621:    75:             dir_path.mkdir(exist_ok=True, parents=True)
40826: 10622:    76:
40827: 10623:    77:             # Sous-structure sp√©cifique
40828: 10624:    78:             if dir_path.name == "agents":
40829: 10625:    79:                 for agent_type in ["coder", "tester", "architect", "documenter"]:
40830: 10626:    80:                     (dir_path / agent_type).mkdir(exist_ok=True)
40831: 10627:    81:
40832: 10628:    82:             if dir_path.name == "memory":
40833: 10629:    83:                 for sub in ["vector_store", "history", "learnings"]:
40834: 10630:    84:                     (dir_path / sub).mkdir(exist_ok=True)
40835: 10631:    85:
40836: 10632:    86:     def get_agent_state_path(self, agent_id: str) -> Path:
40837: 10633:    87:         """Retourne le chemin de l'√©tat d'un agent"""
40838: 10634:    88:         return self.directories["agents"] / agent_id
40839: 10635:    89:
40840: 10636:    90:     def save_task_result(self, task_id: str, result: Dict[str, Any]):
40841: 10637:    91:         """Sauvegarde le r√©sultat d'une t√¢che"""
40842: 10638:    92:         task_file = self.directories["sprints"] / "current" / f"task_{task_id}.json"
40843: 10639:    93:         task_file.parent.mkdir(exist_ok=True)
40844: 10640:    94:
40845: 10641:    95:         with open(task_file, "w") as f:
40846: 10642:    96:             json.dump({
40847: 10643:    97:                 "task_id": task_id,
40848: 10644:    98:                 "result": result,
40849: 10645:    99:                 "timestamp": datetime.now().isoformat(),
40850: 10646:   100:                 "agent": result.get("agent", "unknown")
40851: 10647:   101:             }, f, indent=2)
40852: 10648:   102:
40853: 10649:   103:     def load_agent_context(self, agent_id: str, limit: int = 10) -> List[Dict]:
40854: 10650:   104:         """Charge le contexte r√©cent d'un agent"""
40855: 10651:   105:         context_dir = self.get_agent_state_path(agent_id) / "context"
40856: 10652:   106:
40857: 10653:   107:         if not context_dir.exists():
40858: 10654:   108:             return []
40859: 10655:   109:
40860: 10656:   110:         # R√©cup√®re les fichiers de contexte les plus r√©cents
40861: 10657:   111:         context_files = sorted(context_dir.glob("*.json"),
40862: 10658:   112:                              key=lambda x: x.stat().st_mtime,
40863: 10659:   113:                              reverse=True)[:limit]
40864: 10660:   114:
40865: 10661:   115:         contexts = []
40866: 10662:   116:         for file in context_files:
40867: 10663:   117:             with open(file, "r") as f:
40868: 10664:   118:                 contexts.append(json.load(f))
40869: 10665:   119:
40870: 10666:   120:         return contexts
40871: 10667:   121:
40872: 10668:   122: # Utilisation
40873: 10669:   123: project_fs = ProjectFileSystem(Path("./project_data"))
40874: 10670:   124:
40875: 10671:   125: # Sauvegarde d'√©tat
40876: 10672:   126: agent_state = AgentState(
40877: 10673:   127:     agent_id="coder_001",
40878: 10674:   128:     current_task={"id": "TASK-123", "description": "Implement login"},
40879: 10675:   129:     context={"files": ["auth.py"], "dependencies": ["flask"]},
40880: 10676:   130:     memory=[{"task": "previous", "result": "success"}],
40881: 10677:   131:     performance={"accuracy": 0.95, "speed": 120}
40882: 10678:   132: )
