??: ShareGithub.bat
----------------------------------------
   1: @echo off
   2: chcp 65001
   3: title Final Share - Batch Only
   4: color 0A
   5: 
   6: rem Configuration GitHub
   7: set GITHUB_USERNAME=poolsyncdefi-ui
   8: set GITHUB_REPO=structured-lending-protocol-clean
   9: set GITHUB_TOKEN=
  10: 
  11: :menu
  12: cls
  13: echo.
  14: echo ========================================
  15: echo   FINAL SHARE - BATCH ONLY
  16: echo ========================================
  17: echo.
  18: echo 1. CREATE FULL SHARE (all files with line numbers)
  19: echo 2. CREATE DIFF SHARE (changed files only)
  20: echo 3. GIT COMMIT + PUSH
  21: echo 4. PUBLISH TO GITHUB REPOSITORY
  22: echo 5. SHARE TO GITHUB GISTS
  23: echo 6. EXIT
  24: echo.
  25: 
  26: set /p choice=Enter choice (1-6):
  27: 
  28: if "%choice%"=="1" goto fullshare
  29: if "%choice%"=="2" goto diffshare
  30: if "%choice%"=="3" goto gitpush
  31: if "%choice%"=="4" goto githubrepo
  32: if "%choice%"=="5" goto githubgists
  33: if "%choice%"=="6" exit /b 0
  34: goto menu
  35: 
  36: :fullshare
  37: cls
  38: echo Creating project share with line numbers and full paths...
  39: 
  40: rem Create header
  41: echo ============================================================================== > PROJECT_SHARE.txt
  42: echo STRUCTURED LENDING PROTOCOL - FULL PROJECT SHARE >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
  43: echo ============================================================================== >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
  44: echo GitHub: %GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO% >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
  45: echo Repo URL: https://github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO% >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
  46: echo Date: %date% Time: %time% >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
  47: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
  48: 
  49: rem Get git info
  50: echo [GIT INFORMATION] >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
  51: echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
  52: for /f "delims=" %%i in ('git branch --show-current 2^>nul') do echo Branch: %%i >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
  53: for /f "delims=" %%i in ('git rev-parse --short HEAD 2^>nul') do echo Commit: %%i >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
  54: for /f "delims=" %%i in ('git log --oneline -1 --pretty=format:"%%s" 2^>nul') do echo Last commit: %%i >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
  55: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
  56: 
  57: rem === CONTRACTS DIRECTORY ===
  58: echo [CONTRACTS DIRECTORY - *.sol files] >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
  59: echo ============================================================================== >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
  60: set contract_count=0
  61: for /r contracts %%f in (*.sol) do (
  62:     set /a contract_count+=1
  63: 
  64:     set "filepath=%%f"
  65:     set "filename=%%~nxf"
  66:     set "filesize=%%~z"
  67:     set "filemodified=%%~tf"
  68: 
  69:     echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
  70:     echo FILE %contract_count% ^| !filepath! >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
  71:     echo Size: !filesize! bytes ^| Modified: !filemodified! >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
  72:     echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
  73: 
  74:     if exist "%%f" (
  75:         setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
  76:         set line_num=1
  77:         for /f "tokens=* delims=" %%a in ('type "%%f"') do (
  78:             echo !line_num!: %%a >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
  79:             set /a line_num+=1
  80:         )
  81:         endlocal
  82:     ) else (
  83:         echo [FILE NOT FOUND] >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
  84:     )
  85:     echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
  86: )
  87: 
  88: rem === SCRIPTS DIRECTORY ===
  89: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
  90: echo [SCRIPTS DIRECTORY - *.js, *.bat, *.sh, *.txt files] >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
  91: echo ============================================================================== >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
  92: set script_count=0
  93: for /r scripts %%f in (*.js *.bat *.sh *.txt) do (
  94:     if exist "%%f" (
  95:         set /a script_count+=1
  96: 
  97:         set "filepath=%%f"
  98:         set "filename=%%~nxf"
  99:         set "filesize=%%~z"
 100:         set "filemodified=%%~tf"
 101:         set "fileext=%%~xf"
 102: 
 103:         echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 104:         echo SCRIPT !script_count! ^| !filepath! >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 105:         echo Size: !filesize! bytes ^| Type: !fileext! ^| Modified: !filemodified! >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 106:         echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 107: 
 108:         setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
 109:         set line_num=1
 110:         for /f "tokens=* delims=" %%a in ('type "%%f"') do (
 111:             echo !line_num!: %%a >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 112:             set /a line_num+=1
 113:         )
 114:         endlocal
 115:         echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 116:     )
 117: )
 118: 
 119: rem === TESTS DIRECTORY ===
 120: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 121: echo [TESTS DIRECTORY - *.js, *.txt files] >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 122: echo ============================================================================== >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 123: set test_count=0
 124: for /r test %%f in (*.js *.txt) do (
 125:     if exist "%%f" (
 126:         set /a test_count+=1
 127: 
 128:         set "filepath=%%f"
 129:         set "filename=%%~nxf"
 130:         set "filesize=%%~z"
 131:         set "filemodified=%%~tf"
 132:         set "fileext=%%~xf"
 133: 
 134:         echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 135:         echo TEST !test_count! ^| !filepath! >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 136:         echo Size: !filesize! bytes ^| Type: !fileext! ^| Modified: !filemodified! >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 137:         echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 138: 
 139:         setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
 140:         set line_num=1
 141:         for /f "tokens=* delims=" %%a in ('type "%%f"') do (
 142:             echo !line_num!: %%a >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 143:             set /a line_num+=1
 144:         )
 145:         endlocal
 146:         echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 147:     )
 148: )
 149: 
 150: rem === PROJECT STRUCTURE ===
 151: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 152: echo [PROJECT FILE STRUCTURE] >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 153: echo ============================================================================== >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 154: echo Listing all project files... >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 155: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 156: 
 157: echo CONTRACTS: >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 158: dir contracts /b /s >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 159: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 160: 
 161: echo SCRIPTS: >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 162: dir scripts /b /s >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 163: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 164: 
 165: echo TESTS: >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 166: dir test /b /s >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 167: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 168: 
 169: echo CONFIG FILES: >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 170: dir *.json *.toml *.yml *.yaml *.config *.cfg /b >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 171: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 172: 
 173: rem === SUMMARY ===
 174: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 175: echo [SUMMARY] >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 176: echo ============================================================================== >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 177: echo Total contract files: %contract_count% >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 178: echo Total script files: %script_count% >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 179: echo Total test files: %test_count% >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 180: set /a total_files=contract_count+script_count+test_count
 181: echo Total code files: %total_files% >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 182: echo. >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 183: echo Generated: %date% %time% >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 184: echo ============================================================================== >> PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 185: 
 186: cls
 187: echo File created: PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 188: echo Files: %total_files% total (%contract_count% contracts, %script_count% scripts, %test_count% tests)
 189: echo.
 190: echo Copy content to pastebin.com and share the URL
 191: echo.
 192: pause
 193: goto menu
 194: 
 195: :diffshare
 196: cls
 197: echo Creating diff report...
 198: 
 199: rem Create diff report
 200: echo ============================================================================== > DIFF_REPORT.txt
 201: echo STRUCTURED LENDING PROTOCOL - DIFF REPORT >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 202: echo ============================================================================== >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 203: echo Date: %date% Time: %time% >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 204: echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 205: 
 206: rem Get git information
 207: echo [GIT STATUS] >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 208: echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 209: git status >> DIFF_REPORT.txt 2>nul
 210: echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 211: 
 212: rem Get changed files with details
 213: echo [CHANGED FILES DETAIL] >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 214: echo ============================================================================== >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 215: set changed_count=0
 216: for /f "tokens=1,*" %%a in ('git status --porcelain 2^>nul') do (
 217:     set status=%%a
 218:     set "file=%%b"
 219: 
 220:     if exist "!file!" (
 221:         set /a changed_count+=1
 222: 
 223:         set "filepath=!file!"
 224:         set "filesize=%%~z"
 225:         set "filemodified=%%~tf"
 226: 
 227:         echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 228:         echo FILE !changed_count! ^| !filepath! >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 229:         echo Status: !status! ^| Size: !filesize! bytes ^| Modified: !filemodified! >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 230:         echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 231: 
 232:         if "!status!"=="??" (
 233:             echo [NEW FILE - FULL CONTENT WITH LINE NUMBERS] >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 234:             echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 235:             setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
 236:             set line_num=1
 237:             for /f "tokens=* delims=" %%l in ('type "!file!"') do (
 238:                 echo !line_num!: %%l >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 239:                 set /a line_num+=1
 240:             )
 241:             endlocal
 242:         ) else (
 243:             echo [MODIFICATIONS - GIT DIFF OUTPUT] >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 244:             echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 245:             git diff "!file!" >> DIFF_REPORT.txt 2>nul
 246:             if errorlevel 1 (
 247:                 git diff --cached "!file!" >> DIFF_REPORT.txt 2>nul
 248:             )
 249:             echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 250:             echo [CURRENT FILE CONTENT WITH LINE NUMBERS] >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 251:             echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 252:             setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
 253:             set line_num=1
 254:             for /f "tokens=* delims=" %%l in ('type "!file!"') do (
 255:                 echo !line_num!: %%l >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 256:                 set /a line_num+=1
 257:             )
 258:             endlocal
 259:         )
 260:         echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 261:     )
 262: )
 263: 
 264: if %changed_count%==0 (
 265:     echo No changes detected in the working directory. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 266:     echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 267: )
 268: 
 269: if %changed_count% gtr 0 (
 270:     echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 271:     echo [LINE-BY-LINE CHANGES SUMMARY] >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 272:     echo ============================================================================== >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 273:     for /f "tokens=2" %%f in ('git status --porcelain 2^>nul ^| findstr /r "^M ^A ^??"') do (
 274:         if exist "%%f" (
 275:             echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 276:             echo FILE: %%f >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 277:             echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 278:             git diff --unified=0 "%%f" 2>nul | findstr "+" "-" >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 279:             echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 280:         )
 281:     )
 282: )
 283: 
 284: echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 285: echo [GIT DIFF SUMMARY] >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 286: echo ============================================================================== >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 287: git diff --stat >> DIFF_REPORT.txt 2>nul
 288: if errorlevel 1 (
 289:     echo No staged changes. Use 'git diff --cached' for staged changes. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 290: )
 291: 
 292: rem Summary
 293: echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 294: echo [REPORT SUMMARY] >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 295: echo ============================================================================== >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 296: echo Total changed files: %changed_count% >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 297: echo Report generated: %date% %time% >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 298: echo. >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 299: echo INSTRUCTIONS FOR CODE REVIEW: >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 300: echo 1. Files are listed with full paths for precise location >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 301: echo 2. Line numbers are included for specific references >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 302: echo 3. Changes marked with + (additions) and - (deletions) >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 303: echo 4. New files show complete content >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 304: echo ============================================================================== >> DIFF_REPORT.txt
 305: 
 306: cls
 307: echo File created: DIFF_REPORT.txt
 308: echo Changed files: %changed_count%
 309: echo.
 310: echo Copy content to pastebin.com and share the URL
 311: echo.
 312: pause
 313: goto menu
 314: 
 315: :gitpush
 316: cls
 317: echo GitHub: https://github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%
 318: echo.
 319: set /p msg=Commit message:
 320: if "%msg%"=="" set msg="Project update"
 321: echo.
 322: git add .
 323: git commit -m "%msg%"
 324: git push
 325: echo.
 326: echo Verify commit: https://github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%/commits/main
 327: echo.
 328: pause
 329: goto menu
 330: 
 331: :githubrepo
 332: cls
 333: echo ========================================
 334: echo   PUBLISH TO GITHUB REPOSITORY
 335: echo ========================================
 336: echo.
 337: echo Repository: %GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%
 338: echo URL: https://github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%
 339: echo.
 340: 
 341: rem Check if Git is installed
 342: git --version >nul 2>&1
 343: if errorlevel 1 (
 344:     echo ERROR: Git is not installed or not in PATH
 345:     echo Please install Git from: https://git-scm.com/downloads
 346:     echo.
 347:     pause
 348:     goto menu
 349: )
 350: 
 351: rem Check if GitHub token is set
 352: if "%GITHUB_TOKEN%"=="" (
 353:     echo GITHUB_TOKEN is not configured.
 354:     echo.
 355:     echo To create a GitHub token:
 356:     echo 1. Go to https://github.com/settings/tokens
 357:     echo 2. Click "Generate new token (classic)"
 358:     echo 3. Give it a name
 359:     echo 4. Select "repo" (FULL scope)
 360:     echo 5. Click "Generate token"
 361:     echo 6. Copy the token (starts with 'ghp_')
 362:     echo.
 363:     set /p GITHUB_TOKEN=Enter your GitHub token:
 364:     if "%GITHUB_TOKEN%"=="" (
 365:         echo No token entered. Operation cancelled.
 366:         echo.
 367:         pause
 368:         goto menu
 369:     )
 370: )
 371: 
 372: rem Configure remote URL with token
 373: echo Configuring Git remote with token...
 374: git remote remove origin 2>nul
 375: git remote add origin https://x-access-token:%GITHUB_TOKEN%@github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%.git
 376: 
 377: if errorlevel 1 (
 378:     echo ERROR: Failed to configure Git remote
 379:     echo.
 380:     pause
 381:     goto menu
 382: )
 383: 
 384: rem Configure Git user
 385: echo Configuring Git user...
 386: git config user.name "%GITHUB_USERNAME%"
 387: git config user.email "%GITHUB_USERNAME%@users.noreply.github.com"
 388: 
 389: rem Add all files
 390: echo Adding files to Git...
 391: git add .
 392: 
 393: rem Commit
 394: set /p commit_msg=Enter commit message (press Enter for default):
 395: if "%commit_msg%"=="" set commit_msg="üöÄ Automated publication: Structured Lending Protocol - %date% %time%"
 396: echo Committing with message: %commit_msg%
 397: git commit -m "%commit_msg%"
 398: 
 399: rem Push to GitHub
 400: echo Pushing to GitHub repository...
 401: git branch -M main
 402: git push -u origin main --force
 403: 
 404: if errorlevel 1 (
 405:     echo ERROR: Failed to push to GitHub
 406:     echo Check your token permissions and repository access
 407:     echo.
 408: 
 409:     rem Try alternative method
 410:     echo Trying alternative authentication method...
 411:     git remote remove origin
 412:     git remote add origin https://%GITHUB_USERNAME%:%GITHUB_TOKEN%@github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%.git
 413:     git push -u origin main --force
 414: 
 415:     if errorlevel 1 (
 416:         echo ERROR: All authentication methods failed
 417:         echo Please verify:
 418:         echo 1. Token has "repo" permissions
 419:         echo 2. Repository exists: %GITHUB_REPO%
 420:         echo 3. Token is not expired
 421:         echo.
 422:     ) else (
 423:         echo SUCCESS: Repository published successfully!
 424:         echo URL: https://github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%
 425:     )
 426: ) else (
 427:     echo SUCCESS: Repository published successfully!
 428:     echo URL: https://github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%
 429:     echo.
 430:     echo Check your repository at:
 431:     echo https://github.com/%GITHUB_USERNAME%/%GITHUB_REPO%
 432: )
 433: 
 434: rem Clear token from memory for security
 435: set GITHUB_TOKEN=
 436: echo.
 437: pause
 438: goto menu
 439: 
 440: :githubgists
 441: cls
 442: echo ========================================
 443: echo   SHARE TO GITHUB GISTS
 444: echo ========================================
 445: echo.
 446: echo Gists are like pastebin but integrated with GitHub
 447: echo Each file can be up to 1MB
 448: echo.
 449: 
 450: rem Check if curl is installed
 451: where curl >nul 2>&1
 452: if errorlevel 1 (
 453:     echo ERROR: curl is not installed or not in PATH
 454:     echo Please install curl or use Windows PowerShell alternative
 455:     echo.
 456:     pause
 457:     goto menu
 458: )
 459: 
 460: rem Check if GitHub token is set
 461: if "%GITHUB_TOKEN%"=="" (
 462:     echo GITHUB_TOKEN is not configured.
 463:     echo.
 464:     echo To create a GitHub token:
 465:     echo 1. Go to https://github.com/settings/tokens
 466:     echo 2. Click "Generate new token (classic)"
 467:     echo 3. Give it a name
 468:     echo 4. Select "gist" permission
 469:     echo 5. Click "Generate token"
 470:     echo 6. Copy the token (starts with 'ghp_')
 471:     echo.
 472:     set /p GITHUB_TOKEN=Enter your GitHub token (with gist permission):
 473:     if "%GITHUB_TOKEN%"=="" (
 474:         echo No token entered. Operation cancelled.
 475:         echo.
 476:         pause
 477:         goto menu
 478:     )
 479: )
 480: 
 481: echo Checking GitHub token...
 482: curl -s -H "Authorization: token %GITHUB_TOKEN%" https://api.github.com/user > temp_user.json
 483: findstr "login" temp_user.json >nul
 484: if errorlevel 1 (
 485:     echo ERROR: Invalid GitHub token or no permission
 486:     echo Please verify:
 487:     echo 1. Token has "gist" permission
 488:     echo 2. Token is not expired
 489:     echo 3. Token starts with "ghp_"
 490:     echo.
 491:     del temp_user.json 2>nul
 492:     pause
 493:     goto menu
 494: )
 495: 
 496: for /f "tokens=2 delims=:," %%a in ('findstr "login" temp_user.json') do set github_login=%%a
 497: set github_login=%github_login:"=%
 498: set github_login=%github_login: =%
 499: del temp_user.json 2>nul
 500: 
 501: echo Token valid for user: %github_login%
 502: echo.
 503: 
 504: rem Check if share files exist
 505: if not exist "PROJECT_SHARE.txt" (
 506:     echo PROJECT_SHARE.txt not found.
 507:     echo Would you like to create it first? (Y/N)
 508:     set /p create_choice=
 509:     if /i "%create_choice%"=="Y" goto fullshare
 510:     echo Operation cancelled.
 511:     echo.
 512:     pause
 513:     goto menu
 514: )
 515: 
 516: rem Read the file and check size
 517: for %%F in ("PROJECT_SHARE.txt") do set filesize=%%~zF
 518: set /a filesize_kb=%filesize%/1024
 519: set /a filesize_mb=%filesize_kb%/1024
 520: 
 521: echo File: PROJECT_SHARE.txt
 522: echo Size: %filesize% bytes (%filesize_kb% KB, %filesize_mb% MB)
 523: echo.
 524: 
 525: if %filesize% gtr 1000000 (
 526:     echo WARNING: File is larger than 1MB (%filesize_mb%.%filesize_kb% MB)
 527:     echo Gists have a 1MB limit per file.
 528:     echo.
 529:     echo Options:
 530:     echo 1. Split file into multiple parts (recommended)
 531:     echo 2. Try to upload anyway (may fail)
 532:     echo 3. Cancel
 533:     echo.
 534:     set /p split_choice=Choose option (1-3):
 535: 
 536:     if "%split_choice%"=="1" goto splitfile
 537:     if "%split_choice%"=="3" goto menu
 538: )
 539: 
 540: rem Prepare file content for JSON
 541: echo Preparing file content for upload...
 542: powershell -Command "(Get-Content -Path 'PROJECT_SHARE.txt' -Raw) -replace '\"', '\"' -replace '\\', '\\' -replace '`t', '\t' -replace '`r`n', '\n' | Set-Content -Path 'temp_content.txt' -Force"
 543: 
 544: rem Create JSON payload
 545: echo Creating Gist...
 546: (
 547: echo {
 548: echo   "description": "Structured Lending Protocol - Full Project Share ^(%date% ^)",
 549: echo   "public": false,
 550: echo   "files": {
 551: echo     "PROJECT_SHARE.txt": {
 552: echo       "content":
 553: ) > temp_payload.json
 554: 
 555: type temp_content.txt >> temp_payload.json
 556: 
 557: (
 558: echo
 559: echo     }
 560: echo   }
 561: echo }
 562: ) >> temp_payload.json
 563: 
 564: rem Upload to GitHub Gists
 565: echo Uploading to GitHub Gists...
 566: curl -s -X POST ^
 567:   -H "Authorization: token %GITHUB_TOKEN%" ^
 568:   -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" ^
 569:   https://api.github.com/gists ^
 570:   -d @temp_payload.json > temp_response.json
 571: 
 572: rem Check response
 573: findstr "html_url" temp_response.json >nul
 574: if errorlevel 1 (
 575:     echo ERROR: Failed to create Gist
 576:     echo Response:
 577:     type temp_response.json
 578:     echo.
 579: 
 580:     rem Try to parse error
 581:     for /f "tokens=2 delims=:," %%a in ('findstr "message" temp_response.json') do (
 582:         set error_msg=%%a
 583:         set error_msg=!error_msg:"=!
 584:         echo Error: !error_msg!
 585:     )
 586: ) else (
 587:     for /f "tokens=2 delims=:," %%a in ('findstr "html_url" temp_response.json') do (
 588:         set gist_url=%%a
 589:         set gist_url=!gist_url:"=!
 590:         set gist_url=!gist_url: =!
 591:     )
 592: 
 593:     echo SUCCESS: Gist created successfully!
 594:     echo.
 595:     echo Gist URL: !gist_url!
 596:     echo.
 597:     echo You can share this URL for code review.
 598: 
 599:     rem Save Gist info to file
 600:     echo Gist URL: !gist_url! > GIST_INFO.txt
 601:     echo Created: %date% %time% >> GIST_INFO.txt
 602:     echo Description: Structured Lending Protocol - Full Project Share >> GIST_INFO.txt
 603:     echo File: PROJECT_SHARE.txt >> GIST_INFO.txt
 604:     echo.
 605:     echo Gist information saved to: GIST_INFO.txt
 606: )
 607: 
 608: rem Cleanup
 609: del temp_content.txt 2>nul
 610: del temp_payload.json 2>nul
 611: del temp_response.json 2>nul
 612: set GITHUB_TOKEN=
 613: 
 614: echo.
 615: pause
 616: goto menu
 617: 
 618: :splitfile
 619: cls
 620: echo ========================================
 621: echo   SPLIT FILE FOR GITHUB GISTS
 622: echo ========================================
 623: echo.
 624: echo Splitting PROJECT_SHARE.txt for GitHub Gists...
 625: echo Gist limit: 1MB per file
 626: echo.
 627: 
 628: rem Calculate number of parts needed
 629: set /a parts_needed=(%filesize% / 1000000) + 1
 630: echo File size: %filesize% bytes
 631: echo Parts needed: %parts_needed%
 632: echo.
 633: 
 634: set /p gist_desc=Enter description for Gists:
 635: if "%gist_desc%"=="" set gist_desc="Structured Lending Protocol - Part"
 636: 
 637: echo Creating %parts_needed% parts...
 638: set part_num=1
 639: set current_line=1
 640: set total_lines=0
 641: 
 642: rem Count total lines first
 643: for /f %%i in ('type "PROJECT_SHARE.txt" ^| find /c /v ""') do set total_lines=%%i
 644: set /a lines_per_part=%total_lines% / %parts_needed%
 645: 
 646: echo Total lines: %total_lines%
 647: echo Lines per part: %lines_per_part%
 648: echo.
 649: 
 650: :splitloop
 651: if %part_num% gtr %parts_needed% goto splitdone
 652: 
 653: set start_line=%current_line%
 654: set /a end_line=%current_line% + %lines_per_part% - 1
 655: if %end_line% gtr %total_lines% set end_line=%total_lines%
 656: 
 657: echo Creating part %part_num%: lines %start_line%-%end_line%
 658: 
 659: rem Extract part using PowerShell
 660: powershell -Command "Get-Content -Path 'PROJECT_SHARE.txt' -TotalCount %end_line% | Select-Object -Last %lines_per_part% | Set-Content -Path 'PROJECT_SHARE_PART%part_num%.txt' -Force"
 661: 
 662: rem Upload this part to Gist
 663: echo Uploading part %part_num% to Gist...
 664: powershell -Command "(Get-Content -Path 'PROJECT_SHARE_PART%part_num%.txt' -Raw) -replace '\"', '\"' -replace '\\', '\\' -replace '`t', '\t' -replace '`r`n', '\n' | Set-Content -Path 'temp_content_part.txt' -Force"
 665: 
 666: (
 667: echo {
 668: echo   "description": "%gist_desc% %part_num%/%parts_needed%",
 669: echo   "public": false,
 670: echo   "files": {
 671: echo     "PROJECT_SHARE_PART%part_num%.txt": {
 672: echo       "content":
 673: ) > temp_payload_part.json
 674: 
 675: type temp_content_part.txt >> temp_payload_part.json
 676: 
 677: (
 678: echo
 679: echo     }
 680: echo   }
 681: echo }
 682: ) >> temp_payload_part.json
 683: 
 684: curl -s -X POST ^
 685:   -H "Authorization: token %GITHUB_TOKEN%" ^
 686:   -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" ^
 687:   https://api.github.com/gists ^
 688:   -d @temp_payload_part.json > temp_response_part.json
 689: 
 690: findstr "html_url" temp_response_part.json >nul
 691: if errorlevel 1 (
 692:     echo ERROR: Failed to create Gist for part %part_num%
 693: ) else (
 694:     for /f "tokens=2 delims=:," %%a in ('findstr "html_url" temp_response_part.json') do (
 695:         set gist_url_part=%%a
 696:         set gist_url_part=!gist_url_part:"=!
 697:         set gist_url_part=!gist_url_part: =!
 698:     )
 699:     echo SUCCESS: Part %part_num% created: !gist_url_part!
 700: 
 701:     rem Save Gist URL
 702:     echo Part %part_num%: !gist_url_part! >> GISTS_INDEX.txt
 703: )
 704: 
 705: rem Cleanup for this part
 706: del temp_content_part.txt 2>nul
 707: del temp_payload_part.json 2>nul
 708: del temp_response_part.json 2>nul
 709: 
 710: set /a current_line=%end_line% + 1
 711: set /a part_num+=1
 712: goto splitloop
 713: 
 714: :splitdone
 715: echo.
 716: echo All parts created successfully!
 717: if exist "GISTS_INDEX.txt" (
 718:     echo.
 719:     echo Gist URLs saved to: GISTS_INDEX.txt
 720:     echo.
 721:     type GISTS_INDEX.txt
 722: )
 723: 
 724: rem Create master index
 725: echo Creating master index file...
 726: (
 727: echo ========================================
 728: echo   GITHUB GISTS INDEX
 729: echo ========================================
 730: echo Project: Structured Lending Protocol
 731: echo Split into: %parts_needed% parts
 732: echo Date: %date% Time: %time%
 733: echo.
 734: echo GIST URLs:
 735: echo.
 736: ) > GISTS_MASTER_INDEX.txt
 737: 
 738: if exist "GISTS_INDEX.txt" type GISTS_INDEX.txt >> GISTS_MASTER_INDEX.txt
 739: 
 740: echo.
 741: echo Master index saved to: GISTS_MASTER_INDEX.txt
 742: echo.
 743: 
 744: rem Cleanup part files
 745: for /l %%i in (1,1,%parts_needed%) do (
 746:     del PROJECT_SHARE_PART%%i.txt 2>nul
 747: )
 748: 
 749: set GITHUB_TOKEN=
 750: pause
 751: goto menu
----------------------------------------
??: share_github_v7.py
----------------------------------------
   1: #!/usr/bin/env python3
   2: """
   3: Share GitHub V7 - Python Version
   4: Lit la configuration depuis project_config.json
   5: """
   6: 
   7: import json
   8: import os
   9: import sys
  10: import subprocess
  11: import datetime
  12: from pathlib import Path
  13: import requests
  14: import re
  15: import fnmatch
  16: 
  17: # ============================================================================
  18: # CONFIGURATION
  19: # ============================================================================
  20: 
  21: class Config:
  22:     """Charge et g√®re la configuration depuis JSON"""
  23: 
  24:     def __init__(self, config_path="../project_config.json"):
  25:         self.config_path = Path(config_path)
  26:         self.default_config = {
  27:             "PROJECT_NAME": "Structured Lending Protocol",
  28:             "PROJECT_PATH": ".",
  29:             "GITHUB_USERNAME": "poolsyncdefi-ui",
  30:             "GITHUB_REPO_NAME": "structured-lending-protocol-clean",
  31:             "GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION": "Structured Lending Protocol Clean Version",
  32:             "GITHUB_REPO_PRIVATE": False,
  33:             "GITHUB_TOKEN": "",
  34:             "EXCLUDE_PATTERNS": [],
  35:             "EXCLUDE_DIRS": [],
  36:             "INCLUDE_PATTERNS": []
  37:         }
  38:         self.config = self.load_config()
  39: 
  40:     def load_config(self):
  41:         """Charge la configuration depuis le fichier JSON"""
  42:         if self.config_path.exists():
  43:             try:
  44:                 with open(self.config_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
  45:                     config = json.load(f)
  46:                 print(f"‚úì Configuration charg√©e depuis: {self.config_path}")
  47:                 return {**self.default_config, **config}  # Merge avec defaults
  48:             except Exception as e:
  49:                 print(f"‚ö† Erreur lecture config: {e}")
  50:                 return self.default_config
  51:         else:
  52:             print(f"‚ö† Fichier config non trouv√©: {self.config_path}")
  53:             print("Utilisation des valeurs par d√©faut")
  54:             return self.default_config
  55: 
  56:     def get(self, key, default=None):
  57:         """R√©cup√®re une valeur de configuration"""
  58:         return self.config.get(key, default)
  59: 
  60:     def save_token(self, token):
  61:         """Sauvegarde le token dans la config"""
  62:         self.config["GITHUB_TOKEN"] = token
  63:         try:
  64:             with open(self.config_path, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
  65:                 json.dump(self.config, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False)
  66:             print(f"‚úì Token sauvegard√© dans: {self.config_path}")
  67:             return True
  68:         except Exception as e:
  69:             print(f"‚úó Erreur sauvegarde token: {e}")
  70:             return False
  71: 
  72: # ============================================================================
  73: # FONCTIONS UTILITAIRES
  74: # ============================================================================
  75: 
  76: def run_command(cmd, cwd=None, capture_output=True):
  77:     """Ex√©cute une commande shell"""
  78:     try:
  79:         if capture_output:
  80:             result = subprocess.run(cmd, shell=True, cwd=cwd,
  81:                                   capture_output=True, text=True, encoding='utf-8')
  82:             return result.returncode, result.stdout, result.stderr
  83:         else:
  84:             result = subprocess.run(cmd, shell=True, cwd=cwd)
  85:             return result.returncode, "", ""
  86:     except Exception as e:
  87:         return -1, "", str(e)
  88: 
  89: def get_git_info():
  90:     """R√©cup√®re les informations Git"""
  91:     info = {}
  92: 
  93:     # Branche actuelle
  94:     code, stdout, _ = run_command("git branch --show-current")
  95:     if code == 0:
  96:         info['branch'] = stdout.strip()
  97: 
  98:     # Dernier commit
  99:     code, stdout, _ = run_command("git rev-parse --short HEAD")
 100:     if code == 0:
 101:         info['commit'] = stdout.strip()
 102: 
 103:     # Message du dernier commit
 104:     code, stdout, _ = run_command('git log --oneline -1 --pretty=format:"%s"')
 105:     if code == 0:
 106:         info['last_commit_msg'] = stdout.strip()
 107: 
 108:     return info
 109: 
 110: def should_exclude(path, config):
 111:     """V√©rifie si un chemin doit √™tre exclu"""
 112:     path_str = str(path).replace('\\', '/')  # Normaliser les s√©parateurs
 113:     path_name = path.name
 114: 
 115:     # V√©rifier d'abord les dossiers complets (EXCLUDE_DIRS)
 116:     exclude_dirs = config.get("EXCLUDE_DIRS", [])
 117:     path_parts = path_str.split('/')  # Utiliser '/' normalis√©
 118: 
 119:     for dir_name in exclude_dirs:
 120:         if dir_name in path_parts:
 121:             return True
 122: 
 123:     # V√©rifier les patterns avec wildcards (EXCLUDE_PATTERNS)
 124:     exclude_patterns = config.get("EXCLUDE_PATTERNS", [])
 125: 
 126:     for pattern in exclude_patterns:
 127:         # G√©rer les patterns de dossier avec /*
 128:         if pattern.endswith('/*'):
 129:             dir_pattern = pattern[:-2]
 130:             if dir_pattern in path_parts:
 131:                 return True
 132:             continue  # Ne pas v√©rifier plus loin pour les patterns de dossier
 133: 
 134:         # Pour les fichiers, utiliser fnmatch directement
 135:         if fnmatch.fnmatch(path_name, pattern) or fnmatch.fnmatch(path_str, pattern):
 136:             return True
 137: 
 138:     return False
 139: 
 140: def should_include(path, config):
 141:     """V√©rifie si un chemin doit √™tre inclus (prioritaire sur exclude)"""
 142:     path_str = str(path).replace('\\', '/')  # Normaliser les s√©parateurs
 143:     path_name = path.name
 144: 
 145:     include_patterns = config.get("INCLUDE_PATTERNS", [])
 146: 
 147:     # Si pas de patterns d'inclusion d√©finis, tout est inclus
 148:     if not include_patterns:
 149:         return True
 150: 
 151:     # V√©rifier chaque pattern d'inclusion
 152:     for pattern in include_patterns:
 153:         if fnmatch.fnmatch(path_name, pattern) or fnmatch.fnmatch(path_str, pattern):
 154:             return True
 155: 
 156:     # Si aucun pattern ne correspond, le fichier n'est pas inclus
 157:     return False
 158: 
 159: # ============================================================================
 160: # FONCTIONS DE PARTAGE
 161: # ============================================================================
 162: 
 163: def create_full_share(config):
 164:     """Cr√©e un fichier de partage complet avec num√©ros de ligne"""
 165:     print("\n" + "="*60)
 166:     print("CREATE FULL SHARE")
 167:     print("="*60)
 168: 
 169:     project_path = Path(config.get("PROJECT_PATH", "."))
 170: 
 171:     if not project_path.exists():
 172:         print(f"‚úó Chemin introuvable: {project_path}")
 173:         return False
 174: 
 175:     print(f"Chemin du projet: {project_path}")
 176:     print(f"Patterns d'inclusion: {len(config.get('INCLUDE_PATTERNS', []))}")
 177:     print(f"Dossiers exclus: {len(config.get('EXCLUDE_DIRS', []))}")
 178:     print(f"Patterns exclus: {len(config.get('EXCLUDE_PATTERNS', []))}")
 179: 
 180:     # Scanner les fichiers
 181:     print("\nScanning des fichiers...")
 182:     all_files = []
 183:     scanned = 0
 184:     excluded = 0
 185: 
 186:     for item in project_path.rglob("*"):
 187:         if item.is_file():
 188:             scanned += 1
 189: 
 190:             # V√©rifier d'abord si le fichier doit √™tre inclus
 191:             if not should_include(item, config):
 192:                 excluded += 1
 193:                 continue
 194: 
 195:             # V√©rifier ensuite si le fichier doit √™tre exclu
 196:             if should_exclude(item, config):
 197:                 excluded += 1
 198:                 continue
 199: 
 200:             all_files.append(item)
 201: 
 202:     print(f"\nR√©sultats du scan:")
 203:     print(f"  Fichiers scann√©s: {scanned}")
 204:     print(f"  Fichiers exclus: {excluded}")
 205:     print(f"  Fichiers inclus: {len(all_files)}")
 206: 
 207:     if len(all_files) == 0:
 208:         print("\n‚ö† Aucun fichier √† inclure!")
 209:         print("V√©rifiez vos patterns d'inclusion/exclusion dans project_config.json")
 210:         return False
 211: 
 212:     with open("PROJECT_SHARE.txt", "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
 213:         # En-t√™te
 214:         f.write("="*80 + "\n")
 215:         f.write(f"STRUCTURED LENDING PROTOCOL - FULL PROJECT SHARE\n")
 216:         f.write("="*80 + "\n")
 217:         f.write(f"GitHub: {config.get('GITHUB_USERNAME')}/{config.get('GITHUB_REPO_NAME')}\n")
 218:         f.write(f"Repo URL: https://github.com/{config.get('GITHUB_USERNAME')}/{config.get('GITHUB_REPO_NAME')}\n")
 219:         f.write(f"Date: {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n")
 220:         f.write("\n")
 221: 
 222:         # Informations Git
 223:         git_info = get_git_info()
 224:         f.write("[GIT INFORMATION]\n")
 225:         f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
 226:         if git_info.get('branch'):
 227:             f.write(f"Branch: {git_info['branch']}\n")
 228:         if git_info.get('commit'):
 229:             f.write(f"Commit: {git_info['commit']}\n")
 230:         if git_info.get('last_commit_msg'):
 231:             f.write(f"Last commit: {git_info['last_commit_msg']}\n")
 232:         f.write("\n")
 233: 
 234:         # Parcourir les fichiers AVEC FILTRAGE
 235:         file_counters = {
 236:             'contracts': 0,
 237:             'scripts': 0,
 238:             'tests': 0,
 239:             'other': 0
 240:         }
 241: 
 242:         # Grouper les fichiers par type pour un affichage organis√©
 243:         solidity_files = [f for f in all_files if f.suffix == '.sol']
 244:         script_files = [f for f in all_files if f.suffix in ['.js', '.py', '.sh', '.bat', '.ps1', '.ts']]
 245:         test_files = [f for f in all_files if any(test_dir in str(f) for test_dir in ['test', 'tests', '__tests__'])]
 246:         other_files = [f for f in all_files if f not in solidity_files + script_files + test_files]
 247: 
 248:         # Fichiers Solidity (contrats)
 249:         if solidity_files:
 250:             f.write("[CONTRACTS DIRECTORY - *.sol files]\n")
 251:             f.write("="*80 + "\n")
 252: 
 253:             for sol_file in solidity_files:
 254:                 file_counters['contracts'] += 1
 255:                 relative_path = sol_file.relative_to(project_path)
 256: 
 257:                 f.write(f"\nFILE {file_counters['contracts']} | {relative_path}\n")
 258:                 f.write(f"Size: {sol_file.stat().st_size} bytes | Modified: {datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp(sol_file.stat().st_mtime)}\n")
 259:                 f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
 260: 
 261:                 try:
 262:                     with open(sol_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as sf:
 263:                         lines = sf.readlines()
 264:                         for i, line in enumerate(lines, 1):
 265:                             f.write(f"{i:5d}: {line.rstrip()}\n")
 266:                 except Exception as e:
 267:                     f.write(f"[ERROR READING FILE: {e}]\n")
 268: 
 269:                 f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
 270: 
 271:         # Fichiers de scripts
 272:         if script_files:
 273:             f.write(f"\n[SCRIPTS DIRECTORY]\n")
 274:             f.write("="*80 + "\n")
 275: 
 276:             for script_file in script_files:
 277:                 file_counters['scripts'] += 1
 278:                 relative_path = script_file.relative_to(project_path)
 279: 
 280:                 f.write(f"\nSCRIPT {file_counters['scripts']} | {relative_path}\n")
 281:                 f.write(f"Size: {script_file.stat().st_size} bytes | Type: {script_file.suffix} | ")
 282:                 f.write(f"Modified: {datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp(script_file.stat().st_mtime)}\n")
 283:                 f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
 284: 
 285:                 try:
 286:                     with open(script_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as sf:
 287:                         lines = sf.readlines()
 288:                         for i, line in enumerate(lines, 1):
 289:                             f.write(f"{i:5d}: {line.rstrip()}\n")
 290:                 except Exception as e:
 291:                     f.write(f"[ERROR READING FILE: {e}]\n")
 292: 
 293:                 f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
 294: 
 295:         # Fichiers de test
 296:         if test_files:
 297:             f.write("\n[TESTS DIRECTORY]\n")
 298:             f.write("="*80 + "\n")
 299: 
 300:             for test_file in test_files:
 301:                 file_counters['tests'] += 1
 302:                 relative_path = test_file.relative_to(project_path)
 303: 
 304:                 f.write(f"\nTEST {file_counters['tests']} | {relative_path}\n")
 305:                 f.write(f"Size: {test_file.stat().st_size} bytes | Type: {test_file.suffix} | ")
 306:                 f.write(f"Modified: {datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp(test_file.stat().st_mtime)}\n")
 307:                 f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
 308: 
 309:                 try:
 310:                     with open(test_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as tf:
 311:                         lines = tf.readlines()
 312:                         for i, line in enumerate(lines, 1):
 313:                             f.write(f"{i:5d}: {line.rstrip()}\n")
 314:                 except Exception as e:
 315:                     f.write(f"[ERROR READING FILE: {e}]\n")
 316: 
 317:                 f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
 318: 
 319:         # Autres fichiers (selon les patterns d'inclusion)
 320:         if other_files:
 321:             f.write("\n[OTHER FILES]\n")
 322:             f.write("="*80 + "\n")
 323: 
 324:             for other_file in other_files:
 325:                 file_counters['other'] += 1
 326:                 relative_path = other_file.relative_to(project_path)
 327: 
 328:                 f.write(f"\nFILE {file_counters['other']} | {relative_path}\n")
 329:                 f.write(f"Size: {other_file.stat().st_size} bytes | Type: {other_file.suffix} | ")
 330:                 f.write(f"Modified: {datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp(other_file.stat().st_mtime)}\n")
 331:                 f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
 332: 
 333:                 try:
 334:                     with open(other_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as of:
 335:                         lines = of.readlines()
 336:                         for i, line in enumerate(lines, 1):
 337:                             f.write(f"{i:5d}: {line.rstrip()}\n")
 338:                 except Exception as e:
 339:                     f.write(f"[ERROR READING FILE: {e}]\n")
 340: 
 341:                 f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
 342: 
 343:         # Structure du projet (version filtr√©e)
 344:         f.write("\n[PROJECT FILE STRUCTURE - FILTERED]\n")
 345:         f.write("="*80 + "\n")
 346:         f.write("Listing filtered project files...\n\n")
 347: 
 348:         for item in all_files:
 349:             relative_path = item.relative_to(project_path)
 350:             f.write(f"{relative_path}\n")
 351: 
 352:         # R√©sum√©
 353:         total_files = sum(file_counters.values())
 354:         f.write("\n" + "="*80 + "\n")
 355:         f.write("[SUMMARY]\n")
 356:         f.write("="*80 + "\n")
 357:         f.write(f"Total contract files: {file_counters['contracts']}\n")
 358:         f.write(f"Total script files: {file_counters['scripts']}\n")
 359:         f.write(f"Total test files: {file_counters['tests']}\n")
 360:         f.write(f"Total other files: {file_counters['other']}\n")
 361:         f.write(f"Total code files: {total_files}\n")
 362:         f.write(f"\nGenerated: {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n")
 363:         f.write("="*80 + "\n")
 364: 
 365:     print(f"\n‚úì Fichier cr√©√©: PROJECT_SHARE.txt")
 366:     print(f"‚úì Fichiers inclus: {total_files}")
 367:     print(f"  - Contrats: {file_counters['contracts']}")
 368:     print(f"  - Scripts: {file_counters['scripts']}")
 369:     print(f"  - Tests: {file_counters['tests']}")
 370:     print(f"  - Autres: {file_counters['other']}")
 371:     return True
 372: 
 373: def create_diff_share():
 374:     """Cr√©e un rapport des changements"""
 375:     print("\n" + "="*60)
 376:     print("CREATE DIFF SHARE")
 377:     print("="*60)
 378: 
 379:     # V√©rifier si on est dans un repo Git
 380:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git status")
 381:     if code != 0:
 382:         print("‚úó Pas dans un repository Git ou Git non install√©")
 383:         return False
 384: 
 385:     with open("DIFF_REPORT.txt", "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
 386:         # En-t√™te
 387:         f.write("="*80 + "\n")
 388:         f.write("STRUCTURED LENDING PROTOCOL - DIFF REPORT\n")
 389:         f.write("="*80 + "\n")
 390:         f.write(f"Date: {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n")
 391:         f.write("\n")
 392: 
 393:         # Status Git
 394:         f.write("[GIT STATUS]\n")
 395:         f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
 396:         code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git status --porcelain")
 397:         if code == 0 and stdout.strip():
 398:             changed_files = stdout.strip().split('\n')
 399:             f.write(f"Changed files: {len(changed_files)}\n\n")
 400: 
 401:             for file_status in changed_files:
 402:                 if file_status.strip():
 403:                     status = file_status[:2].strip()
 404:                     filename = file_status[3:].strip()
 405:                     f.write(f"{status}: {filename}\n")
 406: 
 407:                     # Afficher les diff√©rences
 408:                     if status in ['M', 'A', '??']:
 409:                         f.write("-"*40 + "\n")
 410:                         if status == '??':  # Nouveau fichier
 411:                             if os.path.exists(filename):
 412:                                 with open(filename, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as nf:
 413:                                     lines = nf.readlines()
 414:                                     for i, line in enumerate(lines, 1):
 415:                                         f.write(f"{i:4d}: {line.rstrip()}\n")
 416:                         else:  # Fichier modifi√©
 417:                             code, diff_output, _ = run_command(f"git diff {filename}")
 418:                             if code == 0 and diff_output:
 419:                                 f.write("Changes:\n")
 420:                                 f.write(diff_output)
 421:                         f.write("-"*40 + "\n")
 422:         else:
 423:             f.write("No changes detected in the working directory.\n")
 424: 
 425:         f.write("\n" + "="*80 + "\n")
 426:         f.write("[GIT DIFF SUMMARY]\n")
 427:         f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
 428:         code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git diff --stat")
 429:         if code == 0 and stdout:
 430:             f.write(stdout)
 431:         else:
 432:             f.write("No staged changes.\n")
 433: 
 434:     print("‚úì Fichier cr√©√©: DIFF_REPORT.txt")
 435:     return True
 436: 
 437: def git_commit_push_publish(config):
 438:     """Commit, push et publication sur GitHub"""
 439:     print("\n" + "="*60)
 440:     print("GIT COMMIT + PUSH + PUBLISH TO GITHUB")
 441:     print("="*60)
 442: 
 443:     github_token = config.get("GITHUB_TOKEN")
 444:     username = config.get("GITHUB_USERNAME")
 445:     repo_name = config.get("GITHUB_REPO_NAME")
 446: 
 447:     # V√©rifier le token
 448:     if not github_token or github_token.strip() == "":
 449:         print("\nüîë TOKEN GITHUB REQUIS")
 450:         print("Pour cr√©er un token:")
 451:         print("1. https://github.com/settings/tokens")
 452:         print("2. 'Generate new token (classic)'")
 453:         print("3. Donnez un nom")
 454:         print("4. S√©lectionnez 'repo' (TOUTE la section)")
 455:         print("5. 'Generate token'")
 456:         print("6. Copiez le token (commence par 'ghp_')\n")
 457: 
 458:         github_token = input("Collez votre token GitHub: ").strip()
 459:         if github_token:
 460:             if config.save_token(github_token):
 461:                 print("‚úì Token sauvegard√©")
 462:             else:
 463:                 print("‚ö† Token non sauvegard√© dans la config")
 464:         else:
 465:             print("‚úó Aucun token fourni")
 466:             return False
 467: 
 468:     # Demander le message de commit
 469:     commit_msg = input("\nMessage de commit (ENTER pour d√©faut): ").strip()
 470:     if not commit_msg:
 471:         commit_msg = f"üöÄ Automated commit: {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}"
 472: 
 473:     # √âtape 1: V√©rifier Git
 474:     print("\n1. V√©rification Git...")
 475:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git --version")
 476:     if code != 0:
 477:         print("‚úó Git non install√©")
 478:         print("T√©l√©chargez depuis: https://git-scm.com/downloads")
 479:         return False
 480:     print("‚úì Git install√©")
 481: 
 482:     # √âtape 2: Ajouter les fichiers
 483:     print("2. Ajout des fichiers...")
 484:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git add .")
 485:     if code != 0:
 486:         print(f"‚úó Erreur git add: {stderr}")
 487:         return False
 488:     print("‚úì Fichiers ajout√©s")
 489: 
 490:     # √âtape 3: Commit
 491:     print("3. Commit...")
 492:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command(f'git commit -m "{commit_msg}"')
 493:     if code != 0:
 494:         print(f"‚ö† Erreur commit (peut √™tre normal si pas de changements): {stderr}")
 495: 
 496:     # √âtape 4: Configurer remote
 497:     print("4. Configuration remote GitHub...")
 498:     remote_url = f"https://x-access-token:{github_token}@github.com/{username}/{repo_name}.git"
 499: 
 500:     # Supprimer et recr√©er le remote
 501:     run_command("git remote remove origin")
 502:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command(f'git remote add origin "{remote_url}"')
 503:     if code != 0:
 504:         print(f"‚úó Erreur configuration remote: {stderr}")
 505:         return False
 506:     print("‚úì Remote configur√©")
 507: 
 508:     # √âtape 5: Push
 509:     print("5. Push vers GitHub...")
 510:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git branch -M main")
 511:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git push -u origin main --force")
 512: 
 513:     if code == 0:
 514:         print("\n" + "="*60)
 515:         print("‚úÖ PUBLICATION R√âUSSIE !")
 516:         print("="*60)
 517:         print(f"Repository: https://github.com/{username}/{repo_name}")
 518:         print(f"Commit: {commit_msg}")
 519: 
 520:         # Afficher le dernier commit
 521:         code, last_commit, _ = run_command('git log --oneline -1')
 522:         if code == 0:
 523:             print(f"Dernier commit: {last_commit.strip()}")
 524: 
 525:         return True
 526:     else:
 527:         print(f"\n‚úó ERREUR PUSH: {stderr}")
 528: 
 529:         # Essayer m√©thode alternative
 530:         print("\nEssai m√©thode alternative...")
 531:         alt_remote_url = f"https://{username}:{github_token}@github.com/{username}/{repo_name}.git"
 532:         run_command("git remote remove origin")
 533:         run_command(f'git remote add origin "{alt_remote_url}"')
 534: 
 535:         code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git push -u origin main --force")
 536:         if code == 0:
 537:             print("‚úÖ Publication r√©ussie avec m√©thode alternative!")
 538:             print(f"Repository: https://github.com/{username}/{repo_name}")
 539:             return True
 540:         else:
 541:             print(f"‚úó √âchec m√©thode alternative: {stderr}")
 542:             return False
 543: 
 544: def share_to_github_gists(config):
 545:     """Partage sur GitHub Gists"""
 546:     print("\n" + "="*60)
 547:     print("SHARE TO GITHUB GISTS")
 548:     print("="*60)
 549: 
 550:     github_token = config.get("GITHUB_TOKEN")
 551: 
 552:     # V√©rifier le token
 553:     if not github_token or github_token.strip() == "":
 554:         print("\nüîë TOKEN GITHUB REQUIS")
 555:         print("Pour cr√©er un token:")
 556:         print("1. https://github.com/settings/tokens")
 557:         print("2. 'Generate new token (classic)'")
 558:         print("3. Donnez un nom")
 559:         print("4. S√©lectionnez 'gist' permission")
 560:         print("5. 'Generate token'")
 561:         print("6. Copiez le token (commence par 'ghp_')\n")
 562: 
 563:         github_token = input("Collez votre token GitHub (avec permission gist): ").strip()
 564:         if github_token:
 565:             if config.save_token(github_token):
 566:                 print("‚úì Token sauvegard√©")
 567:             else:
 568:                 print("‚ö† Token non sauvegard√© dans la config")
 569:         else:
 570:             print("‚úó Aucun token fourni")
 571:             return False
 572: 
 573:     # V√©rifier si le fichier de partage existe
 574:     if not os.path.exists("PROJECT_SHARE.txt"):
 575:         print("\n‚ö† PROJECT_SHARE.txt non trouv√©")
 576:         create = input("Cr√©er le fichier de partage d'abord? (o/n): ").lower()
 577:         if create == 'o':
 578:             create_full_share(config)
 579:         else:
 580:             print("‚úó Op√©ration annul√©e")
 581:             return False
 582: 
 583:     # V√©rifier la taille du fichier
 584:     file_size = os.path.getsize("PROJECT_SHARE.txt")
 585:     file_size_mb = file_size / (1024 * 1024)
 586: 
 587:     print(f"\nFichier: PROJECT_SHARE.txt")
 588:     print(f"Taille: {file_size} bytes ({file_size_mb:.2f} MB)")
 589:     print(f"Limite Gist: 1 MB")
 590: 
 591:     if file_size_mb > 1:
 592:         print("\n‚ö† Le fichier d√©passe la limite de 1 MB pour les Gists")
 593:         print("Options:")
 594:         print("1. Diviser en plusieurs Gists")
 595:         print("2. Essayer quand m√™me (peut √©chouer)")
 596:         print("3. Annuler")
 597: 
 598:         choice = input("\nVotre choix (1-3): ").strip()
 599:         if choice == '3':
 600:             return False
 601:         elif choice == '1':
 602:             return split_and_upload_gists(config, github_token)
 603: 
 604:     # Lire le contenu du fichier
 605:     try:
 606:         with open("PROJECT_SHARE.txt", 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
 607:             content = f.read()
 608:     except Exception as e:
 609:         print(f"‚úó Erreur lecture fichier: {e}")
 610:         return False
 611: 
 612:     # Pr√©parer la requ√™te API
 613:     headers = {
 614:         "Authorization": f"token {github_token}",
 615:         "Accept": "application/vnd.github.v3+json"
 616:     }
 617: 
 618:     data = {
 619:         "description": f"{config.get('PROJECT_NAME')} - Full Project Share {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d')}",
 620:         "public": False,
 621:         "files": {
 622:             "PROJECT_SHARE.txt": {
 623:                 "content": content
 624:             }
 625:         }
 626:     }
 627: 
 628:     print("\nEnvoi vers GitHub Gists...")
 629:     try:
 630:         response = requests.post("https://api.github.com/gists",
 631:                                 headers=headers,
 632:                                 json=data)
 633: 
 634:         if response.status_code == 201:
 635:             gist_data = response.json()
 636:             gist_url = gist_data["html_url"]
 637:             gist_id = gist_data["id"]
 638: 
 639:             print("\n" + "="*60)
 640:             print("‚úÖ GIST CR√â√â AVEC SUCC√àS !")
 641:             print("="*60)
 642:             print(f"URL: {gist_url}")
 643:             print(f"ID: {gist_id}")
 644: 
 645:             # Sauvegarder l'info du Gist
 646:             with open("GIST_INFO.txt", "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
 647:                 f.write(f"Gist URL: {gist_url}\n")
 648:                 f.write(f"Gist ID: {gist_id}\n")
 649:                 f.write(f"Created: {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n")
 650:                 f.write(f"Description: {data['description']}\n")
 651:                 f.write(f"File: PROJECT_SHARE.txt\n")
 652:                 f.write(f"Size: {file_size} bytes\n")
 653: 
 654:             print(f"\n‚úì Informations sauvegard√©es dans: GIST_INFO.txt")
 655:             return True
 656:         else:
 657:             print(f"‚úó Erreur API GitHub: {response.status_code}")
 658:             print(f"Message: {response.text}")
 659:             return False
 660: 
 661:     except Exception as e:
 662:         print(f"‚úó Erreur connexion: {e}")
 663:         return False
 664: 
 665: def split_and_upload_gists(config, github_token):
 666:     """Divise et upload sur plusieurs Gists"""
 667:     print("\n" + "="*60)
 668:     print("SPLIT AND UPLOAD TO MULTIPLE GISTS")
 669:     print("="*60)
 670: 
 671:     # Lire le fichier
 672:     try:
 673:         with open("PROJECT_SHARE.txt", 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
 674:             lines = f.readlines()
 675:     except Exception as e:
 676:         print(f"‚úó Erreur lecture fichier: {e}")
 677:         return False
 678: 
 679:     total_lines = len(lines)
 680:     max_lines_per_gist = 10000  # Environ 500KB-1MB selon la taille des lignes
 681:     num_parts = (total_lines // max_lines_per_gist) + 1
 682: 
 683:     print(f"Lignes totales: {total_lines}")
 684:     print(f"Lignes par Gist: {max_lines_per_gist}")
 685:     print(f"Nombre de parties: {num_parts}")
 686: 
 687:     gist_urls = []
 688: 
 689:     for part_num in range(1, num_parts + 1):
 690:         start_idx = (part_num - 1) * max_lines_per_gist
 691:         end_idx = min(part_num * max_lines_per_gist, total_lines)
 692: 
 693:         print(f"\nPartie {part_num}/{num_parts} (lignes {start_idx+1}-{end_idx})")
 694: 
 695:         # Extraire les lignes pour cette partie
 696:         part_lines = lines[start_idx:end_idx]
 697:         part_content = "".join(part_lines)
 698: 
 699:         # Pr√©parer la requ√™te API
 700:         headers = {
 701:             "Authorization": f"token {github_token}",
 702:             "Accept": "application/vnd.github.v3+json"
 703:         }
 704: 
 705:         data = {
 706:             "description": f"{config.get('PROJECT_NAME')} - Part {part_num}/{num_parts} {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d')}",
 707:             "public": False,
 708:             "files": {
 709:                 f"PROJECT_SHARE_PART{part_num}.txt": {
 710:                     "content": part_content
 711:                 }
 712:             }
 713:         }
 714: 
 715:         try:
 716:             response = requests.post("https://api.github.com/gists",
 717:                                     headers=headers,
 718:                                     json=data)
 719: 
 720:             if response.status_code == 201:
 721:                 gist_data = response.json()
 722:                 gist_url = gist_data["html_url"]
 723:                 gist_urls.append(gist_url)
 724:                 print(f"‚úì Partie {part_num} cr√©√©e: {gist_url}")
 725:             else:
 726:                 print(f"‚úó Erreur partie {part_num}: {response.status_code}")
 727: 
 728:         except Exception as e:
 729:             print(f"‚úó Erreur partie {part_num}: {e}")
 730: 
 731:     # Cr√©er un index des Gists
 732:     if gist_urls:
 733:         with open("GISTS_INDEX.txt", "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
 734:             f.write("="*60 + "\n")
 735:             f.write("GITHUB GISTS INDEX\n")
 736:             f.write("="*60 + "\n")
 737:             f.write(f"Project: {config.get('PROJECT_NAME')}\n")
 738:             f.write(f"Split into: {len(gist_urls)} parts\n")
 739:             f.write(f"Date: {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n")
 740:             f.write("\nGIST URLs:\n\n")
 741: 
 742:             for i, url in enumerate(gist_urls, 1):
 743:                 f.write(f"Part {i}: {url}\n")
 744: 
 745:         print("\n" + "="*60)
 746:         print("‚úÖ TOUS LES GISTS CR√â√âS !")
 747:         print("="*60)
 748:         print(f"Nombre de Gists: {len(gist_urls)}")
 749:         print(f"Index sauvegard√© dans: GISTS_INDEX.txt")
 750: 
 751:         # Afficher les URLs
 752:         print("\nURLs des Gists:")
 753:         for i, url in enumerate(gist_urls, 1):
 754:             print(f"  Part {i}: {url}")
 755: 
 756:         return True
 757: 
 758:     return False
 759: 
 760: # ============================================================================
 761: # MENU PRINCIPAL
 762: # ============================================================================
 763: 
 764: def clear_screen():
 765:     """Efface l'√©cran"""
 766:     os.system('cls' if os.name == 'nt' else 'clear')
 767: 
 768: def main_menu(config):
 769:     """Affiche le menu principal"""
 770:     while True:
 771:         clear_screen()
 772:         print("\n" + "="*60)
 773:         print(f"SHARE GITHUB V7 - {config.get('PROJECT_NAME')}")
 774:         print("="*60)
 775:         print(f"Repo: {config.get('GITHUB_USERNAME')}/{config.get('GITHUB_REPO_NAME')}")
 776:         print(f"Path: {config.get('PROJECT_PATH')}")
 777: 
 778:         # Afficher le statut du token
 779:         token = config.get("GITHUB_TOKEN")
 780:         if token and token.strip() != "":
 781:             print(f"GitHub: CONFIGUR√â {'*' * min(len(token), 10)}...")
 782:         else:
 783:             print("GitHub: NON CONFIGUR√â")
 784: 
 785:         print("\n" + "="*60)
 786:         print("MENU PRINCIPAL")
 787:         print("="*60)
 788:         print("1. CREATE FULL SHARE (all files with line numbers)")
 789:         print("2. CREATE DIFF SHARE (changed files only)")
 790:         print("3. GIT COMMIT + PUSH + PUBLISH TO GITHUB")
 791:         print("4. SHARE TO GITHUB GISTS")
 792:         print("5. CONFIGURATION")
 793:         print("6. EXIT")
 794:         print("="*60)
 795: 
 796:         choice = input("\nVotre choix (1-6): ").strip()
 797: 
 798:         if choice == "1":
 799:             create_full_share(config)
 800:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
 801: 
 802:         elif choice == "2":
 803:             create_diff_share()
 804:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
 805: 
 806:         elif choice == "3":
 807:             git_commit_push_publish(config)
 808:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
 809: 
 810:         elif choice == "4":
 811:             share_to_github_gists(config)
 812:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
 813: 
 814:         elif choice == "5":
 815:             configuration_menu(config)
 816: 
 817:         elif choice == "6":
 818:             print("\nAu revoir!")
 819:             break
 820: 
 821:         else:
 822:             print("Choix invalide!")
 823:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
 824: 
 825: def configuration_menu(config):
 826:     """Menu de configuration"""
 827:     while True:
 828:         clear_screen()
 829:         print("\n" + "="*60)
 830:         print("CONFIGURATION")
 831:         print("="*60)
 832: 
 833:         print("\nConfiguration actuelle:")
 834:         print(f"1. PROJECT_NAME: {config.get('PROJECT_NAME')}")
 835:         print(f"2. PROJECT_PATH: {config.get('PROJECT_PATH')}")
 836:         print(f"3. GITHUB_USERNAME: {config.get('GITHUB_USERNAME')}")
 837:         print(f"4. GITHUB_REPO_NAME: {config.get('GITHUB_REPO_NAME')}")
 838: 
 839:         token = config.get("GITHUB_TOKEN")
 840:         if token and token.strip() != "":
 841:             masked_token = token[:4] + "*" * (len(token) - 8) + token[-4:] if len(token) > 8 else "***"
 842:             print(f"5. GITHUB_TOKEN: {masked_token}")
 843:         else:
 844:             print("5. GITHUB_TOKEN: NON CONFIGUR√â")
 845: 
 846:         print(f"6. EXCLUDE_PATTERNS: {len(config.get('EXCLUDE_PATTERNS', []))} patterns")
 847:         print(f"7. EXCLUDE_DIRS: {len(config.get('EXCLUDE_DIRS', []))} dossiers")
 848:         print(f"8. INCLUDE_PATTERNS: {len(config.get('INCLUDE_PATTERNS', []))} patterns")
 849: 
 850:         print("\n9. Tester la connexion GitHub")
 851:         print("10. Sauvegarder la configuration")
 852:         print("11. Retour au menu principal")
 853:         print("="*60)
 854: 
 855:         choice = input("\nVotre choix (1-11): ").strip()
 856: 
 857:         if choice == "1":
 858:             new_name = input(f"Nouveau PROJECT_NAME [{config.get('PROJECT_NAME')}]: ").strip()
 859:             if new_name:
 860:                 config.config["PROJECT_NAME"] = new_name
 861: 
 862:         elif choice == "2":
 863:             new_path = input(f"Nouveau PROJECT_PATH [{config.get('PROJECT_PATH')}]: ").strip()
 864:             if new_path:
 865:                 config.config["PROJECT_PATH"] = new_path
 866: 
 867:         elif choice == "3":
 868:             new_user = input(f"Nouveau GITHUB_USERNAME [{config.get('GITHUB_USERNAME')}]: ").strip()
 869:             if new_user:
 870:                 config.config["GITHUB_USERNAME"] = new_user
 871: 
 872:         elif choice == "4":
 873:             new_repo = input(f"Nouveau GITHUB_REPO_NAME [{config.get('GITHUB_REPO_NAME')}]: ").strip()
 874:             if new_repo:
 875:                 config.config["GITHUB_REPO_NAME"] = new_repo
 876: 
 877:         elif choice == "5":
 878:             new_token = input("Nouveau GITHUB_TOKEN (ENTER pour effacer): ").strip()
 879:             config.config["GITHUB_TOKEN"] = new_token
 880: 
 881:         elif choice == "6":
 882:             print(f"\nEXCLUDE_PATTERNS actuel:")
 883:             for i, pattern in enumerate(config.get('EXCLUDE_PATTERNS', [])[:10], 1):
 884:                 print(f"  {i}. {pattern}")
 885:             if len(config.get('EXCLUDE_PATTERNS', [])) > 10:
 886:                 print(f"  ... et {len(config.get('EXCLUDE_PATTERNS', [])) - 10} autres")
 887:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
 888: 
 889:         elif choice == "7":
 890:             print(f"\nEXCLUDE_DIRS actuel:")
 891:             for i, dir_name in enumerate(config.get('EXCLUDE_DIRS', [])[:10], 1):
 892:                 print(f"  {i}. {dir_name}")
 893:             if len(config.get('EXCLUDE_DIRS', [])) > 10:
 894:                 print(f"  ... et {len(config.get('EXCLUDE_DIRS', [])) - 10} autres")
 895:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
 896: 
 897:         elif choice == "8":
 898:             print(f"\nINCLUDE_PATTERNS actuel:")
 899:             for i, pattern in enumerate(config.get('INCLUDE_PATTERNS', [])[:10], 1):
 900:                 print(f"  {i}. {pattern}")
 901:             if len(config.get('INCLUDE_PATTERNS', [])) > 10:
 902:                 print(f"  ... et {len(config.get('INCLUDE_PATTERNS', [])) - 10} autres")
 903:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
 904: 
 905:         elif choice == "9":
 906:             test_github_connection(config)
 907:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
 908: 
 909:         elif choice == "10":
 910:             try:
 911:                 with open(config.config_path, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
 912:                     json.dump(config.config, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False)
 913:                 print("‚úì Configuration sauvegard√©e!")
 914:             except Exception as e:
 915:                 print(f"‚úó Erreur sauvegarde: {e}")
 916:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
 917: 
 918:         elif choice == "11":
 919:             break
 920: 
 921: def test_github_connection(config):
 922:     """Teste la connexion √† l'API GitHub"""
 923:     print("\n" + "="*60)
 924:     print("TEST CONNEXION GITHUB")
 925:     print("="*60)
 926: 
 927:     token = config.get("GITHUB_TOKEN")
 928:     if not token or token.strip() == "":
 929:         print("‚úó Token GitHub non configur√©")
 930:         return
 931: 
 932:     headers = {
 933:         "Authorization": f"token {token}",
 934:         "Accept": "application/vnd.github.v3+json"
 935:     }
 936: 
 937:     try:
 938:         response = requests.get("https://api.github.com/user", headers=headers)
 939: 
 940:         if response.status_code == 200:
 941:             user_data = response.json()
 942:             print(f"‚úÖ Connexion r√©ussie!")
 943:             print(f"   Utilisateur: {user_data.get('login')}")
 944:             print(f"   Nom: {user_data.get('name', 'Non d√©fini')}")
 945:             print(f"   Email: {user_data.get('email', 'Non d√©fini')}")
 946: 
 947:             # Tester les permissions
 948:             print("\nüîç Test des permissions...")
 949: 
 950:             # Tester permission gist
 951:             try:
 952:                 gist_response = requests.post("https://api.github.com/gists",
 953:                                             headers=headers,
 954:                                             json={"description": "Test", "public": False, "files": {"test.txt": {"content": "test"}}})
 955:                 if gist_response.status_code in [201, 401, 403]:
 956:                     print(f"   Permission gist: {'‚úÖ' if gist_response.status_code == 201 else '‚úó'}")
 957:             except:
 958:                 print("   Permission gist: ‚úó")
 959: 
 960:         else:
 961:             print(f"‚úó Erreur connexion: {response.status_code}")
 962:             print(f"   Message: {response.text}")
 963: 
 964:     except Exception as e:
 965:         print(f"‚úó Erreur r√©seau: {e}")
 966: 
 967: # ============================================================================
 968: # POINT D'ENTR√âE
 969: # ============================================================================
 970: 
 971: if __name__ == "__main__":
 972:     print("\n" + "="*60)
 973:     print("SHARE GITHUB V7 - Python Version")
 974:     print("="*60)
 975: 
 976:     # Charger la configuration
 977:     config = Config()
 978: 
 979:     try:
 980:         main_menu(config)
 981:     except KeyboardInterrupt:
 982:         print("\n\nProgramme interrompu. Au revoir!")
 983:     except Exception as e:
 984:         print(f"\n‚úó Erreur inattendue: {e}")
 985:         import traceback
 986:         traceback.print_exc()
 987:         input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour quitter...")
